2a1(mdo sde): de'i mad/ bam po dang gi/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
2a2(mdo sde): skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcog na/ bcor ldan 'das
2b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbed yul rin de ngadake pa 'khyer bya
2b2(mdo sde): khyams de bzhi dag she gsong thig nas bsed dmas chen de
2b3(mdo sde): skyon kyi cho ga sang sngags pa/ sdud pa cher pe'i rgyu 'thun
2b4(mdo sde): paM/ sangs sras kyi chos tham sa cad ma pa ra sri
2b5(mdo sde): pas mjen par ga da pa~M/ ngang chub sems dpa' sems dang
3a1(mdo sde): rin po'i gnas/ mtha' yas pa nges par bstan pa/ dri bzhin
3a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyi rlangs/ mi chags pa'i spyod yul gyi ye shes la
3a3(mdo sde): 'jug pa/ dga' bar+ya chen po rab tu bskyed pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs
3a4(mdo sde): pa la 'jug pa/ kun ras ma smad pa/ ye shes kyis rnam par dpyod pa/ de'i rang bzhin
3a5(mdo sde): ma yin pa la 'jug pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par mngon du stod pa/ yon tan gyi tshogs
3b1(mdo sde): thams cad dpag tu med pa na bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni/ mngon
3b2(mdo sde): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ chos kyi 'khor lo ni rab tu bskor/ slob ma shin tu dul ba mtha' yas pa'i
3b3(mdo sde): tshogs ni mnga'/ chos tha mas cad la mnga'i ni brnyes/ sems ca/ na thams cad kyi bsam pa'i
3b4(mdo sde): bya ba ni shin tu mkhyen/ dbang po dam pa'i pha rol tu byon/ sem sa can thams cad kyi nyon
3b5(mdo sde): mongs pa'i bag chags kyi 'tshams sbyor ba yang dag par 'joms pa la ni mkhas shing / sangs rgyas kyi
3b6(mdo sde): mdzad pa lhun gyis grub ni rgyun ma bcad do// dge slong sa ya phrag drug gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang
4a1(mdo sde): thabs gcig ste/ thams cad kyang cang shes kyi sems dang ldan pa/ yang dag
4a2(mdo sde): ba'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor
4a3(mdo sde): ba yang dag par 'jo mas pa la brtson pa/ de bzhin gshegs dang chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/ chos
4a4(mdo sde): zab mo la gnas par mkhas pa/ dmigs su med pa'i chos la sa nges par byung ba/ spyod lam
4a5(mdo sde): mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa/ sbyin pa'i gnas chen por gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la
4a6(mdo sde): shin tu zhugs pa sha stag go// sangs rgyas kyi zhing / sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
4a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po dpag tu med/ grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du
4b1(mdo sde): med pa/ tshad med brjod du med pa'i yang brjod med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang yang thabs gcig ste/ thams cad kyang sems
4b2(mdo sde): kyi skad cig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'grol ba la mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim gro ba
4b3(mdo sde): ba la mkhas pa/ chos mnyan pa la mi ngoms par yang dag par tshul ba/ rtag tu rgyan mi 'chang bar sems can thams cad yongasu smin par byed po
4b4(mdo sde): la brtson pa/ thabs dang shes rab dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la rab tu gnas pa/ rtog po dang / rnam par
4b5(mdo sde): rtog pa dang / spros pa thams cad la sa yang dag par 'das pa/ thams cad mkhye/ na pa'i ye shes la nye bar gyur pa sha stag la 'di
4b6(mdo sde): lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rma ga gi lha zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'og/ yul las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba dang / bang
4b7(mdo sde): chung sems dpa'i rnam par snang mdzad snying po shes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gnon pa dpa' be zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
4b8(mdo sde): yid gnyis yang dag par 'joms pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bsgrags ldan zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa
5a1(mdo sde): / lta ba'i mig ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' mun pa bral zhes bya ba dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa rkyen
5a2(mdo sde): po dpag tu med/ tshad med grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du ming/ dpag gis mi lang / brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag dang
5a3(mdo sde): yang thabs gcig// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa chen po'i le'u zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la rab tu ston
5a4(mdo sde): te/  'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de na ma khi'i dkyil 'khod cing bkod pa chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i
5a5(mdo sde): na'adag 'dug pasnyam du shes// khang pa 'jug/ sa pa dag gi bkong ba de nyid sems can na/ mas kyi mig lngar snang bar gyur to// khang pa brtsegs pa
5a6(mdo sde): 'khor pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang / gzhan yong lha dang / klu dang / gnon sbyin dang / dri ba'i 'a
5a7(mdo sde): de dag thams cad ma gtogs par stong gsugyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gzugasu snang ba lhag me gzhan thams cad med par gyur te/ thams
5a8(mdo sde): cad kyang namakha' lta bur gyur pa snyam du shes so// 'di lta ste dper na/ bskal pas shin tu bsregs te/ na mkha' bzhin du gyur pa na stong gsum gyi stong
5b1(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten khams na/ gzugs snang ba gang yang mig lngar snang bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ de'i tshe na gang gzugs su snang ba rnams sems can dag gi
5b2(mdo sde): mig sngar mi snang bar gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa chen de zhes bya ba na/ bang
5b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de dag gi khang pa brtsegs pa yongasu longs spyod pa de 'dra ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa de na snang ngo // na mkha' la khang pa brtsegs pa 'dug po de
5b4(mdo sde): dgra ma gtogs par stong gsum gyi stong chen bai'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sa'i steng dang gzhi'i bar du thams cad kyang mi snang ba skar du rab tu shes so// 
5b5(mdo sde): ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / khor yug gi ri dang / khor yug gi ri chen po dag sems can gang gi mig sngar yang mi snas gyur te// grong dang grong khyer dang / 
5b6(mdo sde): gleng rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams kyang mi snang ste/ gan na du na mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa
5b7(mdo sde): de dag nyid du shes shing / bcom ldan 'das kyi song ge'i khri ni 'bang du dpag tshad khrir 'phags par rab tu snang ngo // gang la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i
5b8(mdo sde): seng ge'i khri de'i 'od kyis kyang / steng gsum gyi stong gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te/ gang steng gsum gyi steng
6a1(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'i nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i 'od de dag thams
6a2(mdo sde): cad kyang mog mog por byas par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad kyis 'di lta bu'i cho 'drul ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba
6a3(mdo sde): mthong nas/ phan tshan dro smra ba/ khang pa brtsegs pa 'di'i bkod pa ci 'dra ba de ni/ bdag cag gi tshe'i tshad bskal par 'dug par gyur kyang / bdag cag
6a4(mdo sde): gis rgya cher rnam par dbye ba bstan par sla bu ma yin te/ de tsam du khang ba brtsegs pa di dag gi yon tan dkod pa ni chang med do zhes 'dzer to// 
6a5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mthus/ gan sa brtan shA ri'i bu khrang pa brtsegs pa de nas langs nas na mkha' la la gu ste/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha
6a6(mdo sde): ngabatud nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal me sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das na mkha' la
6a7(mdo sde): mchis pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa 'di ma lags pa/ gzhan stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad namakhar gyur cing / nam mkha'i
6a8(mdo sde): rang bzhin du gangad rab 'di su'i snga ltas lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod kyis khang pa brtsegs pa brtsegs 'di mdzod/ 
6b1(mdo sde): dmang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyed kyis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag gi bsngags pa
6b2(mdo sde): yongasu brjod pa'i mtha' shes par nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis me'i chad bas par gyur kyang / khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag gi bsngags
6b3(mdo sde): ba'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu ji ltar 'khor 'di dag thams cad na mkha' la song zhing / khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa chen por
6b4(mdo sde): zhugs par snang ba bzhin du/ bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khang pa brtsegs pa de yang 'di 'dra'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bkod pa chen
6b5(mdo sde): po 'jig rten gyi khams de gang gi phyogs na mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la ba/ shA ri bu de ni 'di nas shar phyogasu sangs rgyas
6b6(mdo sde): kyi zhing brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyis yongasu gang ba rnyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'di sa pa na/ bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams
6b7(mdo sde): san de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba da lta na bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// shA ri'i bu bkod pa chen
6b8(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams den/ byang chub kyi sems rin po che las rin po che gzhan mi 'byung ngo // de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa de rin po che ba/  pa
7a1(mdo sde): / gcig pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de yang nam byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos 'chang ba de na seng ge khri dang bcas te/ 
7a2(mdo sde): la bye ba phrag brgyad cu srid kyi na mkha'i dkyil du mngon par 'phya'o/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa chen po dar na mkhwa'i dkyil
7a3(mdo sde): du mngon par 'bogs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la chos nyan to/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yang na mkha'i dkyil yongasu dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi
7a4(mdo sde): phyag rgya yang dag par rab tu ston to// ri'i bu bkod ba chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams den gang byang chub sems dpa'adi dag gi khang po rtsegs pa
7a5(mdo sde): yongasu longs spyod pa de ni bskal par yang brjod 'i nus// shA ri'i bu khyod kyis nga'i sang+ge ra khri 'di mthong ngam/ gsol ga bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo / 
7a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa de'i seng+ge'i khri yang 'di 'dra ste/ de la bcom
7a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis la 'jug gan mkha'i dkyil yongasu dag pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya yang dag
7a8(mdo sde): par rab tu ston te// rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis la 'jug pa na mkha'i dkyi'i yengasu dag pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dngos po meng pas chos pa
7b1(mdo sde): cad yod pa dang med pa dang bral ba dang / rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid bas/ chos thams cad dngos po med pa dang / snang dar gyur pa med pas ches thas / 
7b2(mdo sde): rig pa mang ba dang / rgyu dang dmigs pa med pas chos thams cad snang bar gyur pa med pa dang / nye bar ni ba'i mchen ting pas/ ches thams cad dmigs pa
7b3(mdo sde): red pa dang / gnyi su med pas chos thams cad nye bar zhi ba dang / so so tha dad pa med pas chos thams cad gsu med pa dang / tshul gcig la zhugs pas
7b4(mdo sde): ches thams cad tha dad pa med pa dang / ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang bral bas ches thams cad kul gcig pa dang / dus gsum la yang dag par 'das
7b5(mdo sde): pas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid meng pa nga / thams cad la mi gnas pas chos thams cad na mkha'i dkyil dang / thams cad du mi snang bas ches
7b6(mdo sde): thams cad mi gnas pa'i sgo dang yul gyi lam las yang dag par 'das pas chos thams cad snang ba med pa dang / nang dang phyi rnam par rig pas ches thar
7b7(mdo sde): cad yul med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pas/ chos thams cing rnam par dag pa dang / ngo bo nyid kyis nye bar zhi ngas/ 
7b8(mdo sde): thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs dag pa dang / sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa med pas/ chos thams cad nye bar ni dang / gzeng ba sa pa
8a1(mdo sde): byung bas/ chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang / ba ba med cing yongasu 'dzin pa med pas/ chos thams cad bzod ma nas ma byung ba dang // 
8a2(mdo sde): bdag po med pas/ chos thams cad nga'i ba med cing yongasu 'dzin pa med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis bdag med pas chos thams cad bdag po med pa dang / bzeng
8a3(mdo sde): ma nas rnam par dag pas/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa dang / ldog pa med pas chos thams cad bzod ma nas rnam par dag pa dang / sgyu
8a4(mdo sde): ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin byas/ chos thams cad ldog ba med pa dang / dngos po med pas chos tham sa cang sgyu ma lta bu dang / mngon par 'dzu
8a5(mdo sde): byed pa'i mtshan nyid pas/ chos thams cad dngos po me da pa dang / sems dang lus dben pas/  chos thams cad mngon par 'dus ma byas
8a6(mdo sde): pa dang / mtshan nyid med cing mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'i mtshan nyid med pas/ chos thams cad dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid las ma g.yos pas
8a7(mdo sde): chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang / gnas dmigasu med pas chos thams cad ma g.yos pa dang / dmigs pa med pa'i mtha' la rab tu gnas pas/ 
8a8(mdo sde): chos thams cad gnas pa med pa dang / kun gzhi med pas chos thams cad dmigs pa med pa dang / kun gni dang bral bas chos thams cad kun gzhi
8b1(mdo sde): med pa ste/ shA ri'i bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa de byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis la 'jug pa nam
8b2(mdo sde): mkha'i dkyil yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya yang dag par rab tu ston te/ de thos pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa dag mngon par shes
8b3(mdo sde): pa rnam par dag pas rnam par shes pa la bzad pa/ chos thams cad la dbang byed pa rjes su 'thob bo// yang / shA ri'i bu bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten
8b4(mdo sde): gyi khams de'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sbyin pas brgyan cing bskal pa grangs med par gtong ba rje su seng ba/ tshul khrims kyis brgyan
8b5(mdo sde): cing blo shin tu byung ba/ bzod pas brgyan cing sems can thams cad la zhe 'grus pa med pa'i sems/ dang ldan pa/ brtson 'grus kyis brgyun cing
8b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi chos thams cad kyi tshogs bsags pa/ bsam gtan gyis brgyan cing bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting 'dzin
8b7(mdo sde): dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam par rtsen pa/ shes rab kyis rgyan cing bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon
8b8(mdo sde): mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba/ byams pa chen pos brgyan cing / sems can thams yongs su skyob par gnas pa/ snying rje tshon pas
9a1(mdo sde): / brgyad cing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa/ dga' ba chen pos brgyan cing / sems can thams cad dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / rab tu dga' nga la
9a2(mdo sde): so sor 'god pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa/ btang snyoms chen pos brgyan cing / sems can thams cad mi mtho mi dma' ba la 'god pa rgyur mi gcod par sbyor ba sha stag go// yang shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
9a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa rin po che dkod pa gcig pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi ning na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po namakha'i mdzod ces bya ba 'dug ste/ bsod nams kyis gzi brjid kyis shin tu brjid pa/ 
9a4(mdo sde): ye shes mthong ba thogs pa med pa/ mtshan rnams kyis lus brgyan pa/ dpe brang bzang po rnams kyis byams pa brgyan ba/ spobs pas ngag brgyan pa/ gzungs kyis sems brgyan
9a5(mdo sde): pa/ thos pas dran pa brgyan pa/ nges par sems pas bden pa brgyan pa/ rtogs pas don rtogs pa brgyad pa/ bsam pas dam bcas pa brgyan pa/ khyad par du 'gro bas lhag pa'i bsam
9a6(mdo sde): pa brgyan pa/ sbyor bas brgyan cing chos thams cad la the tsom med par gyur pa/ btang snyoms chen pos brgyan cing mthon dman med pa/ mngon par shes pa chen pos brgyan cing / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par
9a7(mdo sde): rtsen pa thams cad mngon par shes pa/ bsod nams kyis brgyan cing / lag na rin po che gtong ba mngon par grub pa/ ye shes kyis brgyan cing sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa la zhugs pa/ 
9a8(mdo sde): blos brgyan cing sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba rtogs par byed pa/ mig gis brgyan cing mig lnga'i yul la shin tu rnam par dag pa/ rna bas brgyan cing sgra dang don thams cad rtogs pa snying po dang / 
9b1(mdo sde): ldan pa/ so so yang dag par rig pas brgyan cing // don dang chos dang nges pa'i tshig dang spongs pa so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad par ston pa/ stobs kyis brgyan cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
9b2(mdo sde): stobs bcu rjes su thob pa/ mi 'jigs pas brgyan cing / pas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/ yon tan gyis brgyan cing sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas bzod pa/ 
9b3(mdo sde): chos kyis brgyan cing spu'i bu ga thams cad nas chos sgrog pa/ so so rig pa'i rjesu song ba/ snang bas brgyan cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad lag 'thil du thod pa/ 'od kyis brgyar cing sangs rgyas
9b4(mdo sde): kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byed pa/ kun nas ston pas brgyan cing chang par lung ston pa/ gdams pa dang rjes su bstan pas brgyan cing / de byed pa'i chos tshar phyin pa cu yu
9b5(mdo sde): rnam par dag pas rnam par grol ba thams cad ston pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pas brgyan cing gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes la gnas pa/ tshogs/ 
9b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi yon tan gyis brgyan cing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos 'dul ba'i rjes su zhugs pa ste/ shA ri'i bu gang bkod pa 'di lta bu kun tu snang ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
9b7(mdo sde): namakha'i mdzod kyi byin gyis brlabs so// shA ri 'i bya byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po namakha' mdzod de nga la blta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / 'dus pa
9b8(mdo sde): chen po 'i le'u chos kyi rnamagrangs 'di rab tu yongs su bzung ba dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag chos kyi dga' ba dang / bde bdang // 
10a1(mdo sde): mchog tu dga' bskyed pa dang / theg pa chen po 'di'ang rab tu yong su bzung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyang yong su bzung ba'i phyir nga'i gan
10a2(mdo sde): du'ong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dkod pa gcig pa de la gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis kyis yongs su
10a3(mdo sde): bskor te/ mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu mngon du gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mi byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas ma
10a4(mdo sde): snang bar gyur te/ sems kyi skad cig gcig 'byung ba tsam gyis/ da mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin nas de bar snang la 'dug ste/ da/ bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi me tog dang / 
10a5(mdo sde): phreng ba dang / phye ma dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i char rab tu phab pa 'di lta ste/ zla ba dang zla ba chen po dang / shin tu mdzes pa'i zla ba
10a6(mdo sde): dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / nyi ma rab tu 'bar dang / me she la dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / mdog mdzes par 'dug pa dang / sbal dang / sbal chen po dang / sba la rab tu mdzes dang / 
10a7(mdo sde): dri ma med pa dang / kun tu dri ma med pa dang / rnam dag 'od dang / gser du snang dang / na mkhar snang dang / reg gyur dang / dri chen dkar dang / 'dab brgya pa dang / ze ba stong ldan dang / mya ngan sel
10a8(mdo sde): dang / dga' byed dang / lhas pastong dang / klung mi tog dang / dga' ba kun skyed dang / bsam gtan yan lag dang / dri dga' dang / lus sems ches byed dang / stong gsum dri nga / nang
10b1(mdo sde): kun ni byed dang / nang kun sel dang / bdag gi gzi brjid kyis brgyan cing dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyis grub pa/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' reg pa de lta bu'i me tog gis stong gsum gyi stong
10b2(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kun tu khebs par byas pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du me tog pus mo nub tsam du gang bar gyur to// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i
10b3(mdo sde): 'khor des sngon pa thos ma mthong ba'i me tog de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i me tog blta na sdug pa 'di dag g.yas mchis/ bcom
10b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mnga'i mdzod de bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas 'dir 'ongs te/ de nam mkha'i dkyil du 'dug
10b5(mdo sde): nas/ 'di lta bu'i me tog gi char rab tu phab bo// de nas byang // chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod byang chub se dmas dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis po de dag dang lhan cig
10b6(mdo sde): tu/ nam mkha'i dkyil de nas babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
10b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas
10b8(mdo sde): sam zhes spyan gsol zhing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis po 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam
11a1(mdo sde): grangs nyan 'tshal ba 'di dag ji ltar chos thams cad la dbang bgyid cing chos chen po dang ldan pas/ slar ldog par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi dka' mchid kyis
11a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis mgu bar mdzod cig ces de skad kyang gsung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khwa'i steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad
11a3(mdo sde): stong phrag bcu tsam gyi rin po che'i gdugs su byin gyis brlab nas/ bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par sdod pa/ chos
11a4(mdo sde): dang don dang yon tan ye shes 'phags pas na/ yod/ das dag rnam dag snga nas dag cing dri ma med// gnas medanam mkha' 'dra bar mi g.yo rab tu bsnyes// rab
11a5(mdo sde): zab kun nas spyod yul min la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba chos kyi skus ni rab po sku mnyam yang // gzugs mdzes ldan ning gzugs bzang sku yang ston par mdzes// semra
11a6(mdo sde): can rnams la phan pa'i thugs rje rab bskyed nas// bsod nams brgya ba'i mtshan gyi sku'i mchog kyang ston// khyod ni mi gsungs rtog med sgra dang tshig kyang med// tshig gi rang bzhin brag tsha/ 
11a7(mdo sde): mtshan nyid gzung du med// sgra med rtag med yi ge med pa mkhyen nas kyang // byams pa khyod ni snying rje can pas rgyal ba'i tshigs kyang gsung // sems can kun gyi sems dang sems
11a8(mdo sde): byung rjes su ri// khyod ni sems kyi rang bzhin sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid mkhyen// sems kyi rgyud kyi rang bzhin ji 'dra rab mkhyed kyang // sems dang yid rnams la ni khyod kyi sems mi gnas/ 
11b1(mdo sde): 'gro ba rnams la khyod kyis spyod pa kun bstan te// bde bar gshegs pa'i sku ni 'gyur ba yong ma mchis// gang gi gzugs dang sems dang yon tan ci 'dra bar// mtshan dang spyod la ma dag
11b2(mdo sde): kyang de'i tshul tu ston// didi gshegs chos 'di la ni nga yir 'dzin pa med// khyod ni chos la gnas pa med cing 'dzin pa med// sems can mang po kun rtog chos kyis 'dul mkhyen nas/ 
11b3(mdo sde): khyod ni bla na med pa'i chos rnams rtag tu ston// dral ba'i skul 'khor 'di kun gyis bltas pa na// gzugs dang mtshan ma tha dang skal ba mi mnyam gnas// khyod kyi sku ni mi 'gyur rtog med
11b4(mdo sde): mtshan med de// 'khor rnams ji lta'i sems dang bsam bzhin tshim par mdzad// chos 'di thams cad rgyu dang skyes pa ste// byed med ngo bo nyid med kun tu rtog las
11b5(mdo sde): skyes// bde gshegs de 'dra'i chos kyi tshul rnams mkhyen nas/ su// byang chub mi 'gyur ni babla na med pa brnyes// mnga'// dang de bzhin dbus bcad rnam par rtog pa med// stong
11b6(mdo sde): zhing gsog la rang bzhin gsob ste ya ma rA// khyod kyis de 'dra'i chos nyid rnam dag mkhyen nas su// 'gro ba rnams la rgyu dang las dang byed pa ston// chos 'dis sems can med cing srog
11b7(mdo sde): dang gang zag med// nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam pas na ming yang rnam par dag/ sems can gan du nyer gshegs yang dag bdag med pa// mi 'chi 'dus ma byas la sems can mang sang mdzad/ 
11b8(mdo sde): brtson 'grus mthu dang stobs kyis byang chub 'di tshol phyir// khyod kyis bskal pa bsam yas bye ba phrag brgyar bshad// sgrub pa med pa'i nan tan man nying byang chub ste// gang phyir spyod pa'i don de/ 
12a1(mdo sde): rjes su thob par gyur// chos rnams mnyam pa nyid ni mnyam par banag mkhyen pas/ rab dang 'bring dang tha ma dag kyang mnyam par mkhyen// mnyam pa nyid la mnyam/ 
12a2(mdo sde): nyid rtag bzhugs rnam mi rtog/ de phyir rgyal ba mnyam par bzhag cing mi 'gyur ba// phung po khams dang dbang po ji ltar sbrum bzhin// 'jig rten gsum po chu bla 'dra ste 'pho ba med// sem
12a3(mdo sde): can rnams ni rmi lam lta bur dngos med de// mkhyen pas rmi lam bzhin du rtogs nas chos 'di gsung // byang chub mchog rab brda yi rang bzhin khyod kyis brnyes// de ni thob dang ma thob pa zhes brjod/ 
12a4(mdo sde): du med/ ji ltar byang chu khyod kyis de bzhin 'khor lo yang / tshul dang tshul min 'dug pa'i mtshan thal rab tu bskor/ rgal nas sems can mang po bsam yas rab skol ba/ 
12a5(mdo sde): grol nas bcings pa'i nang na mchis pa shin tu 'grol/ thig chen bla med 'di la 'grol ba dazugs 'dren cing // nges 'byin mnyam pa brnyes pa mya ngan 'das la 'god// gang / 
12a6(mdo sde): mamang sems can ni yang mya ngan 'das ma mchis// sems can gdod nas rnam dag sems can nyid mi sdug/ sems can sgyu ma'i mtshan du byang chub sangs rgyas nas// 'di'i mtha' rnams
12a7(mdo sde): sems can mang po rtogs par mdzad// namamapa' la ni gzugs rnams nam yang mi snang yin// de ltar 'gro ba kun gyi gzugs ni gzugs nyid mtshungs// chos de gzugs dang gzugs
12a8(mdo sde): ming gzugs min mtshan nyid de// gang gis de ltar don rnams yang dag dpe rtogs pa// ji tsam rgyal ba'i bsngags bdag gi dbar bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bsngags pa la
12b1(mdo sde): mthong chags te// rang gi yon tan rnams kyi 'dren bsngags nam mkha' 'dra// gnyis med bsngags brjod 'di ni rgyal ba'i bsngags pa'o// sangs rgyas 'gro ba sad par mdzad cing dmigs
12b2(mdo sde): med pa// sems med sems nyid brnyes pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar 'dren pa kun gyis mi'i seng ge bsngags// de ltar de bzhin nyid phyir yang dag yon tan bsngags// sems
12b3(mdo sde): can thams cad bdag med mtshan nyid ye shes mnyam// thams cad rtogs nas chos dbyings rjes su rig par bgyi// chos kun 'dod chags bral ba'i mtshan gyi tshul shes pa/ des ni
12b4(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid kyis 'dren pa mchod par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod kyis tshigs su bcad ba 'di dag smras ma thab tu// nam mkha' la bdug pa'i khang
12b5(mdo sde): ba brtsegs pa bkod pa chen po de'ang rnam pa drug du rab tu g.yos so// bar snang las kyang gang sangs rgyas bcom lda na 'das rnams kyis bskal pa thangs med pa bye ba khrag
12b6(mdo sde): khrig brgya stong du yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs
12b7(mdo sde): kyis kun brjod do// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni rmi lam na'ang mngon par zhen pas dmigs pa'i lta ba mi 'byung ngo // gang dag tshigasu bcad pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas mos pa dang / 
12b8(mdo sde): gang yang zos nas sgrub pa de dag ni// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod da ltar seng ge'i sgra sgrog par 'gyur ro zhes de lta bu'i sgra bung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i
13a1(mdo sde): mdzod kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam
13a2(mdo sde): grangs 'di'i ming zos nas/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang // phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang chos snang
13a3(mdo sde): bar bgyi ba gang cung zad bstan pa'i slad du 'dir mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rang gi chos la the tsom du gyur pa nges par bstan pa/ bcom
13a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhu ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i blo la rab tu gnas pas// de dag gi the tsom thams cad kyang rab tu bsal cing / sangs rgyas kyi
13a5(mdo sde): chos thams cad snang bar bgyis pade leg so// bcom ldan/ 'das gal te de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la skabs phye na/ chos rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa'i bka' mchid cung zad
13a6(mdo sde): gcig bdag nu'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ni mi chags pa'i ye shes can te/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma lags pa mkhyen pa/ ye shes
13a7(mdo sde): la mkhas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni snang ba brnyes pa ste/ mun pa thams cad dang bral ba/ bcom ldan 'das ni don mkhyen pa ste/ tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ 
13a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ni dus mkhyen pa ste/ tshod las mi 'da' zhing phyang par lung ston pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni tshod mkhyen pa ste/ sems can thams cad la so so ci rigs par chos ston
13b1(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das ni rnam par rol ba ste/ mngon par shes pa dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par nges pa'i ye shes la mangs pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni shin tu rnam par gzigs pa'i blo dang ldan pa
13b2(mdo sde): ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa phyag mthil du 'jog par kun ston pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni mngon par 'phags ste/ spyi gtsug ltar mi mthong ba/ bcom ldan 'das ni zil
13b3(mdo sde): gyis mnon pa ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na dpa' bo gcig po// bcom ldan 'das ni rang byung ba ste/ slob dpon med par chos thams cad rang gis
13b4(mdo sde): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'dren rab ste/ 'dren pa med pa dang lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams la yang dag pa'i lam ston pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni ldan pa'i
13b5(mdo sde): rgyal po ste/ thog ma dang lam ma mchis pa'i 'dod padang / nyin mongs pa dang / kun tu slob pa dang / shin tu sgrub pa/ dang / kun ras ldang bas bsdangs pa'i 'jig rter
13b6(mdo sde): gnas pa rnams nad ma mchis pa/ 'chi ba ma mchis pa'i gnas kyi lam la rab tu 'god pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni stobs dang drag shul 'chang ba ste/ gnas dang gnas ma yid pa
13b7(mdo sde): mkhyed pa la mkhas shing gsum rig pa'i rig pa brnyes pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni mi 'jigs pa chen po brnyes pa ste/ zag bzad cing mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
13b8(mdo sde): te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa la mkhas pa/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du khyu mchog seng ge'i sgra sgrog pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni sangs rgyas
14a1(mdo sde): / chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa ste/ dus gsum la logs pa med pa'i ye shes can/ bcom ldan 'das ni sku dang gsung dang thugs yongs su dag pa ste/ 'khrul ba dang
14a2(mdo sde): tshem mnga' ba/ snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni byams pachen po la gnas paste/ ni 'gras pa med pa 'drob
14a3(mdo sde): ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i 'od zer gyis gzigs pa'i spyan drang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje chen po la gnas pa ste/ 
14a4(mdo sde): legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal bsam mi bskyod pa dang / sems can / thams cad la mnyam par 'jug pa'i blo dang ldan pa
14a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa ste/ mnyam pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa la zhugs pa bcom ldan 'das ni bye brag med pa ste/ nam mkha' lta bur shin tu
14a6(mdo sde): rnam par dag cing / sems can thams cad la mnyam par sbyor ba/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'dod pa med pa ste/ shes rab kyis ngoms pa/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang
14a7(mdo sde): bral ba bcom ldan 'das ni thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa/ sman lnga'i tshul yongs su dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dang chos dang
14a8(mdo sde): ye shes tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan par bdag gis rig nas chos rab tu brjod pa'i sgo yongs su zhu bar 'tshal te/ gus pa dang bcas shing chos la gces spras su bgyi ba dang ldan pa ste/ nga rgyal
14b1(mdo sde): ma mchis shing sems can thams cad chos la sbyor ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrubs pas chos 'tshal ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su ru'o// de skad ces pam
14b2(mdo sde): bdang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// legs so legs so// skyes bu dam pa ji ltar khyod gang ga'i
14b3(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dris pa rnams lung bstan pa thob pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod mi dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shog dang // dris pa de dang de nyid
14b4(mdo sde): lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi rgyal po rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug
14b5(mdo sde): ba des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// ci zhig gi phyir rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar 'dod/ 
14b6(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi rgyal pa rab tu snang ba la tshigs su bcad pas smras
14b7(mdo sde): btagang rnams sems dang sems la sems yid mtshungs// shin tu bsams sems ye shes mnyam la gnas// sems la sems med par ni zhugs pa'i tshul// de dag don tu
14b8(mdo sde): rgyal gang bdag zhu'o// snang ba thob cing mun pa dri ma med// yid gnyis can gyi yid gnyis blo gcod pas// nges byas rnam par thar pa lag bzhag pa// de dag ched du bde bar
15a1(mdo sde): gshegs la zhu// bdag la bdag med shin tu rnam dag yid// sems can don zhugs sems can med la dga'// sems can bdag med gnyis las par
15a2(mdo sde): byed pa// rnam par nges pa'i chos kyi gtam 'dri'o// cho ga spyod pa brtul zhugs yongs su dag/ bsam pa dag cing sems ni nam mkha' 'dra// lhun po lta bur brtan zhing mi g.yo ba// de
15a3(mdo sde): dag ched du yon tan mdzad la nu// blo bzlogs brtan pa brtson 'grus kun nas bzang // dpa' bo bdun gyi dgra yang rgyal bcom// nyon mongs rab tu nyon mongs dri spyong ba// mthong dga' de/ 
15a4(mdo sde): dag don tu da du'o// chos sbyin tshul khrims brjod/ ba brtson 'grus dpa'// bsam gtan rnam par shes/ rab mchog tu myur/ mngon shes pasam gtan rnam par
15a5(mdo sde): grol ba'i 'ong // rab dag dri med don tu bdag tshu'o/ stong pa mtshan ma med cing gi sgron gnas// bsams shi 'bo dang ni skye btsun// skyes pa med cing mi gnas 'a
15a6(mdo sde): 'amed/ de dag dang ma mi spyong ban// nyan ces rang rgyas skyes gzhan dag gis// rtogs pa dag did bang mo yong dag ga/ spyi hU~M gyi mau rnams bskul ba ma// chos kyi
15a7(mdo sde): gtam ni bde bar gshegs la nu// legs par byas pa rdzogs pa'i chos la dga'// chos la chos med 'dzin pa gnyis las grol// rtag tu mnyam pa zhig mchog gi chos la dgar
15a8(mdo sde): sems kyang nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i don tu ru// gang dag sangs rgyas rigs gnas chos la dag la/ rtag tu sangs rgyas bstod pa kun med tho// grags pa mtha' yas 'jig rten gsum
15b1(mdo sde): du thos// yon tan rgya mtsho de phyir 'di zhu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar/ 
15b2(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' dag sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ tshul khrims nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / brtson 'grus nam
15b3(mdo sde): mnga' dang mtshungs pa dang / bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / bsod nams nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / ye shes nam mkha'
15b4(mdo sde): dang mtshungs pa rnams lags// sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang // chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang // gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang // tshul
15b5(mdo sde): khrims rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral ba rnams lags/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i lha rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral/ pa rnams lags/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa thob
15b6(mdo sde): cing byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa yang spyod de/  mas can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang cho ga shes pa rnams lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos
15b7(mdo sde): dkon mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa dang / mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos gang de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid de'i chos thams cad yongs su
15b8(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang / thog ma nas sems can rnam par dag pas/ sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i slad du/ 
16a1(mdo sde): tshul bzhin du'ang rab tu sbyor ba rnams lags// mngon par shes pa las mnyams shing chos thams cad la dbang bgying ba rnams lags/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
16a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyis shin tu rtogs par dga' ba'i chos kyi tshul zab mo la zhugs pa rnams lags/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mangs te/ mtha' gnyis lta ba rnams
16a3(mdo sde): cad dang bral ba rnams lags// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams lags// chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la rab tu zhugs shing
16a4(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba rnams lugs// gabasam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed de theg pa chen to da 'di la legs par gnas shing / maM g.yo ba rnams lag/ 
16a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yul rjes su thob cing rang gi yul yongs su dag pa rnams lags// gzungs thob pa rtag tu mi brjed pa spyod pa rnams lags/ spobs pa thogs pa med cing rgyun mi
16a6(mdo sde): 'chang la rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa rnams lags// skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho dang / 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa rnams lags/ bdud bani'i
16a7(mdo sde): lam las yang dag par 'das shing // bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad bcom pa rnams lags// bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa bsags shing sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar
16a8(mdo sde): gyur pa rnams lags// sangs rgyas rnams mthung yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzud pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa rnams gnas pa rnams lags// rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge
16b1(mdo sde): 'dzin thob cing / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la mi chags pa rnams lags// chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa dang / nam mkha' la rlung mar lta bu'i sems dang
16b2(mdo sde): ldan pa rnams lags// cho ga dang spyod pa'i tshul shes pa dang mun pa dang bral zhing snang ba thod pa rnams lags// gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang 'byung gi ye shes shin tu rtogs pa rnams
16b3(mdo sde): lags// myur du theg pa chen po la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di thob par 'gyur lags// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
16b4(mdo sde): po nam mkha'i mdzod la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod leg so legs so// skyes bu chen po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so// 
16b5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ khyod ni sems can thams cad kyi gsol pa ma btab pa'i bshes gnyen/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la snang ba thob pa/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje
16b6(mdo sde): chen po'i go cha bgos pa/ bgrang ba las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ rtag tu chos tshol bas mi ngoms pa ye shes kyi mtshon cha can/ nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad
16b7(mdo sde): las yang dag par 'das pa/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chang par sems can gyi don la brtson pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad las yang dag par 'das pa/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems
16b8(mdo sde): kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par sgrub pa ste/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi yon tan rnams kyi mtha' rtogs par sla ba ma yin no// de'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod legs par rab
17a1(mdo sde): nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yon tan rnams dang gzhan dag kyang thong bar 'gyur ba bshad do// bcom
17a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod// bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
17a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bdag rnam par dag pas sems can rnam par dag pa
17a4(mdo sde): la 'jug pa dang / sems can rnam par dag pas sbyin pa rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa dang / sbyin pa rnam par dag pas bsngo ba rnam par dag la 'jug pa dang / bsngo ba rnam par dag/ 
17a5(mdo sde): pasabyang chub rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub semasadapa' sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// 
17a6(mdo sde): des rnam par dag pa brgyad kyi sgo nas sbyin pa de sbyin te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ngar 'dzin pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ nga yir 'dzin pa rnam par dag par sbyin pade sbyin// 
17a7(mdo sde): rgyu rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ lta ba rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ mtshan ma rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ tha dad pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ rnam par smin
17a8(mdo sde): pa la mi re ba rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ nam mnga' dang mtshungs pa'i sems rnam par dag par sbyin par sbyin te/ rnam par dag pa brgyad po 'di dag gi sgo nas sbyin pa de sbyin no// ji
17b1(mdo sde): ltar nam mkha' mtha' med pa de bzhin du sems mtha' med par byas te/ sbyin pa de sbyin// ji ltar nam mnga' rgya che zhing bsgribs pa med pa de bzhin du byang chub tu bsngos te sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar/ 
17b2(mdo sde): nam mkha' la gzugs med pa de bzhin du/ gzugs thams cad la mi gnas par sbyin bde sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' la tshor ba med pa de bzhin du tshor ba thams cad dang bral bar sbyin pa
17b3(mdo sde): myod/ de ltar rnamam pa' la shes med pa de bzhin du/ 'du shes thams cad kyi 'du ba med par smin pa spyodan// ji ltar nam mtha' 'das ma byas pa de bzhin du/ 'du
17b4(mdo sde): thams cad med par sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' mtshan nyid rnam par rig pa me'i de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pami gnas par sbyin bde sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkhas
17b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad khyab pa de bzhin du/ sems can la byams pas khyab par sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' mi zad pa de bzhin du/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rig
17b6(mdo sde): mi zad par bsngo zhing sbyin pa de sbyin// ji ltar nam mkha' la mun pa med pa de bzhin du/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi mun pa med par sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' rtag par rab tu snang
17b7(mdo sde): ba de bzhin du/ sems kyi rang bzhin yongasu dag par sbyin bde sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' sems cad thams cad kyi go skabs 'byed pa de bzhin du/ sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar sbyin pa
17b8(mdo sde): de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' nga'i ba med pa bzhin du/ sems can thams cad yid la byed pa thams cad bral bar sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar sprul pas sprul pa la sbyin pa sbyin pa lta bur rnam par mi
18a1(mdo sde): rtog cing / lhun gyis 'grub ste/ sems dang yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral zhing chos thams cad la re ba med pa de ltar gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir// sgyu ma'i
18a2(mdo sde): mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag par byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa de sbyin te/ rigs kyi bu gang de lta bur sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de ni shes rab kyi ye shes kyis ni sems can thams cad
18a3(mdo sde): kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su 'dir zhing / thabs kyi ye shes kyis ni sems can thams cad mi gtong nga ste/ rigs kyi bu de lta bur gtong ba'i sems ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa
18a4(mdo sde): namapa' dang mtshungs pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems dang / ra' sems dpa' chen po kha ga na mar me zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'das
18a5(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba 'di 'dra ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa
18a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag rnam pa med pa ste/ rnam pa rnam par dag pa sems can gyi rnam pa ste/ sems can rnam par dag pa chos kyi rnam pa ste/ chos
18a7(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa ye shes kyi rnam pa ste/ ye shes rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi rnam pa ste/ shes rab rnam par dag pa/ sems kyi rnam pa ste/ sems rnams par dag pa/ 'jig rten gyi rnam
18a8(mdo sde): pa ste/ 'jig rten rnam par dag pa/ gzugs med pa ste/ gzugs su ston pa dang / mi ston pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa/ mun pa med cing mun pa rab tu snang bar byed pa/ mtshan mtha
18b1(mdo sde): cad rnam par bshig pas mtshan ma med pa'i mthar gyur pa/ mthar phyin pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa/ mi zad pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis ma khyen/ 
18b2(mdo sde): ba'i lung bstan pa thob pa/ mtshams bcad cing byang chub sems dpa'i nges par gyur pa la zhugs pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas btab cing dbang skur pa thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
18b3(mdo sde): thams cad la yang dag par zhugs shing mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par spyod pa/ legs par spyod pa la spyad pa/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang cho ga shes pa'i byang
18b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag go spyong yul te/  skyes bungs pa de dang de dag ni de lta bu'i ston pa sbyin par byed do// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'
18b5(mdo sde): khri drug stong nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sbyin pa la brjod ba skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// dag
18b6(mdo sde): pa'i sems kyis rtag tu sbyin pa byin// byang chub phyir te rnam smin yang mi 'dod// dga' zhing mgu nas rjes su gdung med de// rab tu grol nas rtag tu sbyin pa byin// mkhas pa
18b7(mdo sde): chos rnams sgyu 'drar shes nas su// lus dang srog la'ang chags par mi 'gyur zhing // de dag la ni nams kyang 'dzin pa med// de ltar de dag bsam pa byang chub nges// thams cad
18b8(mdo sde): btang yang mi dgar mi 'gyur zhing // de la zhum pa med de go za ba med// de yis nam mkha' mtshungs par chos rnams bsgoms// de bas dga' bar mi 'gyur zhum pa'ang med/ 
19a1(mdo sde): bdag gis rang bzhin snga nas rnam par dag byang chub rnam par dag pas sbyin pa sbyin// de nas sems kyi rgyud la mi chags par// smos pa med par sbyin parab tu
19a2(mdo sde): sbyin pa sems mnyam nyid kyang mnyam pas kun tu sbyin pa gtong // rab 'bring tha ma gsum yang med par sbyin// bsam pa yongs dag dri ma med pa yis// thams cad gtong yang rnam par
19a3(mdo sde): smin mi 'dong // lus dang tshe ni mi rtag sgyu ma 'dra// longs spyod rmi lam glog bzhin snying po med// 'jig rten kun la snying rje rtse bskyed nas// 'jig rten chos kyis ma gos sbyin pa sbyim/ 
19a4(mdo sde): nyon mongs dag phyir bdag gi nor kun gtong // rgyal 'i nga tshig gi gnas su 'gyur snyam ste// bdud rnams kyis kyang dbadag la glags mi rnyed// de ltar brtags nas thams cad
19a5(mdo sde): gtong ba yin// stobs bcus sbyin pa rtsa ba yin no/ sa gsungs// de la rab tu gnas dang tshul khrims ldan/ tshul khrims yon tan gnas nas bsam gtan rnyed/ 
19a6(mdo sde): bsam gtan ma chags shes rab rdzogs par byed// sbyin pa dang ni dul bas sems ra tshim// nyon mongs rnams kyang tshig nas phyir mi skye// sbyin pa bdag dang gzhan la phan par
19a7(mdo sde): gsungs// ngan dang bde ba 'dus byas sbyin pas mgu// smi gtang nyan mongs spangs zhing dge ba'i phyir// des na 'dzin pa la ni chags mi 'gyur// kha rol nyon mongs phyir ni mi / 
19a8(mdo sde): ste/ bdag blo nam dag byang chub byor gtong ngo // ji lta ji ltar mi num sems kyis gtong // de ltar des ni byang chub yon tan mthong // ji lta ji ltar byang chub yon tan mthong / 
19b1(mdo sde): ltar de ltar sems can brgya tshim byed// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos
19b2(mdo sde): bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims nam mkha' mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs brnyan lta bu'i lus mnyam pa nyid
19b3(mdo sde): de dang / brag cha lta bu'i sgra mnyam pa nyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i sems mnyam pa nyid dang / nam mkha' lta bu'i blo mnyam pa nyid de// rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang
19b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' tshul khrims nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu brgyad po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi tshul khrims yongs su dag pa ste/ 
19b5(mdo sde): brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems rnam par/ dag pa'i phyir// byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral/ pa dang / tshad mar gyur pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ 
19b6(mdo sde): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med pa dang // dam bcas rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ bslab pa thams cad mi 'dor ba dang / smon lam yong su dag pa'i phyir/ skye ba
19b7(mdo sde): thams cad du mi 'jug pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir mi lhod pa dang / mtshan ma yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ byang chub tu bsngo ba dang / nyon mongs pa yongs
19b8(mdo sde): su dag pa'i phyir/ kun nas gdung ba med pa dang / byang chub yong su dag pa'i phyir/ smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul
20a1(mdo sde): khrims yongs su dag pa'o// gnan yang tshul khrims yongs su dag pa ni nam mkha' dag pa ste/ tshul khrims debang dag pa'o// nam mkha' dri ma med pa ste/ tshul khrims
20a2(mdo sde): de yang dri ma med pa'o// nam mkha' ni ba ste/ tshul khrims de 'ang zhi ba'o// nam mkha' mi mtho ba ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mi mthong ba'o// nam mkha' mi dma' ba ste/ tshul khrims de yang mi dma' ba'o// 
20a3(mdo sde): nam mnga' gzung du med pa ste/ tshul khrims deng gzung du med pa'o// nam mkha' gnas med pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang gnas med pa'o// nam mkha' med pa ma yin te/ tshul khrims de yang med
20a4(mdo sde): pa ma yin pa'o// nam mkha' rtag pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang rtag pa'o// nam mkha' mi zad pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang mi zad pa'o// nam mkha' mtshan ma med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mtshan
20a5(mdo sde): ma med pa'o// nam mkha' rgyu ba med pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang rgyu ba med pa'o// nam mkha' spros pa med pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang spros pa med pa'o// nam mkha' zag pa
20a6(mdo sde): med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang zag pa med pa'o// nam mkha' 'dus ma byas pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang 'das ma byas pa'o// nam mkha' mi 'gyur ba ste/ tshul khrims de yang mi 'gyur ba'o// 
20a7(mdo sde): nam mkha' rnam par mi rtog pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang rnam par mi rtog pa'o// nam mkha' thams cad du song ba ste/ tshul khrims de yang thams cad du song ba'o// nam mkha' mi chod mi phyed pa
20a8(mdo sde): ste/ tshul khrims de yang mi chod mi phyed pa'o// nam mnga' mtshungs par sbyor ba ste/ tshul khrims de yang mtshungs par sbyor ba'o// nam mkha' rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin
20b1(mdo sde): / ba ste/ tshul khrims de yang rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// de nas
20b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad gsungaso// sems zhi tshul khrims dri med srung zhing gdung ba med// lus dang sems kyang rnam dag ngag yid thams cad bsdams// 
20b3(mdo sde): mkhas pa rtag tu nang ni tshul khrims dregs mi snyems/ blo 'chang sems la mi gnas byang chub sems la ston// las gang ma byas ma bsams de bzhin ma brtags te// de ni dmar sngo ser mem kha don
20b4(mdo sde): gzugs mi gnas// gzung med mi bden mi g.yo dben dab nam mkhar bzhin// tshul khrims lnga ba gnas med ma/ khas bkun gyis bsngags// tshul khrims don rab ni ni
20b5(mdo sde): byed nyon mongs ni// zhi gnas lhag mthong dag gi mthar bri na mthar ston pa// gang su bcings las grol ba de dag tshul khrims bsnyen// de bas tshul khrims zar byed byang chub rtsa ba'i
20b6(mdo sde): gni/ gang su sbyangs pa dgon gnas 'dod nyung chog shes pa// yo byad bsnyungs shing bsam gtan dben tshogs sems sbyangs pa// tshul khrims de'i gnas nges sems rkang pa thar pa'i
20b7(mdo sde): rten/ de phyir tshul khrims brgyan pa lam bde thams cad sgrub// g.yo ba rlom sems kun bral lta ba'i nyon mongs gcod// nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam byams pas khyab cing mthar 'dzin sbyong // 
20b8(mdo sde): byang chub phyir nges mi gtong byang chub kun mi rtog/ gang ma pas chog shes de 'dra tshul khrims pha rol phyir// bam po gnyis pa// rigs kyi bu de la rnga
21a1(mdo sde): ltar byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin nen/ rigs kyi bu chos bani dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa nam mkha' dang mdzus/ 
21a2(mdo sde): pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshig nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir// gshe yang slar mi gshe ba dang / lus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir brdegs kyang slar mi rdegs
21a3(mdo sde): pa dang / sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir/ skyo kyang slar mi spro ba dang / bsam pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir/ khros kyang slar mi khro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bani de dag
21a4(mdo sde): dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa nam mnga' dang mtshungs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yongs
21a5(mdo sde): su dag pa 'di brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste// nam mkha' la zhe 'gras pa med de/ sems can thams cad la ni 'gras pa med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang // 
21a6(mdo sde): nam mkha' la rjesu chags pa med de/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti la rjes su chags pa med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni mnyam par sbyor ba ste/ sems can thams cad la sems
21a7(mdo sde): mnyam pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni ma snang ma nyams pa ste/ lus dang sems zad pas nyams pa med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni bag la nyal
21a8(mdo sde): thams cad spang ba ste/ ngag la nyal med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni yid dang dmigs pa med pa ste/ yid dang dmigs pa med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa
21b1(mdo sde): dang / nam mkha' ni ma skyes ma byung ba ste/ ma skyes ma byung ba'i bzod pa can gyi bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni gzugs dang / gzugs med pa thams cad la khyab pa ste/ 
21b2(mdo sde): byams pas khyab pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa yongasu dag pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o// rigs kyi bu
21b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa ni 'di brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste stong pa nyid la bzod kyang lta ba gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang / mtshan ma
21b4(mdo sde): med pa la bzod kyang mtshan ma sel ba ma yin pa dang / smon pa med pa la bzod kyang / byang chub tu smon pa med pa ma yin pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa la bzod kyang / 'dus byas rnam
21b5(mdo sde): bar gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang / skye ba med pa la/ bzod kyang / 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid kyis ma yin/ pa dang / 'byung ba med pa la bzod kyang / skye ba dang gnas pas
21b6(mdo sde): ma yin pa dang / sems can med pa la bzod kyang / dngos po rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin du bzod kyang dus rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin ste/ rigs kyi bu
21b7(mdo sde): brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa'o// bzod pa zhes bya ba ni 'di dag bdag la bi she yang bzod do snyam pa de ni nga yir 'dzin pa'i bzod pa
21b8(mdo sde): ste/ 'di ni namapa' dang mtshungs pa mi bzod pa ma yin no// 'di dag gshe ba bdag gis bzod par bya'o snyam pa de ni ngar 'dzin pa'i bzod pa ste/ de ni nam mnga' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma
22a1(mdo sde): yin no// 'di dag ni yi ge sdong pa'o snyam pa de ni sgra dang skad kyi bzod pa ste/ de na nam mtha' dang mtshungs pa'i brjod pa ma yin no// 'di yang stong pa bdag kyang stong par snyam pa den med
22a2(mdo sde): la byed pa sbyor ba'i 'azod pa ste/ de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no// bdag gis bzod pa'o snyam pa de ni rnam par rig pa'i bzod pa ste/ de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin// 
22a3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na/ shing sa la chen po rig la yod par mi zhig 'ongs te/ shing sa la bcad na/ de la shing sa la bcang ba'i lhag ma rnams 'di snyam du 'di dag ni bcad// bdag ni ma bcad do snyam du mi
22a4(mdo sde): sems te/ de dag la rjesu chags pa yang med/ khong khro ba yang sred de/ me rtog rnam par mi rtog yongs su mi rtog pa de bzhin du gang bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs
22a5(mdo sde): pa yongs su dag pa'i mchog go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// zad pa sa pa bzod pa mi zad gtsang // yid ni yul la ma chags
22a6(mdo sde): shin tu bsgoms// phyi nang shin tu rnam dag mi gnas pa// na mkha' mtshungs mnyam sems mchog bzod pa'o// lus 'di gzugs brnyan rtsi shing rtsigs pa 'dra// sems kyang gzugs med mi snang
22a7(mdo sde): rgyu ma 'dra// chos 'di lta ba'i gnas med na mkha' bzhin// lus kyang mi 'gyur yid la khro ba med// bkur sti byed la dga' dang na sdang med// mtho dang dma' bar rnam par rtog pa med// theg pa gang
22a8(mdo sde): 'dra sa ltar sbyor ba de// sems can dag pa bstan 'dir bzod smra yin// srog med gang zag bdag med sems can med// chos 'di thams cad stong par gang bzod cing // rgyu dang rkyen dang byed dang
22b1(mdo sde): 'gal mi byed// de ni bstan 'dir bzod mchog yang dag nyid// kha ngan zer ba'i tshig zos mi gshe zhing // byed pa med pa nam mkha'i sprin sgra bzhin// bdag rnam bsul yid stong pa'i mchog mthong de// 
22b2(mdo sde): bstan 'dir sems can gtsang ma bzod smra yin// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus rnamapa' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
22b3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus na mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la brtsom yang chos thams cad yongasu ma grub par rab tu shes pa
22b4(mdo sde): dang sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba mngon par 'du byed kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos kyi sku mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba dang / sems
22b5(mdo sde): can yongasu smin par byed kyang / sems can rnam par dag pas sems can mi dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin kyang / 'dod chags dang
22b6(mdo sde): bral bar bya ba'i chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa
22b7(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis brtson 'grus yongs su dag pa 'di brgyad de brgyad gang zhe na/ brtson 'grus gang gis lus brgyan pa'i lus de gzugs brnyan lta bur rig pa
22b8(mdo sde): mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang gis tshigs mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshig de ya ma rmar rnam par brtags te/ brtson 'grus gang gis sems ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas su 'jog pa'i sems
23a1(mdo sde): de sems kyi chos nyid kyis rnam par brtags te mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang gis pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs thams cad rab tu bsdud par byed kyang / de gcig nas/ 
23a2(mdo sde): gcig tu sems zad pa'i chos nyid kyis shin tu brtags te mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub kyang byang chub de dngos pa/ 
23a3(mdo sde): mtshan nyid du rnam par brtags te/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / brtson 'grus gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu sbyong bar byed pa'i zhing de yang nam mkha'i dang mtshungs pas rnam par
23a4(mdo sde): brtags te mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang gis thos pa thams cad 'dzin par byed pa de sgra brag cha dang mtshungs par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / brtson 'grus gang gis sangs
23a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu sgrub pa de yang chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid du rnam par brtags nas/ mi dmigs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems
23a6(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus yong su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis brtson 'grus te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus
23a7(mdo sde): dang / yongasu chad pa'i brtson 'gruso// de sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus ni/ lus dang ngag dang sems dang rab tu ldan pa'o// yongasu chad pa'i brtson 'grus ni len pa med pa/ 'dor ba med pa gnas pa
23a8(mdo sde): med pa ste/ nam byang chub sems dpa' lus dang ngag dang sems sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus rtsa ba nas mi gnas par shin tu brtags nas/ mi dmigs shing yongasu chad pa'i brtson 'grus ni chos
23b1(mdo sde): kyi dbyings kyi rjes su 'jug pas rjesu 'gro ba ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// ji ltar nam mkha' gzugs med cing sems can thams cad
23b2(mdo sde): rab tu rgyu ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de yang chos thams cad la mi gnas shing sems can thams cad yong su smin par byed do// ji ltar nam mkha' gzugs thams
23b3(mdo sde): cad la go skabs 'byed cing bla gab med pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de yang sems can thams cad la go skabs 'byed cing lta ba thams cad dang bral
23b4(mdo sde): ba'o// ji ltar na mkha' las rtsa dang nags tshal dang / lo to// ga skye yang rtsa ba med cing gnas med pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de yang sangs rgyas
23b5(mdo sde): kyi chos thams cad skyed kyang 'jig tshegs la lta ba'i rtsa ba la gnas pa med do// ji ltar na mkha' thams cad du song yang 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i
23b6(mdo sde): brtson 'grus de yang dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi rjesu sngo yang 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// ji ltar na mkha' mtshungs par sbyor zhing / gzugs tha dad par ston pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems
23b7(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de yang sems can thams cad la chos thams cad mtshungs par sbyor zhing spyod pa sna tshogs kun tu ston to// nam byang chub sems dpa' gang kun tu sgrub par byed pa
23b8(mdo sde): de mnyam pa nyid pas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing gang la rtsom pa de yang rnam par brtags na mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus na mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// 
24a1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// brtson 'grus dag gi stobs kyis mthu bskyed nas// lus dang srog la'ang phangs par mi byed
24a2(mdo sde): cing // bdag nyid chen po byang chub spyad pa spyod// sems can phan pa'i don byed pa na sems pa// sngon gyi sred par 'dus byas ji srid pa// byang chub yon tan phyir ni de srid 'khor// de dag skye
24a3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba'ang yong med do// phyi phyir brtson 'grus dag ni rab tu skyed// sems can bsam mi khyab pa 'grol bar brtson// sangs rgyas bsam me khyab pa mchod par 'tho// zhing rnams
24a4(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab lta bar brtson// bsam gyis mi khyab pa dud rnams 'dul bar brtson// sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab gtong bar brtson// tshul khrims bsam gyis mi khyab bsgom par
24a5(mdo sde): brtson// bzod pa bsam gyis mi khyab bsgom par brtson// brtson 'grub bsam gyis mi bya ba dge bar brtson// bas ma gtan bsam gyis mi khyab sems par brtson// shes rab
24a6(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab bsgom par brtson// byams pa bsam gyis mi khyab bsgom par brtson// don dang yon tan sgrub par rab tu brtson// srog dang lus kyang mi langs brtson par byed/ 
24a7(mdo sde): nyon mongs tha ba kun las rnam par grol// stong pa rnam thar bdag med mngon par brtson// bdag la bdag med che ba'i bdag nyid brtsor// ltabs rnam grol byang chub phyir yang spyod// snu ma/ 
24a8(mdo sde): smig chung bo nyid du brtson// sems med sems kyang sems ma yin pa thob// g.yo ba med pa'i chos rnams ston par brtson// 'gro ba kun tu spyod cing rnam par grol// bshad cing klog pa
24b1(mdo sde): la ni rab tu brtson// chos dang chos min gnyis las shin tu 'das// sgra dang yi ge'i ngo bo nyid la brtson// 'gro ba rnams la mdo sde stong rnams smra// sangs rgyas yon tan rnams ni mtha' yang med// 
24b2(mdo sde): sems can spyod pa rnams la'ang mthar med de/ mkhas pa de la rtag tu brtson 'grus sbyor// sems can spyod mtha' med la rab tu 'jug/ chos 'di rnams ni skye med 'gog med de// mkhas pa de dag
24b3(mdo sde): sems kyang mi zhum zhing // phyi phyir brtson 'grus rlabs chen rab bskyed de// 'di 'dra'i chos la sems can bsgom du btsud// rigs kyi de bu la ji ltar na// byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan
24b4(mdo sde): namapa' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos pa ni dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems
24b5(mdo sde): nang du yang dag 'jog la/ nang du sems gnas par yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong ba dang / sems phyi rol nas kyang ba zlog la phyi rol tu sems rgyu ba yang mi dmigs pa dang / bdag/ 
24b6(mdo sde): gi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang mnyam pa nyid du snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sems mnyam pa nyid de yang sems sgyu ma'i chos su mnyam pa nyid du snyoms par
24b7(mdo sde): 'jug pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan namakha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan yongasu
24b8(mdo sde): dag pa 'di brgyad ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan byed kyang rung po la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang khams la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / 
25a1(mdo sde): bsam gtan byed kyang skye mched la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan de 'byed kyang 'jig rten 'di la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / 
25a2(mdo sde): bsam gtan byed kyang 'jig rten pha rol la gnas ste/ bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang 'dod pa'i khams la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang
25a3(mdo sde): gzugs kyi khams la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub
25a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan yongasu dag pa'o// gzhan yang dres par rtogs pa'i sems ni bsam gtan yongasu dag pa ste/ dri la nges par rtogs pa'i sems nyid gang zhe na/ gang
25a5(mdo sde): chos rnams la mi 'tho mi dmi' ba/ mi stod mi smod 'gyur ba// med pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ stsogs pa med pa/ 'bri ba med// ga 'dzin pa med pa/ gtong ba med pa/ mun pa med pa/ 
25a6(mdo sde): snang ba med pa/ rtog pa med pa/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ 'du shes med pa/ yid la byed pa med pa/ gcig pa'ang ma yin// gnyis pa'ang ma yin pa/ gnyis pa yin pa'ang ma yin pa/ g.yo ba
25a7(mdo sde): med pa/ rlom sems med pa/ spros pa med pa/ sogs med pa/ bri ba med pa/ sgom pa med pa/ 'jig pa med pa ste/ gang mtshan ma dang / dmigs pa thams cad la mi gnas pa'o// gang sem
25a8(mdo sde): mi gnas pa de ni sems nges par rtog pa'o// sems nges par rtog pa ni gzugs rnams la mi rgyug ste/ mig dang gzugs dang rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsan
25b1(mdo sde): gtan byed do// sems nges par rtog pa ni sgra rnams la mi rgyug ste/ rna ba dag sgra dang / rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do// sems nges par/ 
25b2(mdo sde): rtog pa ni dri rnams la mi rgyug ste/ sna dang dri dang / rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do// sems nges par rtog pa ni dri rnams la mi rgyug ste/ lce
25b3(mdo sde): dang ro dang / rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do// sems nges par rtog pa ni reg pa rnams la mi rgyug ste/ lus la reg pa dang / rnam par shes pa rig
25b4(mdo sde): cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do// sems nges par rtog pa ni chos rnams la mi rgyug ste/ yid dang chos dang / rnam par shes pa rig cing / rang gi mtshan nyid dang
25b5(mdo sde): par dag par bsam gtan byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dben// bskal pas bsreg pa na/ nam mkha' mi 'tshig cing / chu/ sa 'jig pa na mkha' gsher bar mi 'gyur ba bani/ 
25b6(mdo sde): du/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi 'tshig cing / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang
25b7(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la'ang ma chags pa yin no// mnyam par banag pa yang yin la/ sems rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems can rnams kyang shin tu 'god do// mnapa/ 
25b8(mdo sde): bar banag kyang dga' ba med la/ langs nas cad khong khro ba med pa yin no// 'phags pa'i skye bo rnams la ni banye bar ston kyang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye bo rnams mang / 
26a1(mdo sde): su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus rab tu 'bar bar yang byed do// mnyam par banag cing mnyam pa yang yin la/ mi mnyam par spyod pa rnams la tha dad par ston pa
26a2(mdo sde): yang rab tu ston to// mnyam pa nyid kyis mi mnyam pa yang mi mthong la/ minyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar yang mi byed de// de ni mi 'gal zhing 'ga' ba med pa rnamapa' dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyi
26a3(mdo sde): bsam gtan pa zhes bya'o// shes rab che ba'i bsam gtan pa zhes bya'o// rnam par shes parab tu mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan pa zhes bya'o// gang gis bsam gtan de ltar mngon par rtogs pa'i
26a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de bsam gtan namakha' dang mtshungs pa ste/ mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// bsam
26a5(mdo sde): gtan rnams kyi dbang po yongs su dag/ dran pa rtse gcigayid ni mnyam par bzhag/ gnas rnams thams cad la ya nga mi gnas shing / 'gro ba kun la mnyam nyid snyoms par
26a6(mdo sde): banags nang dang phyi rol dag na gnas pa yi// phung po skye mched khams la mi gnas shing // nye bar zhi ba dben pa spyod yul te// mkhas pa de dag rtag tu mnyam par bzhag/ mnyam pa nyid kyis rtag
26a7(mdo sde): tu mnyam bzhag pa// chos kyis dbyings dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa'i yid// shin tu dben pa'i sems kyang ston byed cing // mkhas pa bsam gtan kun la'ang mi chag so// 'gro ba rnams kyang yongs su
26a8(mdo sde): smin bya'i phyir// 'chi 'pho skye ba 'chi ba nyer ston kyang // ting nge 'dzin las de dag mi nyams te/ de ni sems rtogs dbang gis de 'dra'o// gzugs med ting nge 'dzin kyang spyod yul la// sems can rnams ni
26b1(mdo sde): yongasu smin pa'i phyir// 'dod pa'i khams su'ang rab tu snang byed do// de dag bdag dang sems can mi gnas so// nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa'i spyod yul te// sgyum dang yang mtshungs shing smig rgyu 'dra// mi
26b2(mdo sde): lam chu zla sprin gyi mtshan nyid du// chos rnams shes nas rtag tu mnyam par bzhag/ 'gro ba kun gyi shes pa'i spyod yul du// 'gro ba rnams la sems dang blo 'jug cing // sems rgyud la ni bsgribs pa
26b3(mdo sde): med pa ste// rang gi sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu shes// bsam gtag rdzu 'phrul mngon shes mkhas pa yis// zhing rnams mang po bye bar de 'gro zhing // mi shes nyon mongs thams cad spangs po yi// rgyal ba
26b4(mdo sde): bsam mi khyab la mchod par byed// dbang po rnams ni dul zhing zhi ba'i yid// zhi gnas pha rol phyin cing mi rtog pa// de ni 'gro ba rnams la zhi ba'i yid// rtag tu ye shes stobs la mnyam par
26b5(mdo sde): bzhag/ mnyam pa nyid dang mnyam pa'ang yong med la// mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba mtshan med de// mnyam nyid de la gang dag rab ga/ nas pa// de dag rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin// rigs
26b6(mdo sde): kyi bu de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab nam pa' dang
26b7(mdo sde): mtshungs pa yin te/ ba ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' rnam par dag pas sems can thams cad rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang / ye shes rnam par dag pas/ rnam par shes pa thams cad
26b8(mdo sde): rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pas bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang gang zag rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang / don rnam par dag pas/ yi ge thams cad
27a1(mdo sde): rnam par dag par rab tu rtogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab na mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
27a2(mdo sde): rnams kyi shes rab yongs su dag pa ni 'di brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub kyang rtag par lta bar mi sbyor ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong bar
27a3(mdo sde): brtson 'grus rtsoms yang chad par lta bar mi ltung ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug kyang mi skye ba'i bzod pa dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes par snang yang / 
27a4(mdo sde): nges pa'i tshig gi spobs pa la mi chags pa dang / chos kyi sdom bzhi'ang ston la mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba nyid du dngos po yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ba dang / las dang
27a5(mdo sde): bye ba la 'jug pa rab tu ston kyang las med cing rnam pa/ ra smin pa med pa las kyang mi g.yo ba dang / spros pa med pa 'i chos shes pa la gnas pa yin yang / chos thams cad kyi tshig/ 
27a6(mdo sde): rab tu dbye ba nges par bstan pa rab tu ston pa dang / chos thams cad kyi snang ba rab tu rnyed pa yin yang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba yang sems can rnams la rab tu ston pa ste/ rigs
27a7(mdo sde): kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab yong su dag pa'o// yang shes rab ces bya ba 'di ni/ rnam par rtog pa kun nas 'bar ba med pa'i phyir/ nye bar zhi ba'i tshig go// rang
27a8(mdo sde): gi mtshan nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'di ni mi 'gyur ba'i tshig go// gnas med pa'i phyir 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshig go// yang dag pa nyid ji lta ba'i phyir 'di ni ji lta ba bzhin gyi tshig go// 
27b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyir 'di ni bden pa'i tshig go// ma rungs par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir 'di ni yang dag pa'i tshig go// bcings pa yang dag par gcod pa'i phyir 'di ni yid rno ba'i tshig go// 'phags pa'i
27b2(mdo sde): yon tan gyi phyir 'di ni ngoms pa'i tshig go// shin tu brtags pa'i phyir 'di ni nges par mi byed pa'i tshig go// brjod du med pa'i phyir 'di ni don gyi tshig go// khyad par med pa'i phyir 'di ni mtshungs pa'i
27b3(mdo sde): tshig go// mi shigs pa'i phyir 'di ni snying po'i tshig go// mi gnas pa'i phyir 'di ni ma g.yos pa'i tshig go// rab tu 'bigs pa'i phyir 'di ni rdo rje'i tshig go/ byed pa byas pa'i phyir 'di ni sgrol ba'i
27b4(mdo sde): tshig go// rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir 'di ni rnam par dag pa'i tshi go/ snang ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir// 'di ni mun pa med pa'i tshig go// sgro brtags pa med pa'i
27b5(mdo sde): phyir 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i tshig go// shin tu zad cing byung ba'i phyir 'di ni zad pa'i tshig go// 'dus ma byas pa/ 'i phyir 'di ni mi zad pa'i tshig go// sbyar ba med pa'i phyir 'di ni
27b6(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas kyi tshig go// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir// 'di ni namakha'i tshig go// bsgribs pa med pa'i phyir 'di ni namakha'i tshig go// gnas pa'i gnas kyi phyir 'di ni kun nas gsal byed
27b7(mdo sde): tshig go// ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir 'di ni mi dmigs pa'i tshig go// rnam par shes pa dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i phyir 'di ni ye shes kyi tshig go// gnyen po med pa'i phyir 'di ni mi rdzi ba'i/ 
27b8(mdo sde): tshig go// mngon par ma grub pa'i phyir 'di ni lus med pa'i tshig go// kun tu rtog pa'i sdug bsngal gyi phyir// 'di ni yongs su shes pa'i tshig/ sred pa'i bag la nyal yang dag par bcom par/ 
28a1(mdo sde): phyir ba 'di ni kun 'byung spangs pa'i tshig go// rab tu ma byung ba'i phyir// 'di ni 'gog pa'i tshig go// gnyis su med pa'i lam la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir// 'di ni sgom pa'i tshi go/ 
28a2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pas rab tu bye ba'i phyir// 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi tshig go// rab tu 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir/ 'di ni chos kyi tshig ste/ gang de lta bu'i tshig la 'jug pa'i ye shes snang ba gan/ 
28a3(mdo sde): gyi dring la mi 'jog sapa 'di ni shes rab ces bya'o// gang nges par bstan pa thams cad na mkha' dang mtshungs par bstan pa'i rjes su 'gro ste/ rjes su 'gro bas chos chung ngu la yang mi rtog rnam par
28a4(mdo sde): mi rtog pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha/ rol tu phyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o// de nas bcom lda/ rten 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// shes
28a5(mdo sde): rab lta dang mun pa nyon mongs gcod// rtag tu bag chags nyon mongs rab bstsal cing // rgyu dang rkyen dang byed pa nges par ston// mtha' rnams thams cad yongasu gcod par byed// bdag dang sems
28a6(mdo sde): can la yang mi gnas shing // gang zag srog la'ang rtag tu gnas pa med// dngos dang dngos med gnyis las thar byed de// shes rab pha rol 'gro bar rab tu bstan// shes rab bdud las rgyal te nyon
28a7(mdo sde): mongs med// shes rab chu bo las bsgral rab tu sgrol// shes rab ye shes byed cing rnam par sbyong // shes rab thar pa bde ba'i mchog kyang ston// shes rab kyis ni bsgribs pa'i rtsa ba sbyong // phung po kham/ 
28a8(mdo sde): ni yongasu shes pa'i mtshan// mtshan dang mtshan gzhi mtshungs mtshan grol byed pa// shes rab thob pa srid pa gsum na mdzes// yongasu dag spyod shes rab ces bya ste// 'jig rten thams cad kyis/ 
28b1(mdo sde): / nimi gos spyod// spyad pa spyod pa rab tu rtogs par spyod// shes rab dag pa'i mi ni rnam par mdzes// mig lnga dag ni yongasu dag byed cing // dbang po lnga ni rab tu snang bar byed// 'gro ba lnga rnams rab tu bcod/ 
28b2(mdo sde): par byed/ phung po lnga ni zad phyir chos ston to// pha rol tshul rol rtag tu mi gnas shing // chos kyi dbyings gan sag shin tu gnas// bar snang dang ni mtshungs mnyam 'dra ba ste/ sangs rgyas ye shes rjes
28b3(mdo sde): su mthun zhing 'phags// rnyed dang ma rnyed gnyi ga'i mtha' las grol// dbus la rtog pa kun rtog mi rtog pa// gang na 'phags pa thams cad song ba yi// 'chi ba med pa'i lam du 'jug pa ston// 
28b4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal shes shing de bzhin sred pa spangs// lam rnams ston cing 'gog pa'ang rab tu 'chad// bden pa shes pas shes rab 'di 'jug ste// des ni sngon gyi mtha' yang rab tu bcad// zhing rnams
28b5(mdo sde): thams cad zhing mtshungs zhing ma yin// chos rnams tha// mas cad chos mtshungs rab tu dben// sems can thams cad bdag med sems can mtshungs// shes rab blo spyod pas ni 'di
28b6(mdo sde): shes so// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos nam mkha' dang mtshungs te/ de dag gi byang chub kyi sems
28b7(mdo sde): kyis bon de yang nam mkha' dang mtshungs so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams ji snyed mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byed pa de yang byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral te/ dge
28b8(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba bsags shing bsags pa de dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sngo bar byed cing / de dag thams cad kyang rnamapa' dang mtshungs par tshad med par rab tu gnas so// de la byang chub
29a1(mdo sde): sems dpas 'di ltar nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/ bdag gis bsod nams tshad med pa mngon par 'du bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshad med par
29a2(mdo sde): brtsams pas tshad med pa'i don 'phel ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa la brtson par bya'o// rigs kyi bu tshad med pa bcu po 'di dag ni/ gang byang chub sems
29a3(mdo sde): dpas bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pas/ lus kyi rgyan tshad med pa yong su rdzogs par bya / 
29a4(mdo sde): dang / sems can thams cad kyi rjesu song ba'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pas/ ngag gi rgyan tshad med pa yongs rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rjes su
29a5(mdo sde): 'jug pas/ sems kyi rgyan tshad med pa yongasu rdzogs/ par bya ba dang / spyod pa dang ye shes dang / spyod lam tshad med/ pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba tshad med pa yongs su
29a6(mdo sde): rdzogs par bya ba dang / rnam pa tshad med pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa tshad med pa yong su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bsod nams dang sems nges par rtog pa dang / spyod pa tshad
29a7(mdo sde): med pa sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam tshad med pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba dang / rgyan bkod pa thams cad dang / spyod pa thams cad kyis byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya
29a8(mdo sde): ba dang / gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin yong su rdzogs pas/ mdzod spu yongs su sbyong ba tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bla ma la rim gro byed cing 'dud pa tshad med pa dang / nga rgyal ba/ 
29b1(mdo sde): pa tshad med pas/ dbu'i gtsug tor spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sgyu dang g.yo med par 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang 'thun par 'dzin pas don yod par rnam par/ 
29b2(mdo sde): gnon pa tshad med pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba ste/ rigs kyi bu tshad med pa bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpas bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis yong su rdzogs par bya'o// gzhan yang rigs kyi
29b3(mdo sde): bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems na mkha' dang mtshungs par gyur pa de na/ nam mkha' tshad med pas/ de'i rtsom pa thams cad kyang tshad med pas kun tu gnas te/ de bas na bsod nams nan/ 
29b4(mdo sde): mkha' dang mtshungs shes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes na mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ gang sems can thams cad kyi sems la ye shes
29b5(mdo sde): des khyad par bye pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems kyang 'dod chags dang bcu sa pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu sheso// zhe
29b6(mdo sde): sdang dang bcas pa'i sems kyang zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems kyang gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa
