29b7(mdo sde): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyang des nye ba'i nyon mongs pa bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// des bdag 'dod
29b8(mdo sde): chags med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la 'dod chags 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do// de bdag nyid zhe sdang med pa'i
30a1(mdo sde): chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par/ sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la zhe sdang 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do// de bdag nyid gti mug med pa'i chos
30a2(mdo sde): kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la gti mug 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do// des bdag nyid nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin
30a3(mdo sde): las ma g.yos par sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do// des 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pa
30a4(mdo sde): rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos 'chad do// 'dod chags/ drang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sems la dam na par yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong // 'dod chags dang / 
30a5(mdo sde): zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems la mchog tu yang yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ngo // de kyi 'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de gnyi su med pa'i
30a6(mdo sde): mtha'i sgo nas/ chos kyi dbyings yongasu shes te/ chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de 'dod chags kyi dbyings/ chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de zhe sdang gi dbyings/ chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa gti mug gi
30a7(mdo sde): dbyings / chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de nyon mongs pa'i dbyings so// de bas na chos thams cad chos kyi dbyingasu yang dag par 'du'o zhes bya ste/ chos kyi dbyings ni gar yang 'gro ba'ang med mi 'gro
30a8(mdo sde): ba'ang med do// chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rje su song ste/ gang bdag gi dbyings shes pa des chos dbyings kyang shes so// de ltar na chos kyi dbyings dang bdag gi dbyings de dag mi gnyis so// 
30b1(mdo sde): dedeci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag rnam par dag pas chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par dag go// de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang rnam par dag pa ste/ gang rnam par dag pa de rab tu snang ba'o// gang rab tu snang ba de bla ga ba
30b2(mdo sde): med pa'o// gang bla bag med pa de la mtshan ma thams cad kyi skabs med do// gang mtshan ma med pa de la gnas pa gang yang med de/ mi gnas pa ni na mkha'o// gang de ltar ye shes kyi rjesu 'gro zhing / 
30b3(mdo sde): ye shes des chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes nam mnga' dang mtshungs pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas
30b4(mdo sde): rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ gang tshul khrims las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing / zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims las kyang mi nyams pa'o// ting nge 'dzin las sangs rgyas rjesu dran zhing / chos
30b5(mdo sde): kyi dbyings mnyam pa thams cad las kyang mi 'gyur ban// shes rab las sangs rgyas rjesu dran zhing / chos thams cadargyu ba med par yang rnam par mi rtog pa'o// rnam par grol ba/ 
30b6(mdo sde): las sangs rgyas rje su dran zhing / sems gnyis la yang mi gnas pa'o// rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing shes pa thams cad la yang mi chags pa'o// stobs
30b7(mdo sde): las sangs rgyas rjesu dran zhing / dus gsum mtshungs pa'i ye shes las kyang mi g.yo ba'o// mi 'jigs pa las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing / zag pa thams cad dang lhan cig du yang mi gnas
30b8(mdo sde): pa'i lasangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid du'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o// gnan yang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni gang / gzugs
31a1(mdo sde): las sangs rgyas yang dag pa rjes su mi mthong la/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas/ dran pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su yang 'gro ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
31a2(mdo sde): byed dang / rnam par shes pa las sangs rgyas yang dag pa rjesu mi mthong la/ rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid shes pas dran pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su yang 'gro ba'o// phung po dang / khams dang / skye
31a3(mdo sde): mched rnams las sangs rgyas yang dag par rje su mi mthong la/ phung po dang / khams dang skye mched kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas/ dran pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su yang 'gro ba'o// gang yang chos thams
31a4(mdo sde): cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas/ shes rab che ba'i dran pa de ni yid la byed/ rab thams cad med de/ lta ba thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa ra'o// 'ang de lta bu'i rnyog pa med pa'i dran pas/ dran pa
31a5(mdo sde): nye bar gnag pa shes pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i saso// rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas rje/ su dran pa ni/ gang spyod lam thams cad du// sangs
31a6(mdo sde): rgyas la mngon par ma chags par mi byed/ 'greng ba dang / 'chag pa dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba dang / smra ba dang / mi smra bar yang sangs rgyas la mngon par chags par
31a7(mdo sde): mi byed do// de mngon par ma chags pas dran pa'ang dran par mi byed/ mi dran pa'ang dran par mi byed do// de dran pa yid la mi byed pas/ gzugs dang / mtshan dang chos nyid du'ang sangs rgyas rje su mi dran no// 
31a8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu di ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa ste/ gang la mtshan ma dang dmigs pa thams cad kun tu spyod pa med pa med pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sa
31b1(mdo sde): kyi sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i chos rjesu dran pa gang zhe na/ chos shes bya ba ni 'dod chags med pa'o// de la gang chos ci la chags kyang rung / de dag la chos rje su dran pa gang yang med do// chos shes
31b2(mdo sde): bya ba ni kun gzhi med pa'o// de la gang chos gang la sbyor ba de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do// chos shes bya ba ni nye bar zhi ba ste/ gang sems dang yid 'bar bar byed pa de dag la
31b3(mdo sde): chos rjesu dran pa gang yang med do// chos shes bya ba ni mtshan ma med pa ste/ gang mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do// chos shes bya
31b4(mdo sde): ba ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ yang 'dus byas su rab tu bzhag pa lag nas pa de dag la chos rjesu dran pa gang yang med do// yang cho sa rjesu dran pa ni gang gis 'du byed thams cad
31b5(mdo sde): skye ba med par mthong ste/ yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa la 'jug pa 'o// byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes par rig nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa
31b6(mdo sde): rab tu 'thob bo// gang de lta bu'i gnas ni yang dag pa'i chos kyi gnas so// gang gis de ltar mngon par rtogs pa de ni/ chos thams cad mngon par rtogs pa ste/ 'di ni slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / 
31b7(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon par rtogs pa'o// de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa ni/ 'phags pa thams cad kyi rnam par/ 
31b8(mdo sde): grol ba ste/ de la chos gang yang kun tu spyod pa med do// chos gang yang kun tu spyod pa med pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i chos rjes su dran pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dang rji/ 
32a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i dge 'dun rje su dran pa gang zhe na/ dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa skyed de/ mngon par 'du byed pas rjes su dran par mi nu so// gang na/ 
32a2(mdo sde): lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las kun tu spyod pa med pa de ni mngon par 'du mi byed pa zhes bya'o// de la 'dus byas shes bya ba ni gdags pa dang tha snyad do// 'dus ma byas pa ni
32a3(mdo sde): gdags pa thams cad yang dag par 'jom pa'o// tha snyad thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'o// rigs kyi bu
32a4(mdo sde): de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i gtong ba rjesu dran pa gang zhe na/ gtong ba zhes bya ba ni phung po thams cad 'a dor zhing rab tu gtong ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des chos
32a5(mdo sde): gang yang btang ba med do// 'di ltar de la gang gtong ba'i chos// gang yang snang bar mi 'gyur te/ 'di la gang chos thams ca/ mi 'dzin pa de ni gtong ba'i mchog// gang 'dzin pa
32a6(mdo sde): de ni mi gtong ngo // gang mi gtong ba de ni mi snyem so// gang mi snyems pa de ni dmigs par mi byed do// dmigs par mi byed pa de la sems rgyu ba med do// rgyu ba med pa ni sems kyis rnam
32a7(mdo sde): bar rig pa med pa'o// gang la sems kyis rnam par rig pa med pa de ni rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'o// rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i
32a8(mdo sde): gtong ba rjesu dran pa'o// gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba de ni thams cad mkhyen par sngos pa ste/ gang thams cad mkhyen pa ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid do// gang mnyam
32b1(mdo sde): pa nyid la gnas pa ni rab tu gtong zhing byang chub tu 'ang sngo ste/ de rjes su dran yang chos gang yang rje su dran pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa ni chos dang chos ma yin pa gnyis dang / 
32b2(mdo sde): ldan pa ma yin te/ gang 'di gnyis su med pa de la yid la byed pa ci yang med do// rigs kyi bu de ltar chos shes pa la rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i gtong
32b3(mdo sde): brjesu dran pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ tshul khrims shes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ zag pa med
32b4(mdo sde): pa/ smon lam med pa/ lhun gyis grub pa/ brtul zhugs grub pa// brtul zhugs thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa ste/ rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas te/ sems kyi
32b5(mdo sde): dmigs pa'i gnas ma yin no// shes rab kyi rtsa ba ste/ spros pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// rnam par grol ba'i rgyu 'thun pa ste/ gnyis kyis rab tu bye ba ma yin no// mkhas pas rab
32b6(mdo sde): tu bsngags pa ste/ gzugs snang ba ma yin no// nyon mongs pa zhi ba ste/ so so rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// bde ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing gnyen pos bskyed pa yin te/ gang de lta
32b7(mdo sde): bu'i tshul khrims rjes su dran zhing dran pa la rnyog pa med pa de ni rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims rjesu dran pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas
32b8(mdo sde): kyis gnang ba'i lha rjesu dran pa gang zhe na/ lha'i ris gnyis rjes su dran par bya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha dang / skye ba gcig gis thegs pa'i byang chub sems
33a1(mdo sde): dpa' dga' ldan gnas na 'khod pa rnams so// de la byang chub sems dpas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams rjesu dran no// yang skye ba gcig gis rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems
33a2(mdo sde): dpa' dga' ldan gnas na gang dag 'khod pa de dag ni spyi bo lta bu bcus rjes su dran te/ bcu gang zhe na/ pha rol phyin pa thams cad kyi nang na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyi bor gyur pa dang / mngon par
33a3(mdo sde): shes pa thams cad kyi nang na/ mi nyams pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / sa thams cad kyi nang na dbang bskur ba'i sa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyi nang na/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / 
33a4(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin mi nyams pa dang / so so yang dag pa'i nang na don dang / spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / shes pa thams cad kyi nang na/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa dang / dbang
33a5(mdo sde): po thams cad kyi nang na rab 'bring tha ma la 'jug pa shes pa dang / stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la snang ba'i ye shes rjes su 'gro dang / spyan thams cad kyi nang na/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan
33a6(mdo sde): kun tu gzigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'di dag gi lag mthil du song ba ltar 'dug pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes
33a7(mdo sde): rab kyis mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa'o zhes spyi bo'i chos rnam bcu po de dag gis rjes su dran no// de'i dran pa de ni lta bas ma 'khrugs/ ngag la nyal dang / kun nas ldang bas ma
33a8(mdo sde): 'jugs/ yid la byed pas ma 'khrugs/ spros pas ma 'khrugs pa ste/ de lta bu'i dran pa rnyog pa med pas/ lha rjes su dran pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i lha rje su dran pa
33b1(mdo sde): zhes byal// rigs kyi bu de la dza ltar byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa dang / mnyam pa nyid thob kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa yang spong ba yin na na/ mya ngan las 'dasug
33b2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba ste/ tshor ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa/ dmigs pa thams cad zhi ba/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi nying mtshams sbyor
33b3(mdo sde): ba med pa ste/ skyes bu dam pa de mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid thob cing sngon gnas bcas pa'i snying rje chen po dang / thabs dang / shes rab dang / ye shes kyis ni rnam par rol/ 
33b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis shin tu byin gyi rlabs shes rab dang ye shes ni shin tu bsgoms/ sngon gyi byin gyis rlabs kyis ni bsam pa yongs su dag pa/ sgyu mas rnam par rol pa'i
33b5(mdo sde): nge 'dzin la ni gnas te/ nyon mongs pa gang gis 'khor ba rab/ tu bskyed pa'i 'khor bar 'ching ba de dag rab tu spangs shing // / ye shes gang gis mya ngan las 'das par ston pa de
33b6(mdo sde): la dbang thob pas mi skye ba las skye zhing mi 'byung ba las 'byung ba ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par zhugs kyang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba yang mi 'chad do// / 
33b7(mdo sde): de ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phrug su tshangs pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi sgo ste/ ye shes kyi sgo gang la gnas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam
33b8(mdo sde): pa nyid thob kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa'i spyod pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang / cho ga shes pa yin zhem/ 
34a1(mdo sde): / rigs kyi bu sems can rnams kyi spyod pa ni brgyad khri bzhi stong ste/ 'di ni sdom gyi rtsa ba'i tshig go// gang yang sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi
34a2(mdo sde): khyab pa/ brjod du med pa de sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mkhyen te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mi rig/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyis mi rig pa de la/ byang chub sems
34a3(mdo sde): dpa' sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / rang gi shes pas sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su rab tu 'jug ste/ spyod pa de'i gang ngo bo nyid dam/ gang mtshan nyid kyang
34a4(mdo sde): rung ste/ rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ rkyen gyi mtshan nyid dam/ byed rgyu da mtshan nyid dam/ tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ mi 'dra ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'dod
34a5(mdo sde): chags kyi mtshan nyid dam/ zhe sdang gi mtshan nyid dam/ gti mug gi mtshan nyid dam/ skal ba mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sems can dmyal ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ 
34a6(mdo sde): dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi mtshan nyid dam/ gshen rje'i 'jig rten gyi mtshan nyid dam/ lha'i mtshan nyid dam/ mi'i mtshan nyid dam/ nyan thos kyi nges par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ rang
34a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi nges par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sangs rgyas kyi nges par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ ring po'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ bar ba'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ nye ba'i rgyu'i mtshan
34a8(mdo sde): nyid kyang rung ste/ spyod pa de dag thams cad kyi mtshan nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ ye shes thams cad la kha na ma thob med pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub
34b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang cho ga shes pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gi chos dkon mchog
34b2(mdo sde): gi mdzod 'dzin pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ni mi zad pa ste/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid la rab tu 'jug pa
34b3(mdo sde): ji snyed pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod la bzung ba'i ye shes la 'jug pa'ang de snyed do// ji ltar sems can gyi spyod pa mi zad cing mtha' med
34b4(mdo sde): ba bzhin du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod kyang mi zad cing mtha' med pa'o// chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ces bya ba ni/ gang gi nub
34b5(mdo sde): mo de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes pa nas/ gang gi nu/ ba mo yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa de'i bar du/ de bzhin ga/ shegs pas bshad pa dang / 'chad pa dang
34b6(mdo sde): 'chad par 'gyur ba de thams cad ni de bzhin no// ma nor bde bzhin no// gnan ma yin pa'o// ci'i phyir de bzhin zhes byi zhe na/ de bzhin nyid zhi ba la yang dag par zhugs pas de'i phyir de
34b7(mdo sde): bzhin zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir na ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ces bya zhe na/ don dam pa'i bden pa la yang dag par zhugs pa de'i phyir ma nor pa de bzhin zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir ni gnan ma yin pa de
34b8(mdo sde): bzhin nyid ces bya zhe na/ de bdag gi ngo bo nyid ma yin par gzhan du mi btsal te/ de'i phyir gnan ma yin pa'o// yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ni// 
35a1(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams mang du thos pa/ kun dga' bo lta bur gyur kyang / de dag thams cad kyis bskal
35a2(mdo sde): pa bye ba phrag stong du yang yi ge khong du chud par mi nus so// yang don gcig du bstan te/ ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa 'di lta bu ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi
35a3(mdo sde): mdzod do// de byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dzin te/ ji ltar yi ge thams cad mi brjed cing / don thams cad mi nyams par sems can thams cad mgu bar byed/ sangs rgyas thams cad
35a4(mdo sde): rab tu mnyes par byed/ bdud thams cad pham par byed/ mu stegs can gzhan thams cad tshar gcod/ nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar byed cing de dag la chos dkon mchog rab
35a5(mdo sde): tu sgrogs pa de ltar 'dzin to// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub/ sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa yin no// yang
35a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos gang gi ngo bo nyid du ngas chos rnams mngon par sangs rgyas pa de'i ngo bo nyid du/ byang chub sems dpas chos rnams gzung bar bya'o// yang ji lta bur de bzhin gshegs pas
35a7(mdo sde): chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas she na/ yongasu ma grub pa'i tshul gyis sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid dang / yul las shin tu 'das pa'i tshul gyis rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid dang / shin tu skye
35a8(mdo sde): ba med pa'i tshul gyis smig rgyu'i ngo bo nyid dang / mi 'pho ba'i tshul gyis mig yor gyi ngo bo nyid dang / rang bzhin med pa'i tshul gyis gzugs brtan gyi ngo bo nyid dang / rag las pa'i tshul
35b1(mdo sde): gyis stong pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshul gyis mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / sems chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / 'dod chags thams cad dang brag
35b2(mdo sde): ba'i tshul gyis 'dod chags pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / grangs thams cad las 'das pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas pa'i ngo bo nyid du/ de ltar rigs kyi bu tha snyad du gzhan gyi rnam par rig pa la rten nas/ 
35b3(mdo sde): de 'dra bar chos de ngas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ gang chos de'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de ni tshig gis brjod par mi nus so// de la chos rnams 'dzin par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems
35b4(mdo sde): dpas de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par sa dngas rgyas par byas te yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig gis kyang sems nga can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la
35b5(mdo sde): bstan par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dang pa' thog ma nas sems can rnam par dag pas sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu
35b6(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams ni thog ma nas rnam par dag pa ste/ de la sems can rnams kyi rtsa ba'i dngos po med de/ byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba yongasu chad par rig nas
35b7(mdo sde): sems can gang rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de la bdag tu lta bar mi 'gyur/ sems can du lta bar ma yin/ srog tu lta bar ma yin/ gang zag tu lta bar yang mi 'gyur ro// de
35b8(mdo sde): yang 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can zhes bya ba 'di ni phyin ci log ste/ rgyur lta ba'i kun nas dkris pa dang / ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sred pa 'dus pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa
36a1(mdo sde): kun tu rtog pa la sems can zhes brjod snyam mo// de la byang chub sems dpas med pa phyin ci log las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa rab tu spangs pa'i phyir/ sems can rnams
36a2(mdo sde): la chos ston te/ dngos po gang yang chud mi gzon to// sems can med cing sems can dben pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nas rnam par
36a3(mdo sde): dag pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do// rigs kyi bu de ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor bas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub ce na/ 
36a4(mdo sde): tshul bzhin zhes bya ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na// rgyu dang rkyen ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'bras bu mngon par grub bo// sbyin pa ni longs spyod chen po'i rgyu ste/ 
36a5(mdo sde): de la byang chub sems dpa' gang gtong ba de yang tham// sa cad mkhyen par bsngos nas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed do// tshul khrims ni lha dang mir skye ba'i
36a6(mdo sde): rgyu ste/ lha dang mir skyes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams tshul khrims la rab tu 'dzud de/ tshul khrims yang dag par bzung ba de yang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas/ tshul
36a7(mdo sde): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed de/ bzod pa dang des po ni lus dang ngag dang / sems kyi rgyan gyi rgyu ste/ lus dang ngag dang sems brgyan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag
36a8(mdo sde): la ban pa dang / gzhan la phan par zhugs pa yin te/ phan par 'dod pa/ bzod pa'i gnas de yang thams cad mkhyen par sngos nas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed do// rtso
36b1(mdo sde): 'grus ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sdud pa'i rgyu ste byang chung sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams nas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang
36b2(mdo sde): dag par sgrug pa'i brtson 'grus de yang thams cad mkhyen par sngos nas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// bsam gtan ni sems dga' ba dang cang shes
36b3(mdo sde): ba'i rgyu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dga' ba dang / cang shes pas ni gnas kyi tshogs kun tu stong ste/ zhi gnas kyi tshogs de yang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas/ bsam gtan gyi
36b4(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed do// thos pa ni shes rab chen po'i rgyu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' shes ra dab chen po ni dmigs par lta ba mi 'dzin cing / dmigs pa
36b5(mdo sde): med pa'i thos pa de yang thams cad mkhyen par bsnga sa nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa ra byed do// de bzhin du dge ba'i chos thams cad de/ dge ba'i
36b6(mdo sde): chos kyi rgyu gang dang gang bsug khrid dang de'i 'bras bu lhun gyis 'grus pas mngon par skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyu dang rkyen de ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang tshul bzhin zhes
36b7(mdo sde): bya ba la chos thams cad kyi tshul bzhin ni bdag yin te// ji ltar bdag la bdag med pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad la bdag med do// ji ltar bdag stong pa de bzhin du chos thams
36b8(mdo sde): cad stong ngo // ji ltar bdag ming du btags pa tsam du zad pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyang ming du btags pa tsam du zad do// de ltar tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub sem
37a1(mdo sde): dpa' ni chos thams cad mnyam par sbyor ro// gang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de/ de ltar tshul bzhin la sbyor ba'i byang / 
37a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub bo// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa las ma nyams sho shing / chos thams cad la dbang
37a3(mdo sde): byed pa yin zhe na/ de la rigs kyi bu dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'jig tshogs la lta ba ma bcom par mngon par shes pa bskyed pa de dag ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams las nyams par 'gyur ro// yang
37a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis yang dag par bcom nas// lta ba dang len pa thams cad med par mngon par
37a5(mdo sde): shes pa bskyed de/ ye shes dang ldan shes rab dang ldan// blo dang ldan/ bzod pa dang ldan/ tshul khrims dang ldan te/ ting nge dz+ri nal snyoms par zhugs shing / lus dben sems/ 
37a6(mdo sde): dberan te/ 'di 'dra ba'i ye shes kyis nang nye bar ni zhing phyi rol du mi rgyu ga/ yul med pa'i yul can/ cang shes pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ shin tu brtags pas/ 
37a7(mdo sde): brtags pa/ rab tu dkar ba'i blo/ nyon mongs pas ma 'khrugs pa/ snang thob pa/ ye shes rab rib med pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs bstsags pa/ ye shes kyi tshogs bstsags pa/ zhi gnas
37a8(mdo sde): kyi tshogs bsugs pa/ lhag mthong gi tshogs bstsags pa/ sbyin pas brtan pa/ tshul khrims kyis brgyan pa/ bzod pa'i go gyon pa/ brtson 'grus kyi ya lang bgos pa/ bsam gtan la gnas
37b1(mdo sde): pa shes rab shin tu bsgoms pa'i blo dang ldan pa khyams pas rje su 'thun pa/ snying rje la rab tu gnas pa/ thabs kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa de lta bu'i chos dang ldan pas mngon par shes bskyed/ 
37b2(mdo sde): de/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du mngon par shes pa de dag gis shin tu 'phags shing / de mngon par shes pa de dag gis chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin te/ gzugs thams cad mthong
37b3(mdo sde): sgra thams cad thos/ sems can thams cad la 'jug cing bskal pa grangs med pa rjesu dran te/ rdzu 'phrul thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul/ zag pa zad pa'i bde ba rnyed cing yid kyi rnam par
37b4(mdo sde): rtog pa ji snyed pa la rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa thams cad la dbang byed pa yin te/ des chos thams cad de bzhin du lhun gyis grub par gan so// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub
37b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' mngon par shes pa las mi nyams shing chos/ thams cad la dbang byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la rje/ ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi tshul zab
37b6(mdo sde): mo rab tu zhugs shing / nyan thos dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu zab mo zhes bya ba ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o// rten cing 'brel
37b7(mdo sde): par 'byung ba'i tshul ni 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ mi dang gzugs kyi
37b8(mdo sde): rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sring ba'i
38a1(mdo sde): rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyi rga shi dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug/ 
38a2(mdo sde): bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' shig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'i sku dang rkyen gang yin pa de la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes rab tu
38a3(mdo sde): 'jug ste/ de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba kun 'byung ba'i tshul zhes bya'o// de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gog pa'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed
38a4(mdo sde): 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'ag
38a5(mdo sde): skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/ len pa
38a6(mdo sde): 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye/ ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba
38a7(mdo sde): dang 'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' shig 'gag par 'gyur ro// de ni rigs kyi bu rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gog pa'i tshul zhes/ 
38a8(mdo sde): bya'o// sems can rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang rkyen gang yin pa de la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes rab tu 'jug ste/ de ni chos kyi tshul zab mo la 'jug pa zhes bya ste/ 
38b1(mdo sde): gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon
38b2(mdo sde): mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba shes pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul lo// rang gi ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpas kyang de'i ma
38b3(mdo sde): sbyor ba sheso// gzhan yang zab mo zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig tshogs dang / bdag rnam par dag pa dang / chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig tshogs ni kun tu btsal
38b4(mdo sde): kyang mi dmigs so// gang mi dmigs pa de ni zang mo'o// bdag ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang ma brnyes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag thog ma nas kyang rnam par dag ste/ 
38b5(mdo sde): ltar bdag rnam par dag pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad rnam par dag go// de ci'i phyir rnam par dag pa zhes bya zhe na/ de la/ chos gang yang ma skyes ma bskyed ma 'gags ma
38b6(mdo sde): 'gags pa ste/ de bas na rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o// mun pa med pa/ snang ba med pa/ kun gzhi med pa/ rab rib med pa/ don de ma pa zab mo gang la mig med cing mig 'gog pa
38b7(mdo sde): med pa nas yid kyi bar du med cing yid 'gog pa med pa ste/ de ni yul du bgrang ba ma yin no// gang yul ma yin zhing yul med pa de ni don dam pa ste/ de'i phyir zab mo zhes bya'o// 
38b8(mdo sde): de la sems dang yid 'dzin pa med de/ rtogs par dka' ba mthong ba dka' ba/ khong du chud par dka' ba de lta bu'i chos kyi tshul zab mo la ye shes gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog
39a1(mdo sde): sems can gzhan la yang rab tu ston te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi tshul zab mo la rab tu zhugs pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thad
39a2(mdo sde): kyis gting dpag dka' ba yin no// bam po gsum pa// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i
39a3(mdo sde): shes pa la mkhas te/ mtha' gnyis su lta ba thams cad dang bral ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang brten pa de ni ci yang ma yin pa/ 
39a4(mdo sde): gang rten pa de ni dngos po med pa/ gang rten pa de ni yongasu ma grub pa/ grang rten cing 'brel bar 'thung ba de ni mi rtag pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ brangag med pa/ zhe ba/ gang brten pa de la ni bdag med/ 
39a5(mdo sde): sems can med/ srog med/ gso ba med/ skyes bu med/ gang zag/ med/ shed las skyes med/ shed bu med/ gang rten pa de la ni yang dag par 'byung ba gang yang med/ gang rten pa de
39a6(mdo sde): la de ci yang med pa/ rtsol ba med pa/ stong pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ dben pa/ rgyu ba med pa/ ma spros pa spros pa med pa ste/ de'i phyir skye ba na chos kho na skye/ 'gag pa na chos kho na 'gag ste/ 'di la bdag gam/ 
39a7(mdo sde): sems can nam/ srog gam/ gso ba 'am/ skyes bu 'am/ gang zag gam/ shed las skyes sam/ shed bu med ces bya'o// chos gang dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de dag la ni skye ba ci yang med cing
39a8(mdo sde): bdag po med de/ de'i phyir chos thams cad ni rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang mig yor lta bu zhes bya ste/ ji ltar phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams skye ba ni/ skyed par byed po med/ 'gag pa na/ 
39b1(mdo sde): yang 'gog par byed pa med pa de bzhin du/ nang gi chos rnams skye ba na yang skyed par byed pa med/ 'gag pa na yang 'gog par byed pa med de/ gnan dun rkyen rnams yod na 'drung gi rkyen mtshang na
39b2(mdo sde): 'gog go snyam du sems te/ de ltar shes pa la sbyor ba ni mthar lta ba thams cad rab tu spong ngo // de la mthar lta ba gang zhe na/ mtha' zhes bya ba ni chad pa dang rtag pa ste/ gang de kye/ rnam par ma 'jig
39b3(mdo sde): na chad pa dang / rtag pa dang bral ba ste/ de'i phyir dag pas na mthar lta ba thams cad rnam par dag pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug
39b4(mdo sde): nga'i shes pa la mkhas te/ mthar lta ba thams cad dang bral ba/ nga yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'ade ba bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas/ de bzhin
39b5(mdo sde): nyid dbyer med pa shes pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa zhes bya ba la de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa de ni phyag ste/ phye ba med pa/ 'jug pa me// 
39b6(mdo sde): pa mngon par zhen pa med pa/ mi bskyed pa/ bskyod par bya ba ma yin pa ste/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskyed par mi nuso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin/ 
39b7(mdo sde): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten ni phyag rgya des btab pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyad ni shin tu mi skye ba'i phyag rgya/ shin tu stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgya/ shin tu mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgya/ 
39b8(mdo sde): shin tu smon pa med pa'i phyag rgya/ shin tu 'dus ma byas pa'i phyag rgya/ shin tu 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyag rgya/ shin tu de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgya/ shin tu yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyag rgya/ 
40a1(mdo sde): shin tu nam ma pa'i ngag rgya ste/ dper na namakha'i phyag rgya mi snang ba de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya de yang spyan lnga la mi snang ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgyas
40a2(mdo sde): btab pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi tha snyad ji snyed du 'dogs pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab bzhin du tha snyad 'dogs so// de la gang dag rnam par shes
40a3(mdo sde): nga'i spyod yul ba de dag ni chos rnam par 'jog par byed do// gang dag rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa de dag ni chos rnam par 'jog par mi byed/ chos tha dad du mi byed do// de dag de bzhin
40a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas na/ de dag de bzhin nyid 'byed par mi byed do// de la de bzhin nyid tha dad pa gang zhe na/ gang dag tha/ ma dang 'bring dang / rab kyi chos rnam su rnam par rtog
40a5(mdo sde): pa'o// gang dag chos thams cad la mi rtog cing rnam par mi rto/ dag pa de dag ni de bzhin nyid tha dad du mi byed do// gang ji snyed/ mang por brtags shing rnam par brtags kyang de
40a6(mdo sde): bzhin nyid dbye bar mi nus te/ dper na sems can thams cad ni na mkha' la rnam par rgyu yang nam mkha'i khams ni 'dres par mi byed do// de bzhin du sems can thams cad de bzhin nyid la
40a7(mdo sde): rnam par rgyu yang de bzhin nyid ni 'dres par mi byed do// gang 'dir de lta bu'i chos rnams shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu ni de bzhig gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa yin te/ de bzhin
40a8(mdo sde): nyid kyang 'dres par mi byed do// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la zhugs shing / chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba yin zhe na/ 
40b1(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings shes bya ba ni rdul thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings so// yang dag par bsgrubs pa med pa'i phyir ma skyes pa'i dbying so// ma byung ba'i phyir mi 'gog/ 
40b2(mdo sde): pa'i dbyings so// 'gro ba med pa'i phyir mi 'gro ba'i bying so// na ba med pa'i phyir 'ong ba med pa'i dbying so// 'byung ba med pa'i phyir gnas med pa'i dbyings so// dus gsum mnyam pa'i phyir ji
40b3(mdo sde): lta ba bzhin gyi dbyings so// bzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ bdag gi dbyings so// don dam pa yin pa'i phyir gang zag med pa'i dbyings so// gnas med pa'i phyir rnam par rig pa med pa'i
40b4(mdo sde): dbyings so// 'dre ba med pa'i phyir kun gzhi med pa'i dbyings so// / nges par gyur pa'i phyir skye ba med pa'i dbyings so// rang bzhin gyis yong su dag pa'i phyir nam pa'i dbyings so// gnyen
40b5(mdo sde): po med pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings te/ 'di ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul lo 'jug pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad de ltar zhugs pas de la/ byang chub sems
40b6(mdo sde): dpa' de ltar chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa'i gang ci smra ba dang / brjod pa dang / ston pa de thams cad ni chos kyi dbyingasu yang dag par gzhol ba nyid do// chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la zhugs pa
40b7(mdo sde): de 'dod chags kyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag gnyis med par rab tu shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod chags ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// zhe sdang gi khams dang / 
40b8(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhe sdang ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// gti mug gi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ 
41a1(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gti mug na chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// nyon mongs pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/  ci phyir ne na/ nyon mangs/ 
41a2(mdo sde): pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin cano// 'dod pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyi su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin cano// gzugs kyi
41a3(mdo sde): khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs kyi khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// gzugs med pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de
41a4(mdo sde): dag ni gnyi su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs med pa'i khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin cano// mig gi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyi su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe
41a5(mdo sde): na/ mig ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ca no// gzugs kyi kha mas dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyi su med de/ de ci'i// phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang
41a6(mdo sde): bzhin cano// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyi su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi rnam par shes pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// yid kyi bar
41a7(mdo sde): gyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / chos kyi
41a8(mdo sde): dbyings de dag ni gnyi su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// phung po'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyi su med de/ de
41b1(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ phung po'i khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin cano// sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyi su med de/ de
41b2(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa dang chu dang / me dang / rlung ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / chos thams cad kyi bar dang / chos
41b3(mdo sde): kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos mnyam pa nyid 'di la zhugs pa de ni chos kyi
41b4(mdo sde): dbyings thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i phyir/ chos tha/ dmas cad rab tu shes pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la
41b5(mdo sde): zhugs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed de/ theg pa chen 'di la legs par gnas shing mi g.yo ba yin
41b6(mdo sde): zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed pa bcu gnyis kyis na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi phyed pa yin te/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 
41b7(mdo sde): byang chub kyi sems mi phyed pa dang / bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pas sbyor ba mi phyed pa dang / sbyin pa mi phyed pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang
41b8(mdo sde): shes rab mi phyed pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po mi phyed pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po mi phyed pa dang / sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mi phyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
42a1(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa mi phyed pa dang / 'khor bas yongasu mi skyo ba mi byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa bas mi ngom pa mi byed pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byang bzang po'i phyir gtan pa med
42a2(mdo sde): pa'i mchod sbyin byed pa mi phyed pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir lus dang srog 'dor ba mi phyed pa dang / sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan gyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba mi
42a3(mdo sde): phyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa mi phyed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di lta bu 'di dag las mi phyed pa de'i tshe/ bsam pa rdo rje
42a4(mdo sde): ltar sra ning mi byed pa yin no// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che rdo rje ni nor bu rin po che thams cad 'bigs kya nga bdag nyid ni mi 'bigs so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
42a5(mdo sde): bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed pa yang / sem/ sa can thams cad kyi bag la nyal ba dang / nyon mongs ba kun nas ldang ba dang / lta bar gyur pa rnams sel kyang / 
42a6(mdo sde): bdag nyid ni theg pa chen po 'di las mi phyed do// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed de/ theg pa chen po 'di la legs par gnas shing mi
42a7(mdo sde): g.yo ba yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yul rjes su thob cing rang gi yul yongasu dag pa yin zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul zhes bya ba ni yul
42a8(mdo sde): ma yin pa/ yul med pa yul thams cad yongs su dag pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yong su dag pas/ rang gi yul yongasu sbyong ste/ de 'di snyam du mig
42b1(mdo sde): gi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba 'am/ ring ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben
42b2(mdo sde): pa'i yul la ni mig gi yul gang yang med do// rna ba'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba 'am ring ba ma yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas
42b3(mdo sde): yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni rna ba'i yul gang yang med do// sna'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yud ni su dang yang nye ba
42b4(mdo sde): 'am ring ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul ral ni sna'i yul gang yang med do// lce'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi
42b5(mdo sde): yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang / yang nye ba 'am ring ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa / rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yu
42b6(mdo sde): la ni lce'i yul gang yang med do// lus kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba 'am ring ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yu
42b7(mdo sde): ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni lus kyi yul gang yang med do// yid kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba
42b8(mdo sde): 'am ring ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni yod kyi yul sha med do// phung po rnams dang / khams
43a1(mdo sde): rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa la yang de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi
43a2(mdo sde): yul dben pa nyid kyis yul thams cad dben par 'jug go// rang gi zhing yong su dag par sangs rgyas kyi zhing la zhugs pa de ni chos gang dag de'i dbang po drug la snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams ca
43a3(mdo sde): la sangs rgyas kyi yul dben par 'jug go// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa de bzhin du/ de yul thams cad la yang mi chags mi thogs te/ 
43a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yul la rje su zhugs shing rang gi yul yongasu dag ba yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gcu
43a5(mdo sde): thob pa rtag tu mi brjed par spyod pa yin zhe na/ rig sa kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gzungs yongasu sgyu ba bya bas gzungs thob par 'gyur te/ de la gzungs yongasu sgyud
43a6(mdo sde): ba byed pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni gzungs yongasu sbyang ba byed pa ste/ sum cu rtsa gnyis po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa dang / chos don du gnyer ba
43a7(mdo sde): dang chos kyi kun dga' la dga' mos pa dang / chos la mos pa dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / chos la bab pa dang / mang du thos pa rnams la sten cing bsnyen la bsnyen bkur byed pa
43a8(mdo sde): dang / slob dpon dang / mkhan po rnams la nga rgyal med cing btsun par gus par byed pa dang / chos yongasu tshol bas mi ngoms pa dang / rjes su bstan pa rnams la bka' blo bde zhing mthun
43b1(mdo sde): par 'dzin pa dang / chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la ston pa tsam du shes shing 'khrul pa mi tshol ba dang / kun 'dzin pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / ston pa la le lo med pa dang / chos la slob
43b2(mdo sde): dpon gyi dpe ma khyad med cing zang zing med par chos sbyin pa dang / shes rab kyi rtsa ba'i gnas zos pa dang / tshul bzhin gyi chos la sbyor ba dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos la so sor brtag pa'i phyir
43b3(mdo sde): mang du thos pa mu med par byas pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa mu med par bcas pa dang / rtag tu dben pa la sems gnol ba dang / rje su dran pa drug rjes su dran pa dang / yang dag pa
43b4(mdo sde): chags par 'gyur ba drug mi 'dor ba dang / gus par bya ba'i gnas drug yongasu mi gtong ba dang / sems can tha/ dmas cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis chos la sbyor ba
43b5(mdo sde): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang mi 'gal ba'i las dang bya ba la 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo ga/ sum la sems nges par rtog pa la mi skrag pa dang / 'phags
43b6(mdo sde): pa'i rigs dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan kun 'dzin pas yongasu yi mi 'chad pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung ba las sems zhum pa med pa dang / sems can la lta bas snying rje che ba
43b7(mdo sde): dang / chos la lte bas lus dang srog 'dor ba dang / ye shes la lta bas rtag tu rgyal med pa dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba la yongasu mi skyo ba ste/ 'di ni gzungs smra
43b8(mdo sde): ba byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de lag tu gang zhe na/ gang kun bzung ba'i chos rnams mi brjed pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams mi brjed pa dang / dran po rjesu dran pa dang / rtogs par
44a1(mdo sde): khor du chud pa dang / blo gros 'dod pa dang / yi ge mi zad pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang skad la 'jug pa shes pa dang / spobs pa bstan pa thogs pa med cing rgyun mi 'chad/ 
44a2(mdo sde): ba dang / nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde rtogs pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde rtogs pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / kun rdzob mi zad pa bstan pa shes pa dang / don dam pa dbyer me
44a3(mdo sde): pa'i de kho na bstan pa shes pa dang / bden pa la 'jug pa nges par shes pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rje su 'jug pa shes pa dang / yang dag par spong ba'i brtson 'grus mi 'god pa shes/ 
44a4(mdo sde): ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas rnam par rol pa shes pa dang / dbang po'i rim pa shes pa dang / stobs la gnas pa mi bskyod par shes pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rtogs pa dang 'thun pa
44a5(mdo sde): shes pa dang / lam la 'jug pa'i gnas shes pa dang / zhi gnas kyis sems gnas par shes pa dang / lto// ga mthong gis chos sgrol bar shes pa dang / rig pa dang rnam
44a6(mdo sde): par grol ba'i rje su 'thun pa shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i yas skyed pa shes pa dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la 'jug pa shes pa dang / 
44a7(mdo sde): bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi so so ci rigs par shes pa dang / sgra skad dang ngag gi lam la 'jug pa shes pa dang / chos kyi brda' ston pa shes pa dang / don dbyer med par shes pa dang / tshig
44a8(mdo sde): 'bru mi zad par shes pa dang / sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba shes pa dang / so so ci rigs par chos ston pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa dran pas
44b1(mdo sde): 'dzin pa shes pa dang / tshig dang yi ge thams cad mtshams sbyar ba'i nges pa'i tshig la 'jug pa shes pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ 
44b2(mdo sde): rtogs pa shes pa dang / rgyu dang bya ba la 'jug pa shes pa dang / chos thams cad la snang b.rang rib med par shes pa ste/ 'di ni gzungs shes bya'o// lus dang bag dang sems dang 'dra ba'o/ 
44b3(mdo sde): chos kun tu 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni mi zad pa ste/ chos kyi char 'bebs pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tha~Md rnam par skyed pa 'di ni// gzungs
44b4(mdo sde): kyi tshul la 'jug pa yin te/ gzungs thob pa sangs nga rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mi brjed par spyod pa zhes bya'o// nga rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa
44b5(mdo sde): rtag tu mi brjed par spyod pa yin// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa thogs pa med cing rgyun mi 'chad la/ rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs
44b6(mdo sde): kyis byin gyi rlabs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa yin te/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa myur ba dang / 
44b7(mdo sde): spobs pa mgyogs pa dang / spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang / spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / shin tu nges pa'i tshig la spobs pa dang / zab mo la spobs pa dang / sna tshogs la spobs pa
44b8(mdo sde): dang / legs par rgyan pa'i spobs pa dang / zhum pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / tshigasu bcad pa sna tshogs bstan pa ga la spobs pa dang / 
45a1(mdo sde): nas mdo dang rtogs pa brjod pa dang / sngon byung ba la spobs pa dang / mi thul ba'i spobs pa dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa mi zad pa la spobs pa dang / spobs pa shin tu gsapa
45a2(mdo sde): zhing shin tu mdzes pa dang / tshig btsun ning gzung ba'i spobs pa dang / chos ston pa 'bras bu yod pa'i spobs pa dang / lha'i 'khor gyi rgyan gyi spobs pa dang / the tsom thams cad gcod par/ 
45a3(mdo sde): spobs pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la spobs pa dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / 'khor la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms
45a4(mdo sde): kyi spobs pa dang / skye ba dran pa mngon par shes pa'i spobs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi byin gyis rlabs pa'i spobs pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu nyi shu rtsa bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub
45a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa yino// de dag kyang/ yongasu sbyang ba bya ba nyi shu rtsa bzhis 'grub ste/ nyi shu rtsa ba ni/ gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bla ma'i ngag mi gcog pas myur ba'i sdon/ 
45a6(mdo sde): par 'gyuro// tshur shog ces bya ba dang / song zhes bya ba la g.yo med pas spobs pa mgyogs par 'gyuraro// nyan ma ngas pa thams cad la chags pa med pas spongs pa thogs pa/ 
45a7(mdo sde): med par 'gyuro// de la ma chags par gnas pas spongs pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyuraro// phra ma'i tshig med pas shin tu nges pa'i tshig la spobs par 'gyu'o// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung
45a8(mdo sde): brtogs pas zab mo la spobs par 'gyuraro// sbyin pa sna tshogs bsugs pas sna tshogs la spobs par 'gyuraro// chung ma legs par brgyan te/ rab tu byin pas legs par brgyan pa'i/ 
45b1(mdo sde): spobs par 'gyuraro// byang chub kyi sems las mi nyams pas zhum pa med pa'i spobs par 'gyuraro// tshul khrims kyi phung po legs par kun tu bsrungs pas 'jigs pa med pa'i spobs pa/ 
45b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dril bu sna tshogs byin pas/ tshig su bcad pa sna tshogs bstan pa'i nges pa'i tshig la spobs par 'gyu ro// sbyin pa dang ldan pa dang / rim
45b3(mdo sde): gro byed pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa sngon du 'gro bas mdo dang rtogs pa brjod pa dang / sngon byung ba la spobs par 'gyuraro// sdug bsngal ba dang / dbul ba dang / mgon med pa la mi brnyas pas mi
45b4(mdo sde): thul ba'i spobs par 'gyuraro// gter mi zad pa sbyin pa dang / pha rol chos la sbyor bas tshig rab tu dbye ba mi zad pa/ dal spongs par 'gyu ro// tshig bden pa dang / tha ba med pa dang / 
45b5(mdo sde): ngag rtsub po med pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pas spobs pa shin tu gsal zhing mdzes par 'gyur ro// bla ma'i tshig khyad du mi gsod pa dang / gzhan gyi tshig mi gcog pas
45b6(mdo sde): tshig btsun zhing gzungs pas spobs par 'gyu ro// rang gi yon tan gyi chos sgrub pas chos bsten pa 'bras bu yod pa'i spobs par 'gyuro// bdag la mi stod pa dang / gzhan la mi
45b7(mdo sde): smod pa dang / phangs pa'i dngos po yongasu gtong bas lha'i 'khor gyi rgyan gyi spobs par 'gyur ro// chos la slong dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa dang / chos ji ltar thos pa bzhin du ston pas
45b8(mdo sde): the tsom thams cad gcod pa'i spobs par 'gyu ro// bstan chos thams cad shes pa dang / gzhan la mi gnod pa dang / nad pa rnams kyi nad g.yog byed pa dang / sman rab tu sbyin pas
46a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la spobs par 'gyur ro// pha rol la 'khrul pa'i skabs mi tshol ba dang / gzhan dag gi ltung ba mi gleng ba
46a2(mdo sde): dang 'khrul pa la mi rtog pas 'khrul pa med pa'i spobs par 'gyu ro// sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang sems can thams cad la mtshungs par sbyor ba dang / mya ngan las
46a3(mdo sde): 'das pa'i lam la dgod pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur bsti dang / tshig su bcad pa thams cad don du mi gnyer bas/ 'khor la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / gtong snyoms kyi spobs
46a4(mdo sde): par 'gyu ro// bka' blo bde ba dang / nges pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang / sems dga' ba dang / gzhan gyi rgyud 'khrug par mi byed pas/ skye ba dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i
46a5(mdo sde): spobs par 'gyuro// theg pa chen po las maM nya mas pa dang / theg pa dman pa mi 'dod pa dang / sems can la snying rje ba dang / thams cad nan tan la 'god pas
46a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i slob par 'gyur ro// sems can gzhan la go bar byed pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o// sems can gzhan la nan du bya ba ston pas
46a7(mdo sde): de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o// gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud tshim par byed pas de'i phyir spongs pa zhes bya'o// sems can gzhan gyi sems dang 'thun par ston pas de'i
46a8(mdo sde): phyir spongs pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos dang yon tan dang / ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni spobs pa thogs pa med cing rgyun mi
46b1(mdo sde): 'chad la rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyi brlabs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang / 'chi pho dang / 'byung ba rnams la dbang
46b2(mdo sde): thob pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu gnyis dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho dang / 'byung ba rnams la dba' thob pa yin te/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdig pa'i
46b3(mdo sde): grogs po yongasu spangs shing rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten pa dang / lta ba shin tu yongasu dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongasu dag pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / 
46b4(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug pa dang / ldang ba shes pa dang / shes ra ba dang / thabs zung du 'brel pa dang / mngon par shes pa nyams la thob pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung bar so sor rtog pa dang khasams
46b5(mdo sde): bzhin du skye ba dang / smon lam yong su rdzogs pa dang / sems can la lta ba'i byams pa la sbyor ba dang / snying rje chen po la nges par sems pa dang / chos la snga ma lta bur rtog pa dang / 'chi
46b6(mdo sde): 'pho zhing skye ba dang / chos kyi mtshan nyid rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos la 'jug pa dang / phyin ci log gi chos la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam/ 
46b7(mdo sde): kyis byin gyis brlabs nas skye ste/ 'pho zhing 'byung la skye ba dang / 'pho ba dang 'byung bar yang mi sems pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang dang gang du skyes nas/ sems can gyi don byed
46b8(mdo sde): pa'i skyes pa'i rabs bstan pa tshad med grangs med pa'i skyes pa'i rabs de dag thams cad ni rtsa ba gnyis la gnas pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la gnas pa dang / 
47a1(mdo sde): snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba la gnas pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho dang / 'thung ba rnams la dbang thob pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang
47a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bdud bzhi'i lam las yang dag par 'das shing bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad yang dag par bcom pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sku
47a3(mdo sde): ma lta bur shes shing rtogs pas phung po'i bdud las yang dag par 'da'o// ji ltar thos pa'i chos la tshul bzhin so sor rtogs pas nyon mongs pa'i bdud las yang dag par 'da'o// rten cing 'brel
47a4(mdo sde): par 'byung ba rtogs pas 'ching bdag gis bdud las yang dag par 'da'o// byang chub kyi sems las mi nyams pas lha'i bu'i bdud las yang dag par 'da'o// yang des bdud kyi las rnams
47a5(mdo sde): bcom pa yin te/ des bdud kyi las rnams bcom pa gang zhe na/ gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la bdud kyis glags mi rnyed pa ste/ theg pa dman pa 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / 
47a6(mdo sde): byang chub kyi sems mi srung ba bdud kyi las dang / sems can tha dad par sbyin pa bdud kyi las dang / skye ba la gnas pa'i tshul khrims bdud kyi las dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ gzugasu bsngos
47a7(mdo sde): pa'i bzod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi bye ba la brtson pa'i brtson 'grus dang / de la chags shing ro myang ba'i bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyis chos ngan pa la smod pa bdud kyi las dang / 'khor bas/ 
47a8(mdo sde): yongasu skyob bdud kyi las dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yong su mi sngob bdud kyi las dang / nyon mongs pa la spyod 'dud kyi las dang / ltung ba 'chab pa bdud kyi las dang / byang chub sems dpa'
47b1(mdo sde): la sdang ba bdud kyi las dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba bdud kyi las dang / byas pa rgyun gcod pa bdud kyi las dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongasu mi tshol ba bdud kyi las dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan pa
47b2(mdo sde): mi 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mabyung byed pa bdud kyi las dang / zang zing dang 'brel par chos ston pa bdud kyi las dang / thabs dang zil las sems can yongasu smin par
47b3(mdo sde): byed pa bdud kyi las dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po 'dor ba bdud kyi las dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams la khong khro ba bdud kyi las dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la mi gus pa bdud kyi
47b4(mdo sde): las dang / nyan thos kyi bslabs pa'i rjesu 'thun pa bdud kyi las dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gyi rje su 'jug pa bdud kyi las dang / dus ma yin par sgrub 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / 
47b5(mdo sde): snying rje chen po bor nas rigs la rtog pa bdud kyi las dang // 'dus ma byas 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / 'dus byas la smod pa bdud kyi las dang / sems can gyi ci bya'o cog la
47b6(mdo sde): g.yel ba bdud kyi las dang / nga rgyal la gnas shing mi 'dud pa dang / lce gnyis smra ba dang / g.yo sgyu dang ldan pa dang / bcos ma la dga' ba dang / mi drang ba dang / rtsub cing brlang ba dang / 
47b7(mdo sde): sdig pa la mi smod pa dang / chos kyi drungs 'byin pa dang / zos pa cung zad tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa dang / chos ma yin pa don tu gnyer ba dang / chos ma yin pa 'dod pa dang / sgrib pa dang
47b8(mdo sde): chod pa dang / kun nas ldang ba rnam par mi gnon pa bdud kyi las dang / sems kyi dri ma mi rtog pa bdud kyi las dang / dge sbyong gi dri ma la mi mjed pa bdud kyi las te/ rigs kyi bu ji tsam du
48a1(mdo sde): mi dge ba'i chos la 'jug pa dang / dge ba'i chos 'dor ba de thams cad ni bdud kyi la so// chos bzhis na bdud kyi las 'di dag las shin tu 'da' ste/ bani gang zhe na/ 'di lta
48a2(mdo sde): ste byang chub kyi sems ma brjed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag dang / dad pa dang / brtson 'grus la gnas pa'i bag yod pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la gnas te/ sems can yongasu smin par byed
48a3(mdo sde): pa dang / chos kyi tshul zab mo la gnas te/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin paso// rigs kyi bu de ltar chos la sbyor ba'i bya chu sa dpa' ni bdud bzhi'i lam las yang dag par 'das shing / 
48a4(mdo sde): bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad bcom pa yin no// rigs kyi/ de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams tshad med pa bsugs shing sems can thams cad 'tsho bar gyur pa/ 
48a5(mdo sde): yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can rnams la byams pas gnas pa yin/ 'byung po rnams la snying rje bar gnas pa yin/ bsam gtan rnams la de/ 
48a6(mdo sde): la ma chags par gnas pa yin/ slong ba rnams la bdogs pa thams cad yongasu gtong ba yin/ bsod nams dag gis longs spyod mi zad pa yin/ bsam pa dag pas lag na rin po che yin// 
48a7(mdo sde): mthon dman gyi yid med pas sems sa dang mtshungs pa yin// tshul khrims yongasu dag pas bsam pa 'byor pa yin/ mchod sbyin thams cad sgrub pas sems grol zhing sgo bsgribs/ 
48a8(mdo sde): ba med pa yin/ chos rnam par 'byed pas gzungs dang spongs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med par 'gro bas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la gnas pa/ 
48b1(mdo sde): yin ji lta phyi rol gyi 'thung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ bdag gi nang gi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi
48b2(mdo sde): 'tsho bar gyur cig/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / chos shes pa la mkhas pa gang yin pa de san thams cad kyi 'tsho ba ma yin par ma gyur cig ces de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang yongs su/ 
48b3(mdo sde): bsngo ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams tshad med pa bsags shing / sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
48b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams ma byung yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la/ dbyang chub sems dpa' ni gnas ma yin
48b5(mdo sde): pa'i bya ba shes pas stobs bcu yongasu sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin/ ba yin/ zag pa zad pa'i bya ba shes pas mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongasu sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ dus gsu/ 
48b6(mdo sde): la chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi bya ba shes pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongasu sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan snang ba thob pas/ spyan lnga
48b7(mdo sde): yongasu spang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba thob pas/ mngon par shes pa thams cad yongasu sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags yang dag
48b8(mdo sde): mar bcad pas/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yong su bskang ba tshar phyin pa yin/ bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bsags pas lus dang / ngag dang / sems dang mtshan dang / dpe byad
49a1(mdo sde): / bzang po'i rgyan yongs sbyangs par bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ dbang skur ba thob pas sa bcu yongasu sbyangs par bye ba tshar phyin pa yin/ ye shes kyi tshogasags pasas/ 
49a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas rnams ma byung yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can
49a3(mdo sde): rnams la nye bar gnas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la mi
49a4(mdo sde): chags pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dben/ 'dzam bu'i gling na sems can rnams kyi gzugs snang ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dang 'dra ba'i phyag rgya rgya mtsho chen po la
49a5(mdo sde): yod de/ de'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po zhes bya'o// de bzhin du sems ma na thams cad kyi semasu snang ba'am/ gzugs snang ba 'a/ slar snang ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rgya/ 
49a6(mdo sde): mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi snang ba gcig la snang bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin ces bya'o// 'di lta ste/ 
49a7(mdo sde): dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni ro gcig pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos la rnam par grol ba'i ror shes pas ro gcig pa yi no// 'di lta ste dper ma rgya mtsho chen
49a8(mdo sde): po ni dus las mi yol ba yino// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang dus dang dus ma yin pa la so sor rtog pas/ byang chub kyi snying po'i dus las me yol lo// 'di lta ste dper na/ 
49b1(mdo sde): rgyamatshan thon ga pa da nga nga rtan cig mi gan so// de bzhi du byang chub sems dpa' yang bag chags kyi nyan mongs pathams cad dag nya thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems can thad da / 
49b2(mdo sde): cig sa gan so// di ste surgyam chin ba rnathams cad byung pas dru ba ma / gang ba med // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ches thams cad zad pas chos kya byings
49b3(mdo sde): 'am gang bar mi byed do// di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po na la tshon tshad medado// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis tshad med do// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni za
49b4(mdo sde): cing gtong dag dga' ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems sa 'a yang ma cheng nyin ngos dag ra sangs rgyas thams cad gi sa gtid dang gda' ba ma'o/ di sa ste pes/ 
49b5(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po ni sems can tshad med pa'i gnas yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can yongasu smin par bya ba tshad med pa'i gnas/ 'di ni rgya mtsho phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin
49b6(mdo sde): la 'jug pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la mi chags pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar drabyang chub se/ 
49b7(mdo sde): dnga' chags pa thams cad las yang dge par 'das pa yin ne na/ chags pa zhes bya ba ni gang chos rnams la lta bkun nas ldang ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' ni lta bkun nas ldang bathams
49b8(mdo sde): ba ma pa 'gas pa ma 'amapa mam 'di gas pa sa rdung sa na ma kyil la mi chags/ de na du byang chu mas das rung ba ba zu sa
50a1(mdo sde): yang sems can thams cad la mi chag so// yang skyes bu dam pa de dag ni spyad pa dang / cho ga'i tshul shes pa yin te/ de la chog ni dran pa'o// spyad pa ni rnam par mi g.yeng ba'o// de/ 
50a2(mdo sde): dag ni mun pa dang bral zhing snang ba thob yang yin ste/ de la mun pa zhes bya ba ni gang chos rnams la mi shes pa'o// snang ba zhes bya ba ni gang chos rnams la ye shes thogs pa med pa ste/ de'i phyir de/ 
50a3(mdo sde): dag mun pa dang bral zhing snang ba thob pa zhes bya'o// skyes bu dam pa de dag ni ye shes gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang gis ye shes thob pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag rang byung gi ye
50a4(mdo sde): shes la mngon par gnas shing sems can gzhan ye shes 'dod par byed pa yin no// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos gtan la 'bebs pa'i ye shes bstan pa 'di la gzhan gyi dring
50a5(mdo sde): kha mi 'jog cing rang gis ye shes thob par gyur pa nga de'i tshe/ myur du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyuraro// 8/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de'i tshe/ tshig su bcad pa 'di dag
50a6(mdo sde): gsung so// gang zhig lta ba kun las sems dang na zhing // mkhas pa bsod nams tshogs ni rab byed la/ anam ldang ba yongasu spangs nas su byang chub phyir bsngos de
50a7(mdo sde): ni zad mi 'gyur// nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal kun spangs nas/ de ni ye shes tshogs rnams tshol bar byed// mtha' yas blo ldan na mkha'i ngo bo nyid// kun mkhyen ye shes yongasu rdzogs par
50a8(mdo sde): byed// rgyal ba'i sras de sangs rgyas rjes dran pa// gzugs dang mtshan gyi chos su ma yin te// nang na sems dang yid ni mi rgyu ba// de ni mthun par sangs rgyas rje su dran// chos ni 'dod cha
50b1(mdo sde): zlal ning rang bzhin den/ nang rab ni drug tu mdzar ma med/ gang ga dmigs pa thams cad bral gyur ba/ de 'dir chos ni su dran pa yin/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun shin bya dus mabyas/ 
50b2(mdo sde): stong pa mtshan med smon las rnam par grol// de la sems med dran dang 'jug pa med// de ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa yin// phung po yongs su btang ba thams cad gtong // nyon mongs dngos
50b3(mdo sde): po thams cad legs par 'dor// snyems pa med cing rtog dang rnam rtog dag/ 'di ni gtong ba legs par rjesu dran// tshul khrims zag pa med cing 'dus ma byas// lus dang ngag dang
50b4(mdo sde): yid kyis 'jug pa med// 'byung ba med cing srid ga sum mi gnas pa// de ni tshul khrims rjesu dran pa yin// lha gang dag cing dri med nyon mongs med// dga' ldan gnas
50b5(mdo sde): pa dbang bskur thob gyur pa// sems can dag pa de dge 'dir dran zhing // bdag kyang myur dus drar 'gyur snyam sems// de bzhin gshegs kyi dam chos 'dzin pa ni// nyon mongs dngos po
50b6(mdo sde): thams cad 'dzin mi byed// chos dang chos min gnyis las rnam par grol// de 'dra de ni rgyal ba'i chos 'dzin yin// rgyal bas byang chub mtshan nyid gang gnyis pa// chos kyi mtshan nyid de
50b7(mdo sde): ni yongs su 'dzin cing // gang gis rdul med mtha' 'di rab shes pa// de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi chos 'dzin yin// bdag ni rab tu dag pas sems can dag/ chos kun dag par
50b8(mdo sde): mangs pa sus rtog pa// de ni sems dag rang bzhin 'od gsal te// sems can gdon phyir rtag tu yongs smin byed// sems can khams rnams ma rung mi byed cing// de ni bri zhing gang / 
51a1(mdo sde): par mthong ba med// lta ba nor ba rab tu spang bar ston// de 'dra de ni sems can mang po spyong // 'jig rten yul kun rab tu gang ston pa// des ni sangs rgyas yul yang rab tu bstan/ 
51a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas yul ni na mkha' mtshungs pa ste// de bzhin 'jig rten yul yang rab tu shes// sgra skad dbyangs dang yi ge thams cad ni// brag cha 'dra ba de yis rab mthong zhing // de la nyan pa'ang
51a3(mdo sde): shin tu yod min par// de ltar rab tu shes pa gzungs 'thob bo// kun tu 'dzin dang 'dzin cing klog pa dang // chos rnams bstan pa'i rnam par rab bshad kyang // bdag dang sems can chosu
51a4(mdo sde): rlom sems med// de ni gzungs la rab tu gnas pa yin// rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs pa 'dzin byed cing legs par gsungs pas sems can tshim byed pa// dran dang ting nge 'dzin dang bral mi
51a5(mdo sde): 'gyur// gzungs la nges pa'i yon tan 'di dag go// / chos ni rnam pa kun tu bsugs med pas// chos la mi 'phro/ 'phros pa med pa 'ang min// dper nak+Sha ni char rgyun 'phebs pa ltar
51a6(mdo sde): de ltar de yang chos kyi char pa 'bebs// yon tan 'byung gnas rnams kyi spobs pa ni// thogs med rgyun chags rgyun chad mi 'gyur bar// mdo sde stong phrag bye ba rab tu 'chang// sems can dbang
51a7(mdo sde): bor sems can 'du shes med// sangs rgyas mthu yis bskal pa bye stong du// rgyun mi 'chad par chos ni rab ston cing // bsam pa ji bzhin sems can tshim par byed// spobs pa'i tshul
51a8(mdo sde): gyis sangs rgyas yon tan gnas// chos 'di thams cad na mkha' 'dra ba zhes// gang gis chos rnams kun gyi tshul shes la// sems can srog dang gang zag mi 'dzin pa// de ni rgyal ba
51b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi dam chos 'dzin// sems can thams cad shin tu mya ngan 'das// de dag de ltar kun tu skye ba med// su yi bzod 'di dri med 'od gsal ba// de ni bstan pa 'di la bag yod yin// phung
51b2(mdo sde): po yang dag sgyu ma lta bur mthong // chos dbyings ci 'dra de bzhin khams rnams shes// dbang po drug ni grong stong 'drar mthong ba// de ni phung po'i bdud las yang dag 'dar// sprin brtsegs phung ba
51b3(mdo sde): lta bur nyon mongs rnams// bag yod tshul bzhin rab tu rtog byed cing // chos la mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa// de ni nyon mongs bdud las yang dag 'da'// gang zhig skye ba rtag tu skye med shes/ 
51b4(mdo sde): 'di la gang yang 'pho med 'gro ba med// chos rnams/ 'ongs med song ba med shes pa// de ni 'chi bdag bdud kyi dbang mi 'gro// gang zhig g.yo dang rlom sems mi byed cing // byang chub gnas
51b5(mdo sde): kyang byang chub 'du shes med// bdag dang sems can med kyang snying rje 'jug/ de ni dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud 'du'o// rnam shes ye shes gnyis ni mnyam par mthong / 
51b6(mdo sde): 'dus byas mi gnas 'dus ma byas la min// 'gro ba'i sems ni sgyu ma 'drar mthob ba// de ni sems pa'i rdzi ba med pa yin// pha rol tshu rol gang la'ang mi chags la// chos ldan
51b7(mdo sde): gru ni yang dag su sbyor zhing // sems can sgrol yang sems can 'du shes med// mnyam pa zhes bya byang chub sems dpa' de// srid pa gsum po 'brog dgon 'dra ba dang // stong pa
51b8(mdo sde): 'gyur ba med par rab shes shing // lam gyi rims kyis rtag tu sems can sgrol// de ni ded dpon bdud rtsi lam ston pa// 'dzangs pa de ni tshul dang tshun mi mkhas// chos rnams
52a1(mdo sde): gdod nas stong par rab tu shes// tshul dang rigs pas mya ngan 'das la 'dzud// byang chub sems dpa' do ni 'dren ces bya// sems kyi rgyud ni gzhan dang gzhan du
52a2(mdo sde): 'gyur // sems ni sems la rnams kyang 'tshams mi sbyor// 'gro ba'i sems rgyud de dag rab shes pa// byang chub sems dpa' yong su 'dren ces bya// nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid dang chu zla ltar/ 
52a3(mdo sde): chos rnams thams cad dag cing rnam dag ces// nyon mongs kun dang 'dre bar mi byed pa// sems can dag pa de ni ma smad pa// gang zhig chos gcig gis ni chos rnams kun// sgyu ma
52a4(mdo sde): smig rgyu 'dra bar gzungs med dang // gsog dang brdzun dang rtag pa med par shes// de ni byang chub snying por myur du 'gro// chos gtan la 'bebs pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na// 
52a5(mdo sde): lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / lce 'phye chen po'i srog chags khrag khrig phrag bdun cu gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sem
52a6(mdo sde): bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong ni mi skye bo'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu
52a7(mdo sde): g.yos so// snang ba chen pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par 'gyur to// lha brgya stong dag kyang me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs shing sil snyan dag kyang bkrol nas 'di skad ces
52a8(mdo sde): gang dag bstan pa 'di thos nas mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / nan tan byed pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi yul du rje su dong ba yin no// gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam
52b1(mdo sde): drung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad mkhas pa rnams kyis rgyan kyis legs par brgyan pa byas te phyag bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas byung bar gyur na/ chos 'di lta bu 'di rab
52b2(mdo sde): tu ston par 'gyuraro// skyes bu dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang mthong bar 'gyu ro zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi nus pa lung
52b3(mdo sde): bstan pas// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod mngon tu rangs par mdzad pas mu tig gi dra ba 'od dri yod cing rnam par dag pa stong gsum yongasu gang
52b4(mdo sde): ba ri ba bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la mngon par gsol nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes ni chags pa mi mngar
52b5(mdo sde): zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' ba// bstan pa ni rgyun mi 'chad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sems la gzigs shing / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma
52b6(mdo sde): yin pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa bstan pa des 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim par gyur to// theg pa
52b7(mdo sde): chen po 'di yang rgyas par brjod pa mdzad par gyur to// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag la yang chos kyi snang ba chen pos rgyas par
52b8(mdo sde): mad par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la yang chos 'byung ba'i sgobastan pas chos 'byung ba'i sgo des chos 'byung ba'i sgo tshad ma mchis pa bstan par
53a1(mdo sde): bgyi'o// bam po bzhi pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur bar spobs pa zhes bya ba de 'khor de nyid du 'dus
53a2(mdo sde): par gyur te 'dug pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu gang khyod kyi ming na mkha' mdzod ces bya ba de/ ci na mkha' khyod kyi mdzod dam/ 
53a3(mdo sde): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin te/ nam mkha' ni kho bo'i mdzod do// myur bar spobs pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rnam pa'i mdzod kyi bye brag bdag cag gis kyang blta'o// de nas bcom ldan
53a4(mdo sde): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nam mkha' mdzod kyi khyad par ston da cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i
53a5(mdo sde): mdzod kyis byang chub sems dpa' myur bar spobs pa la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi yid la gang 'dod pade kho bos nam mkha' las char dbab bo// 
53a6(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' myur bar spongs pa 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che ud pa la'i dpal gyi 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba na/ 
53a7(mdo sde): 'od thams cad rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i pad+ma rgya ni rgyang grags kyi tshad/ mdab ma bye ba stong phrag mang po// 'jam zhing gzhon pa/ gos ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba/ dris ni
53a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing khyab pa/ kha dog mang po brgya stong dang ldan pa/ mthong na yid du 'ong zhing chog mi shes pa/ pad+ma de mthong ba dang dri bsnams pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting
53b1(mdo sde): nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba de bdag gis mthong ste/ 'khor 'dir de 'dra ba'i pad+ma'i char po ba shig snyam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' myur bar spobs pas pas ma ma thag tu/ de nas
53b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' na mnga' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ nam mkha'i ngos las de 'dra ba'i pad+ma'i char mngon par phab ste/ de na 'khor de dag thams cad pad+ma de dag gi dri tsher zhing
53b3(mdo sde): mthong bas dga' ba'i zas shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// 'khor de thams cad ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i mdzod la phyag
53b4(mdo sde): 'tshal nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to// skyes bu dam pa'i byin gyi/ dbarlabs dang / ye shes kyi stobs leg so// leg so// sems can thams cad kyang 'di 'dra ba'i byin gyi rlabs thob par
53b5(mdo sde): thur cig/ de na byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkod ces bya ba/ 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ byang chub sems dpa'// na mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// 
53b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nam mkha' las gser phye'i char phob shig/ byang chub sems dpa'i rin chen dkod kyis tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ de'i modado la nam mkha' las gser
53b7(mdo sde): phye'i char mngon par phab bo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkod kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad smraso// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nam mkha'
53b8(mdo sde): las rin po che thams cad kyi char phob shig/ tshig de skad ces smras ma thag du/ de'i mod la phyogs bcu na ji tsam rin po che grangs med dpag tu med pa ming tha dad pa kha dog tha dad pa/ 
54a1(mdo sde): yod pa de dag gi char chen po mngon par phab pa 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / shel dang / bai DUr+ya dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / spug dang / dpal gyi
54a2(mdo sde): snying po'i za ba can dang / dri med dang / rin chen byir ru dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / me shel dang / snang byed dang / 'od mchog dang / 'dzam gling 'od dang / me 'ong dang / dung dang man shel dang / bya ru dang / an
54a3(mdo sde): da rnyil dang / yon tan 'byung gnas dang / rab tu zhi ba'i 'od dang / chu 'od dang / chu mdog dang / chu dang bar byed dang / sa'i 'od dang / mi phyed pa'i gnas dang / mig gi bzod pa dang / brgya byin
54a4(mdo sde): thogs pa dang / rgyal ba dang / cher rgyal ba dang / gni brjid 'bar dpal gyi snying po'i rgyal po dang / rdo rje'i ze ba can dang / 'jig rten snang byed dang / skar ma dga' dang / 'od 'dzin dang / 
54a5(mdo sde): zla gam dang / 'dzam bu'i chu 'od dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi 'o dang / 'od stong ldan dang / skar mda'i sgo dang / me'i 'od/ dang / rgyal bas brgyan pa dang / tsha bzhi byed dang / gdung ba med
54a6(mdo sde): ba dang / nad sel dang / mig sbyong dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid sbyong dang / yan lag rnam par snang ba dang / rnam par snang ba'i 'od dang / 'od sngon po dang / 'od ser po
54a7(mdo sde): dang / dkar po dang / shel gyi kha dog dang / rin po che'i dra ba dang / rin po che thams cad yang dag par bsdus pa dang / ming de lta bu dang / ming de ma yin pa'i rin po che'i char rab tu
54a8(mdo sde): bab ste/ nor bu rin po che de dag gi ming bskal par yang zad par sla ba ma yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dus kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba des/ byang chub sems dpa' nam
54b1(mdo sde): mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni sems can sdug bsngal zhing dbul ba zas dang skom med pa/ gcer bu gos med pa/ 
54b2(mdo sde): gos ral po gyon pa dang / yi dgas rnams dkres shing skam pas yongasu zin pa/ gcer bu rang gi skras yog ga/ mchil ma dang ngar snabs dang / khrag dang / rnag za 'dod pa de lta bu'i sen
54b3(mdo sde): de dag bskyeb pa'i phyir/ zas dang skom dang / gos kyi char khyed kyis phog shig/ de nas de ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis/ bza' ba dang bca' ba dang / myang ba
54b4(mdo sde): dang bldag pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab ste/ rob rgya dang ldan pa'i khu ba dang btung ba thams cad kyi char gyi rgyun shing rti'i srog shing tsam gyi char mngon par bab po// gos kha dog du
54b5(mdo sde): ma dang / kha dog tha dad pa dang / kha dog brgya stong du ma dang // phra zhing 'jam pa ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba'i char rab tu bab ste/ de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
54b6(mdo sde): khams na bkren pa dang / dbul po thams cad dang / yi dgas thams cad kun tshim par byaso// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sman pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba des/ byang chub sems dpa' nam
