54b7(mdo sde): mkha'i mdzod la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu sems can na ba g.yog med pa/ nad du mas reg pa yod pa de dgi don du/ sman chen po'i char gang gis de dag thams cad nad las yosu
54b8(mdo sde): thar par 'gyur ba phob cig/ de nas de ma thag du bar snang las bdud rtsi'i sman gyi char mngon par rab tu phab ste/ des nang thams cad las yongasu thar par gyur to// de nas byang chub sem
55a1(mdo sde): dpa' ngan song spong zhes bya ba des/ byang chub sems dpa' namakha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ngan song gsum zhi bar gyis shig/ de nas de ma
55a2(mdo sde): thag du bar snang las 'od rab tu btang ste/ sems can dmyal ba pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams 'od des reg pa de dag thams cad bde bad
55a3(mdo sde): rab tu ldan par gyur te/ ngan song gsum po thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa yongasu gtong ba la rab tu sbyor ba'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / drug pa dang / phye ma dang / 
55a4(mdo sde): chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la stsogs pa dang / rol mo sna lnga dang ldan pa dang / glu'i dbyangs dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / chung ma dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / slas dang / rta dang
55a5(mdo sde): bal glang dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu chung dang / gnon pa dang / khyim dang grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ldo/ ngas dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang / bskyed
55a6(mdo sde): mo'i tshal dang / yang tog dang / khar brtsegs pa dang / khong bzangs dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / zla ba kham pa lta bu dang / khri dang khyogs dang / glang bzhi pa dang / glang bcu drug pa nas
55a7(mdo sde): rta cing shes stong gis drang ba dang ldan pa'i shing rta'i bar gyi char bar snang las mngon par rab tu bab po// de nas byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod kyis de lta bur byin gyis brlabs nas/ 
55a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di dag long la byin cig/ yongasu gtong bar gyis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs pa gyis shig/ de nas byang
55b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi brgyan ces bya ba des byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i char ni bab na/ de yang tshu
55b2(mdo sde): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i char phob shig/ des tshigs de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ phyogs bcun sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul khrims kyis yon tan gyi rgyan gyi bsnga
55b3(mdo sde): pa ji snyed rjod pa de snyed kyi tshul khrims kyi yon tan dang bsngags pa'i smra bar snang las byung ngo // de bzhin du bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi yon tan gyi sgra yang
55b4(mdo sde): tsam phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams yi ge dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / brda dag gis chos kyi sgo brgya stong ston pa'i chos kyi sgra de dag thams cad ma chad ma
55b5(mdo sde): lhag khyad ma zhugs par bar snang las ma lus par rdzogs par byung ngo // chos kyi sgra des stong gsum gyi stong / chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad go bar byaso// de mtshad
55b6(mdo sde): med grangs med pa'i sems can theg pa gsum la yongasu smin pa'i byas par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba de 'di snyam du semaso// byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa'
55b7(mdo sde): mdzod kyi bkod pa 'jig rten 'di 'ba' shig na 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na'ang yod snyam pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mnga'i mdzod kyis/ byang chub sems dpal
55b8(mdo sde): kun tu snang ba'i sems kyi kun tu rtogs pa sems kyis shes so// shes nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod shin tu dri ma med cing
56a1(mdo sde): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lha'i mig rnyed na/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams ci mthong ltos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang
56a2(mdo sde): bas lha'i mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su bltas na/ de'i phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/ ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir
56a3(mdo sde): rin po che thams cad kyi char rab tu phab pa dang / chos kyi sgra thams cad grag pa de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na yang ma chad ma lhag khyad ma zhugs par 'di lta bu'i bya ba rnams
56a4(mdo sde): rab tu 'byung bar mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod kyi smon lam gyi byin gyis rlabs grub pa de ni bsam
56a5(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab ste/ ga lar yang gcig char sas rgyas kyis zhing thams cad du skyes bu dam pas 'di ba'i char mngon par rab tu phab bo zhes ched du brjed pa 'di ched du
56a6(mdo sde): brjod do// de na sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des gang du rin po che'i char dang / chos kyi char
56a7(mdo sde): rab tu 'bab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod kyis/ rin po che'i char dang / chos kyi char gyi cho 'phrul 'di bstan pas bgrang ba las
56a8(mdo sde): 'das pa'i sems can rnams byang chub sems skyeso// des na rgyal po'i khab nas bud med yug sa mo lnga brgya byung nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod ga la ba der dong ste lhan
56b1(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa mdzod la 'di skad ces smraso// skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa rdzogs par mdzad na// bdag cag la yang khyo rtsol cig/ de nas de mtha
56b2(mdo sde): te byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi bud med de dag gi sngon gyi khyo'i kha dog dang / mtshan ma dang dbyibs ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i skyes pa lnga brgya nam mkha' las bcwa
56b3(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod kyi mdun na 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis bud med de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// sring mo dag bdag
56b4(mdo sde): bdag gi khyi ji lta ba bzhin du khrid cig/ de nas budamed de dag gis ji lta bur rang rang gi khyo gang yin pa khrid nas dga' mgu rangs shing rab tu dge' ste/ yid bde ba skyes
56b5(mdo sde): nas rang rang gi khyim du dong ngo // de nas sprul pa'i skyes shA de dag gis zhag bdud bud med dag ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa de
56b6(mdo sde): lta de ltar smin par byas so// de nas yang bud med lnga brgya po de dag byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi thad du lhags nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smraso// chos kyi rang
56b7(mdo sde): bzhin stong pa sgyu ma 'dra// chos kyi mtshan nyid de ni sngon ma 'tshal// de phyir khyod kyis sprul pa'i khro sul te// bdag cag theg pa'i mchog la des smin bgyis// chos 'di thams cad
56b8(mdo sde): yang dag sprul pa ste// g.yo ba med cing byed med snga nas stong // zag med ye shes dag gis rab rtogs te// slan chad nyon mongs dbang du mi mchi'o// byang chub mchog gi sems ni
57a1(mdo sde): bskyed par bgyi// sems can thams cad 'gron du gnyer bar bgyi// sems can rgya chen khyod kyis phab pa bzhin// bdag cag gis kyang chos mchog char pa dpag// 'dren
57a2(mdo sde): mchog thub pas de dag lung bstan pa// khyed cag ma 'ongs dus na 'gyur ba ni// spyad pa spyad nas rgyal ba'i dbang po dag/ shin tu dul zhes bya ba'i bde gshegs 'gyur// yang de'i tshe na mi lnga
57a3(mdo sde): brgya gsad par chad de gsod du khrid pa las// de dag gis bar snang las sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod ces bya ba gang 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams la mi 'jigs
57a4(mdo sde): pa sbyin pa zhig yod kyis// de la khyod cag phyag 'tshal cig dang / gsad pa 'di las thar par 'gyu ro zhes sgra zhig thos so// de nas de dag thams cad shi bas 'jigs skrag pas sgra skad
57a5(mdo sde): gcig tu// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig de/ skad ces smra so// tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ skad cig de
57a6(mdo sde): nyid la bar snang las mi lnga brgya pas te der lhags nas/ gshed ma mi de dag la 'di skad ces smra so// khyed cag gis mi dbul po 'di dag gsad de ci rung / nged cag gi gos dang rgyan rnams
57a7(mdo sde): khyer la/ nged cag gi srog chod de mi dag khye cig/ de dag chags pas non pa'i phyir/ gsad par chad pa'i mi lnga brgya po de dag btang ste/ sprul pa'i skyes bu de dag gas do// de nas mi gsad
57a8(mdo sde): pa las gtang ba de dag gsad pas 'jigs shing skrag pa las dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod ga la ba der dong ste lhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das
57b1(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la yang mgo bos phyag 'tsha lo// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la yang thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis
57b2(mdo sde): bdag cag gi srog dang / dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par bgyis na/ bdag cag chos gang la nan tan du bgyis pas bdag la sman pa dang / gzhan la sman pa la zhugs par 'gyur ba'i chos
57b3(mdo sde): bstan pa bdag cag la sul du gsol// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig
57b4(mdo sde): dang / 'di ltar khyed rnams bdag la ban pa dang / gan/ la phan par zhugs par 'gyuraro// de dag la de skad ces smras pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
57b5(mdo sde): de'ade dag la byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mdzod kyis brgya stong ri ba'i ras bcos bu zung cig byin te/ grogs pa dag res bcos bu zung 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol cig/ de dag zad
57b6(mdo sde): kyis ras bcos bu zung de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mngon par gsol te/ de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams
57b7(mdo sde): yang dag par bsgrubs nas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'thung ngo zhes lung bstan to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ byang chub sems dpa' nas/ 
57b8(mdo sde): mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang mi skam mi zad mi dengs pa'i namapa' la mdzod bzhag nas ji srid lon/ nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri
58a1(mdo sde): bu 'di ji snyam du sems ci na mkha' skam pa'am zad pa yod dam/ dengs par 'gyur ram/ smras pa rigs kyi bu de lta ma yin// smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du/ byang chub de/ 
58a2(mdo sde): ni nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de/ de la bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams der bsngos pas/ de bas namakha' la mdzod mi skams mi zad mi dngas so// yang khyod kyis nam mkha' la mdzod
58a3(mdo sde): bzhag nas ji srid lon zhes zer ba ni// kho bos byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid lon pa de srid do// smas pa rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid lon// smras pa/ 
58a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen pas mkhyen to// de nas gnas pa rtan shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa'
58a5(mdo sde): mdzod kyis/ byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gal te/ de bzhin gshegs pas gnas 'di bstan na lha dang
58a6(mdo sde): bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams myos par 'gyu ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di na sems can gang rnams rtog pa mang zhing dad du 'gyur ba dag mchis kyis bshad du gsol/ bcom
58a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed
58a8(mdo sde): kyis yongasu gang bar gyur te/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi bskal pa brgya stong zhing rdul phra mo gcig bzhag la de lta bar bgrang ba dang mtshan mar bzhag pas de snyed
58b1(mdo sde): kyi rdul phra mo thams cad ni zad par 'gyur gyi/ ji srid nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bskal ba grangs/ 
58b2(mdo sde): med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de dag la zad pa gang yang med do// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi zad nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mnga'i mdzod kyis dang po byed/ 
58b3(mdo sde): chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ci zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yang shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rin po che bkod pa zhes bya ba'i bskal pa
58b4(mdo sde): la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar
58b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha/ lo sgyur ba/ bla na med go/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston gsang / sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das smon lam thams cad
58b6(mdo sde): las shin tu byung ba/ rin po che'i gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa
58b7(mdo sde): yod pa de dag gi tshe'i tshad bskal par gnas kyang bshad par sla ba ma yin no// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ni 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi tshad du
58b8(mdo sde): gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni bgrang ba las 'das pa zhig byung ngo // shA ri'i bu de'i dus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na stong gsum gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lha
59a1(mdo sde): thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ rin po che'i mdzod bsam gyis mi khyab bo// de'i bu rdzus te skyes pa rang gi gzi brjid kyis mngon par gru sum khri drug
59a2(mdo sde): stong yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med kyi ming med do// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe tshad kyang bskal pa stong phrag brgya thub bo// de nas rgyal po lha thams cad kyi
59a3(mdo sde): dbang bskur bas/ bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcur bcom ldan 'das de la bsnyen bkur dang / rim gro byas te/ nyin gcig la 'god pa yang ri rab bye ba stong snyed kyi rin po che'i phung po zad par gyur/ 
59a4(mdo sde): ba de lta bus bsnyen dkur dang / rim gro bya'o// de nas rgyal po de bsod nams kyis brtan pas bu'i tshogs dang / grong gi mi rnams dang 'khor rnams dang bcas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par/ 
59a5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po lha tham sa cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyan
59a6(mdo sde): du khyod sems na de da ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa' mdzod do'i tshe de'i dus na/ stong gsum gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po thaMd kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya
59a7(mdo sde): bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha radwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma byang chub sems dpa' namakha' mdzad 'dis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos
59a8(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das de srid nas theg pa la rab tu zhugs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das de 'dra ba'i spyod pas 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi mthu chen po rnyed par nus so// bcom ldan 'das
59b1(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod 'di gang ga'i klung gi bye ma rnyed kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang / sti stang byas te/ byang chub
59b2(mdo sde): sems yongasu spyang so// gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub kyi sems yongasu dge bas bsam pa yongasu sbyangs te/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma rnyed kyi bsam pa yongasu dag pas sbyor ba/ 
59b3(mdo sde): yongasu sbyangs/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sbyor ba yongasu dag pas lhag pa'i bsam pa yongasu sbyangs/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma rnyed kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa yongasu dag pas sbyin pa'i pha rol
59b4(mdo sde): tu phyin pa yongs sbyangs/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma rnyed kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dge bas tshul khrimaste kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu sbyangs/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma rnyed kyi
59b5(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu sbyangs/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pas
59b6(mdo sde): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu sbyangs/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu sbyangs/ 
59b7(mdo sde): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu sbyangs/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi shes rab kyi pha rol
59b8(mdo sde): tu phyin pa yong su dag pas/ thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pas/ sems can thams cad la khong khrob
60a1(mdo sde): med pa'i sems dang / thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer yongasu sbyangs/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad la khrong khro ba med pa'i sems dang thogs pa me
60a2(mdo sde): pa'i 'od zer yong su dag pas/ byams pa chen po yongasu sbyangs pa nas/ snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes kyi bar du
60a3(mdo sde): yongasu spang so// de bzhin du lus yongasu dag pa dang / ngag yongasu dag pa dang / sems yongasu dag pa ste/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems yongasu dag pas/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
60a4(mdo sde): gcig yongasu spangaso// de bzhin du sbyar te/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thams cad nas/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan thams cad yongasu dag pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar du des gang
60a5(mdo sde): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongasu dag pas/ nam mkha' mdzod 'di yongasu dag bar/ byang chub sems dpa' namapa' mdzad 'das yongs su
60a6(mdo sde): sbyangs so// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' namakha' mdzod 'dis na mkha' las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa tham sa cad ston te/ shA ri'i bu ji ltar na mkha' la zad pa med pa de
60a7(mdo sde): bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu 'di'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad yongasu dag pas gang la yang zad pa med do// des na 'di namapa'i mdzod ces bya'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sem
60a8(mdo sde): dpa' khri longs spyod mi zad pa dang / lag na rin po che dang / namakha' mdzod kyi smon lam yongasu bskang ba'i bzod pa skyeso// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba
60b1(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces spraso// rigs kyi bu bdag cag gis na mkha' las chos bsgrag pa'i mdzod mnyan to// na mkha' mdzod kyis sbas pa/ de'i phyir
60b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gus pa dang bcas shing zhes dang bcas par 'dug la/ namakha' 'di la ston par 'du shes skyed cig dang / chos mnyan pa'i mdzod thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
60b3(mdo sde): chos kyi rgyal po dang 'khor de dag thams cad thal mo sbyar nas na mkha' la phyag 'tshal te 'khod do// de sa nas byang chub sems dpa' namakha'i mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bar snang
60b4(mdo sde): las tshig su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // na mkha' 'dra pa'i yid rnams kyi// thams cad chos kyi tshul gang yi na// de la 'jug par rab bstan gyis// khyed cag mthar gyis
60b5(mdo sde): mnyan par gyis// na mkha' la ni mtho ba med// dma' ba'ang yod pa ma yin te/ gang gis chos nyid mthon dman med// de la 'dud pa ga la yod// nam mkha' la ni skye ba med// 'gog pa dag
60b6(mdo sde): kyang mi dmig so// ma skyes pa'i chos rnams la// de la rnam par 'jig pa med// nam mkha' la ni 'bri ba med// gang ba dag kyang mi dmig so// chos rnams gang med 'bri med de// na mkha' dang ni/ 
60b7(mdo sde): mtshungs mnyam mo// na mkha' le ni mun pa med// de ni de yis nyon mi mongs// sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal bas// de bas nams kyang nyon mongs med// nyi zla yi ni 'od zer gyis// 
60b8(mdo sde): nam mkha' dga' bar mi 'gyur te// namakha' 'dra ba'i sems rnams kyang // gang la'ang dga' bar 'gyur ba med// mdung thung rtse gnyis 'bab pas kyang // nam mkha' la ni nyan
61a1(mdo sde): mongs med// de bzhin sdug bsngal sgo kun gyis// rgyal ba'i sras ni nyon mi mongs// bdud rtsi dus kyi char pa yis// nam mkha' la ni dga' 'gyur med// rnyed dang sti stub
61a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyis// byang chub sems dpa' dga' mi byed// bstod pa dang ni smad pa la// na mkha' yongasu mi rtog ste// de bzhin bde dang sdug bsngal la// byang chub sems dpa' brtan mi g.yo// 
61a3(mdo sde): sa dag g.yos par gyur kyang ni// namakha' nam yang g.yo ba med// 'jig rten 'di dag g.yo 'khrug kyang // byang chub sems dpa' 'khrug pa med// bsreg pa'i bskal pa 'byung ba na// 
61a4(mdo sde): ji ltar na nam mkha' mi 'tshig pa// de bzhin nyon mongs thams cad kyis// byang chub sems dpa' bstan mi gdung // skye ba med cing 'dul ba'ang med// ji ltar na mkha' gnas pa/ 
61a5(mdo sde): bzhin/ chos rnams 'od med 'gro ba'ang med// chos kyi dbyings la de dag gnas// gzugasu snang ba ji snyed pa// namakhar las ni thams cad 'thung // cho su snang ba ji snyed
61a6(mdo sde): pa// de dag chos kyi dbyings la 'byung // mtshan ma med cing gzugs med pa// na mkha' ltar yod ma yin te// de ltar sems rnams rab shes na// namapa' dang ni mtshungs mnyam// ming / 
61a7(mdo sde): tsam pa ni namakha' ste// de la kha dog dbyibs kyang med// sems dang yid dang rnam shes kyang // ming gis yongasu bstan pa'o// ji ltar rnamatha' mtha' med cing // thams cad du yang gzung du med// 
61a8(mdo sde): de bzhin ye shes mthu chen kyang // namakha' dang ni mtshan nyid mtshungs// sems can na mkha' 'gro mod kyi// de la 'gro ba'i rjes kyang med// sems can byang chub phyir spyod kyang // de ni spyod pa'i
61b1(mdo sde): mtshan ma min// ji ltar sngon gyi mtha' yis lus rnamapa' dang ni mtshungs 'drag de bzhin phung po'i ngo bo nyid// namapa' dang ni mnyam zhing mtshungs// khams bzhi dag kyang namakha' dang / 
61b2(mdo sde): shing 'dra bar rab tu gsungs// 'di ltar bsregs pa'i bskal pa la'ang // nam mkha' dang ni khams 'di mtshungs// ji ltar sems can thams cad kyis// khams kyang yongasu gang mi nuH/ 
61b3(mdo sde): de bzhin yul rnams kun gyis kyang // sems kyi rgyud ni mi gang // tshig chen seng ge'i sgra dag gis// 'jig rten mgon gyis gsungs pa ni// 'jig rten 'das pa'i shes rab gang // 
61b4(mdo sde): dag bstan pa 'di la ngoms// ji ltar na mkha' rgya che bas// mtha' ma dmigs par mi 'gyur te// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos rnams kyang // mtha' ma dmigs par mi 'gyu'o// chos
61b5(mdo sde): rnams thams cad sangs rgyas chos// gang gis yang dag nyid shes na// de dag dngos po mi 'jig cing // nga / sa po dag la'ang mi gan so// dngos dang dngos med rnam shes
61b6(mdo sde): shing ka yang dag mtha' la gnas pa// dngos po dang ni dngos med par// lta ba mkhas pas mi 'dzin to// stong pa nyid ni sgra yis bsgrags// sgra la stong pa nyid med de// de ni sgra med brjod pa
61b7(mdo sde): med// de phyir stong pa nyid ces bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad kyang ni// stong pa nyid ni brjod du med// gang de stong zhes bya ba yang // de yi don ni brjod du med// sgyu ma smig rgyu rmi lam dang // 
61b8(mdo sde): mig yor dang ni brag cha rnams// de la stsogs pa bshad pa yis// 'dren pa rnams ni chos ston to// sems can rnams ni drang ba'i phyir// dpe rnams shin tu kun bstan te/ rab tu ni/ 
62a1(mdo sde): pa'i chos rnams la// gnyen po rnams ni mi dmigs so// mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kun kyang // mtshan nyid du ni rab tu bstan// mtshan gzhi mtshan ga ni med pa dag/ 
62a2(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings la mi dmig so// mtshan gni namakha'i mtshan nyid// nam pa' 'ang mtshan nyid med pa yin// gang gis tshul 'di rab rtogs pa// de dag byang chub sems dpa' yin// chags pa ma/ 
62a3(mdo sde): cing bcings pa med// shin tu cung zad med pa ste// spros med spros dang bral ba de// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// sems can las ni de ma grol// sems can la yang mi gnas shing // sen
62a4(mdo sde): rang bzhin ye shes kyis// byang chub sems dpa' zhes de bya/ sems can rab tu mya ngan 'das// thos nas dngang bar mi phye de// gang de byang chub rab bzhugs pa// dpa' bo dag gi
62a5(mdo sde): go cha 'di// sgyu ma byed pa sems can dag/ mang du sbrel nas der gsad kyang // de la gsad pa gang yang med// sems can mtshan nyid de bzhin no// sgyu ma dang ni sems can dang / 
62a6(mdo sde): mya ngan 'das dang sangs rgyas kun// rnam pa kun tu rang bzhin cig/ rang bzhin rang bzhin med par rtogs// namapa' las ni rnam pa'i mdzod// mi zad pa'i mdzod grub ste// sems can thams cad mgu
62a7(mdo sde): byed cing ma mdzod de zad par mi 'gyur ro// tshad med bsod nams chu bos ni// mdzod 'di rnam par sbyangs pa ste// chos rnams la'ang 'pho med par// chos rnams chos nyid blta bar bya// rgyu la brten te/ 
62a8(mdo sde): byung ba yi// chos rnams thams cad rab shes na// de yi mdzod ni mi zad// chos kyi mdzod ni bsam mi khyab// chos ba'i 'di dag mi zad par// 'jig rten mgon pos rab gsungs te// sems can
62b1(mdo sde): namapara' byang chub sems// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos rnam so// de ste de dag rdzas yin na// de dag yongasu zad 'gyur gyi// de dag med pas mi zad ces// de bas de ni mi zad gsungs// chos ni rab
62b2(mdo sde): tu skad cig pa// zad pa chos ni mi zad do// mi zad de la zad pa med// de phyir mi zad pa zhes bya// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gis// chos bstan 'di ni rab shes na// des ni byang chub rnyed mi
62b3(mdo sde): dka' byang chub nyid la yang dag zhugs/ tshig su bcad pa bstan pa 'di byung ba na// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// lha'i bu na mkha'i dkyil na
62b4(mdo sde): 'khod pa khri nyis stong ni// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pra'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can zhes bya ba 'dus par
62b5(mdo sde): gyur te 'dug pa des// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sgra 'di ga la byung snyam du bdag ngo mtshar du gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis
62b6(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod la dris shig dang / 'di khyod la lan ldon no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis/ byang chub sems
62b7(mdo sde): dpa' na mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu sgra 'di ga las byung snyam du bdag ltad mor 'dzin par gyur to// nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di / 
62b8(mdo sde): snyam du sems/ zag cha'i skrag las zung / sbas pa/ rigs kyi bu pha rol gyi sgra'i rnam par rig byed las drag chi 'asgra 'byung // smras pa rigs kyi bu drag cil lus sam// sems sam// 
63a1(mdo sde): gzugs sam/ kha dog gam/ dbyibs gang yang yod dam/ smras pa rigs kyi bu de ni med de/ smras pa rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// ji ltar brag cha yongasu ma grub kyang sgra skad go bar byed pa/ 
63a2(mdo sde): de bzhin du// namakha' yongasu ma grub ste/ sgra dang skad go bar byed par 'gyuraro// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sgra 'di go bar byed pa su gang nas dbyangs 'di 'byung / smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ye shes kyi so sor rnam par
63a3(mdo sde): rigs pa bsam gyi mi khyab ste/ kho bos yid kyi sems pas gang bsam pa de bar snang 'di las byung yang / sems de der 'gro ba yang med/ de 'dir 'ong ba'ang med mod kyi sgra'i sgra brnyan yang 'byung ngo // 
63a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ji tsam du zab pa la ltos/ gang rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung yang rgyu 'bras bu 'grub pa mi 'phol/ rgyu med pa las kyang 'bras bu 'byung ba ma yin no// 'di lta ste/ 
63a5(mdo sde): rgyu dang rkyen las 'bras bu mngon par 'grub pa'i chos 'dig/ nyi ga la yang g.yo ba med cing byed pa med do// gang de lta bu 'i 'du shes pa de dag ni bral ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom
63a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis kyang gang kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa de nyid de'i rnam par byang ba zhes gsung so// kun nas nyon mongs pa bskul pas rnam par byang ba ma yin te/ gang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i ngo bo
63a7(mdo sde): nyid kyi mtshan nyid de ni rnam par byang ba'o// 'di lta ste/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byed pa zhes bya ba 'di gnyi ga yang brda'i tshig go// don dam pa'i mtha' la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par
63a8(mdo sde): byang ba yang dmig su med do// don dam pa'i mtha' ni mtha' ma yin te/ gang 'di mtha' ma yin pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya'o// gang yang dag pa'i mtha' de stong pa nyid kyi mtha'o// gang stong
63b1(mdo sde): nyid kyi mtha' de bdag gi 'tho'o// gang bdag gi mtha' de ni chos thams cad kyi mtha'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni de'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi mthar/ nye bar ni ba'i mtha' ste/ gang
63b2(mdo sde): mtha' de gsum gyi sgo la mi chags de ni/ chos thams cad la mi chags pa'i ye shes rnyed do// de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus/ byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can la 'di skad ces smra so// / 
63b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu khyod ltad mo can zhes ming sus btags/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod gang dang du chos la 'dun pa dang / brtson pa dang der ljang mor mi 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de
63b4(mdo sde): bzhin no// smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du kho bo che/ sa thams cad la 'dun cing brtson pa de dang der kho bos nam sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yong su rdzogs par 'gyur
63b5(mdo sde): snyam du ltad mo dang ldan no// de'i phyir kho bos ltad mo can zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la khwa bo ltad mor gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang
63b6(mdo sde): spyod pa la 'jug pa shes pa la kho bo ltad mor gyur te/ de'i phyir kho bo la ltad mo can zhes bya'o// gang la kho bo ltad mor mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes de gang yang med/ 'jug pa de gang yang med pas/ 
63b7(mdo sde): de'i phyir kho bo ltad mo can zhes bya'o// gang du kho bo ltad mor gyur pa der nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / bdud kyi las thams cad kyi skab med de'i phyir na kho bo ltad mo can zhes bya'o// de nas
63b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa'i ming 'di nyid las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu brjod de/ sangs
64a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos thams cad ston kyang gang la'ang mi chags te/ chags pa ma mchis par sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang stong ngo mtshar to// de nas 'khor de nyid du byang / 
64a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin rab tu bstan
64a3(mdo sde): pa la brtsams te/ gang ci 'dra bar ting nge 'dzin yongasu sbyang ba bya ba la spobs par gyis shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
64a4(mdo sde): rin chen dngal la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi snying por thogs pa med par 'gro ba bsam pa dag pa zhes bya ba yod do// 
64a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting dang 'dzin sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i 'od dazer ces bya ba yod de/ de dag dang gzhan bsrung ba'i phyir/ gzhan
64a6(mdo sde): gyi gnod pa thams cad yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur// dri ma med ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems yongasu dag par 'gyuraro// rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dge ba'i
64a7(mdo sde): chos thams cad rnam par 'phel bar 'gyuraro// dge ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rnyog pa med par 'gyuraro// mngon par 'phags zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong bar
64a8(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dul bar 'gyur// 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni g.yas phyogs kyi lam yong su rdzogs par
64b1(mdo sde): 'gyuraro// ga pa nas bya ba'i ding 'dzidzi ni b+hu dang lta ba las rnam par zlog par 'gyur// ga' byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ches kyi ba dga' la dga' zhing mos par 'gyu'o// sa pa'i
64b2(mdo sde): rjes su song zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sbyin gnas yongasu dag par 'gyur ro// mthu drag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems mi 'dzum par 'gyuro// mtshungs par mnyam pa nyid la
64b3(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad la sems mnyam par 'gyu ro// byed pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ las rnam par smin pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro// 
64b4(mdo sde): seng ge'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'jigasapa/ spu zing zhes byed pa med par 'gyur// sems dpa' ba zhes/ bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni nyon mongs pa'i bdud thams cad skrag
64b5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'jig rten thams cad kyis mi gos par 'gyur ro// pad+ma dkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems kyi rgyan du 'gyu ro// 'od ba
64b6(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing snang bar 'gyu ro// bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rjesu chags pa dang khong khro ba spong bar 'gyur ro// rgyal mtshan gyi
64b7(mdo sde): rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la snang bar 'gyu ro// skar 'dang ldan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni bag chags thams cad 'joms par 'gyuraro// 
64b8(mdo sde): nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mun pa mun nag med par 'gyuraro// nyi ma 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta bar 'gyur/ 
65a1(mdo sde): yon tan gyi 'byung gnas shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni yon tan gyi chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro bar 'gyuraro// sred med kyi bu lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni pha rol rgol pa
65a2(mdo sde): thams cad 'joms par 'gyu ro// snying po'i rjesu song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rdo rje'i lus mi phyed par 'gyuraro// snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dam bcas pa thams cad nyams
65a3(mdo sde): 'og tu chud par 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mngon par shes pa las mi nyams par 'gyuraro// rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni byang chub kyi snying por 'gro
65a4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos thams cad rab tu rtogs par 'gyuro// spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa
65a5(mdo sde): la 'jug pa'i ye shesu 'gyuro// sa 'dzin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi na ni chags pa dang zhe sdang med par 'gyu ro// bdud kyi kyi la 'khor 'jom pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni bdud
65a6(mdo sde): bzhi las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyuraro// lus rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni gzugs thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyuraro// mi 'dzums pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin ni tu
65a7(mdo sde): gcig tu 'gyuraro// rnam pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dmigs pa thams cad yongasu dag par 'gyuraro// nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dmigs pa thad las yang
65a8(mdo sde): dag par 'da' bar 'gyuro// 'khor lo dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin ni chos kyi 'khor lo yongasu dag par 'gyu ro// klog 'od ces bya ba'i tingange 'dzin ni sems kyi skad cig 'jig pa la rnam par
65b1(mdo sde): lta bar 'gyuraro// legs par byas pas rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dge ba'i chos thams cad yong su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin ni mi dge ba'i chos
65b2(mdo sde): thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro// lus kyi rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongasasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// ngag gi rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni tshangs pa'i sgra skad bsgrags
65b3(mdo sde): pas sems can thams cad kyi sems mgu bar 'gyur ro// sems kyi rgyan ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin las nyams par 'gyu ro// brtan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni phyir mi ldog par
65b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// mtshungs par gtong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can tha dad par 'gyu ro// tshul khrims bstsags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni smon lam thams cad yongasu rdzogs par
65b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i go bgos pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni lu/ sa dang srog la mi lta ba 'gyuraro// brtson 'grus brtan pa zhe/ sa bya ba'i ting 'dzin ni mngon par shes pa myur bar
65b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// tshad med pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni tshangs po la dbang byed par 'gyuraro// ci yang med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni gzugs med pa'i khams yongasu sbyong bar 'gyur
65b7(mdo sde): ro// lhun po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyuraro// lhun po'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni phyogs bcur rnam par lta bar 'gyur
65b8(mdo sde): ro// shes rab kyi skar mda' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sgrib pa dang / chong pa dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad rnam par sel bar 'gyuraro// rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni las
66a1(mdo sde): dang byab sna tshogs la 'jug par 'gyur ro// mtha' yas 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lta ba thams cad yongasu gcod par 'gyur// stong pa nyid ces pa
66a2(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin ni mi dmigs pa dang lha thams cad spong bar 'gyuraro// mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang / yong su rtog pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur/ 
66a3(mdo sde): smon pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni smon lam thams cad yong su rdzogs par 'gyur// mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni g.yo ba dang sems pa thams cad 'jom par 'gyur ro/ 
66a4(mdo sde): sgra dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni spobs pa thogs med par 'gyur ro// kun 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni thos pa thams cad 'dzin par 'gyuraro// dran pa rnam par dag pa zhes
66a5(mdo sde): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni tshad med pa'i snod kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad tshol bar 'gyuraro// mi zad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad mgu bar 'ju'o// 
66a6(mdo sde): rin chen bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni lag na rin po che rab tu rnyed par 'gyuraro// rjesu 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin ni sems can thams cad kyi sems shes par 'gyur/ 'gro ba
66a7(mdo sde): 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'gro ba thams cad rtogs par 'gyuraro// blo gros la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin ni sems dang yid rnam par dag par 'gyuraro// sprin dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting
66a8(mdo sde): ma pa ga na du tshus kyi mas kyi dzumams kya madra sa bya nga ci ma du rkye cha rnyen pa'i pa
66b1(mdo sde): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun rje su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las mi ldog par 'gyuraro// gtod
66b2(mdo sde): brjesu dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni phung po thams cad rab tu 'dor bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rtsa ba la rab tu
66b3(mdo sde): 'god par 'gyuraro// lha rje su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rnam par dag pa'i chos la kha na ma tho ba med par 'gyuraro// chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos thams
66b4(mdo sde): cad la yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyu ro// na mkha'i ngo bo nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos thams cad la chags pa med par 'gyu ro// rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa zhes bya ba'i
66b5(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// rgyud chags pa dang rgyud ma yin pa'i rjes su rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni yi ge thams cad dang tshig rab tu
66b6(mdo sde): dbye ba shes pa la mabs pa 'dzin par 'gyur// shin tu sbyangs pa dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin dang dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de sems kyi skad
66b7(mdo sde): cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rigs kyi bu de dag ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgyad cu ste/ ting nge 'dzin
66b8(mdo sde): de re re la yang 'khor ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo lnga brgya lnga brgya yod do// de dag thams cad bsdoms na ting nge 'dzin pa ni drir 'gyur te/ de dag kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang bas ting nge/ 
67a1(mdo sde): 'dzin brgyad khrir 'gyuraro// de dag sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba mi zad pa'i ye shes kyis ting 'dzin brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'gyuraro// ting nge 'dzin ji
67a2(mdo sde): snyed pa chos kyi sgo mo yang de snyed chos kyi phung po yang de snyed de de'i phyir sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong de bzhin
67a3(mdo sde): gshegs pas bshad ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang spyod pa la 'jug pa sems can rnams shes par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi mdo'o// gang sangs rgyas kyi yes ma
67a4(mdo sde): dag dang / sems can gyi spyod pa 'tha' dag la 'jug pa de ni tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ bskal pa brgya stong gi mthar 'dug kyang bshad par sla ba ma yino// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
67a5(mdo sde): 'di yongasu bstan cing ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di dag ba/ da pa na byang chub sems dpa' khri drug stong ni ting 'dzin dang / ye shes kyis mngon par bsgrubs pas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod
67a6(mdo sde): pa thob par gyur to// lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyeso// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la
67a7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di bstan pa ni legs par smras te/ lus mngon sum pas gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i chos rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du/ 
67a8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yong su rjod pa 'di shin tu yongasu bstan pa ni legaso legs so// / bam po lnga pa// / de nas bcom ldan
67b1(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi thad du khyang chub sems dpa' nam mnga' mdzod kyis thog
67b2(mdo sde): mar na mkha' 'di las rin po che thams cad kyi char rab tu phab/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rin cher dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
67b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bgrang ba la 'das pa'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol tu gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
67b4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas
67b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas/ 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba ska rags shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu yon tan gyi 'od ces bya ba'i bskal
67b6(mdo sde): pa la 'jig rten du byung ste/ yang rigs kyi bu ska rags shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de yang 'byor pa bde ba li legs pa rgyas pa skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba/ rin po che sna bdun
67b7(mdo sde): gyis brgyan pa/ 'jam zhing gnyen ba/ gos ka tsa lin 'di ka ltar reg na bde ba/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi ba da ma bkram pa/ rin po che gsal ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par spras
67b8(mdo sde): ga/ mig mangs ris su bres pa/ gal mthil ltar mnyam ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams de 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi rnams kyi longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa ltar
68a1(mdo sde): / @/ 'dug go// mi de dag thams cad kyang gzhal med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa na gnas par gyur cing bsams pas zas dang som rab tu 'byor to// de yang rigs kyi bu/ 
68a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag drug cu'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'byung ngo // yang rigs kyi
68a3(mdo sde): bu de'i che de'i dus na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba rin po che sna bdun da lnga'i ga drung ste/ yang rigs kyi bu rgyal po bsad rnams kyis brgyad pa/ 
68a4(mdo sde): de'i khang pa/ dzam bu'i gling gi dbus su brtsigs par gyur te/ shar phyogs su yang dpag tshad bzhi/ nub phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / byang phyogasu yang dpag tshad bzhi bani bkra ba / kha lnga
68a5(mdo sde): na sdug pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ bskyed// mos tshal lnga brgyas rab tu brgyan pa'o// yang rigs kyi bu rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa'i btsun mo brgyad khri bani
68a6(mdo sde): stong yod de/ thams cad kyang yul gyi bzang mo sha stag go// khye'u brgyad bri ba ni stong mod de/ thams cad thang can can padz+ra stobs dang / drag shul 'chang ba sha stan go// yang rigs kyi/ 
68a7(mdo sde): rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa la btsun mo rin po che gnyis yod de/ gcig gi ming ni dpal gyi gzi brjid/ gcig gi ming ni dpal gyi 'od do// rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgya
68a8(mdo sde): pade dga' ba bkod pa zhes bya ba'i bskyed mos tshal du zhugs te/ btsun mo'i nang na 'dug pa'i tshe/ lha mo de gnyis kyi bang pa nas khye'u gnyis drung ste/ rdzus te skyes pa sngon gyi sbyor ba phun
68b1(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa/ smon lam rdzogs pa/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par zhugs ste/ gcig gi ming ni seng ge zhes grwa gcig gi ming ni seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro
68b2(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ste/ de gnyis byung ma thag tu sgra skad dbyangs gcig tu/ pha bsod nams kyis brgyan pa la tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smra so// sngon byas dge dang mi dge chud mi za// de bzhin gshegs
68b3(mdo sde): la mchod byas chud mi za// bsams pa byang chub sems kyang chud mi za// bsgrub pa gtsor byed thos pa chud mi za// sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa chud mi za// bzod dang des pa rnams kyang chud rtsa
68b4(mdo sde): zab byas pa gzo zhing dge ba'i las bya'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa de yang chud mi za// rtse gcig pas dam gtan dang ni rnam thar sems// nges par rtog dang shes rab se
68b5(mdo sde): mi nyams// ye shes las byas rtag tu mi 'khrugs te// mi 'khrugs chos las byang chub rnyed mi dka'// de ni nyan mongs pa yis mi gos te/ de ni slar yang mngal du mi gnas
68b6(mdo sde): shing // de ni pad+ma'i snying por rdzus te skye// mi gos pa ni pad+ma chu las ltar// shar phyogs logs kyi rgyal ba smin pa'i rgyal// dus gsum mi chags ye shes dam pa yis// de gshegs dri med
68b7(mdo sde): kyi gnan su// chos 'dod phyir ni de nas bdag cag 'ongs// u dum pa ri'i me tog ji lta bar// de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba rnyed par dkas// de la bsnyen bkur bgyi dang blta slad du/ 
68b8(mdo sde): bde gshegs thad du yab kyang bzhud par bgyi// rgyal pos rje su bstan pa 'di thos nas// bu dang btsun mo 'khor dang lhan cig tu// srog chags bye ba stong gis yongs bskor te/ 
69a1(mdo sde): rgyal ba de'i gan du nye bar dong // me tog dri zhim drug par bcas pa yis// de la tshul dang 'dra ba'i mchod byas nas// zhabs la phyag 'tshal rab tu bskor byas te/ 
69a2(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar ba byas nas spyan ngar 'dug/ seng ge dang ni seng ge'i rtsal 'gro yang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la bzung na su// gtugs nas chos dang don ldan mkhas pa yis// rabs
69a3(mdo sde): pa des ni tshigs bcad 'di dag smras// khyod ni skyabs dang mgon dang dpung gnyen te// 'jig rten ldongs pa rnams kyi sgron mar gyur// sems can rnams kyi bsam spong gyur la mkhas// 
69a4(mdo sde): ji ltar mos pa de bzhin gnas par mdzad// rgyal po 'di ni phyug cing skyid pas myong // gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang bcis pas bcings// nam yang ston pa la ni mchod phyir yang // nye bar mi
69a5(mdo sde): 'chi chos lta ga la nyan// mgon pos thugs rje rab tu bskyed du nga ste/ ji ltar de kun lhan cig thos na su// theg pa mchog las// ldog par mi 'gyur ba// byang chub lam mchog de ni leg
69a6(mdo sde): bar ston// bcom ldan mgon po tal brgyad cu srid// na mkhar 'phags bzhugs mi dbang de la gsungs// nga'i chos mchog rgyal po khyod nyon la// thos nas de la tshul bzhin nan tan gyis// 
69a7(mdo sde): 'dod pa mi rtag de bzhin rgyal srid srog/ srog ni rtsa yi zil ba'i thigs pa 'dra// rtse ba de bzhin 'dod pa de rmi lam 'dra// mkhas pa su zhig 'di la dga' ba bskyed// sen gang yang 'dod
69a8(mdo sde): bas ngams med/ phyir yang de bzhin 'dod pas skom zhing chug byis pa dmas mi shes shing yul la gnas/ shes rab gang ngoms de dag shin tu ngams/ sbrum slu zhing snying po med pa ltar/ 
69b1(mdo sde): / de 'azhin phung po lnga yang sgyu ma 'dra// khams rnams 'di dag sbrul gdug bzhin du bstan/ dbang po drug ni stong pa'i grong dang 'dra// bu dang chung ma rgyal srid yul 'khor yang // 'chi bar gnas
69b2(mdo sde): pa'i grog su 'gyur ba med// sbyin du la kun sdom tshul khrims phung po ni// de dag pha rol 'gro ba'i grogs yin// nga'i gzugs dang yon tan spobs pa rdzogs// rdzu 'phrul dag kyang ci 'dra rab
69b3(mdo sde): ltos la// gal te 'di 'dra bar yang 'gyur 'dod na// byang chub dam pa 'di phyir sems skyed cig / rgyal po bal glang des ni chos thos nas// srog chags byed stong phrag bdun cu dang // sras
69b4(mdo sde): dang btsun mo stobs bcas grong mi rnams// byang chub dam pa 'di phyir sems bskyed// bdag cag mchog gi sems ni bskye da par bgyi// sems can thad 'gron du gnyer bar gyi// 
69b5(mdo sde): byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad par bgyi// 'gro ba tha med sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi// rigs kyi bu de ltar rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa des// bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang
69b6(mdo sde): bcas pa la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du rung ba yid du 'ong ba kha na ma tho ba med pa'i bde ba'i yo byad dang // yongasu longs spyad pa thams cad kyis rim gro byaso// khye'u seng ge dang seng ge'i
69b7(mdo sde): sul gyis 'gro ba de gnyis// bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung // de dag rab tu byung bas rgyal bu phyi ma nyi khri yang khyim nas khyim med par rab tu dra // 
69b8(mdo sde): de nas seng ge dang seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba'i dge slong byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang yo byad bsnyungs pa dang / dben par spyod pa la sbyor zhing brtson pas ring po ma lon par/ mngon par
70a1(mdo sde): / shes pa lnga bskyed// de dag mngon par shes pa rnyed nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyis chos bshad nas de gnyis kyis sem
70a2(mdo sde): tshad med grangs med pa yongasu smin par byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chubs tu bkod par 'gyur to// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar lo brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das nas/ rgyal po bsod nams
70a3(mdo sde): kyis brgyan pa de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal po ga la ba der song ba dang / des khye'u de gnyis rab tu byung bar mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang
70a4(mdo sde): ngas ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas na/ 'di gnyis rab tu byung nas ngas ma byas pa zhig byas snyam du brnyas pa'i
70a5(mdo sde): sems skyeso// rigs kyi bu de nas yang de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal po// nyes/ rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa de lta bur sems pa
70a6(mdo sde): mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab dang mngon par shes pa dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyis
70a7(mdo sde): stobs ston la 'kho thams cad dga' bar gyis shig/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad ma go mog par gyis shig/ byang chub kyi lam 'bar bar gyis shig/ sems can thams cad tshim par/ 
70a8(mdo sde): gyis shig / las kyi rgol pa tha~Md tshar chod cig/ chos kyi smon ma 'bar bar gyis shig/ nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par rol pa ston cig/ de nas dag
70b1(mdo sde): / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro bas de'i dus na/ namakha' la lag pas thugs nas/ de'i namakha' lag pas thugs pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten khams nam/ 
70b2(mdo sde): ba drug tu rab tu g.yos so// des yang na mkha' la lag pas thugs pa dang / de nas de'i tshe bar snang las sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgyad stong ma dkrol bar sgra byung ngo // des yang na mkha' la
70b3(mdo sde): lag pas thugs pa dang / de nas bar snang las sngon ma mthos ma thos pa dri zhim zhing 'jam pa ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba'i me tog rnams kyi char bab bo// des yang na mkha' la lag
70b4(mdo sde): pas blugs pa dang / de nas de ma thag tu bar snang las rin po che thams cad kyi char rab tu mngon par ba ba/ longs spyod kur bye thams cad kyi char rab tu bab po// ji lta bur stong gsum gyi
70b5(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams der yo byad thams cad kyi char mngon par rab tu 'bab pa de de lta bu'i zas dang skom dang bro'i char mngon par rab tu ba'o// de nas de bzhin
70b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal pos/ rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sbyin pa yongasu btang ba
70b7(mdo sde): dang / rin po che'i char 'bab pa 'di gang mang / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i char 'di ni dper bgyi ba yang sla ba ma lags te/ de tsam du tshad ma mchi so// bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po
70b8(mdo sde): chen po byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba 'di mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis 'dod na/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma rnyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu 'di 'dra ba'i rin
71a1(mdo sde): po che'i char mngon par 'bab so// gang 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can de dag la ji lta bur 'dod pa bzhin du ngoms shing tshim par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar
71a2(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gang sa p+pa'i lha rnams kyis ma la 'di sems bskyed ma thag tu/ namakha' las rin po che thams cad kyi char mngon par rab tu 'bab pa las na/ byang chub sems dpa'
71a3(mdo sde): 'di ni na mkha'i mdzod du 'gyur ba snyam zhes sgra byung // ji ltar sa bA'i lha rnams kyis sgra byung ba de bzhin du/ bar snang dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang // 
71a4(mdo sde): dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' nas/ 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis kyang / ma la 'di sems bskyed ma thag 'di 'dra ba'i rin po che'i char rab tu 'bab pa las na/ kye ma byang chub
71a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'di ni na mkha'i mdzod du 'gyur ba snyam ne/ sa sgra byung bas/ ming de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshe phyogs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od 'azer gyi rgyal
71a6(mdo sde): bo de rje su yid rang ngo // gang la des rje suM yi rang ba de la gang gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang rjes su yi rang ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di ltar rgyal po bsod nams
71a7(mdo sde): kyis brgyan pa des byang chub sems dpa' seng gi'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs de mthong nas/ khye'u rgyal ba'i blo gros shes bya ba
71a8(mdo sde): rgyal por bcug te/ dad pas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/ sbyin pa 'di ni sems kun tu chags pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni sems yong su dag pa'o// sbyin pa 'di ni lus dang ngag gi bgegs
71b1(mdo sde): so// rab tu byung ba'i ni lus dang ngag yongasu sbyang ba'o// sbyin pa 'di ni bgegs chen po'o// rab tu byung ba ni bgegs thams cad nye bar zhi ba'o// sbyin pa 'di ni rtsa dang lo ma'o// rab tu byu
71b2(mdo sde): ba ni snying po dang 'bras bur 'grub pa'o// sbyin can dor ba dang bcas shing yongasu 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni yongasu 'dzin pa thams cad 'dor ba'o// sbyin pa 'di ni
71b3(mdo sde): 'jig tshogs la lta ba las ma bskyed pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni lta ba thams cad yong du sbyong ba'o// sbyin pa 'di ni byis pa'i rtsed mo'i sbyor ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni dul ba dang zhi ba dang cang shes pa'i san
71b4(mdo sde): snyam du de de ltar tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor zhing / sems de lta bu dang bsam pa de lta bus de ltar rab tu byung ste/ gcig pu mi 'dre ba/ bag/ yod pa/ brtson pa/ rab tu dben par gnas pas ring po mthos
71b5(mdo sde): bar mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i du/ sa na/ rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan par gru de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci
71b6(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig de de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan ces bya bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod 'di ni/ de'i
71b7(mdo sde): tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ des thog mar nam mkha'i mdzod las rin po che'i char phab bo// de tshun chad bskal pabye ba khrag drig
71b8(mdo sde): brgya stong dpag tu med grangs med par nam yang na mkha' mdzod las rin po che'i char 'babs pa'i mngon par shes pa las mnyams so// rigs kyi bu nga ni de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems
72a1(mdo sde): dpa' seng ge zhes bya bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu rgyal ba'i blo glos zhes bya bar gyur te/ gang rgyal po bsod nams kyis
72a2(mdo sde): brgyan pas rgyal por bcug pa'o// rigs kyi bu de'i gsungs rab kyang 'di ltar dga' zhing yong su dag par 'gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur to// sems
72a3(mdo sde): can ji snyed kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// sngon thung ba
72a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i gtam 'di bstan pa na srog chags khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' namapa'
72a5(mdo sde): mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa
72a6(mdo sde): dang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam zhes bya ba ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa
72a7(mdo sde): drug dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i
72a8(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga rnams te/ rigs kyi bu 'dri ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam zhes bya'o// 'jig rten zhes bya ba ni phung po/ 
72b1(mdo sde): lnga'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mi rtags par rig nas/ sbyin pa sbyin no// gzugs sdug bsngal bar rig nas sbyin pa sbyin no// gzugs bdag med par rig/ gzugs zhi bar rig/ 
72b2(mdo sde): gzugs stong par rig/ gzugs mtshan ma med par rig/ gzugs smon pa med par rig/ gzugs mngon par 'du mi byed par rig/ gzugs ma skyes par rig/ gzugs ma byung bar rig/ gtsum
72b3(mdo sde): rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar rig/ gzugs dben par rig/ gzugs gzung ba med par rig/ gzugs kun gzhi med par rig/ gzugs 'byung ba med par rig/ gzugs sgyu ma lta bur
72b4(mdo sde): rig/ gzugs rmi lam lta bur rig/ gzugs rmig rgyu lta bur rig/ gzugs chu zla lta bur rig/ gzugs brag cha lta bur rig/ gzugs mig yor lta bur rig/ gzugs gzugs
72b5(mdo sde): brnyan bur rig/ gzugs rtsa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam lta bur rig nas sbyin pa sbyin te/ de gzugs kyi de bzhin/ nyid kyis sbyin pa'i de bzhin nyid la 'jug go// sbyin pa'i de
72b6(mdo sde): bzhin nyid kyis bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid rjesu shes so// bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin gyis/ sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang / sems can gyi de
72b7(mdo sde): bzhin nyid kyis/ bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su sheso// gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni/ de bzhin nyid med de/ 
72b8(mdo sde): ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas sbyin pa de sbyin pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mo// de
73a1(mdo sde): bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig nas sbyin pa sbyin no// rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med par/ 
73a2(mdo sde): rig/ rnam par shes pa zhi bar rig/ rnam par shes pa stong par rig/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med par rig/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med par rig/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du
73a3(mdo sde): mi byed par rig/ rnam par shes pa ma skyes par rig/ rnam par shes pa ma byung bar rig/ rnam par shes pa rten cing 'brel bar 'thung bar rig nas sbyin pa sbyin no// rnam par shes pa dben
73a4(mdo sde): par rig/ rnam par shes pa bzung ba med par rig/ rnam par shes pa kun bzhi med par rig/ rnam par shes pa mi 'thung bar rig/ rnam par shes pa sgyu ma lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa
73a5(mdo sde): rmi lam lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa smig rgyu lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa chu zla lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa brag cha lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa mig yor lha
73a6(mdo sde): bur rig/ rnam par shes pa gzugs brnyan lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid du rig nas/ sbyin pa sbyin te/ de rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ sbyin pa'i/ 
73a7(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid rje su shes so// sbyin pa de bzhin nyid kyis/ bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis// byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ sems can
73a8(mdo sde): gyi de bzhin nyid dang / sems can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis rje su shes so// gang chos thams cad
73b1(mdo sde): kyi de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin nyid do// mnor pab de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjesu shes pas sbyin pa de sbyin pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i/ 
73b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i la mo// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mi rtag par rig nas/ tshul khrims srung ba nas/ gzugs rje dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / 
73b3(mdo sde): dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu'i bar du rig nas tshul khrims srung ngo // de gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ tshul khrims kyi de bzhin nyid rje su shes so// tshul khrims kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ 
73b4(mdo sde): bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ byang chub kyis de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyis de bzhin nyid kyis/ sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang / sems can gyi
73b5(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid kyis/ bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis/ chos thams cad de bzhin nyid rje su sheso// gang chos thad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de
73b6(mdo sde): bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rje su shes pas tshul khrims de srung ba 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i la mo// de bzhin du
73b7(mdo sde): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtog par rig nas// tshul rnams srung banas rnam pa shes pa rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ma du ga nas/ tshul
73b8(mdo sde): srung ste/ de rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ tshul khrims kyid bzhin nyid rjes su sheso// tshul khrims kyi de bzhin nyid kyis bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis khya / 
74a1(mdo sde): byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ sems cas de bzhin nyid dang / sems can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhi// 
74a2(mdo sde): nyid kyis/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rje su shes so// gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni/ de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhi
74a3(mdo sde): nyid rjes su shes pas/ tshul khrims de srung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mo// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mi rtag par
74a4(mdo sde): rig nas/ bzod pa sgom pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ rjes su shes pa 'di lta bus brtson 'grus rtsom mo// bsam gtan mnyam par 'jog go// shes rab rnam par dpyod do// des gzugs mirtag/ 
74a5(mdo sde): par rig nas/ shes rab rnam par dpyod pa nas// gzugs rdza dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang / mig yor lta bu bar du rig nas/ shes rab rnam par dpyod do// de gzugs
74a6(mdo sde): kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes/ shes rab kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang
74a7(mdo sde): chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang / sems kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes
74a8(mdo sde): shes so// gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su sheso// gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni/ de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid
74b1(mdo sde): do// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas/ shes rab rnam par spyod pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam zhes bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam
74b2(mdo sde): dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig nas/ shes rab rnam par dpyod pa nas/ rnam par shes pa rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid du rig nas/ shes rab rnam par dpyod do// de rnam par
74b3(mdo sde): shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su sheso// shes rab kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 
74b4(mdo sde): byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ sems can gyi de bzhin nyi da dang / sems can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ bdag gi de bzhi na nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis/ chos thams cad
74b5(mdo sde): kyi de bzhin nyid rje su shes so// gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni/ de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes
74b6(mdo sde): su shes pas shes rab rnam par dpyod pa 'di yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i la mo// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas gzugs mi
74b7(mdo sde): rtag par rig nas lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa nas/ gzugs rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang / mig yor lta bu'i bar du rig nas/ 
74b8(mdo sde): lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom mo// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su sheso// lus kyi de bzhin nyid rjesu shes nas/ chos than
75a1(mdo sde): kyi de bzhin nyid kyi bar du rjes su shes so// gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/ 
75a2(mdo sde): do// de bzhin nyid rjesu shes pas/ lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom ste/ lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par mi rtog pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu byang chub
75a3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i la mo// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig pa nas/ rgya cher de bzhin du sbyin pa sbyin
75a4(mdo sde): ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos rnams kyang rgyas par byas te/ gzugs mi rtag par rig pa nas/ chos la chos kyi rje su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhig pa
75a5(mdo sde): bsgom pa nas/ rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang / min yor lta bu'i bar du rig pa nas/ chos la chos kyi rje su wA/ zhing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom mo// de bzhin du tshor
75a6(mdo sde): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig pa nas/ chos la chos kyi rje su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa nas/ rnam par shes pa rnam par rig pa
75a7(mdo sde): med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bar du rig nas/ chos la chos kyi rje su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom mo// de ltar phung po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid do// 
75a8(mdo sde): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid do// bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid// byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de sems
75b1(mdo sde): can ci de pazhi nyid do// sems can gyi bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bdag gi de bzhin nyid do/ bdag gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de chos thams cad pa bzhin nyid // chos cang kyi bzhin nyid gang / 
75b2(mdo sde): yin pa de / de bzhin nyid med de/ mnor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gnan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid// de bzhin nyid rjesu shes pas chos la chos kyi u lha zhing dran pa nye bar gnag pa sgom yang chos dang ldan pa'i
75b3(mdo sde): rnam par rtog pas rnam par mi rtog ste/ gang de ltar rjesu shes pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam zhes bya'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ de ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la ji lta
75b4(mdo sde): bde bzhin du/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / 
75b5(mdo sde): bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med par snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga ya nga de bzhin du rgyas par bya ste/ des gzugs mi rtag pa
75b6(mdo sde): rig nas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes sgrub par byed de/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / gzugs bdag med pa dang / gzugs zhi ba dang / gzugs stong pa dang / gzugs mtshan ma med pa
75b7(mdo sde): dang gzugs smon pa med par rig/ gzugs mngon par 'du mi byed par rig/ mi skyes pa dang / me byung ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / dben pa dang / gzung ba med pa dang / 
75b8(mdo sde): kun gzhi med pa dang / mi 'byung ba dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / rmi lam lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / brag cha lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / gzugs
76a1(mdo sde): rtsa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang / mig yor lta bur rig nas/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub bo// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dga'adra/ 
76a2(mdo sde): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig nas/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub ste/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal bar rig/ rnam par shes pa bdag med pa dang / rnam
76a3(mdo sde): par shes pa zhi ba dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma thung ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / 
76a4(mdo sde): dben pa dang / gzung du med pa dang / kun gni med pa dang / rdzi 'byung ba dang / sbrum lta bu dang / rmi lam lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / khrag ma lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang gzus/ 
76a5(mdo sde): brtan lta bu dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par rigab med pa mtshan nyid du rig nas// mngon par shes pa'i oM/ shes mngon par sdug/ 'di lta ste/ phung po de bzhin nyid gang mi/ 
76a6(mdo sde): pa de mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid do// mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid do// bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid do// byang chub
76a7(mdo sde): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de sems can gyi de bzhin nyid do// sems can gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bang gi de bzhin nyid do// bdag gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de chos thams cad kyi de
76a8(mdo sde): bzhin nyid// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rje su shes pas mngon par she
76b1(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes rab tu sgrub ste/ gang de ltar rjesu shes pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam de ni gzugs
76b2(mdo sde): kyi de bzhin nyid rje su shis pa ste/ gzugs 'jig pa ma yin// chad pa ma yin/ rtag pa ma yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
76b3(mdo sde): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid rje su shes pa ste/ rnam par shes pa 'jig pa ma yin/ chad pa ma yin/ rtag pa ma yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rang bzhin gyis ma/ 
76b4(mdo sde): skyes pa'o// gang phung po'i 'jig rten las rgal ba de ni/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i 'jig rten wa yang mi chags te/ de mi chags pas 'gro ba lngar skyes
76b5(mdo sde): pa'i sems can rnams la 'jig rten las bzla ba'i phyir chos ston te/ gang 'jig rten 'jig par mi byed pa de/ ltar chos ston te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten mi rtag pa'i
76b6(mdo sde): mtshan nyid de/ de 'jig par mi byed do// 'jig rten ni sdug bsngal gyi mtshar nyid/ bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid/ ni ba'i mtshan nyid/ stang ba'i mtshan nyid/ mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid/ smon
76b7(mdo sde): pa med pa'i mtshan nyid/ mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid nas/ de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi bar du ste/ 'jig rten de 'jig par mi byed pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
76b8(mdo sde): dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam yong su dag pa'o// gang lam yong su dag pa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lam log pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams la chos
77a1(mdo sde): kyi snang chen pa byed do// 8dag snang zhed nasa' ga rtenams das pa'i la da pa btug so// thang rdu snang ba 'dzub par byed pa 'byer/ ma du / 
77a2(mdo sde): mchog go// mi dge ba thams cad kyi sems med pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni mchog// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rtse mo rnyed pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni dam pa'o// chu bo thams cad las sgrol ba'i phyir/ 
77a3(mdo sde): lam 'di ni bla na med pa'o// nyi tshe ba'i lam thams cad las 'das pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni gong na med pa'o// gnyen po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni mnyam pa med pa'o// sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi
77a4(mdo sde): lam du yang dag par 'gro ba'i phyir/ lam 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// bdud phyir rgol ba thams cad bcom pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni bde bar 'gro ba'o// mngon par shes
77a5(mdo sde): ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par ros ba'i phyir/ lam 'di ni mi thogs par 'gro ba'o// shes ra kyis snang ba'i 'od rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni mun pa
77a6(mdo sde): mun nag med pa'o// sgyu dang g.yo med pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni drang po'o// sems gya gyu med pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni gsal ba'o// sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni
77a7(mdo sde): mnyam pa'o// sems can thams cad la go 'byed pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni rgya che ba'o// phan tshun du gnod par mi 'gyur bas/ lam 'di ni yangs pa'o// yongasu mi skyo bar 'gro bas lam 'di
77a8(mdo sde): ni rnal du 'gro ba'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas lam 'di ni bsod nams kyis brtan pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas lam 'di ni gdung ba med pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas la
77b1(mdo sde): 'di ni 'jigs pa med pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas lam 'di ni mi zlogs pa'o// bsam gnyen gyi pha rol tu phyin pas lam 'di ni rdul thams cad dang bral ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
77b2(mdo sde): byin pas lam 'di ni namapa' dang mnyam par 'gro ba'o// nga rgyal med pas lam 'di ni ye shes kyi rje su 'gro ba'o// dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pas lam 'di ni sangs rgyas
77b3(mdo sde): kyi chos thams cad yongasu sgom pa'i rjesu 'gro ba'o// sngon thos pa mi slu ba'i phyir lam 'di ni chos kyi 'khor los rab tu skor ba'i rjesu 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
77b4(mdo sde): rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam yongs su dag pa ste/ lam yongasu dag pa gang la gnas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' go cha chen po bgos te/ theg pa chen po de la zhugs nas byang
77b5(mdo sde): chub kyi snying po gA la ba der 'gro ba'o// de la 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi go cha ste/ gru chen po yang / dag par sbyor bas ma rgal ba sgrol ba'i go cha'o// nyon mongs
77b6(mdo sde): ba dang / lta ba'i bcings pa thams cad las yongasu 'grol bas ma grol ba 'grol ba'i mchoga'o// yongasu 'dzin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'dor bas dbugs ma byin rnams dbugs
77b7(mdo sde): pa'i go cha'o// med pa la phyin ci log tu gyur pa mnyam pa nyid du ston pas yongasu mya ngan las ma 'das pa mya ngan las zla ba'i go cha'o// bdag dang sems can dang / srog dang / gang zag
77b8(mdo sde): mi dmigs pas sems can thams cad yongasu dgrol ba'i go cha'o// lus dang srog la mi lta bas dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa'i go cha'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba tshogs stsogs pas ngoms
78a1(mdo sde): / @#mi myong bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu spyong ba'i go cha'o// sbyin pa'i tshogs sna tshogs stsogs pas// mtshan dang // depe byad bzang po lus kyi rgyan gyi go cha'o// mngon par
78a2(mdo sde): gres pathob pas bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad 'dul ba'i go cha'o// so so yang dag par rig pa'i ye shes kyis/ sems can thams cad shin tu tshim par byed pa'i go cha'o// gzungs
78a3(mdo sde): rmi ye shes kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nyan pa dang tshol ba'i go cha'o// mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis sems can thams cad kyi sems la lta ba'i go cha'o// shes rab kyi ye
78a4(mdo sde): shes kyis sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa'i go cha'o// shes rab dang / ye shes kyi stobs yang dag par sgrub pas stobs bcu yongasu skor ba'i na
78a5(mdo sde): cha'o// thams cad du sems gong ba med pas mi 'jig/ sa pa thob pa'i go cha'o// mi dge ba'i chos thams cad snga ngas shing dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed
78a6(mdo sde): pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongasu skong ba'i go cha'o// chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag cha dang / chu zla lta bur thos kyang / mi skrag mi dngang / dang bar
78a7(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi skrag pa'i go cha'o// sems can dzad rang bzhin gyis yongasu mya ngan las 'das par shes kyang sems can yongasu mi gtong bar gnas pa
78a8(mdo sde): de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po'i go cha'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma
78b1(mdo sde): drung bar thos kyang tshe dang 'chi 'pho dang skye ba kun tu ston pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i go cha'o// chos thams cad nges par gyur pa la zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid du shes
78b2(mdo sde): shing / 'du byed thams cad skye ba med par rig kyang 'gog par mi ltung zhing 'bras bu mngon sum du'ang mi byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs mi 'khrugs
78b3(mdo sde): ba'i go cha'o// go cha chen po nyi shu po de dag bgos nas/ de theg pa chen po la mngon par zhugs pa yin no// theg pa chen po de ni bsdu ba'i dngos pos pang lo bzhi dang legs par ldan pa
78b4(mdo sde): byas pa/ bsam pas dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu bsngos pas kyi bas shin tu sbyar pa/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i ye she des lhag par che bas lte ba zab cing legs par byas pa/ den
78b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi khur bskye ba'i/ srog shing dang ldan zhing ni na tu bzung ba/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos ya nga dag par zin pas shin rta'i mda' brtan par sbyar ba/ 
78b6(mdo sde): chos rin po che thams cad kyis legs par brgyan pas rin po thams cad kyi kha ran kyis bskor ba/ sngon dam bcas pa kha dog tu lus 'khrus par byed pas/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'i 'dreng bas
78b7(mdo sde): bcings pa/ thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel pas gnya' shing gi khur khyer gzhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi bu gar legs par sbyar ba/ bden pa bzhi yongasu shes pa'i stobs kyi 'gros can
78b8(mdo sde): cang shes stong rab tu 'bad pa dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ga dran pa'i rung che'i 'breng ba'i srad bus bcings pa/ sems can thams cad
79a1(mdo sde): shong bas rgya che ning yangs par rgyub dang / dgra dang bdud kyi dgra 'dul ba/ legs par bya ba byas pa/ rig pa dang ye shes rab tu sbyor ga byin gyis rlabs kyis byin gyis/ 
79a2(mdo sde): brlabs phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ seng ge'i khri shin tu brgyan pa/ lha dang brgya byin dang / tshangs pa thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ gzugs bzang zhing blta bas mi
79a3(mdo sde): ngoms pa/ blta na sdug pa/ rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi shigs pa lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pas dam bcas pa las mi 'gyur ba kha lo sgyur bas shin tu bsdus shing bzung ba/ rtag tu byang chub kyi sems sngon
79a4(mdo sde): du 'gro ga/ smon lam gyi yon tan yongasu rdzogs pa'i rjesu song ba das gar dga' dgur 'gro ga phyogs bcur rnam par lta/ dba'i lha'i mig gi snang ba thob pa/ phyogs bcu snang bar
79a5(mdo sde): byed pa'i phyir/ 'od yangs pa rnam par dag cing 'od zer mtha' yas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog gi char rgyun tu 'phrupas rtag tu me tog gis gang ga/ rtag tu chos yang dag
79a6(mdo sde): par brjod pas rol mo sil snyan dang ldan pa/ skye bo'i 'khor skal pa 'thun pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thad tshol g.yon tan gyi rnam pa tshad med pa'i ye shes mtha' yas pas shin tu 'ang
79a7(mdo sde): pas/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang rab tu ldan pa ste/ rigs kyi bu theg pa chen po de ni de 'dra'o// skyes bu dam pa de dag de'i phyir/ 
79a8(mdo sde): go bgos nas mngon par zhugs te/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam de la rab tu zhugs pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa ma thob kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa
79b1(mdo sde): yin no// lam dang go cha dang theg pa bkod pa 'di bstan pa na lha dang mi'i srog chags bdun khri nyis stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyeso// byang chub sems dpa' sum
79b2(mdo sde): khri nyis stong ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam yong su dag pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// bam po drug pa// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal
79b3(mdo sde): gyis byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam rnam par sbyang so// smras pa rigs kyi bu bdag rnam par dag pas rnam
