229a8(mdo sde): chub la mngon par mi dga' mngon par ma chags/ mi dmigs/ mi 'tshal / mi smar mo rtog rnam par mi rtog na/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
229b1(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu lung mi bstan// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la sangs rgyas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis de dag bla na med pa yang dag par/ 
229b2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' gang
229b3(mdo sde): byang chub la mngon par mi dga'/ mngon par ma chags/ mi dmigs/ mi 'dod/ mi smon mi sems mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog pa de byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyu ro zhes legs par gsung
229b4(mdo sde): pa de ni ngo mar te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis steng gi phyogs na/ sangs rgyas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bani mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad bdag ca
229b5(mdo sde): la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stong ngo to// de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur grur pas/ bcom ldan 'i ngas la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang slad
229b6(mdo sde): ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod pa dang / yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang dag go cha chen po bgos pa dag gi rna lam du
229b7(mdo sde): gda' bar 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag bdud kyi las skyes shing zung ba rnams kyi dbang du mi mchi ba dang / de dag la bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha dag gis glags rnyed par mi
229b8(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yong su bzung zhing go mchen po bgos te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu mi nyams par byin gyis brla ba sngar gsol// bcom ldan/ 
230a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal ga' mdapa 'a de bas nachos kyi rnam thas 'ang bye kyis tha pa dang / yun druganas par bya 'i phyir ldu nga/ nang sbyi dang /  dang / 
230a2(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa dang / sngags kyi tshig 'di bshad kyis nyon cig/ rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig de bcang
230a3(mdo sde): pas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo cho smra ba de lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum rnams kyis yongasu bsrung
230a4(mdo sde): ba rab tu 'thob ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu de dag las 'am/ lam log par song ngam/ gtsug lag khang du song ngam/ gnas khang du song ngam/ 'chags pa la zhugs sam/ 'khor gyi nang du
230a5(mdo sde): song yang rung ste/ srung bar bye'o// spobs pa skyed par byed/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa'i stobs bskyed pa nye b.rasbyor te/ de la pha rol gyi rgol ba 'am/ phas kyi dgra glags tshol
230a6(mdo sde): bdag gis glags kyang rnyed par mi 'gyuro// de dran zhing shes bzhin du ldang bar 'gyur/ 'chags par 'gyur/ 'dug par 'gyur/ nyal bar 'gyuro// 'jam dpal de la rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig
230a7(mdo sde): deg gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ u d+hu re d+hu d+hu ra~M/ man+da da Te/ tsang Te/ go tsa re sha~M le li/ ti li mai li/ thi li dzi maM li/ hu lu hu lu hu lu/ e bad Te/ be taTe/ kha kha re/ tha re/ kha ra k+She A san ne/ ga ti ma he le mA na shA
230a8(mdo sde): ne mA na se bar gan d+he/ sarba ru ti ra dI ba ga te/ sin d+ha len mo bud+d+he b+h+ya/ tsA ring tre/ na mo d+harmA la/ ni d+ha ta ni/ na maHsang g+ha gabA hi ta ba be/ bru ba shAn ta ni/ sarba pA ga na mai tAM me/ sarba b+hu te b+h+ya/ sang t+ya ni
230b1(mdo sde): sho bra h+ma ba b+h+yo/ a hA ri'i b+hi/ pra shas/ tad tra trishAn te sarba pU tagra ha/ nam sa rba bud+d+he b+h+ya/ sid d+hun tu me man tra ba dA swA hA/ 'jam dpal rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig 'di byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi
230b2(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di la brtson ga rtag tu shes bzhin dang ldan pa mi rgod pa/ khengs pa med pa/ sems mi g.yengs pa/ kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba/ sogs pa dang bral ba chog shes pa/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la
230b3(mdo sde): mngon par dga' ba/ 'du 'dzi nyung ba/ lus dang sems dben pa/ byams pa dang / snying rje la mngon par dga' ba/ chos la dga' zhing mos pa/ bden pa'i tshig la rab tu gnas pa/ mi sku ba/ nang du yang dag
230b4(mdo sde): 'jog la mngon par dga' ga/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pa/ ral brtson pa/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang bral ba/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyung ba la mngon par dga' ba rnyed pa
230b5(mdo sde): dang ma rnyed pa la sems mnyam pa/ mya ngan las 'das la mngon du phyogs pa/ 'khor bas 'jig shing skrag pa/ sdug pa/ dang mi sdug pa la sems mnyam pa/ 'du shes sna tshogs dang / 
230b6(mdo sde): bral ba/ lus dang srog 'dor ba dngos po thams cad la mi blta ba/ spyod pa dang cho ga phur sum tshogs pa/ tshul khrims dang sdom pa la mngon par dga' ga bzod pa dang nges pa mang gdan du zer ba
230b7(mdo sde): bzod pa'i rang bzhin can/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod ces bya ba la brtson pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa khro gnyer dang bral ba/ gsong por smra gang rgyal bcom
230b8(mdo sde): pa des pa/ 'grogs na bde ba/ de lta bu'i spyod pa la rab tu gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos 'jam dpal sngags kyi tshig 'di rab tu gdon par bya'o// 'jam dpal de ltar na/ 
231a1(mdo sde): chos smra ba de tshe 'di nyid la stobs bskyed pa bcu rab tu 'thob bo// bcu gang zhe na/ mi brjed pa'i chos nyid pas dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang / chos rab tu 'byed pa la mkhas// 
231a2(mdo sde): pas blo gros kyi stobs bskyed pa dang / mdo sde'i tshul khong du chud bas rtogs pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang / sdom pa dang spyod pa mi gtong bas dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang / bdag dang gzhan bsrung
231a3(mdo sde): pas ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang / shes rab yong su rdzogs pas thos pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang / thos pa thams cad yong su 'dzin pas gzungs kyi stobs bskyed pa dang / sa
231a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis yong su bzung bas spobs pa'i spobs bskyed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga rab tu thob pas zab mo'i spobs bskyed pa dang / myur du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
231a5(mdo sde): shes yong su rdzogs pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa bskyed pa/ ste 'jam dpal spyod pa la zhugs pa'i chos smra ba gang rig pa dang / nga / sngags kyi tshig 'di rab tu 'don pa de ni stobs bskyed
231a6(mdo sde): pa de bcu rab tu thob par 'gyuraro// rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig bstan pa 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i tshe/ rgyal po chen po bzhi skrag cing ba spu langs par 'gyur te/ g.yog brgya stong phrag du
231a7(mdo sde): ma dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
231a8(mdo sde): cag rgyal po chen po bzhi po 'di dag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' sgrub par bgyid pa ste/ gnyen pashes dang bcas 'khor dang bcas pas rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo chos sgra/ 
231b1(mdo sde): ba dang / chos ston pa gang mdo sde 'di lta bu 'chang ba dang / klog pa de dag bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis bsrung ba dang / skyas dag sba bar bgyi'o// de dag grong ngam grong khyer ram/ ljongs sam// 
231b2(mdo sde): ljos kyi phyogs gang na gnas kyang rung / khyim pa 'am/ rab tu byung ba'ang rung ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po bzhi stobs dang bcas/ 'khor bcas pas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag
231b3(mdo sde): ni rim gro bgyi bar bdag cag sla'o// srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / spro ba dang / spobs pa dang / gzhan gyis gnod par mi bgyi zhing mi rtse bar bgyi ba'i slad du bdag cag smra'o// bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs
231b4(mdo sde): gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs drer dpag tshad brgya khor yug tu lha'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ grul bum gyis glags mi stod// de nas rgyal po chen po 'phags
231b5(mdo sde): skyes pos tshig su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag la bud/ gnyen bshes dang / bran dang 'khor rnams ci mchis pa// de dang bang // gcag 'grogs bcas pas// bdag po de dag rim grong kyi
231b6(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis tshig su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag ni chos kyi rgyal po'i sras// chos las skyes pa chos kyi sprul// khyod kyi sras gang byang chub tu// zhugs pa de dag rim gro ba gyi// 
231b7(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gis tshig su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di// gang dag 'dzin par 'gyur ba rnams// de dag phyogs bcu rnam su yang / bdag gis kunaH/ 
231b8(mdo sde): rlung bar gyi de nas rgyal ba chen po rnam thos kyi lus tshigasu bcad pa di skad ces gsol te/ ga dag rgyang chub bri brgyan pa/ de la ci drangs pa yi/ de rba mtshad pa babyed pa / mams can ku gyis/ 
232a1(mdo sde): / maM nus/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bden pa'i rla ba zhes bya ba des rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gdugs gsol nas tshig su bcang pa 'di skad ces gsol
232a2(mdo sde): to// de bzhin gshegs las bdag nyid kyis// chos kyi rnam grangs gzung bar bgyi// pha rol la yang bstan par bgyi// bdag gi bsam pa de 'dra'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag sems dang // sngon gyi spyad pa/ 
232a3(mdo sde): ci 'dra mkhyen// ji ltar bdag gis sems bdud pa// bdag ni 'jig rten rnam 'dren 'gyur// sangs rgyas dpag med skyob pa la// bdag gi gdugs 'di phul ba yi// bdag ni thub pa khyod 'dra bar// spyi gtsug
232a4(mdo sde): ltar yang mi gdar 'gyur// sangs rgyas skyes bu dam pa yang // bdag dgis byams pas bltas pa yis// yongasu dag pa'i mig thob ste/ rgyal ba ma pham blta bar bgyi// ye shes pha rol phyin pa yi// 
232a5(mdo sde): ston pas de nas lung bstan te// khyod ni 'di nas phyi dus na/ dga' ldan du yang skye bar 'gyur// dga' ldan nas ni shi 'phos nas// rgyal ba bya mas pa mthong bar 'gyur/ bskal pa stong phrag nyi shur ni/ 
232a6(mdo sde): mchod pa byas nas 'byung bar 'gyur// khyod ni rab tu byung nas kyang // tshangs par spyad pa rab spyod de// bskal pa bzang 'dir gang byung ba// bdag po de dag mthong bar 'gyur/ thams cad la yang mchod byas te/ tshangs
232a7(mdo sde): par spyod pa spyad nas ni// bskal pa bye ba drug cu na// de nas khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing ni legs brgyan pa// rin chen gdugs shes bya bar ni// byang chub sems dpa' sha dag la/ khyod ni chos
232a8(mdo sde): rnams ston par 'gyur// tshe'i tshad ni bskal bar 'gyur// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// mya ngan 'das pa'i dam chos kyang // ma 'dres bskal pa phyed du gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po
232b1(mdo sde): brgya byin gyis g.yog brgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos smra ba mdo sde 'di 'chang ba de dag bsrung ba dang / yongasu bzung bar brgyad/ 
232b2(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur dang rim gror yang bgyi'o// gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba 'am// klog pa der ci nas kyang chos smra ba de'i stobs dang mthu dang chos kyi mtshams sbyor ba spobs par 'gyur bar
232b3(mdo sde): bdag 'khor dang bcas te chos nyan du mchi'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi bu sbeng byed ces bya ba des/ do shal rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phul nas chos
232b4(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// thub padag 'dir mngon sum ste/ ji ltar khyod kyi sngon spyad pa// de bzhin bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi// ye shes tshol bar bsgrub par bgyi// khyod kyis sngan chad ma stsal
232b5(mdo sde): bar yongasu ma btang ci ma mchis kha dog pa thams cad garte/ nga ba yi// bdag kyang rje su bslab par bgyi// khyod kyi mdo sde/ 'di yang ni// 'jig rten mgon las mngon du blangs/ 
232b6(mdo sde): yang dang yang du bshad par bgyi// bdag po khyed la bgyis pa gzo// mdo sde 'di la su dga' ba// de dag bdag gi ston pa 'dra// bdag ni sangs rgyas chos 'tshal bas// de la rtag tu rim gro bgyid/ 
232b7(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos rnams yongs srung ba// mgon po nyan thos mi nus te/ phyi dus 'jigs pa chen po'i tshe// bdag gis yongasu bsrung bar bgyi// mgon po bdag kyang dbugs dbyung gsol// lha
232b8(mdo sde): rnams the tsom bcad du gsol// thub pa khyu mchog khyod 'dra ba ma/ ji srid yun gyis 'grub par 'gyur// kun mkhyen ye shes mkhas pa yi// bde bar gshegs pas de lung bstan// 
233a1(mdo sde): nga ni ci 'dra de 'dra bar/ khyod kyang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba phrag sdong dang / bskal pa bye ba brgya yi tshe/ 'jig rten du ni sangs rgyas 'gyur// ming ni ye shes 'byung / 
233a2(mdo sde): zhes bya// byang chub zhi ba thob nas kyang // bdud rnams rab tu btul nas ni// sems can bye ba phrag stong rnams// byang chub la yang 'god par 'gyur// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan
233a3(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag bsam gtan la gnas pa yang btang ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par ston pa de la no// 
233a4(mdo sde): nyan du mchi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa ni 'di las skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bsnyen bkur dang / rim gro bgyi'o// de dag ni
233a5(mdo sde): lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod parla 'os pa lag so// de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag bos/ bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa 'di skad ces
233a6(mdo sde): gsol to// dge slong dang ni dge slong ma// dge bsnyen dang ni dge bsnyen ma// gang rnams mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa// skye bo kun gyi mchod rten de// gal te mdo sde 'di la ni// sems can gcig 'ga' bcu/ 
233a7(mdo sde): na yang // 'gro ba'i mgon po bdag spro ba// chos smra ba ni de dag la// khri bstan gang la de mchis te// mdo sde 'di ni rab ston par// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad du// me tog dgram par bdag spro'o// 
233a8(mdo sde): gang gi lag nas mdo sde 'di/ phyi ma'i dus na thos 'gyur ba// de la a la la zhes ni/ legs spras legs zhes brjod par bgyi// gang na mdo sde 'di mchis par// me yi phung po gang ba yi// 
233b1(mdo sde): bye ba snyed kyi zhing rgal nas// skyo mi 'tshal bar 'chi bar bgyi// rin chen phung po ri rab tsam// dga' bzhin du ni phul nas kyang // sangs rgyas kyi yang lam sbyong ba// mdo sde 'di yang mnyan par bgyi// de nas/ 
233b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par du bya ba 'di lta bu mdzad de// rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par 'du byas pas bdud sdig can dpung gi stobs bzhi dang / bcom ldan
233b3(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag dpung dang bcas// g.yog dang
233b4(mdo sde): bcas pa 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar dam bcas te/ gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i ljongs kyi phyogs der chos nyan pa dang / chos smra ba dag la
233b5(mdo sde): bdud kyi las mi bgyi ba'i steng du bsrung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / khar yang bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer na/ ser gyi kha dog lta bus// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di khyab par
233b6(mdo sde): mdzod/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ skyes bu dam pa dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa de dag gi dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung bar
233b7(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlab so// 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ji srid 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir spyod par 'gyur ba yun de srid dam
233b8(mdo sde): pa'i chos nub par mi 'gyuraro// de nas 'khar de dag thams cad dga' mgu yi rangs rab tu dga' rangs yid bde bar gyur nas spos thams cad dang phreng ba thams cad dang
234a1(mdo sde): byug pa thams cad dang / me tog thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gtor nas/ tshig kyang 'di skad ces e ma ho chos kyi rnam
234a2(mdo sde): grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na yun ring du gnas pa dang / rgyas par gyur cig ces 'dzer to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bkal stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos
234a3(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bzung // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de bas na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ba dang / bcangs
234a4(mdo sde): ba dang / klag pa dang / yang dag par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ khyod la yongasu gtad do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam / klog gam/ gzhan dag
234a5(mdo sde): la ston tam/ yi ger bris pa la mchod pa bgyid na/ de bsod/ nams ji tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyurabacom ldan 'das kyi/ nyes bka' stsal pa/ yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig ji snyed kyi
234a6(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bde ba'i yo brad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa bas/ gang chos kyi rnam
234a7(mdo sde): grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / gzung nas kyang gzhan la ston pa dang / klog pa de ni de bas kyang bsod nams mang du bskyed// kun dga' bo gang gis dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par
234a8(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi rnam grangs glegs bam du bris te/ mchod na de'i tshe 'di nyid la gter 'thob pa bcu tho'o// bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan rab tu thob pas/ sangs rgyas mthong / 
234b1(mdo sde): gter dang / lha'i rnabs rab tu thos pas chos nyan pa'i gter dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun rag tu thos pas/ dge 'dun mthong ba'i gter dang / rin po che'i lag pa rab tu thob pas zad mi shes/ 
234b2(mdo sde): ba'i long spyod kyi gter dang / mtshan dang dpe byang bzang po yong su rdzogs pas gzugs kyi gter dang / g.yog mi phyed pa g.yog gi gter dang / gzungs rab tu thob pas thos pa'i gter dang / 
234b3(mdo sde): spobs pa rab tu thob pas dran pa'i gter dang / pha rol gyi rgol ba tshar gcod pas mi 'jigs pa'i gter dang / sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bas bsod nams kyi gtero// yang bcom ldan
234b4(mdo sde): 'das kyis chos rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sa ya brag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis mi skye ba'i tshe das la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur to// sems can
234b5(mdo sde): tu med pa byang chub la rab tu zhug so// sems can tshad med pa/ yang len pa med par rnam par grolo// de nas bcom ldan 'des la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol
234b6(mdo sde): to bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos nirnam grangs 'di'i
234b7(mdo sde): ming chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya bar zung shig/ sa sa rgyas kyi brgyan bkod pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis kun dris pa zhes bya bar zung
234b8(mdo sde): shig 'jam dpal gyis bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gno nur gyur pa dang / tshangs pa khyad par sems dang bram tsha
235a1(mdo sde): sA la chen po lta bu'i bu mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od dang / gnas brtan 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang khyogs/ 
235a2(mdo sde): bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang dri thar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi
235a3(mdo sde): rangs te mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis nus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogas+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya pra b+ha dang / d+harma pA la dang / dzi na mi tra
235a4(mdo sde): dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de d+harmA ta shI la dang / bar nus kyi lo tsa ba ban sde de ben dra sha~M la dang / ku ma ra shI la la sogs pas nus te gtan la phab pa'o// 
235a5(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dru ma kin ma rA dza pe ri brid tsha na ma ma hA ya na sU tra// bod skad du/ 'phags pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon/ pas nus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs
235a6(mdo sde): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad badrag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong drug khri
235a7(mdo sde): nyis stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phal cher phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnan nas 'dus pa bdun khri nyis stong thams cad kyang
235a8(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa/ gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa chags pa med pa/ ting 'dzin thob pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / mos pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa phun sum
235b1(mdo sde): tshogs pa dang / bsam pa rdo rje ltar brtan zhing mi phyed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa khyad par 'phags pa la zhugs pa/ bdag nyi// 
235b2(mdo sde): byang chub kyi sems mi 'dor ga sems can gzhan byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdoms pa dang / bzod pa dang / nges pa dang / 
235b3(mdo sde): pangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongasu gtong g.yongasu bsngo ba'i cho ga shes pa lus dang ngag dang sems tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis legs par brgyan gsems can thams
235b4(mdo sde): cad la sems snyoms pa dang bzod pa dang / nges pa'i stobs kyi shin tu bgos pa/ bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du brtson 'grus shin tu brtsams pa/ bsam
235b5(mdo sde): gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / snyoms pa/ ra 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis ma par dben pa/ tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba la
235b6(mdo sde): spobs pa chags pa med pa'i shes rab dang / ye shes la mkhas po/ lhun po'i ri ltar sems g.yo ba med pa/ sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / ri ltar rje su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang / 
235b7(mdo sde): bral ba byams pa chen po la gnas te/ 'od zer thogs pa med ga/ snying rje chen po la gnas te/ rtag tu sems can la lta bar brtson pa/ dga' ba chen po la gnas te/ chos kyi kun dga' ba
235b8(mdo sde): la dga' ba dang / ldan pa/ btang snyoms chen po la gnas te/ gnyi su med pa shes pa thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / 
236a1(mdo sde): bstod pa dang / smad pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal las rab tu 'das pa/ bas kyi rgol ba ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cad kun tu rab tu 'joms pa/ bdud dang nyan/ 
236a2(mdo sde): mongs pa'i rgol ba bcom pa/ u dum pa ra'i me tog mthong ba ltar shin tu 'byung bar dka' ba/ gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad la dge ba'i shes gnyen byed pa/ yongasu mya ngan
236a3(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i bar du btan du mdza' gseng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ sangs kyi chos zab mo dang mi 'jigs pa sgrogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa/ mi 'khrugs
236a4(mdo sde): par phyin par lung bstan pa/ ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed pa/ de kho na'i chos kyi tshul la brtson pa/ 'od kyis nyi ma dang zla ba mog mog por byed pa phyogs bcur sgra bsgrags gsangs rgyas
236a5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa/ chos dkon mchog gi mdzod yang dag par 'dzin pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi gcod par yid la
236a6(mdo sde): byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ shin tu rnam par bye ba rnam par 'byed pa la gnas pa'i dang ldan pa/ mthong ba dang thos pa don yod pas rnam
236a7(mdo sde): bar gnon pa/ rtag par rgyun tu sems can yongasu smin par byed pa la brtson pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ sems can thams can gyi dbang po
236a8(mdo sde): mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pas ci rigs par chos ston pa/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bya ba la mkhas pas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi
236b1(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang / btags pa la bde thag tu mkhas pa mi 'jigs pa chen pos 'jigs pa med pa dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi par byed gsas rgyas bye ba phrag rmen
236b2(mdo sde): brgya stong dpag tu med pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pas/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongasu rdzogs pa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi cho gas bsags pa/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
236b3(mdo sde): dang / smon pa med pa'i chos thams cad la mos pa/ rnam par grol ba/ smon lam shin tu btab pa/ sems can dang / chos thams cad rgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / chu zla dang / mig
236b4(mdo sde): yor dang / brag cha dang / na mkha' dang mtshungs par mos pa sgra skad thams cad nges pa'i tshig gis ston pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos dang don dang nges pa'i tshig dang slob
236b5(mdo sde): pa so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shos rab kyi dbang po la rtog pa/ rtogs par khong du chud pa/ shugs chen po 'dzin pa'i stobs bcu la nye bar gyur pa/ shi
236b6(mdo sde): mig dang / lha'i mig dang / shes rab kyi mig dang / chos kyi mig dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi snang ba thob pa/ lam gyi yan lag gi tshogs kyis shin tu sogs pa'i lam thams cad la
236b7(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod snang ba la 'jug pa'i cho ga shes pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge
236b8(mdo sde): 'dzin thob pa/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting 'dzin la 'jug pa'i shes pa mkhas pa/ chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i ting 'dzin mngon sum du gyur pa/ chos dkon mchog sgron ma
237a1(mdo sde): 'dzin pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud la rnam par blta grwa sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la rnam par lta ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas
237a2(mdo sde): kyi ye shes la nye bar gyur pa/ sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi bye ba so sor nye bar gnas pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i yon tan rin po che thams/ 
237a3(mdo sde): cad kyis brgyan pa/ bskal pa thams cad du bsngags pa yongasu rjod kyang mthar mi phyin pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed dang / dag
237a4(mdo sde): 'byung dang / lag na rin po che dang / rin po che me tog dang / na po che'i tog dang / mthong dga' dang / dga' ba'i zla gros dang 8/ mig gis mthong dga' dang / sa 'dzin dang / dga'
237a5(mdo sde): zhing mchog tu dga' byed dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ dang / mthu chen thob dang / dpal chen dang / bdud thul dang / meg mnad ra'i dri dang / rlung lha dang / bden dga' dang / 
237a6(mdo sde): mnyam lta dang / mnyam mi mnyam lha dang / kha lo sgyur dang / gsol ba ma btab par sems can kun gyi bshes gnyen dang / byams pa dang / 'brug sgra dang / lhun po'i rtse mo 'dzin
237a7(mdo sde): dang dalhun po brtsegs pa dang / lhun po'i mchog dang / 'od kyi tog dang / 'od dpal dang / sgron ma'i rgyal po dang / sngon sum blo gros dang / 'od kyis yang dag brgyan dang / sna tshogs
237a8(mdo sde): cod pan dang / mdzes pa'i mig gis lta ba dang / lag bzang dang / legs par bsams pa sems pa dang / 'khor lo rab gnas pa dang / mi g.yo rkang pas rnam gnon dang / rdo rje
237b1(mdo sde): rkang pas rnam gnon dang / rkang pas 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon dang / dga' spobs dang / spobs myur dang / spobs pa mi 'chad pa dang / spobs pa byin gyis brlabs dang / 'jam sgra dang // 
237b2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad tshims byed dang / dra ba can gyi 'od dang / rgyal ba'i blo gros dang / skye bar tshims byed dang / 'gro 'dzin dang / lha'i rgyal pos mchod dang / mchog gi blo gros dang / 
237b3(mdo sde): thogs med sems dang / skye reng blo gros dang / mi skyed pa dang / dpag med rin chen mdzod dang / byang chub blo gros dang / sna tshogs me tog dang / lha'i me tog rgyal po dang / tshangs dbyangs dang / 
237b4(mdo sde): bzang skyong dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / ded dpon pa bzang po dang / mis byin dang / mu lta dang / 'jam dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon
237b5(mdo sde): nur gyur pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bdun bri nyis stong dang / thabs cig tu bzhug so// gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i brgya byin
237b6(mdo sde): dang / tshangs pa dang / 'dzag rten skyob ba dang / de las gzhan pa lha dang / klu dang / genod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi 'am
237b7(mdo sde): mi ma yin pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug go// de nas byang chub
237b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga'i cod pan zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus pa des/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khar chen po de 'dus par rig nas/ stan las langs te
238a1(mdo sde): gros phrag pa cig tu bzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ pus mo g.yas// 
238a2(mdo sde): pa'i lha ngas la gtsug te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// 'jig rten 'das pa
238a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad// khyod ni 'jig rten don mdzad blo gros ldan// snang ba bsnyes shing nyon mongs dri stsal pa// 'jig rten snang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshalo// sbyin la dgyes shing stong
238a4(mdo sde): bcu'i mchog mnga' ba// dul ba btul ba gdul bu'i pha rol phyin// bcom ldan lha dang mi dang klus mchod pa/ gdul ba mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal// mtshan mchog 'gro/ 
238a5(mdo sde): ba mang po'i don mdzad pa// 'dom gang 'od ni gser gyi kha dog 'dra// dge ba'i mtshan gyis dam pa'i gzugs mnga' ba// srid gsum mtshungs med khyod la phyag 'tshal
238a6(mdo sde): kho pha rol gshegs pa gzhan gyi tshogs 'joms zhing // bas kyi rgol ba'i rgol 'joms mi g.yo ba// sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi spyod la mkhas// thugs rje mchog ldan
238a7(mdo sde): khyod la phyag 'tshalo// dgra bcom rgyal po nyon mongs rdul bsal ba// mcho ba dag cing brtul zhugs tshul khrims gnas// lha yi lha mchog dri med dri ma bral// kha rol tshogs 'jom
238a8(mdo sde): khyad la phyag 'tshalo// bde gshegs rin chen mchog tu dga' mdzad pa// dgon par rtag gnas rtag tu dgon par dges// rdul skyon gti mug rnyog pa mi mnga' ga na mkha' mnyam thung/ 
238b1(mdo sde): / khyong la phyag 'tshalo// chu bo bani rgal bden pa ni bka' mchid gsung // mig sbyin bdud brtsi chos kyi bka' mchid can// 'gro ba'i don mdzad 'jig rten gsum rtsug/ 'khor lo zhabs
238b2(mdo sde): mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshalo// lha dang mi yis mchod pa'i mthu bo che// mgon po lha yi dbang po bdud 'joms pa// mi dang lha klu tshogs kyis mchod pa yi// mi mchog dam pa khyod la phyag
238b3(mdo sde): 'tshalo// rtag tu bden sdud dam pa'i chos la dgyes// mnyam thugs 'gro ba kun la byams pa'i thugs// chos la mnyam gnas mi rnams kha lo spur/ yon tan mthar phyin khyod la
238b4(mdo sde): phyag 'tsha lo// snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs rnam par dag dang ldan// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs lta bur 'jam pa'i gsung // dbyangs kyi ya ngan lag rab tshul kun rdzogs pa// bden bsnyen gsung byed
238b5(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal// stong pa mtshan ma med cing smon dang bral/ zab mo lha dka' shin tu rtogs par dka'/ thara'ajug par mkhas pa blo gros ldan// thar pa'i lam nges
238b6(mdo sde): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyu la rten pa mkhas pa'i bcom ldan 'das// mtha' gnyis lta ba rtag tu mi mnga' galas rnams rnam smin kho na'i 'bras bu gsung // lta ba'i mun bral khyed
238b7(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshalo// gang nas ma byon gang du'ang gshegs ma lags/ rtag tu bden pa'i chos rnams rab gsung ba// smig rgyu smra bzhin nga'i mi mnga' ba/ dge ba'i chos tshul khyod la
238b8(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal/ skye ba mi skye gang du'ang skye mi lags// skye dang 'jig dang gang du'ang mi bas pa// chos kyi gnas nyid ji lta'i gnas la gnas// gnas la maM gnas rgyal la byag
239a1(mdo sde): 'tshal lo// de bzhin kho na de bzhin yang dag gsungs// rtag tu mi g.yo de bzhin nyid la bzhugs// lhun po'i rgyal mtshan rdo rje 'dra ba'i sku// mi g.yo ri rab mtshungs
239a2(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo// sku ni dben zhing mnyam thugs blo ldan pa// grags pa mtha' yas 'jig rten gsum du grags/ skyes bu mchog la zhu ba nus pa rnams// 'jig rten zla bas myur du ska
239a3(mdo sde): dbyer gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan gyis/ tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bston nas// 'di
239a4(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slang du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na// de bzhin gsheg pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
239a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub se/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan la
239a6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dri ba dris pa
239a7(mdo sde): de dang de'i lung bstan pas/ khyod kyi sems rang bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsakha pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la
239a8(mdo sde): leg so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan cing / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa sna
239b1(mdo sde): tshogs kyis brgyan dang ldan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos zab mo rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpag
239b2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma lags pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so sor ci rigs par chos ston pa mkhas pa
239b3(mdo sde): rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spod pa shes pa la 'jug pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgyu dang bya ba
239b4(mdo sde): dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa shes pa la brjed pa ma mchis par spyod po rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ 
239b5(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis pa rgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' b.ro// med pa'i rgyan gyis rgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na
239b6(mdo sde): byang chu sems dpa' brtson 'grus kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sem
239b7(mdo sde): dpa' shes rab kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par
239b8(mdo sde): shes pa las mi nyams pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgal nas pha rol thang la
240a1(mdo sde): gnas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang ston gas brtags pani/ 
240a2(mdo sde): kun tu spyod pa dang yang ldan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba la yang blta la mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mi gnas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sem
240a3(mdo sde): dpa' khams sna tshogs la yang rnam par blta la chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' don yang mi 'dor la gnod par yang kun tu dga' ba
240a4(mdo sde): rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi nor dang ldan pa thabs kyis nor med pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' a zhes bgyi ba'i spos rnam pa
240a5(mdo sde): ma mchis pa'i sgor 'jug pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chu/ ba sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sem
240a6(mdo sde): dpa' chos gtan la bab pa rnams la rnam par phye ba shin tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi bya ba dang 'thun par zhugs kyang nyon
240a7(mdo sde): mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis bltar mi mthong ba'i chos kyi dbang phyug rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chu
240a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba rnams lags ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shin tu dul zhing mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams yangs/ 
240b1(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams blangs pa ma mchis pa'i slob dpon rnams lags / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa rnams
240b2(mdo sde): lags ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rjesu bsar ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos
240b3(mdo sde): thams cad la dbang skur ba thob pa rnams lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan
240b4(mdo sde): la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu leg so leg so// rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying rtse ba dang / skye bo pha la
240b5(mdo sde): po che'i don dang / lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir/ zhugs pa dang / rigs kyi bu da ltar gyi dang / ma 'ongs pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rje su gzung ba dang / theg pa
240b6(mdo sde): chen po 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la gang don 'di 'dri bar yongasu sems pa ni leg so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir rab tu legs par nyon la
240b7(mdo sde): yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad// bcom ldan 'das la legs zhes gsol nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa
240b8(mdo sde): dpa ba tsas tham mas kyis de 'di gad ces bka' yul to/ gas kyi byang chub sems dpanga' chos pani dang 'an/ rmongs pa tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa rnams yin na cig shes
241a1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la 'od zer thogs pa med pa rnams yin te/ rin po che dang phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongasu gtong zhing yid 'gyod pa med pa rnams
241a2(mdo sde): yin/ chos smra ba la gzhan dag gis bshad pa ma zlog cing rje su yi rang ste dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob nas leg so zhes bya ba byin pa dang / chos mnyan pa 'am/ chog
241a3(mdo sde): bgo pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi phyir ram/ mtshan mo 'dug pa skul na mchog tu dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / zang zing med pa'i
241a4(mdo sde): sems kyis chos kyi sbyin pa ste rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ spobs pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa rnams yino// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
241a5(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// chos zab mo rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ gzhi gang zhe na/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang rjesu 'thun pa dang / bdag gi rang
241a6(mdo sde): bzhin ltar sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa dang / 'du byed thams cad gar yang mi 'gro// gnas kyang ma 'ongs par rab tu shes pa dang / chos thams cad na mkha'i phyag rgyas btab par
241a7(mdo sde): mos pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ chos zab mo rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa shes pa mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
241a8(mdo sde): chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo shin tu sbyangs pa dang / sgrib
241b1(mdo sde): pa med pa'i sgo mngon sum du gyur pa dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba shes pa dang / sems las su rung zhing ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi
241b2(mdo sde): po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ so so ci rigs
241b3(mdo sde): par chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ gzhi gang zhe na/ so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa dang / sems can gzud pa shes pa dang / chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa shes pa dang / bdag
241b4(mdo sde): gi sems sbyangs pas sems can thams cad kyi sems sbyangs par rab tu shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ so so ci rigs par chos ston
241b5(mdo sde): pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub ni mas dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi ga
241b6(mdo sde): zhe na/ shes rab kyi mdzud pa dang / ye shes chags pa med pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa la zhugs pas sgrib pa thams cad rgyun chad pa dang / blo shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub
241b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes pa la 'jug par mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos
241b8(mdo sde): bzhi dang ldan na/ rgyu dang bya ba dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa shes pa la brjed pa med par spyod pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chang par smra ba ma yin pa dang / rtag par smra ba ma yin
242a1(mdo sde): dang / rgyu dang bya ba dang las kyi 'bras bu la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa dang / chos la chos nyid du byed cing chos la cho su smra'i// 'di bdag dang bdag gis mi
242a2(mdo sde): smra ba ste/ de ltar bya ba la 'jug pas rgyu dang bya ba dang / las kyi 'bral bu chud mi gzon pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ rgyu dang bya ba dang las kyi rnam/ 
242a3(mdo sde): par smin pa la 'jug pa shes pa la brjed pa med par spyod pa rnams yino// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ smin pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na mahA
242a4(mdo sde): gyis legs par brgyan pa rnams yin/ dpe byad bzang pos rnam par spras pa rnams yin/ gzugs blta bas mi ngoms pa rnams yin/ lag na rin po che thob pas long spyod mi zad pa yin te/ rigs kyi
242a5(mdo sde): bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dang ldan na/ sbyin pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ tshul khrims kyi
242a6(mdo sde): rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin du 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi sems
242a7(mdo sde): kyis brgyan pa dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs par 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad yang dag par bcad nas lha dang mir skye ba yongasu bzung
242a8(mdo sde): bar gyur cing byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi de dag dang ldan na/ tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnam su rig par bya'o// gas
242b1(mdo sde): kyi bya byang chub sems dpa' chos bani dang ldan na/ bzod pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te/ ba ni gang zhe na/ tshangs pa'i skad dang / sgra dbyangs lta bu dang ldan pa rnams yim ka la bing ka'i sgra dang rnga/ 
242b2(mdo sde): sgra lta bu dang ldan pa rnams yin/ skye bo mang pos mthong na dga' ba dang / sdug cing yid du 'ongs pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i chos rnams la yid ma la brtan pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
242b3(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bzod pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnam su rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ brtson 'grus kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams
242b4(mdo sde): yin te/ bani gang zhe na/ dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par bya ba'i cho ga shes pas dge ba'i chos rnams la yid ma brtan pa rnams yin/ pha rol gyis gnan pa med pas rdo rje'i lus rab tu/ 
242b5(mdo sde): thob pa rnams yin/ bya ba ci yod ces bya ba mos pas ga/ sol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad la dge ba'i// gshes gnyen byed pa rnams yi ma thos pa'i tshogs lags
242b6(mdo sde): bas mi ngoms pa'i phyir/ yid yongasu mi skyo ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ brtson 'grus kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnamasu rig par bya'o// 
242b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bsam gtan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mi rgod pa rnams yin/ ma khengs pa rnams yin/ mu tshor smrab med/ 
242b8(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ cang shes kyi sems mi 'dor ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bsam gtan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnam su rig par
243a1(mdo sde): bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ shes rab kyi byin gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te/ ba ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag dang sems can/ 
243a2(mdo sde): dang / srog dang / gsob dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag du smra ba med pa rnams yin/ spobs pa chags pa med pa rnams yin/ tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba bstan pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnam
243a3(mdo sde): yin chos thams cad la som nyi med cing the tsom dang bral ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ shes rab kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams
243a4(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bzhi dang / ldan na/ tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems cad thams cad kyi dpung gnyen
243a5(mdo sde): du bya ba'i phyir/ mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byams pa dang / sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bye ba'i phyir/ mngon par bsgrubs pa'i snying rje chen po dang / chos tham
243a6(mdo sde): cad la dga' bas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyir mngon par bsgrubs pa'i btang snyoms te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos
243a7(mdo sde): bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams yin// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa rnams
243a8(mdo sde): yin te khazhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan bzhi bsdud pa'i shes pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgrub pa'i thabs shes pa dang / rang gi sems la dbang sgyur
243b1(mdo sde): ba'i chos shes pa dang / sangs rgyas la lta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ mngon par shes pa las
243b2(mdo sde): mi nyams pa rnams yi no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang nye bar zhi ba dang / pha rol tu mi rmya
243b3(mdo sde): ba dang / chos thams cad la sgyu ma lta bur rab tu rtog pa'i shes pa dang / ye shes kyi stobs can yin gyi/ nyon mongs pa'i stobs can ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po
243b4(mdo sde): 'di dag dang ldan na// g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams yino// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ rgal nas pha rol thang la gnas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 
243b5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i chu bo yang rab tu shes la/ 'dod / sa dang bral ba yang mngon sum du mi byed pa dang / srid pa'i chu dro yong rab tu shes la bsams bshin du yang skye ba dang lta ba/ 
243b6(mdo sde): chu bo yang rab tu shes la lta ba'i bcings pa yang mi 'dor ba dang / ma rig pa'i chu bo yang rabag tu shes la/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rje su 'thun par yang byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
243b7(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ rgal nas pha rol thang la gnas pa rnams yi no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sem
243b8(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi spyod las yang ston la/ ma brtags pa'i kun tu spyod pa dang yang ldan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu yong su bsgrubs pa dang / chos na/ 
244a1(mdo sde): rnam par bsgrubs pas so sor nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shin tu brtags pa dang / mngon par shes lngas rnam par rtse ba shes pa dang ldan pa dang / yid kyi lus mngon par/ 
244a2(mdo sde): bsgrubs pa la mkhas pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems cad thams cad kyi spyod lam yang ston la// 
244a3(mdo sde): ma brtags pa'i kun tu spyod pa dang yang ldan pa rnams yino// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// 'khor ba la yang lha la mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mi gnas pa rnams
244a4(mdo sde): min te 'ji gang zhe na/ 'd-i lnga ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byi gyis brnabs dang / snying tsAchen pa sems dang / khabs la mkhas pa dang / sngon gyi yings mi mdor ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
244a5(mdo sde): chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ 'khor ba la yang lha la mya// ngan las 'das pa lnga yang mi gnas pa rnams yin// rigs kyi nyebu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 
244a6(mdo sde): khams sna tshogs la yang rnam par lha la chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rang bzhin med pas chos rang bzhin med par rtogs pa dang / chos rang / 
244a7(mdo sde): bzhin med pas sems can rang bzhin med par rtogs pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rang bzhin med par mos pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa la som nyi
244a8(mdo sde): cing the tsom dang bral ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na khams sna tshogs pa la yang rnam par lha la/ chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo'o// rigs kyi bu/ 
244b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos bani dang ldan na/ don yang mi 'dor la gnod par yang kun tu snang te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa rnams yin sbyol 'khor ba la
244b2(mdo sde): gnas pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yong su snang bar bsam pa gnas pa rnams yin/ nyan thos dang sangs rgyas kyi yul la yang kun tu snang ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub
244b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ don yang mi 'dor la gnod par yang kun tu snang ngo // rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bsod nams kyis nor dang ldan la tha
244b4(mdo sde): kyis nor med pa rnams yin te/ kha zhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste rgyal po chen po la mos pa'i sems can gdul ba'i phyir/ bsod nams kyi sa 'khor lo sgyur ba dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa'i bsod
244b5(mdo sde): nams kyang nye bar ston pa dang / 'gro ba phal pa 'dul ba'i phyir/ dbul zhing dman par yang nye bar ston pa dang / slong ba mthong na bdog pa thams ca da yongasu gtong zhing nor med par 'gyur ba dang / nor che
244b6(mdo sde): po dang ldan pa mthong na bsod nams kyis longs spyod zad mi shes par yang nye bar ston pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bsod nams kyis nor dang ldan pa yi
244b7(mdo sde): la/ thabs kyis nor med pa rnams yin mo// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ a zhes bya ba'i sgos rnam pa med pa'i sgo la 'jug pa rnams yin te/ bani gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 
244b8(mdo sde): 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par shes pa sbyong ba dang / 'du byed thams cad bzod ma nas sdug bsngal lo zhes byang chub rab tu rnyed pa dang / chos thams cad bdag med do zhes lta bar gyur pa yongs
245a1(mdo sde): sbyong ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni bzod ma nasa'i bzhes ye shes la 'jug pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ a zhes bya ba'i sgos rnam
245a2(mdo sde): ba med pa'i sgo la 'jug pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos ba'i dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ba rnams yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 
245a3(mdo sde): shes rab kyi mig shin tu rnam par dag pa rnams yin/ chos kyi mig gis snang ba thob pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan mngon sum du gyur pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la
245a4(mdo sde): dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi
245a5(mdo sde): bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// chos gtan la dbab pa rnams la rnam par phye la shin tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams yin te/ ba'i gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ so so yang dag
245a6(mdo sde): bar rig pa shes pa sgrib pa med pa dang / bden pa bzhi rnam par dgod pa shes pa dang / rton pa la gnasu shes pa dang / gzungs la g.yeng ba med par shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
245a7(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ chos gtan la dbab pa rnams la rnam pa 'phye ba shin tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldar na/ 
245a8(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi bya ba dang 'thun par zhugs kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin te kha zhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi chos mngor sum du gyur pa dang / 'jig rten las
245b1(mdo sde): sems can yang dag par sgrol ba dang / rjesu chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong ba dang / bzod ma nas rnam par dag cing 'od gsal bas rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa cam ma yin pa ste rigs kyi bu/ 
245b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ 'jig rten gyi bya ba dang 'thun par zhugs kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' tshas
245b3(mdo sde): bzhi dang ldan na// gzhan dag gis ltar mi mthong ba'i chos kyi dbang phyug rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems kyi dbang phyug dang / shes rab kyi dbang phyug dang / ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang
245b4(mdo sde): thabs kyi dbang phyug ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ gzhan dag gi bltar mi mthong ba'i chos kyi dbang phyug rnams yin mo// rigs kyi bu byang chub
245b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos bani dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs ba mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams sangs rgyas la lta ba yang dag
245b6(mdo sde): bar 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can rnams chos nyan pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can rnams byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas rtse/ 
245b7(mdo sde): su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang mi 'bral ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu
245b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ shin tu dul zhing mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyis
246a1(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba mngon sum du gyur pa dang / bden pa la nye bar brtags pas chos thams cad ji lta bas bzhin dang / bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba thams/ 
246a2(mdo sde): cad yang dag par 'joms pa la mkhas par gyur pa dang / nyon mongs pas mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ shin tu dul zhing
246a3(mdo sde): mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos rnams blangs pa med par slob dpon rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta
246a4(mdo sde): ste/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i dngos po phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ sems can yongasu smin par bya rab la rten zhing bsam pa rgya che ba rnams yin// gang ye shes
246a5(mdo sde): yongasu tshol ba de sems can thams cad kyi ched du yin/ gyi/ bdag 'ba' shig gi phyir ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ chos
246a6(mdo sde): rnams blangs pa med par slob dpon rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 
246a7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ bdag gi don btang zhing gzhan gyi don byed pa rnams yin/ bdag gi bde ba thams cad gtod zhing sems can rnams la chos kyi bde ba sbyin pa rnams yin/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos
246a8(mdo sde): ston pa la ngal ba med pa rnams yin// chos kyi 'tsho bas 'tsho'i/ zang zing gis 'tsho ba ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// sems can
246b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi ston pa gyur pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor losabaskor ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di
246b2(mdo sde): lta ste/ gzungs rab tu 'thob pa dang / spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa la shes pa 'jug pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du khrid cing mi byed pa'i chos ston pa yin
246b3(mdo sde): te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi
246b4(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang ba su ba thob pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spyod pa thams cad las rab tu 'das pa rnams yin/ byang chub sems
246b5(mdo sde): dpa' spyod pa las mi ldog cing mi skye ba'i chos la ba/ zod pa thob pa rnams yin/ bsams bzhin du tshe dang 'chi// 'pho dang skye ba yang ston la/ phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas btab
246b6(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya la yang dag par gzhol zhing sa bcus nges par byung nas/ sa nas sar 'phor ba la mkhas pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos
246b7(mdo sde): bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sa stong
246b8(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas/ snang ba chen pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par gyur to// steng gi bar snang las lha bye ba khrag khrig ba
247a1(mdo sde): stong gis lha'i glu dbyangs blangs te/ lha'i me tog man da ra'i char rab tu bab nas/ 'di skad ces kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
247a2(mdo sde): byang chub bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par bsgrubs pa gang lags pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bsgrubs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di snyed cing bshad de/ rab tu
247a3(mdo sde): bstan to// bcom ldan 'das gang bzhi pa bsgrubs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / thos nas mos pa dang / mos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang
247a4(mdo sde): kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang ston pa dang / byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba'i sem su can de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan don dang ldan pa ma lags
247a5(mdo sde): te/ de dag ni ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra brtse// ma pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da ltar seng / ge'i sgra sgrog pa bzhin du lha dang mi lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
247a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi mdun du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang bzhi bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pas rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// zhes ched
247a7(mdo sde): du brjod pa ched du brjod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
247a8(mdo sde): ba'i byang chub tu sems skyeso// byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
247b1(mdo sde): balha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs mya ngan 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta gu de 'dzin pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher
247b2(mdo sde): rab tu ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag chos du dang ldan par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las/ 
247b3(mdo sde): 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni chos brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di
247b4(mdo sde): lta ste/ de dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ba dasam pa nges te/ bsam pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa'i sems med/ shin tu
247b5(mdo sde): byams pa sgom pa bsgoms par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba la gnas te/ snying rje chen po la/ gnas par 'gyur ba dang / chos 'dod de chos don du gnyer bar
247b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms te mtsho chen po rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur ba dang / lus dang srog 'dong zhing dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi cho ga bsags te/ 
247b7(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa bas brtan par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis brlabs te/ smon lam gyis yang dag par byung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'khor gyi nang du 'jigs pa med pas bdud dang / phyir rgol ba bcom
247b8(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba te/ rigs kyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni chos brgyad
248a1(mdo sde): po 'di dag dang ldan par 'gyuro// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong/ 
248a2(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gang dag sa phyogs mtho dman can dang / ri nag po dang / chu mig dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / lteng ka dang / rgya mtsho chen po de dag thams cad mi snang bar gyur to// 
248a3(mdo sde): sa chen po 'di dag thams cad kyang lag mthil ltar mnyam par gnas par gyur to// chun gnas pa'i sems can rnams la gnod pa med par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
248a4(mdo sde): gyi khams 'di na shing skam gang dag lo brgya lon po de dag thams cad las kyang me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs skyes thar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su btud ma
248a5(mdo sde): par btud nas phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// de ma yin pa nga gzhan thams cad las kyang me tog dang / 'bras bu swA gas skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su btud ma
248a6(mdo sde): par btud nas phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// sa chen po las kyang pad+ma tshad shing rta'i phang lo tsam sna tshogs blta na sdug pa kha dog dang ldan pa/ dri dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba dag mngon par 'thon to// snang ba
248a7(mdo sde): chen pos kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par gyur to// mi snang zhing mi dkrol bar yang steng gi bar snang las lha'i sil snyan dang glu dbyangs kyi sgra byung ste grag pa
248a8(mdo sde): gyur to// ri'i rgyal po gangs dang ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngag ldang las kyang lha'i me tog sna tshogs sngon dri mi mnas pa rnams kyang mchog gi dri dang byung ste/ dri ngas stong gsum gyi snying chen po'i
248b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir dri'im po mnam par gyur to// ri'i rgyal po gangs dang / ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngang ldang de las me tog gi char chen po bab ste/ de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil
248b2(mdo sde): 'khor gang na der mngon par bab nas/ sa chen po 'dir me tog gi tshwa de dag gis pus nub tsam du gyur to// me tog gi shing de dag las me tog sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab cing sal snyan dang glu
248b3(mdo sde): dbyangs sna tshogs kyi sgra dag kyang byung ngo // steng gi bar snang la rin po che sna tshogs kyi gdugs dpag tshad brgya stong phrag drug cu'i tshad tsam kun tu gnas par gyur to// rin po che'i gdugs
248b4(mdo sde): de las mu tig gi rgyan zung dang / ri pa Na'i phreb bu g.yer kwa'i dril bu sna tshogs kyi ra ba 'phung bar gyur to// dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra yid du 'ong ba/ yid dga' bar byed pa chags par
248b5(mdo sde): byed pa des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di go bar byas par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
248b6(mdo sde): to// bcom ldan 'das dga' bar bgyid ga mgu bar bgyid pa'i mtshan ma rgya chen po 'di lta bu 'di dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rgyan thams cad kyis
248b7(mdo sde): brgyan par gyur pa gda' ba 'di su'i snga bltas lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di na mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa ri'i rgyal po spos dang ldan nas 'khor mi 'a
248b8(mdo sde): ci stong phrag du ma dang / 'khar stong phrag du ma dang / 'khor lha stong phrag du ma dang / 'ong ba de'i snga blta so// de skad gsungs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de la mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon
249a1(mdo sde): ba sil snyan dang / glu dbyas len pa brgyad dri bani stong dang / 'khor brgya stong du mas bskor nas/ steng gi bar snang la me tog gi chu bo'i char 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das/ 
249a2(mdo sde): ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga
249a3(mdo sde): 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa bdag nyid kyis pi bang gi khog pa bai DUr+ya las byas pa/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi bsam le'u can/ sa le
249a4(mdo sde): sbram dang / nor bu dang / rin po che du mas spras pa/ sngon gyi lus kyi rnam par smin pas yongasu sbyangs pa blangs te/ sil snyan brgyad khri bzhi stong pa de dag dang lhan cig tu grags
249a5(mdo sde): par byed do// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos pi bang de blang / sa ma thag tu de nas pi bang gi sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur
249a6(mdo sde): to/ pi wang gi sgra des 'dod pa na spyod pa'i rgyud kyi sgra dang / glu'i sgra dang / lha'i glu dbyangs kyi sgra rnams zil gyis gnan te mi gsal bar gyur to// de nas bi thang gi sgra des bskul bas
249a7(mdo sde): 'dod pa na spong ba'i lta'i bu de dag gis lha'i rol ma ber te bcom ldan 'das go la bder lhag so// mi'am ci'i rgyal ba sdong thos pi wang de blangs ma thag tu nas stong gsum gyi
249a8(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di shing dang / ri'i rgyal po rab dang / gangs can dang / spos kyi ngang ldang dang / btang thung dang / gtang zung chen po dang / de ma yin pa gzhan ri dag po
249b1(mdo sde): rnams dang / rtsa dang shing gel pa dang / sman dang nags tshal ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ldeg rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldego// g.yo rab tu g.yo/ kun tu rab tu g.yo/ 'gul rab tu 'gul to// 
249b2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na chang gis ra ro ba'i mi 'khyor rab tu 'khor kun tu rab tu 'khyor ba de bzhin du/ shing de dag thams cad dang / ri thams cad kyang 'dud/ rab tu 'dud/ kun tu rab tu 'dud// mi 'am ci'i rgyal
249b3(mdo sde): po sdong pos pi wang khog pa bai DUr+ya las byas pa blangs ma thag tu/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus pa'i nang nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs
249b4(mdo sde): pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge ston dang / dge snyon ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnang sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / rnam pa'i lding dang / maM las ci dang / wA/ 
249b5(mdo sde): 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang mi ma yis dang / rnam par thar pa brgya/  la bsam gtan pa'i dgra bcom pa dang / thams cad dang ldan
249b6(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor gyis pi thang gi sgra de thos pa dang / pi thang gi sgra de ma bzod nas rang rang gi stan las langs te/ 'dar rab tu 'dar/ kun tu rab tu 'dar ro// 'dud rab tu 'dud/ kun tu rab tu 'dud/ 
249b7(mdo sde): gar byed rab tu gar byed/ kun tu rab tu gar byed do// nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi stan la mi dga' ste/ 'gul rab tu 'gul zhing spyod lam yang 'khrugs nas byis
249b8(mdo sde): pa chung ngu bzhin du gar byed pa lta bur ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis/ nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa nyan thos chen po dag
250a1(mdo sde): nyon mongs dang bral ba/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/ bden pa bzhi mthong bar gyur pa yin na ci'i phyir rang gi lus 'jog par mi nus shing / tshe dang / 
250a2(mdo sde): ldan pa dag byis pa chung ngu bzhin du gar byed pa lta bur ston/ nyan thos chen po de dag gis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos pi wang 'di blangs pa dang / sil snyan dang
250a3(mdo sde): glu dbyangs sbyar bas pi wang gi sgra des bdag cag la dbang med par bdag gi lus rang rang gi stan la 'dug par mi dga' zhing 'dar rab tu 'angar kun tu rag tu 'angar te/ sems rnam par
250a4(mdo sde): bzhag par yang ma nus so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis/ gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smra so// btsun pa 'od srung chen po rgas
250a5(mdo sde): gtugs 'khogs pa 'dod pa nyung ba/ cho ga shos pa sbyang sa pa'i yon tan 'dzin pa/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten du gyur pa yin na/ ci'i phyir rang gi lus 'dzin par
250a6(mdo sde): mi nus shing gnas brtan du gyur byis pa chung ngu bzhin du gar byed pa lta bur ston/ gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ rigs kyi du dper na rlung rnam par 'thor byed langs pa na/ shing dang
250a7(mdo sde): nags dang ri thams cad 'di ltar bdag rnam par bzhag pa'i stobs med mthu med/ de dag thams cad mi 'dod bzhin du g.yo rab tu g.yo// 'gul rab tu 'gu'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du gang
250a8(mdo sde): 'di mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas pi wang blangs pa de'i sgra thos pas/ bdag cag rlung rnam par 'thor byed kyis ri chen po bdas pa bzhin du bdag 'dzin ma nus par gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na skyes
250b1(mdo sde): bu dam pa 'di'i smon lam dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi khyad par ni 'di lta ste/ des nyan thos kyi bsod nams dang ye shes dang / gzi brjid thams cad zil gyis non to// byang chub sems dpa'
250b2(mdo sde): cod pan gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dpal dang / gzi brjid dang / stobs la gang gi phyir pi wang gi sgra des bskul ba'am/ sgyud/ 
250b3(mdo sde): par mi nus pas/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi skyed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang nyi tshe ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams kyi stobs
250b4(mdo sde): dang dgazi brjid de ni pi wang gi sgra 'dis zil gyis non to// gang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi stobs dang / gzi brjid de la ni zil gyis gnon par mi nus pa ltos// de nas mi
250b5(mdo sde): 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas pi wang gi sgra de sgrog pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i sngon gyi/ smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis pi thang de dang sil snyan brgya
250b6(mdo sde): bri bzhi stong po de dag las kyang tshigasu bcad pa 'di dge byung ngo // tha ma 'bring dang de bzhin mchog rnams kyi// chos rnams thams cad mnyam zhing chos rnams dben// zhi ba stong pa mi 'gyur
250b7(mdo sde): 'khrug pa med// bzod nas dag ste dri med na mkha' bzhin// gang dag da ltar gyi dang 'das pa yi// sems can kun mnyam sems can sems can med// sems can skad du sgra rnams 'brung
250b8(mdo sde): ba yang // chos kyi sgra dang mtshungs te de yang med// zhing rnams thams cad zhing mnyam zhing min te// bar snang dang ni mtshungs shing mnyam par snang // 'phel ba ma yin mi bzad ma skyes te// gsog
251a1(mdo sde): gsob na mkha' lta bur rnam par dag/ sangs rgyas kun mnyam sangs rgyas sangs rgyas min// chos dbyings nges par 'dres pa med pa ste/ tshul khrims shes rab ye shes rnam
251a2(mdo sde): grol mnyam/ mtshan nyid gcig ste mtsham mnyam mtshan nyid med/ nyom mongs thams cad nyon mongs ma yin grol// tog dang rtog pa kun rtog rnam par rtog nang na sgrub ma yin phyi rol min/ 
251a3(mdo sde): 'du shes mdud pa phyin ci log las gyur// rnam par rtog pas chos dbyings ming btags pa// ming de nyid kyang gzhan min de bzhin min// ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin rjes rtogs pa// de dag
251a4(mdo sde): rtag tu mi chags 'jig rten spyod// gang rnams 'das pa'i bde gshegs grangs med pa// de dag gis ni gang gsungs chos mang po// gzod nas zad cing dengs dang 'jig las dben// de dag
251a5(mdo sde): yul dang phyogasu 'gro ma yin// chos 'di dag ni yi ge las byung ste// yi ge de dag sems can zad pa'i chos// yi ge zad/ pa'i chos nyid shes pas na// chos rnams kun la
251a6(mdo sde): rnam par rtog mi byed// sems kyi rgyud ni rgyud mnyam rgyud ma yin// rang bzhin gzhan dang gzhan te chags pa med// sems dang sems thung chos mtha' med shes pas// 'phags pa rnams
251a7(mdo sde): ni mnyam pa'i chos la 'jug/ mtha' dang mtha' med kun chad rnam par chad// thog ma tha ma par ma mnyam par gyur// dus gsum dag ni dben pa shes pa mnyam// shes pa de yang mtha'
251a8(mdo sde): yod ma yin no// skye bo rtag tu ming dang gzugs la chags// mtha' dang mtha' med lta bas gos pa rnams// sku dang rkyen las byung bar shes pas na// bdag dang sems can rnam par
251b1(mdo sde): rtog ma yin// bdag las ldang ba rtag tu ldang ba ma yin// chos dkun ni spang ba med pa ste// gang dag ldang dang ldang ba med rtogs pa// de dag bzod ma mnyam nyid rje su 'thun// chos kun tu
251b2(mdo sde): tu bdag med rang bzhin te// sprin dang klog dang na mkha' lta bu gsog/ bdag dang sems can rtag tu rang bzhin stong // 'di ni gzungs kyi phyag rgyas 'jug pa yin// mtshan nyid gcig
251b3(mdo sde): ste mtshan mnyam mtshan med par// gang gi thar pa'i sgo gsum rnam rtogs nas// thug pa med pa'i chos rnams ston byed kyang // chos la yongasu rtog pa mi byed do// tha ma 'bring dang / 
251b4(mdo sde): de bzhin mchog rnams kyang // chos 'di dag ni yi ge rnams kyis brjod// yi ge rnams la rnam par rtog mi byed// de lta bur ni don rnams bshad pa yin// don dang tshig
251b5(mdo sde): 'bru gnyis la mi 'jug ste// gnyis med rtag tu don ni sgra dang bral// gang gis mtha' ni dben par shes gyur pa// de yi sngon gyi mtha' ni nye bar chad// gang dag sngon mtha' nye bar/ 
251b6(mdo sde): chad pa rnams// grol ba'i don du 'dus byas rnams la spyod// yang dag mtha' ni rtag tu mtha' med shes// de yi byams dang snying rje shin tu dag/ gang gi byams dang snying rje rnam dag pa/ 
251b7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba mtshungs mnyam sbyor// rgod dang khengs pa ma yin brtan pa yin// skyes bu mchog ni don gyi go cha shes// chos kyi tshul 'di zhi zhing bden pa ste// 'chang ban/ 
251b8(mdo sde): ni dga' ba 'thob par 'gyur// nam yang 'phel ba med cing 'bri ba med// chos nyid 'di ni rang 'dzin med cing zhi// bar snang lam gyi sgra ni gzung med de// gang gi bshad pa med kyang grag par bcu
252a1(mdo sde): gang gis bshad dang gang la bshad pa rnams// de dag thams cad brdzun pa ya ma rma// tshig su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di bshad pa na// byang chub sems dpa'
252a2(mdo sde): brgyad stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tshig su bkum
252a3(mdo sde): pa 'di lta bu 'di dag ga las byung / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la dris shig dang / des de'i lan glon par 'gyur ro// de nas byang
252a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la 'di skad ces smraso// mi 'am ci'i bdag po tshig su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di dag ga lu byung / smras pa/ 
252a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad ga la sa 'byung ba las zung ngo // smras pa mi 'am ci'i bdag po sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad ga las 'byung // smras pa rigs
252a6(mdo sde): kyi bu sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad ni na mkha' las 'byung ngo // smras pa mi 'am ci'i bdag po sems can rnams kyi sgra skad khong ba'i nang nas mi 'byung ngam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam
252a7(mdo sde): du sems/ sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad lus kyi khong nas 'byung ngam/ 'on te sems las 'thung // smras pa/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po lus las kyang ma yin/ sems las kyang ma yin no// de
252a8(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus ni bems po g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ rtsa dang bong ba dang / cig pa dang / shing dang / mig yor lta bu'o// sems ni gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa thogs pa med pa
252b1(mdo sde): rnam par rig pa med pa ste/ sbru ma lta bu'o// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu lus dang sems ma gtogs par gzhan gang nas sgra 'thung bar 'gyur/ sbas pa/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po sems can rnams kyi sgra
252b2(mdo sde): ni yid la byed pa las 'byung bar btag so// smras pa/ gal te na mkha' med na smra ga las 'byung / smras pa/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po namapa' ma gtogs par gzhan gang nas sgra 'thung bar
252b3(mdo sde): 'gyur/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir rnam grangs 'dis sgra'i tha snyad gang ji snyed 'byung ba de dag thams cad ni/ na mkha' las byung bar rig par bya'o// nam pa'i ngo bo nyid ni sgra ste/ 
252b4(mdo sde): rnam par rig ma thag tu 'gag go// 'gags nas/ na mkha'i ngo bo nyid du yang dag par gnas so// de'i phyir chos thams cad ni na mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ste rnam par rig
252b5(mdo sde): pa med pa/ rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin mod kyi/ sgra dang sgra'i brdas brjod do// brjod pa de yang tha snyad do// gang smras brjo dpa 'di 'dra bar rab tu shes pa de ni chos gang la yang mngon
252b6(mdo sde): par mi chags so// gang mngon par mi chags pa de ni rnam par mi 'phro'o// gang rnam par mi 'phro ba de ni mi 'khor ro// gang mi 'khor ba de ni mi phyed pa'o// gang mi phyed pa de ni mi skye'o// / 
252b7(mdo sde): gang mi skye ba de mi 'jig par 'dod do// gang mi 'jig pa de dang ba'o// gang dang bde dag pa'o// gang dag pa de dri ma med pa'o// gang dri ma med pa de 'od gsal ba'o// gang 'od gas
252b8(mdo sde): bde sems kyi rang bzhin no// sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de 'jug pa'o// gang 'jug pa de mtshan ma thams cad gnon pa'o// gang mtshan ma thams cad gnon pa de skyon med/ 
253a1(mdo sde): pa la 'jug pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob pa ste/ de na skyon med pa la zhugs/ 
253a2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bya'o// gang bzod pa thob pa des thams cad bzod de/ de stong par yang bzod de gang zag du yang bzod de/ de ci'i phyir
253a3(mdo sde): zhe na/ gang zag las stong pa gzhan ma yin te/ gang zag nyid stong pa'o// de mtshan mar yang bzod/ de mtshan ma med par yang bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na// mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid
253a4(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa'o// de smon par yang bzod// de smon par me dad par bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ smon lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan ma smon pa med pa'o// de sems cad thams
253a5(mdo sde): rang bzhin gyis yongasu mya ngan las 'das par yang bzod/ de sems can rnams 'chi 'pho ba dang skye bar yang bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'chi 'pho dang skye ba ni sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid do// 
253a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de ltar mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'gal ba med ste/ chos thams cad dang 'gal ba med pa yin no// bdag bzod pa'i rjesu 'gro yang / sems
253a7(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi rjesu 'gro bas kyang 'gro'o// bdag bzod pa'i rjesu 'gro yang / chos thams cad kyi rje su 'gro bas kyang 'gro ste/ 'ong ba yang med/ 'gro ba yang med do// chos thams ca
253a8(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings la gnas par yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ji ltar chos kyi dbyings gnas pa de ltar sems can thams cad gnas te/ gang gis gnas pade 'thob
253b1(mdo sde): ba gnas med pa'i tshul gyis rjesu thob pa de'i sgra'i brda'i tha snyad kyi nye bar bzung nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni gang gis kyang brjod pa'am/ 
253b2(mdo sde): bsnyad pa 'am/ bstan par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don de ni brjod du med pa/ sgra med pa/ bshad du med pa yin yang brjod du med pa'i don brjod pas bstan pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu de bani/ 
253b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i che ba nyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lta'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kye mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'di
253b4(mdo sde): tsam du chos zab mo la bzod pa ston par spobs pa dang / 'di lta bur rgya che ba'i yul la nye bar spyod cing long spyod par 'byor pa dang / chos ston pas zab mo'i bzod pa 'di 'di lta bu dang ldan
253b5(mdo sde): pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba
253b6(mdo sde): bskrun na/ des 'di spobs pa 'di lta bu grub par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams skar ma'i gzugs ji snyed pa de
253b7(mdo sde): dge ni// bgrang ba'i tshul gyis tshad zin pa nus kyi/ mi'amatsha'i rgyal po ljon pa 'dis/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa dang / thar med pa yang dag
253b8(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub btsal ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi gnan/ tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
254a1(mdo sde): de dag ni tshad gzung bar mi nus te/ des na 'da'i stobs pa 'di 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lta tsad par gyis/ mi 'am tsha'i rgyal ba ljon pa la 'di skad ce
254a2(mdo sde): smras so// myi 'am ci'i bdag po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po de dag las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po de lta bu/ 
254a3(mdo sde): bsdoms pas ci bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
254a4(mdo sde): rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par sgrub pa na/ gang / dag gis nam du yang ngoms par mi 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi ngoms pa bcu gnyis po 'di dag ste/
