254a5(mdo sde): bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya bas mi ngoms pa dang / chos mnyan sa mi ngoms pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung bas mi ngoms pa
254a6(mdo sde): dang chos rgya cher rab tu bstan pas mi ngoms pa dang / sems can yongasu srid par bya bas mi ngoms pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrub pas mngoms pa dang dgon pa la gnas pas mi
254a7(mdo sde): mas pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongasu bskang bas mi ngoms pa dang / ye shes mngon par rab tu dang zhing yong su smin par bya bas mi ngoms pa dang / chos nges par sems shing tshul/ 
254a8(mdo sde): bzhin la rab tu sbyor bas mi ngoms pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yong su btsal bas mi ngas pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub bas mngams
254b1(mdo sde): pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par sgrub pa na/ gang dag gis nam du yang ngoms par mi 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi ngoms pa/ 
254b2(mdo sde): bcu gnyis te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa la mi ngoms pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la mi 'am tsi'i rgyal po ljon pas 'di skad ces gso/ 
254b3(mdo sde): to/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rin po che 'byung gnas shes bgyi ba mchis te byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin de la brten na/ yon tan rin po che'i khyad pa
254b4(mdo sde): gyi chos thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba zhig bdag gis thos na/ bcom ldan 'das gang thos pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams yon tan rin po che'i khyad par gyi chos
254b5(mdo sde): 'thob par 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du byang chub sem/ sa dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che 'byung gnas de/ de bzhin gshe/ gas pas legs par bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan
254b6(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po de'i phyi ra legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che'i 'byung gnas ngas khyod la
254b7(mdo sde): bshad do// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas bcom ldan 'das la leg so zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mi
254b8(mdo sde): 'am tsa'i bdag po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog rgyun mi 'chang ba dang / chos dkon mchog rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog rgyun mi 'chad pa
255a1(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir/ sems bskyed pa rin po che brgyad cu po 'di dag la 'jug go// brgyad cu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rin po che mi brjed pa dang / lhan
255a2(mdo sde): pa'i bsam pa'i sems rin po che mi gtong ba dang / dge ba thams cad kyi sems rin po che yongasu mi 'ang ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la sbyar ba'i sems rin po che yongasu mi 'dor ba dang / 
255a3(mdo sde): yid dam la brtan pa'i sems rin po che yongasu mi 'dor ba dang / bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong ba'i sems rim po che byang chub tu yong su sngo bas rnam par smin pa la me ri ba'i sems
255a4(mdo sde): rin po che la 'jug pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa ga/ sum rnam par spongs pas lus kyi rgyan gyi sems rin pa/ da me dang / ngag gi skyon rnam pa bzhi rnam par spong bas dag/ 
255a5(mdo sde): gi rgyan gyi sems rin po che dang / brnab sems dang gnad sems dang / log par lta ba rnam par stong pas sems kyi rtse na gyi sems rin po che dang / tshul khrims ma nyams shing skyon
255a6(mdo sde): med de 'dren ma ma yin zhing / thun chags ma yin pas tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyi sems rin po che dang / sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pas khong khro ba med pa'i sems rin po che dang // 
255a7(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyis nye bar byas pa la ci mi mnyam pas bzod pa dang nges pa'i sems rin po che dang / byang chub kyi yan lag la lta bas lus dang / srog la mi lta ba'i sems rin po che
255a8(mdo sde): dang / mthon dman med pas rje su 'chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba'i sems rin po che dang / zhum pa med pas brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha'i sems rin po che dang / lhod pa med pa/ 
255b1(mdo sde): rtsom kha thams cad nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa'i sems rin po che dang / byang chub kyi lam gyi tshogs sogs pas dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / 
255b2(mdo sde): mos parjed pa med pa'i sems rin po che dang / sems la dbang byed pas bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed pa'i sems rin po che dang / 
255b3(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos sogs chos yongasu tshol ba'i sems rin po che dang / 'jigs pa med cing spobs pas thos pa'i sems rin po che dang / sdig pa 'dod pa dang bral bas zang zing med
255b4(mdo sde): par chos ston pa'i sems rin po che dang / chags pa'i sems med pas slob dpo ma chos la dpe ma bud med pa'i sems rin po che dang / nan tan snying por byed pas tshul bzhin yid
255b5(mdo sde): la byed pa'i sems rin po che dang / de ltar byed pas// ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams la nan tan du/ byed pa'i se mas rin po che dang / gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pas shes
255b6(mdo sde): rab kyis so mar rtog pa'i sems rin po che dang / sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab pas byams pa chen po'i sems rin po che dang / sems can thams cad la lta bas snying rje chen
255b7(mdo sde): po'i sems rin po che dang / chos kyi kun dga' la dga' mos pas dga' ba chen po'i sems rin po che dang / chos thams cad nges par sems pas btang snyoms chen po'i sems rin po dang / 
255b8(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs pas 'khor ba na yongasu mi skyo ba'i sems rin po che dang / bdag bde ba la mi chags pas sems can thams cad yongasu smin par byed pa'i sems ring po che dang / chos 'dzi/ 
256a1(mdo sde): pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po'i sems rin po che dang / thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pas mngon par shes pa chen po'i sems rin po che dang / ma thos pa'i chos mnyan pa'i phyir dge ba
256a2(mdo sde): gnyen la bsten pa'i sems rin po che dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sogs pas sdig pa'i grogs po spong ba'i sems rin po che dang / tha dad pa med pas sems can thams cad la sbyor ba maH
256a3(mdo sde): pa'i sems rin po che dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la 'jug pas/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad yongs su shes pa'i sems rin po che dang / sems can
256a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nang rab tu zhi bar bya ba'iphyir/ chos kyi sman thams cad yang dag par sbyor ba'i sems rin po che dang / ye shes kyi che ba nyid du 'gyur bar
256a5(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir/ ma slabs pa rnams la mi brnyas pa'i semasarin po che dang / sems can thams cad la 'dud pas nga la med pa'i sems rin po che dang / 'chos pa med pas
256a6(mdo sde): g.yo dang sgyu med pa'i sems rin po che dang / dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par byed pas chos la dga' ba'i sems rin po che dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la byas pa gzo
256a7(mdo sde): bas dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa'i sems rin po che dang / 'dza' ba brtan pa'i phyir byas pa shes shing byas pa gzo ba'i sems rin po che dang / bltos pa med pas lan du phan 'dogs
256a8(mdo sde): pa la mi re ba'i sems rin po che dang / dkar po'i phyogs srung bas dgon pa la dga' ba'i sems rin po che dang / las byas pa chud mi gzon pas rtag tu rab tu 'byung ba'i
256b1(mdo sde): sems rin po che dang / sdom pa'i spyod pa sogs pas 'phags pa'i rigs la dga' ba'i sems rin po che dang / sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pas sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams
256b2(mdo sde): cad dang / yo byad baspangs pa'i sems rin po che dang / shes rab kyis mi ngoms pas 'dod pa chung zhing chog shes pa'i sems rin po che dang / lus dang sems dben pa spong
256b3(mdo sde): zhing dben pa'i sems rin po che dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs mi ngoms pa'i sems rin po che dang / sems can thams
256b4(mdo sde): cad kyi the tsom gcad pa'i phyir ye shes kyi tshogs yongasu tshol bas mi ngoms pa'i sems rin po che dang / sangs rgyas la lta ba dang mi 'bral ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran
256b5(mdo sde): ba'i sems rin po che dang / chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba'i phyir/ chos rjes su dran pa'i sems rin po che dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun la gzhol ba'i phyir/ dge
256b6(mdo sde): 'dun rjes su dran pa'i sems rin po che dang / byang chub kyi sems las mi g.yo ba'i phyir/ tshul khrims rjesu dran pa'i sems rin po che dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs
256b7(mdo sde): 'dor bas gtong ba rjesu dran pa'i sems rin pa che dang / skye ba cig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rje su dran pa'i phyir/ lha rje su dran pa'i sems rin pa che dang mchus
256b8(mdo sde): par byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rjesu dran pa'i sems rin po che dang / don thams cad rtog pas don so so yang dag par rig pa'i sems rin po che dang / chos kyi dbyang
257a1(mdo sde): 'dres pa med pas chos so so yang dag par rig pa'i sems rin po che dang / sems can gyi tshig thams cad rtogs pas nges pa'i tshigs so yang dag par rig
257a2(mdo sde): pa'i sems rin po che dang / tshig 'bru'i rang bzhin rje su rtogs pas spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'i sems rin po che dang / rnam par shes pa sgyu ma lta bu yongasu shes pa'i tshul gyis
257a3(mdo sde): ye shes la ston pa'i sems rin po che dang / drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde'i las dang / bya ba dang 'gal bas nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rtog pa'i sems rin po che dang / gang zag gi rang bzhin
257a4(mdo sde): rjes su rtogs pas chos nyid la rton pa'i sems rin po che dang / khams gsum thams cad la mngon par zhen pas 'jigs pa'i phyir 'du byed thams cad la mi rtag pa dang / sdug
257a5(mdo sde): bsngal bar so sor rtog pa'i sems ring po che dang / sems can thams cad la bdag med pas/ chos thams cad la bung ga med par so sor rtog pa'i sems rin po che dang / 
257a6(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i sems las shin tu 'da' bas mi gtsang bar so sor rtog pa'i sems rin po che dang / shin tu zhi zhing nye bar zhi bas mya ngan las 'das pa la zhi bar so sor rtog pa'i sems
257a7(mdo sde): rin po che dang / bdud rtsi'i sgo la yang dag par gzhol bas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mos pa'i sems rin po che dang / mi skye ba'i chos
257a8(mdo sde): la bzod pa thob pas chos thams cad la ma skyes pa dang ma byung bar mos pa'i sems rin po che dang / lta ba thams cad la mngon par shes pa med pas chos thams cad la sgyu ma dang / 
257b1(mdo sde): smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / mig yor dang / rmi lam lta bur yang dag par gzhol ba'i sems rin po che dang / rtag pa dang chad pa dang bral bas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / 'thun pa'i
257b2(mdo sde): sems rin po che dang / gnyis dang bral bas mthar lta ba thams cad sel ba'i sems rin po che dang / theg pa gcig tu khong du chud pas gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i
257b3(mdo sde): sems rin po che dang / skyon med pa la 'jug pas spyod pa thams cad las ldog pa'i sems rin po che dang / chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir yang dag par skyon med
257b4(mdo sde): pa la so sor rtog pa'i sems rin po che dang / sangs rgyas rar kyi chos thams cad skye ba'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i sems rin
257b5(mdo sde): bo che dang / 'di dag ni chos rin po che brgyad cu'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag po de ltar gang chos brgyad cu phra 'di la 'jug pa dang / thob pa pa dang / nan tan
257b6(mdo sde): byed pa de ni ting nge 'dzin rin po che 'byung gnas shes bya'o// chos 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin 'das bsgrubs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang gi tshe dkon mchog 'byung
257b7(mdo sde): gnas ting nge 'dzin 'di rab tu thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ des gang la dbang thob par ma gyur pa'i rin po che 'jig rten gyi 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gang la
257b8(mdo sde): med do// mi 'am ci'i bdag po de la 'jig rten gyi rin po che ni gang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rin po che ni gang zhe na/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po de la 'jig rten gyi rin po
258a1(mdo sde): che ni 'di lta ste/ lha dang mi rnams kyi che ba nyid dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa'i che ba nyid dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i che ba nyid dang / 'khor
258a2(mdo sde): los sgyur ba'i che ba nyid dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i che ba nyid do// de de ltar lha dang me rnams kyi che ba nyid thob
258a3(mdo sde): kyang rgyags pa mi skyed/ bag med pa mi skyed do// de bag yod par gyur pas byang chub sgrub par byed pa'i chos rnams yang dag par sgrub ste/ 'di ni 'jig rten gyi rin po che
258a4(mdo sde): zhes bya'o// de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rin po che gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rin po che'o// 'jig rteg las 'das pa'i chos
258a5(mdo sde): rin po che gang zhe na/ chos gang 'jig rten las sgrol ba'o// 'jig rten las sgrol ba'i chos gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
258a6(mdo sde): shes rab ste/ shes rab kyis 'jig rten las sgrol lo// shes rab rin po che ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad bsdus te/ shes rab ni 'jig rten las 'das
258a7(mdo sde): ba'i chos thams cad kyi gtso bo yin no/ mi'am ci'i bdag po 'di lta ste dper na/ klung thams cad kyi gtso bo ni rgya mtsho chen po'o// ri thams cad kyi gtso bo ni ri'i
258a8(mdo sde): rgyal po ri rab bo// skar ma tham cad kyi gtso bo ni zla ba'o// snang ba thams cad kyi gci ba ni nyi ma'o// ri dwags thams cad kyi gtso bo ni seng ge'o// skye dgu thams cad/ 
258b1(mdo sde): kyi gtso bo ni rgyal bar// sum cu rtsa gsum pa thams cad kyi gtso ba ni brgya byin no// tshangs pa'i dbang du bya ba rnams kyi gtso ba ni tshangs pa chen por// mi 'am ci'i
258b2(mdo sde): bdag po de bzhin du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyi gcan ni shes rab ste/ de'i phyir shes rab ni chos thams cad kyi rgyal po zhes bya'o// mu stegs las
258b3(mdo sde): bsgral ba'i phyir bde bar 'gro bas lam mo// nyon mongs pa'i mun pa sel ba'i phyir sgron ma'o// g.yul las sgrol ba'i phyir dpa' ba'o// sman rab tu sbyor ba'i
258b4(mdo sde): phyir sman pa'o// bstan bcos thams cad shes raba'i phyir slob dben no// chos thams cad rigs pa'i phyir mda'o// / nyon mongs pa gcod pa'i phyir ral gro'o// nyin mongs
258b5(mdo sde): ba'i tshang tshing 'bral ba'i phyir zong gshol lo// mnyam pa'i phyir mi 'gal ba'o// 'thab pa med pa'i phyir rtsod pa med pa'o// 'byung ba med pa'i phyir mi 'gag pa'o// 
258b6(mdo sde): bden pa'i don rnams yongs su shes pas mthar thug pa'i phyir mi 'khrugs pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhog pa'i phyir dran pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams la mnyam pa nyid do// 
258b7(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bskyed pa'o// dbang po rnams sbeng ba'o// stobs rnams kyi mi rdzi ba'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rjes su rtogs pa'o// lam ston pa'o// zhi gnas
258b8(mdo sde): zhi bar byed pa'o// lhag mthong rig par byed pa'o// rab rib med pa'i phyir snang ba byed pa'o// chos kyi snang bas mun pa sel ba'o// rdul dang bral ba'i phyir rdul med pa'o// brnyas thabs
259a1(mdo sde): dang bral ba'i phyir mtho bar sems pa med pa'o// yang ba'i phyir lam las rab tu 'das pa'i phyir kun tu mthong bar byed pa'o// phyi nang dang bral ba'i phyir yul med pa'o// 
259a2(mdo sde): lta bar byas pa med pa'i phyir stong pas sgrol ba'o// rnam par rtog pa nye bar zhi ba'i phyir mtshan ma med pas rab tu phye ba'o// khams gsum pa las rnam par 'das pa'i phyir smon pa'i mtshan
259a3(mdo sde): nyid do// mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// mtshungs pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do// bdud kyi lam dang bral ba'i phyir g.yo ba dang rlom sems 'joms
259a4(mdo sde): ba'o// mi rtogs pa'i sbyin pa'o// mi gan sa pa'i tshul khrims so// rab tu mi gnas pa'i bzod pa'o// blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i brtson 'grus so// 
259a5(mdo sde): sgro btags pa med pa'i bsam gtan no// rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i sgo'i shes rab bo// thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa'o// thabs dang 'brel ba'o// sems
259a6(mdo sde): can la yang dag par gzhol ba'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'o// bya ba med pa'o// bya ba dang bral ba ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po 'di ni shes rab rin po che'o// shes rab rin
259a7(mdo sde): po che 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rin po che 'byung gnas thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des 'thob bo// 'di thob pa la ni rin po che thams cad yang dag par 'du ba yin no// mi 'am
259a8(mdo sde): ci'i bdag po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu bo thams cad kyi sgo ni rgya mtsho chen po ste/ rin po che thams cad sogs pa rin po che thams cad yang dag par 'du ba ste/ de las rin po che/ 
259b1(mdo sde): thams cad 'byung ngo // mi 'am ci'i bdag po de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin rin po che 'thung gnas thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de rin po che thams cad kyi sgo yin te/ chos rin pa che
259b2(mdo sde): thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'o// ting nge 'dzin rin po che'i 'byung gnas las dkon mchog gsum 'byung ste/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog go// 
259b3(mdo sde): de nas ting nge 'dzin rin po che 'thung gnas ni/ rin po che thams cad sogs pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cong ban gyis 'di skad
259b4(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'dis ting nge 'dzin rin po che 'byung gnas 'di thob lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// rigs/ 
259b5(mdo sde): kyi bu khyod kyis de mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la dris shig dang de khyod la ston par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal
259b6(mdo sde): po ljon pa la 'di skad ces smras so// mi le ma ci'i bdag po khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin dkon mchog 'byung gnas 'di thob bam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin 'di ni thob pa
259b7(mdo sde): 'am/ dmigs par so sa re nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// ting nge 'dzim de ni sus kyang mi thob bo// ting nge 'dzin 'di ni gzugs su bgrang ba 'am/ tshor ba 'am/ 2dra/ 
259b8(mdo sde): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bgrang ba ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin 'di ni gzugs su snang ba ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin 'di ni mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / 
260a1(mdo sde): khye dang / lus dang / yang tha rnam pa shes pa'i gzung ba ma yin/ skye ba'i mdzan nyid ma mos/ 'jig pa'i mtshan cing ma yin/ gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ma
260a2(mdo sde): yin/ rgyun 'chad pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ma yin/ mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin/ mtshan nyid ma yin/ mtshan nyid dang bral ba ma yin/ mtshan
260a3(mdo sde): nyid med pa ma men te/ brjod par bya ba yang ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin 'di ni yongasu rtogs par mi nus te/ kun tu rtogs par ma yin/ rnam par rtogs par ma yin no// 
260a4(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te ting nge 'dzin 'di yongasu / dgas pa 'am/ kun tu rtogs pa 'am/ rnam par rtogs par 'gyur na ni brtag pa'i gzhi nyid du 'gyur gyi ting nge 'dzin
260a5(mdo sde): ma yin na// rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba ni/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de dang / khro ba mnyam mo// de dang
260a6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyang mnyamo// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di dang / sems can thams cad mnyam mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad stong pa ste/ stong pa'i/ 
260a7(mdo sde): mtshan nyid ni ting nge 'dzin 'di'o// sems can thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa ste/ mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid ni ting nge 'dzin 'di'o// sems can thams cad ni smon pa med pa ste/ 
260a8(mdo sde): smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ni ting nge 'dzin 'di'o// sems can thams cad ni dbye ba ste/ dben pa'i mtshan nyid ni ting nge 'dzin 'di'o// sems can thams cad ni bdag med pa ste/ bdag/ 
260b1(mdo sde): med pa'i mtshan nyid ni ting nge 'dzi 'di'o// deni lus dang ngag dang sems kyis reg par mi nus so// gang la la dag chas la reg par byed pa dang / mnyam par byed pa dang / mngon par mnyam/ 
260b2(mdo sde): bar byed pa de dag thams cad ni// legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la nga rgyal can du bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces
260b3(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci'i rgyam po ljon pa'i spyod pa bag mchis pa 'di lta bu dang chos la spobs pa 'di lta bu ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ 
260b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu bya ba thams cad kun tu ston la bya ba thams cad kyis kyang mi gos pa 'di ni thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa'o// rigs kyi bu mi 'am
260b5(mdo sde): ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'dis rgyud kyi sgra dang glu'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa byas pa'i tshul 'dis mi 'am ci bye ba ba phrag bdun bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ 
260b6(mdo sde): byang chub tu yongasu smin par byas so// dri za bye ba phrag su ma cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu smin par byaso// lto 'phye chen po bye ba phrag bzhi bcu yang
260b7(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu smin par bya'o// rang gi 'khor gyi srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong yang byang chub tu yongasu smin par byaso// shes rab dang thabs kyi/ 
260b8(mdo sde): ye shes 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gang dang gang gi tshe/ 'khor gyi che ba nyid 'thob pa de dag de'i tshe sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa yongasu smin par byed do// rig
261a1(mdo sde): yaM bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sku med par me mi 'bar ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dben pa na gnas pa yang sems can yongasu smin par
261a2(mdo sde): bya ba mi 'bar ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyu yod na me 'bar ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye bo phal po che'i nang na 'dug na/ sems can
261a3(mdo sde): yongasu smin par bya ba 'bar ro// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ji lta ji lta bur yul dang 'khor chen po 'byor par gyur pa de lta de lta bur sems can
261a4(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa yongasu smin par byed par rigs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lta'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces
261a5(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na mi 'am ci'i rgya la po ljon pas rgyud kyi sgra dang / klu'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / pheg brdab pa bgyis pas sems can yongasu smin
261a6(mdo sde): par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu mi 'am tsi dang dri za dang lto 'phye chen po glu dang / rol ma'i dbyangs sprul mos pa rnams la mi 'am ci'i rgyal po
261a7(mdo sde): ljon pas gang gi tshe bi wang gi sgra thos par byed cing / sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs sbyor ba de ni mi 'am ci dang dri za dang // lto 'phye chen po de dag dga' ba dang / rab tu mgu ba chen po 'thos
261a8(mdo sde): zas de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / rab tu mgu ba thob nas/ rgyud kyi sgra dang / sil snyan gyi sgra dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgra de dag las sangs rgyas kyi sgra 'byung ngo // chos kyi sgra dang dag
261b1(mdo sde): 'dun gyi sgra 'byung ngo // byang chub kyi sems la dga' ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems skyed par sbyor ba'i sgra 'byung ngo // sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus
261b2(mdo sde): dang bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi sgra 'byung ngo // byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi sgra dang / dran pa nye bar gzhan pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang
261b3(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang
261b4(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgra 'byung ngo // mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba'i sgra 'byung ngo // stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dag/ 
261b5(mdo sde): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa/ dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dngos// po med pa'i sgra 'byung ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod
261b6(mdo sde): kyi chos kyi rnam grangs dang / gzugs dang / rdo rje'i tshig dang / 'khor gsum yongasu sbyong ba'i sgra 'byung ngo // phyir me ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i sgra dang / chos
261b7(mdo sde): thams cad la rnam par nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / 
261b8(mdo sde): chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / rin chen sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / rin po che 'byung gnas kyi ting
262a1(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi sgra dang / rin chen brtsegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / dga' byed ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / pad ma bkod pa'i
262a2(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / pad ma bla ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar ma
262a3(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / khyad par can gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / rnam par rgyal bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / cher bsgyings ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / rnam pa la sems dbang byed
262a4(mdo sde): cing ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / seng ge bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / nyi ma'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / mtha' yas 'khyil ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / rgyun gyi rjesu song ba'i
262a5(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ting nge 'dzim gyi sgra dang / rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / rdo rje lha dbu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / rdo rje lte ba'i ting nge 'dzin
262a6(mdo sde): gyi sgra dang / sa 'dzin ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / lhun po sprin ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / lhun po rgyal mtshan ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / rin chen mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / sems
262a7(mdo sde): la dbang byed ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / spyod pa thams cad kyi yul las nges par 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
262a8(mdo sde): sgra dang / zab mo sbed par sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / spobs pa sna tshogs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / bltar mi mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / chos thams cad la rnam
262b1(mdo sde): bar lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad las nges par 'byung ba'i ting 'dzin gyi sgra dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor
262b2(mdo sde): 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / gzugs thams cad kun tu ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / sgra thams cad la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / lus thams cad rnamapa
262b3(mdo sde): gzhig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / spyod pa thams cad la dbang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / shes rab smon pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / lag na sgron me'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
262b4(mdo sde): sgra dang / byang chub mngon sum snang byed ting nge 'dzin/ gyi sgra dang // so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa ston pa/ 'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang / yon tan gyi rnam pa thams
262b5(mdo sde): cad la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu de ltar rgyud kyi sgra dang / sil snyan gyi sgra dang / gla dbyangs kyi sgra de dag las chos kyi sgra ring dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra 'byung// 
262b6(mdo sde): sgra de dag gis sems can de dag yongasu smin par byed du 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'di lta bu dang ldan
262b7(mdo sde): pa yin no// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i yon tan bsngags pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi lag par lha'i me tog man dar ba'i
262b8(mdo sde): bur ma thung nas// de dag gis me tog gi pung de dag mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la gtor to// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas byin gyi brlabs ci lta bus me tog de dag lag
263a1(mdo sde): pa g.yas pas blangs te/ me tog gcig kyang sa la mi ltung ba de lta bu'i byin gyis rlabs byin gyi rlabs nas/ me tog blangs pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
263a2(mdo sde): gtor to// de nas me tog de dag gtor ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus skad cig de la stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis bebs par 'gyur to// me tog rten
263a3(mdo sde): che'i gdugs de las mu tig gi rgyan phreng bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong rab tu 'byung ngo // mu tig gi rgya mabreng mu tig gi 'bru de thams cad las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya
263a4(mdo sde): stong du mthung ba// 'od zer thams cad kyi rtse mo nas kyang pad+ma sna tshogs blta na sdug pa kha dog dang ldan pa dri dang ldan pa/ yad du 'ong ba dag byung bar gyur to// pad+ma thams cad la/ 
263a5(mdo sde): yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku ci 'dra ba'i de bzhin// gshegs pa'i sku skyil mo krung bcas shing bzhugs par/ kun tu snang ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
263a6(mdo sde): dag thams cad kyis kyang mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la legaso zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis sems can mang po yongasu smin par byas so// sems can yongasu smin
263a7(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir/ gang yul las rnam par grol yang yul thams cad kyang ston/ 'khor ba las grol yang bsams bzhin du srid par skye ba kun tu ston/ mya ngan las 'das
263a8(mdo sde): ba'i skyon med pa thob kyang / khams gsum na nye bar spyod pa 'di lta ni byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba byed pa yin te/ leg so legs so// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sngon pas
263b1(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi dbu la rin po che'i gdugs gzhan dag byin gyis brlab bo snyam mo// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon/ 
263b2(mdo sde): pa de'i tshe/ rin po che'i gdugs bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa rin po che'i gdugs bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms
263b3(mdo sde): par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbu'i drang thad kyi steng na/ rin po che'i gdugs rnams gnas pa kun tu snang ngo // 'khor de thams cad kyi lag
263b4(mdo sde): g.yas pa nas kyang rin po che'i gdugs rnams byung bar gyur to// de dag gis rin po che'i gdugs de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la mngon par bkab bo// 
263b5(mdo sde): de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg/ nyes pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
263b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas par bshos la spyan drangs te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas par ri'i rgyal po dang
263b7(mdo sde): ldang du bdag gi gnas su gshegs par gsol lo// de ltar na bdag gi gnas yongasu spyad par 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
263b8(mdo sde): dang kun su pa la lding dang sa mi 'am tsaM dang / lho phye chen po'i tshogs tshad med pa la phan btags par yang 'gyur ra// de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang
264a1(mdo sde): yongs su spyad pa bya bar spro bar 'gyur ro// de'i phyir de dag gi yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / grub pa dang / bde ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
264a2(mdo sde): sgrub pa 'thob par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 
264a3(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba dang / sems can tshad ma mchis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba spel ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa/ 
264a4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu ri spos kyi ngad ldang gi ngos la bdag gi gnas su dgung
264a5(mdo sde): bdun zhig bzhugs par bdag la gnang ba mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni de bzhin/ gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur dang
264a6(mdo sde): yongasu spyad pa bgyi bar smra'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas
264a7(mdo sde): par zhag bdun ri spos kyi ngad ldang gi ngos la bzhugs par gnang ngo // de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar rig nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rang
264a8(mdo sde): shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ sras dang gnyen mdab dang g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gzu/ 
264b1(mdo sde): bskor ba byas te gsil snyan dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nas sobanas// ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngadang ldang la gnas// 
264b2(mdo sde): de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi slad du/ rang gi khyim rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ 'khor gyi khyams rgyar khor yug du dpag tshad lnga brgya pa
264b3(mdo sde): baiDUr+ya sngon po dang / 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi pad+mas legs par brgyan pa/ rin po che du mas rnam par spras pa byas so// 'bor gyi byams der gdan khri rtsa ba rin po che las byas pa/ 
264b4(mdo sde): lha'i ras bcos bu brgya stong bting ba brgya stong // phrag mang po bshams so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan se/ ge'i khri 'bang du dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa/ rin po che thams
264b5(mdo sde): cad kyis spras pa/ rin po che'i kha khyer gyis bskor ba/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ snying po mchog gi bdug pa gdugs pa/ bla re bres pa/ dar gyi lda ldi mang po sa
264b6(mdo sde): pa lha'i me tog gtor ba bsham so// seng ge'i khri de'i phyogs bzhir rin po che'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs blta na sdug pa bzhi sprul ste/ skye bo thams cad bsdus nas/ tshig su bcad pa 'di
264b7(mdo sde): dag smras so// u dum pa ra'i me tog ji bzhin du// sangs rgyas 'byung ba brgya lam rnyed 'gyur ba// mi mchog de ni da ltar byung gyur gyis// skyob la gus dang bcas pas mchod
264b8(mdo sde): bar gyis// nga rgyal dag dang rgyags dpag ya spangs la// phra dag ser sna bzhir sku rnams dang // rgod pa thams cad ying su spong byas la// ston la gus dang bcas pas/ 
265a1(mdo sde): / mchod bgyis// thos pa ldang ba'adir lha yul ba'i/ me tog khyang bar 'phags pa'i snyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas su maskyes bu yumachog
265a2(mdo sde): la ni mchod pa gyis// sems can mchog la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir// dri zhim yid 'ong khyad par 'phags pa'i dri// dus kyi rjesu 'brang ba'i tsen dan gyis// spos kyi ngad ldang 'di la
265a3(mdo sde): bdugs pa gyis// glu dbyangs sa'i snyan rnam mang yid bong ga/ mi 'am ci'i ngag rtag rtsen gar byed pa// ldan par byos la dga' zhing dang ba yis// rkang gnyis mchog la mchod pa
265a4(mdo sde): rab tu gyis// mtshungs pa med pa mthong ba rnyed dka' ba// de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi gdugs rnams dang // ba dan dag drang rgyal mtshan chos gos dang // bla re dmar po yid
265a5(mdo sde): 'od gzung bar byos// sangs rgyas mchod pas bde 'gror/ 'gro bar 'gyur// brgya byin dang ni 'jig rten skyong bar 'gyur// tshangs pa dag dang dbang byed dbang phyug dang // lha dang
265a6(mdo sde): mi yi bdag po chen por 'gyur// mi mchog mchod pas gzugs dang kha dog dang // thugs dang brjod dang 'khor dang longs spyod dang // de bzhin dbang phyug dang ni mnyan tshig dang // de/ 
265a7(mdo sde): bzhi gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig tu 'gyur// gang dag 'dir ni lha dang de bzhin du// mi rnams kyi ni 'dus byas bde ba dang // bde ba bde bas tshim par 'dod pa rnams// 'jig rten mgon po de
265a8(mdo sde): la mchod pa gyis// rang rgyal byang chub de bzhin nyan thos dang // de ltar dam pa mchog gi theg pa dang // bdud kyi dpung rnams rab 'joms gang 'dod pas// sems can mchog de la ni
265b1(mdo sde): mchod pa gyis// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas// rang gi g.yog 'khor thams cad la go byas te// me tog dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / brug pa brdogs nas ro brgya ba'i zhal zas bshams te/ 
265b2(mdo sde): ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang gi lho phyogs kyi ngos la 'dug nas/ sil snyan dang glu dbyangs te/ rgyud kyi sgra dang / glu'i sgra dang / ldan pa'i tshigasu bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
265b3(mdo sde): la gdugs tshod 'ab pa/ phan pa mdzad cing dga' mdzad pa mdzad bcom ldan 'das// zhal ni rab 'dzum zla ba'i ngos ltar dri mi mnga'// skyes mchog dge sbyong dam pa lha dang mis mchod pa/ 
265b4(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs khyod 'dir gshegs pa yi dus 'di lags// stobs bcu rnams kyi stobs mnga' pha rol dpung 'joms pa// gzhan gyi cho ga sa 'joms zhing 'gro la phan pa mdzad/ 
265b5(mdo sde): ma 'khrugs ma rtogs dri ma thab rab spangs pa// phan pa mdzadakha khyod 'dir gshegs pa'i dus 'di lags// sbyangs ba'i yon tan rdul sbyangs the tshom rnam par gtor
265b6(mdo sde): dran dang blo gros blo yangs mos rtogs blo gros ldan// 'gro rgyal rtag tu 'gro ba spangs// phan pa mdzad cing rab tu dgyes pa'i thugs// nyi ma zla ba nor bu glog rnams mdzes pa'i
265b7(mdo sde): 'od pa brgya byin tshangs pa srid gsum lha tshogs 'od 'phrog cing / 'di mdzad dpal stug thub byod 'od ni phar 'gyid pas// 'od 'di bsal nas rgyal ba'i 'od ni lhag ge'o// khyod kyi
265b8(mdo sde): lha skad klu skad mi'am ci'i glu smra yis// yang dang yang du 'bar ba'i nyon mongs zhi bar 'gyid// skad mchog yangs pa tshangs pa rnams kyi sgra skad kyis// nyon mongs thams cad ni
266a1(mdo sde): 'gying bas 'bar ma lags// sman pa gang dag phyogs bcur rgyu yang de dag gis// gang du'ang 'gro ba'i nyon mongs zhi bar bgyid mi nus// sman pa'i rgyal po bla med
266a2(mdo sde): gang tshe gsung brjod pa// de'i tshe nyon mongs kun ni bde ba thams cad smin// shin tu ngo mtshar 'od dang stobs mchog mtshungs med stobs/ gsung ni skyon bral 'phrul pa mi mnga' dgra 'dul/ 
266a3(mdo sde): ba rdul med rab rib dag gi mun pa shin tu bcom// dgra bral phan mdzad khyod kyis dus lags 'dir gshegs gsol// sbyin dang dul dang legs spyod mi mnyam mtshungs dang mnyam
266a4(mdo sde): tshul khrims brtul zhugs mi 'khrugs brtul zhugs dka' thub brtson// bzod dang dul dang shin tu dge la nges pa'i thugs// dga' gsungs dgra rnams kyis ni dga' spong gsheg su gsol
266a5(mdo sde): dbang po stobs dang lam dgyes bsam gtan mngon mkhyen ro// la// dran dang blo gros rtogs dang mos la gnas pa'i// thugs// 'od ni rab tu lhag ge shin tu dgyes pa'i thugs// 
266a6(mdo sde): yon tan mnga' ba khyod 'dir gshegs pa'i dus 'di lags// byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms bsgoms pa'i thugs// skyon gyi mun pa bcom zhing bag la nyal dang bral/ 
266a7(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i lam ni rab bslabs rgyal ba'i lam la gnas// dga' mdzad bde bar gshegs pa dus lag gshegasu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal
266a8(mdo sde): bldan pas gdugs chod phab pa'i tshigasu bcad palasan nas dge slong gi ga dun la bka' stsal ga/ dge slong dag mi 'amatsho'i rgyal ba ljon pas gdugs tshang pabakyis ltung dang / 
266b1(mdo sde): chos gos thogs la zhag bdun gnas pa'i gtsug lag khang skyong yang skos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' lce'i cod pan 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bdag gis khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa
266b2(mdo sde): 'di lta bu sprul la khang pa brtsegs pa der bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas par bzhugs te/ rin po che bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa'i khang pa
266b3(mdo sde): brtsegs pa bdag gis lag pa g.yas par blangs te/ namapo'i ngos las ri'i rgyal po smos kyi ngang ldang du dkur bar byin gyis brlab bo snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lta cod pan de'i tshe
266b4(mdo sde): 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ting nge 'dzin de lta sa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar khang pa brtsegs pa tshad dpag tshad bcu pa/ bkra ba
266b5(mdo sde): blta na sdug pa gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bani zug pa/ cha mnyam pa/ na tu rnam par bye ba byung // khang pa brtsegs pa der stobs/ dang ldan pa'i pad+ma bkod pa'i khri rnams kyang byung // khang pa
266b6(mdo sde): brtsegs pa der bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan rin po che'i pad+ma bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri 'phang du mi bdun yod pa thung // de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa dang / 
266b7(mdo sde): seng ge'i dri'i dkod pa 'di lta bu 'di byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag la thugs rtse ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos chen po 'di
266b8(mdo sde): ngag dang thabs cig tu khang pa brtsegs pa seng ge'i khri bshams pa 'dir bzhugasu gsol bcom ldan 'das bdag gis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di sug pa g.yas pa blangs te/ ri'i rgyal po spos
267a1(mdo sde): kyi ngad ldang du 'tshal nas bzhag par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos chen/ 
267a2(mdo sde): po de dag dang thabs gcig tu khang brtsegs pa der/ ji ltar khri bshams pa de la bzhug so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis khang pa brtsegs pa de lag mthil g.yas par blangs te/ 
267a3(mdo sde): steng gi namakha' las rdzu 'phrul gyis song ngo // de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul 'a
267a4(mdo sde): mthong nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems da ba' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan la mchod
267a5(mdo sde): ba'i las kyi phyir/ me tog dang bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / khrug pa thams cad thogs te/ sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das khang brtsegs pa na bzhugs shing / rnam pa'i ngos la
267a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa la mchod pa byas te 'ong rgyal po sngob kyi dang thang du phyin to// mi 'amachi'i rgyal ba ljon pas bcom ldan 'das pang pa brtsegs pa na bcugs shing rnam pa'i ngas las gshegs pa mthong po/ 
267a7(mdo sde): mthong nas mi'am ci dang / drin brgyad khri ba ni phung gis bskor te/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / thug pa thams cad thogs nas sil stan dang / khe ba dob pa dang / glu dbyangs len pa'i bkod 'byas
267a8(mdo sde): mam ldan 'das pasu pa byor byung / de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal ba ldan pa'i bung dang bcas 'bar dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mag pas phyog 'tshal nasang ltar rdzogs pa med kyi
267b1(mdo sde): / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang phreng ba dang / drug pa de dag dang / sil snyan dang / beb rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs len pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdugs tshod la/ 
267b2(mdo sde): dbabs mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten spong ba dang / de ma yin pa gzhan lha'i bu rnams dang thabs gcig tu mi 'am ci'i rgyal ba/ 
267b3(mdo sde): ljon pa'i 'khor gyi khams bkod pa ga la ba der gshegs te/ rang gi seng ge'i khri ji ltar bshams pa la bzhug so// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad kyang so so ci
267b4(mdo sde): rigs par 'khod do// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la smras pa/ grogs po dag de
267b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig tu gdugs chod gsol gyis/ khyed thams cad 'dus la tshur spyon/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa sbas dang bcas/ bu dang bcas gnyen mdab dang
267b6(mdo sde): bcas/ 'khor dang bcas g.yog dang bcas te/ rang gi lag gis bza' ba dang bca' ba gya nom pa mang po ro dang ldan pa/ ro brgya pa'i zhal zas sna tshogs bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge
267b7(mdo sde): 'dun dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun dang 'khor la brims nas/ ci bde bar bstabs te/ tshim par byaso// tshim par byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed bzhag ste/ phyag bcabs par rig nas dpung dang
267b8(mdo sde): bcas/ g.yog dang bcas te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ji ltar bdag la 'os pa'i stan la 'dug// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa dang / skye bo bal po che de/ 
268a1(mdo sde): kha chos kyi gtam yang dag par ston to// yang dag par 'dzin du bcug yang dag par gzeng bstod do// yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad/ de la bcom ldan das kyi chos kyi gtam ni sa
268a2(mdo sde): yin te/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa yin rnam pa sum cu cu gnyis gang zhe na mibam ci'i bdan pa
268a3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa ma byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro bas/ sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang theg pa dman pa spang ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / spong ba la zhe snang ba med pa'i sem
268a4(mdo sde): kyis sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang len pa rnams la sbyin gnasu 'du shes rabaskyed/ sbyin pade sbyin pa dang / len pa rnams la dge ba'i bshes pa nyen du 'du shes bskyed de/ sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang nang gi sun
268a5(mdo sde): nas nyon mongs pa'i dri ma spangs te/ sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / kun tu 'dzi na pa med pa'i sems kyis dga' ba dang / dang ba dang mchog tu dga' ba thob nas sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / lag brkyang ste lhag par
268a6(mdo sde): gtong ba rnam par gtong ba la dga' bas/ sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / rgya chen po la mos te zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / skye ba thams cad la mi gnas par sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / rnam par smin
268a7(mdo sde): ba la re ba med par sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / lan la re ba med pa'i blos sbyin pa de sbyin pa sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba'i blos sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shesu bsngos te sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / gdung ba med
268a8(mdo sde): ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po sngon du 'og bas sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / bdag sems can yongasu sbyin par byed par 'gyur zhes sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / bdag chos 'dzin par 'gyur/ 
268b1(mdo sde): nes sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang dang 'thun par 'gyu ro zhes sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / bdag bdud kyi phyogs tshar gcod par 'gyuro zhes sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / bdag byang chub
268b2(mdo sde): kyi sems rnam par sbyong bar 'gyu ro zhes sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / bdag skyes bu dam pa'i las byed par 'gyu ro zhes sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / bdag yi dwags kyi lam rnam par spong bar 'gyu ro zhes sbyin pa de sbyin
268b3(mdo sde): ba dang / bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong ba'i rgyu bsags par 'gyu ro zhes sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / bdag gis long spyod chen por 'gyur ba'i bsgrub pa yongasu gzung bar 'gyuro zhes skye
268b4(mdo sde): pa de sbyin pa dang / bdag yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i chos rnams la gnas par 'gyu ro zhes sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / bdag la dga' ba'i gshes gnyen dkon par mi 'gyu ro zhes sbyin pa de
268b5(mdo sde): sbyin pa dang / bdag sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i mig skyed par 'gyuraro zhes sbyin pade sbyin pa dang / bdag gi sbyin pa de/ sa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub
268b6(mdo sde): bar 'gyuraro zhes sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' btong ba phun sum tshogs pa gzhan rnams kyi rjesu bslabs par 'gyur zhes sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / bdag mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po bas des
268b7(mdo sde): pa yongasu bzung bar 'gyu ro zhes sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa dang / bdag la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyu ro zhes sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang / mi 'am
268b8(mdo sde): ci'i bdag po rnam sa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa yin// mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis byang chub sems da
269a1(mdo sde): khams dpa chen po'i chub khrims kyi la rol na pa yong su dag pa yin te/ sum su cu gnyis gang men 'dis de/ chags pa dang /  ldang dang / gti ga dang tha mas sus pa / 
269a2(mdo sde): dag pa'i tshul khrims dang / bdag gi lha sangs rgyas la mi slu ba'i mtshan nyid kyis ngag yong su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba med pas sems yongasu dag
269a3(mdo sde): ba'i tshul khrims dang / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong bas dge ba bcu'i las kyis lam yongasu dag pa'i tshul khrims dang / nyi tshe ba'i sa thams cad mi ston pas byang chub kyi sems dang bsam pa
269a4(mdo sde): mi brjod pa'i tshul khrims dang / shin tu nyams pa med cing g.yo dang bral bas lhag pa'i bsam pa yongasu dag pa'i tshul khrims dang / skyob pal pa thams cad sdud pas 'phags pa'i skye bos
269a5(mdo sde): bsngags pa'i tshul khrims dang / sems can thams cad/ la sems snyoms par byams pa sngon du 'gro ba'i tshulakhrims dang / sems can thams cad yongasu skyob pas snying rje chen
269a6(mdo sde): ba la rab tu sbyor ba'i tshul khrims dang / dam bcas pa'i stobs kyis bslabs pa legs par rdzogs pa yang dag par 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims dang kha na ma thob chung ngu la yang 'jigs par lta bas pa
269a7(mdo sde): tsha shes shing khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs pa'i tshul khrims dang / shin tu mi gtong bas skyon med pa'i tshul khrims dang / spyod pa shin tu dag pas thun tshags ma yin pa'i tshul khrims dang / sangs
269a8(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du 'gro bas rang gi rnam pa mang po la dbang byed pa'i tshul khrims dang / skye bo mkhas pas rig pa'i phyir bsngags pa'i tshul khrims dang / ngan song ngan 'gro thams cad kyi lam
269b1(mdo sde): las sgrol ba'i tshul khrims dang / bde ba'i dngos po thams cad rab tu gnas pa'i tshul khrims dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims yongasu rdzogs par byed pas sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims/ 
269b2(mdo sde): dang yi dam la brtan pas mi lhod pa'i tshul khrims dang / rang gi sems nges par sems pas bdag la mi stod gzhan la mi smod pa'i tshul khrims dang / nyon mongs pa med pas nges par sems
269b3(mdo sde): pa'i snying rje'i tshul khrims dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad la nye bar byed pa'i tshul khrims dang / rab tu dga' bar byed pas dga' bar byed pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'dod pa chags pa med
269b4(mdo sde): bas chog shes par byed pa'i tshul khrims dang / nan tan snying por byed pas sgrub pa rlabs po che'i tshul khrims dang khyim gyis gnas thams cad la la mi lta bas rab tu 'byung ba la gzhol pa'i tshul khrim/ 
269b5(mdo sde): dang chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ma ma las dgon pa la/  dga' ba dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'phags pa'i rig/ la rten pas 'dod pa nyung zhing cho ga shes pa la nges pa'i tshul
269b6(mdo sde): khrims dang / sdig pa 'dod pa thams cad dang bral bas sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa la yang dag par sbyor ba'i tshul khrims dang / sems can med par rnam par sbyor bas dmigs pa
269b7(mdo sde): med par sbyor ba'i tshul khrims dang / chad pa dang rtag pa yongasu spong bas lta bar song ba thams cad dang / gti mug sel ba'i tshul khrims dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang mi 'gal bar byang
269b8(mdo sde): chub kyi rjesu 'thun pa'i tshul khrims te/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa yin// mi 'am ci
269b9(mdo sde): bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa yin te/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus la mi lta bas bzod par
270a1(mdo sde): lta ba dang / srog la mi chags pas bzod par lta ba dang // zhe 'gras pa'i sems med pas bzod par blta ba dang / nyes pas smras pa'i tshig dang du len pas bzod par blta ba
270a2(mdo sde): dang / nyams chung ba'i sems can la snying rje skyed pas bzod par blta ba dang / mi bslabs pa la mi brnyas pas bzod par blta ba dang / gnod pa byed pa rnams la lan glan pa'i mthu yod kyang khan mi
270a3(mdo sde): ljon pas bzod par blta ba dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad bcad kyang mi 'khrugs shing gnod sems med pas bzod par blta ba dang / brlang ba med pas bzod par blta ba dang / gshe ba
270a4(mdo sde): la slar mi gshe bas bzod par blta ba dang / bsam bdag pas bzod par blta ba dang / rnyog pa'i sems med pas bzod par lta ba dang / dkrugs pa'i sems med pas bzod par blta ba dang / gzhan gyi
270a5(mdo sde): sems srung bas bzod par blta ba dang / sems can zad la phan pa'i dngos pos bzod par blta ba dang / snying rje'i blo dang / ldan pas bzod par blta ba dang / nga rgyal med pas bzod par blta ba
270a6(mdo sde): dang sems can thams cad la brnyas thabs med cing 'dud pas bzod par blta ba dang 'bar ba med pas bzod par blta ba dang / nye bar zhi bas bzod par blta ba dang / nges par sems pas
270a7(mdo sde): bzod par blta ba dang / bdag gi 'khrul pa la so sor rtogs pas bzod par blta ba dang / gzhan gyi 'khrul pa'i skyon la mi lta bas bzod par blta ba dang / sangs rgyas rje su dran pa sgoms pas bzod/ 
270a8(mdo sde): par blta ba dang / chos la sems sbyor ba la bzod par blta ba dang / dang ba'i dngos pos bzod par blta ba dang / sems la gdung ba med pas bzod par blta ba dang / bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer
270b1(mdo sde): med pas bzod par blta ba dang / gsong por smra bas bzod par blta ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la dngang ba med pas bzod par blta ba dang / ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba la mos par bzod par blta ba dang // 
270b2(mdo sde): mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas bzod par blta ba ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa yin// 
270b3(mdo sde): mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa yin te/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po 'di
270b4(mdo sde): lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang chos kyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / dge 'dun
270b5(mdo sde): gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chang bar bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grun rtsom pa dang / sems can tshad med pa yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyi rabartson 'grus rtsom pa dang / 'khor ba tshad med yongasu gzung ba'i
270b6(mdo sde): phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sangs rgyas tshad med pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa bsags pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / thos pa tshad
270b7(mdo sde): med pa gzung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sems can thams cad la legs par bshad pas tshim par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sems can thams cad la rab tu gdung ba med pa'i phyir
270b8(mdo sde): brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sems can thams cad la bya ba'i ci yod ces bya ba la spro ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sems can thams cad yongasu mi gtong ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / 
271a1(mdo sde): sems can thams cad tshul khrims kyi bslab pa la gzung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bzod pa'i stobs thams cad dang nges pa mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa
271a2(mdo sde): dang bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad bskyed pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / chags pa med pa'i shes rab mchog yong su bskang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus
271a3(mdo sde): rtsom pa dang khyams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms tshangs pa'i gnas pa yongasu bskang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad la brtson 'grus bskyed pa'i phyir
271a4(mdo sde): brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan bkod par rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yongasu bsdu ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rlom pa dang / bdud thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom
271a5(mdo sde): ba dang / stobs brtan pa chen po sa pha rol gnon pa'i phyir brtson/ 'grus rtsom pa dang / pha rol rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas tshar gcod pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / stobs
271a6(mdo sde): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu bskang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / lus dang ngag dang sems kyi rgyun gyi phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bya ba thams cad nyams 'o/ 
271a7(mdo sde): tu chung bar byed cing brtson 'grus mi gtang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sems zhum pa med par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi rdzi bar bya ba'i
271a8(mdo sde): byir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / ma bsgral ba bsgral ma grol ba dgro la/ dbugs mi phyin pa dbugs dbyung / yongasu mya ngan las ma 'das g.yongasu mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa/ 
271b1(mdo sde): dang bsod nams brgya ba'i mtshan gyi tshogs sogs pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
271b2(mdo sde): ning mtha' yas par rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro zhing sangs rgyas la lta ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sems dang lus dben pa'i phyir de'i brtson 'grus de dben pa nges par zung ba dang / thams cad
271b3(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa'i phyir de'i brtson 'grus de blang ba med cing / dor ba med la gdeg pa med cing gzhag pa med/ skye ba med cing 'byung ba med pas bsdus pa yin te/ mi 'am ci'i
271b4(mdo sde): bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa yin no// mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bya
271b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu// dag pa yin te/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa/ yongasu dag pa dang / blo gros yong su dag pa dang / rtogs pa
271b6(mdo sde): yongasu dag pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa yongasu dag pa dang khrel yod pa yongasu dag pa dang / mos pa yong su dag pa dang / bsngo ba yong su dag pa dang / byang chub kyi sems mi brjed yong su dag pa dang / dbang po sngas
271b7(mdo sde): ba yongasu dag pa dang / mi gnas par yongasu dag pa dang / de la ma chags pa yong su dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa bskyed pa yongasu dag pa dang // sems las su rung ba yongasu dag pa dang / lus
271b8(mdo sde): dben pa yong su dag pa dang / khrag cha shes pa yongasu dag pa dang / nang nye bar zhi ba yongasu dag pa dang / phyi rol du mi rtsub yongasu dag pa dang / dmigs pa'i lta ba spong ba yongasu dag pa dang / bad
272a1(mdo sde): med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gsob med pa dang / gang zag med par so sor rtog cing khams gsum pa la mi gnas pa yongasu dag pa dang / byang chub
272a2(mdo sde): kyi yan lag gi sgo yongasu dag pa dang / sems can la blta ba'i snying rje chen po yongasu dag pa dang / shes rab la 'jug pas rab rib med cing snang ba yongasu dag pa dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu dang / rnam par smin
272a3(mdo sde): pa dang mi 'gal ba yongasu dag pa dang / chos la sems pa'i bzod pa yong su dag pa dang / tshul khrims kyi rnam pa'i chos la so sor rtogs pa yongasu dag pa dang / khabs la mkhas pa bsdu ba yong su dag pa
272a4(mdo sde): dang byang chub kyi snying po bsgrub pa yong su dag pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang mi 'dre ba yongasu dag pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i bsam gtan bsgrub pa yongasu dag pa rang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin thob/ 
272a5(mdo sde): ba la mi g.yeng ba yongasu dag pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa la lta bas yongasu dag pa dang / sems ca/ na thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa
272a6(mdo sde): shes nas/ so so ci rigs par chos ston pa yong su dag pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag
272a7(mdo sde): ba yin no// mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa yin te/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zos pa tshol bas/ 
272a8(mdo sde): mi ngoms pas mang du thos pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pas chos rnams la dpyod pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa dang / byang chub mngon sum du byed pa'i bdag nyid kyi chos bsgrub pa shes pa dang / 
272b1(mdo sde): phung po la mkhas pa la 'jug pas grol ba'i shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa'i shes pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa'i shes pa dang / rgyu dang bya ba khong du chud pas stong pa'i rnam par rten cig
272b2(mdo sde): 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / bden pa la mkhas pa'i shes pa dang / der mi ltung bar skyon med pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / bsams bzhin du skye bas skye ba la so sor mi rtog pa'i
272b3(mdo sde): shes pa dang / bzod ma nus rnam par dag pas chos thams cad mi skye bar shes pa dang / phyin ci log tu gyur pa yongasu smin par byed pas sems can thams cad bdag med par shes pa dang / 
272b4(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthi'i phyir chos thams cad chos gcig du shes pa dang / nam pa' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir zhing thams cad zhing gcig tu shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings
272b5(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad/ sangs rgyas gcig shes pa dang / yi ge shes pa la mabs/ nyepas chos tshig rab tu dbye ba ston pa shes pa dang / legs
272b6(mdo sde): bar bshad pas sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i phyir/ chags pa med pa'i spobs pas chos rgya cher shes pa dang / thos pa thams cad 'dzin pas gzung brjed pa med pa'i
272b7(mdo sde): shes pa dang / bdud de dag byang chub tu yongasu smin par byed pas bdud kyi las thams cad khong du chud pa'i shes pa dang / rnam par bsgrubs te so sor nye bar gnas par shes pas/ chos
272b8(mdo sde): thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rtog pa'i shes pa dang / shin tu yongasu grub pa med pa'i tshul gyis/ chos thams cad rmi lam dang / mig rgyu dang chu zla dang / mig yor dang / zag cha lta bu'i tshul
273a1(mdo sde): du ston pa shes pa dang / shes pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa thams cad khong du chud pa'i shes pa dang / shin tu bslab pa'i phyir 'khor ba
273a2(mdo sde): dang mya ngan las 'das pa gtags par shes pa'i shes pa'i thabs la mkhas pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i phyir stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos shes pa dang / 
273a3(mdo sde): bzang ma nas 'brel ba med pa'i phyir chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi bar shes pa dang / ma rig pa dang / gti mug gi mun pa yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir/ chos thams
273a4(mdo sde): cad la rab rib med cing snang ba thob pa dang / chos thams cad gang du yang mi 'gro// gang nas kyang mi 'ong bar shes pas shes rab gyi 'od dang ldan zhing / sems can thams cad la rnam
273a5(mdo sde): bar thar pa'i chos ston pa dang / las dang bya ba khong du chud pas/ sems can rnam kyi 'chi 'pho dang / 'gro bar skye ba ston pa dang / don dang / chos dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs
273a6(mdo sde): pa'i tshul la mkhas te khyad par de kho na'i lung ston pas so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa dang / bdag 'dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / grol ba dang / sbas pa dang / bya ba yongasu mya ngan las bzlo ba'i phyir
273a7(mdo sde): don yod pa'i chos ston pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis de shes rab las nges par byung bar rig nas chos kyi grong khyer thams cad yongs su/ 
273a8(mdo sde): sbyong bar byin gyis rlob pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la yang dag par gzhol te mtha' la gnas pa'i tshul gyis nges par byas pas lung bstan pa'i sa rab tu thob pa yin/ 
273b1(mdo sde): de ma 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa min// mi 'am ci'i bdag pa byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa sum cu
273b2(mdo sde): rtsa gnyis dang ldan na/ thabs la mkhas par rig par bya ste/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la lta zhing // bdag zad par mi byed pa dang / sems can
273b3(mdo sde): thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ bsod nams chen po la gnas pa dang / sems can thams cad sbyin gnas yin pas/ sbyin gnas mi tshol ba dang / sems can dbul po yongasu smin par bya ba'i
273b4(mdo sde): phyir rgya chen po don du mi gnyer ba dang / sems can thams cad dag bsdam pa la sbyar ba'i phyir lkug pa dang / rig pa lta bur ston pa dang / bud med dang gzhon nu ma yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ bud
273b5(mdo sde): med yongasu 'dzin pa dang / khye'u yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir khye'u yi gzugasu ston pa dang / sems can yong su smin par bya ba dang 'ju na par bya ba'i phyir gzugs thams cad ston pa dang / 
273b6(mdo sde): sems can myos pa yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ myos pa ma yin yang myos pa'i lusu ston pa dang / de la mos pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston pa'i phyir/ smon pa dang sems g.yengs pa'i
273b7(mdo sde): gzugasu ston pa dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir lo brgyar bsags pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po 'dor ba dang / chos 'dzin tu gzhug pa'i phyir sems can rnams la dga' ba dang / ce ba
273b8(mdo sde): dang longs spyod pa thams cad ston pa dang / de la mos pa'i sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir g.yon can mi 'thun pas 'tsho ba lta bur yang bdag nyid ston pa dang / bud med gang tshong dpon dang
274a1(mdo sde): khyim bdag dang / rgyal po'i chung mar gyur pa bu med pa bu'i tshe 'dod pa'i mya ngan zug rngu dang ldan zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba la de ni byang chub sems dpa'as rigs
274a2(mdo sde): de dag dad cing yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du de'i bur 'gro ba dang / 'drog dgon par song ba'i sems can dngul po bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / nor sbyin zhing bgo bsha' bya ba'i
274a3(mdo sde): phyir 'dron pa mang po'i nang du ded dpon chen por 'gyur ba dang / gter chen po mdun du bzhag ste/ nor gyi phung po byin nas chos bstan pa dang / mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan pa'i sems can
274a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi mya ngan gyi zug rngu bskul nas rdzu 'phrul gyi sa chos ston pa dang / gter ston pa'i sems can rnams kyi mdun du gter chen po nye bar bstan nas/ de'i 'tshe ba yongasu dag par bya
274a5(mdo sde): ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la 'jug pa'i phyir gzhan mu steg can spyod pa dang / kun tu rgyu rnams kyi nang du rab tu 'thung ba dang / sems can 'dod chags kyi lca
274a6(mdo sde): klus zin pa rnams yongasu smin par byas pa'i phyir/ smad 'tsheng ma'i khyim dang slas kyi nang du bu mo'i gzugs mdzes pa blta na sdug par ston pa dang / sems can rnams mos pa ci lta ba
274a7(mdo sde): bzhir du chos kyis yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dus pa chen po dang / tshogs mang po'i nang du rnga bo che dang / khar rnga dang / gling bu dang / dung gi sgras sa chen po mdzes par byas nas/ bdag
274a8(mdo sde): nye bar ston cing sems can 'dun pa de dag la rol mo'i dbyangs sgra de dag la chos bstan pa'i sgra 'byin cing / bzo dang las kyi gnas thams cad nye bar ston pa dang / mya ngan du son pa'i
274b1(mdo sde): 'dron pa bza' ba dang / gtung bzad pa la mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rtse zhing de stobs kyis bza' ba dang / gtung ba byin nas bkres pa dang bral zhing skom pa dang bral ba'i sems can
274b2(mdo sde): rnams la chos ston pa dang / sems can gang dag dmus long du gyur pa de dag gi nang du dmus long lta bur gyur nas/ dbul po mig med pa de dag la rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bza' ba
274b3(mdo sde): dang / gtung ba 'byor par byas nas/ mig byin te rang gi gzugs bstan nas/ ji ltar de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos
274b4(mdo sde): ston pa dang rgyal po'i khri mon du bcug pa'i srog chags brgya phrag du ma g.yo sna tshogs dang ldan pa de dag yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du bdag rkun por ston cing / de g.yon can zhes shes
274b5(mdo sde): bar byas nas khri mon du bcug pa dang / de der zhugs nas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bcings pa de dag gi lus bkrus shing bslus te/ gos bzang po bskon nas bza' ba dang btung bas lus tshim
274b6(mdo sde): bar byas te/ bcings pa dam po de dag las dkrol nas/ dza ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur/ ba de lta bur chos ston pa dang / sems can gang dag rgyal pos
274b7(mdo sde): gsang par bsgri ba srog 'chad pa'i 'jigs pa thob pa sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa de dag yongasu smin par bya'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdzu 'phrul gyis gzhan dag
274b8(mdo sde): cig sprul te rdzu 'phrul gyis gshed sa la bsgre nas gsad par 'os pa'i mi de dag bcings pa de las bkrol te/ 'jigs pa dang bral ba srog rnye bla dbugs phyin pa de dag la ji ltar bla na med pa yang
275a1(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bur chos ston pa dang / phyogs gang na dang nor dang zhing dang khyim gyi dngos po dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / 
275a2(mdo sde): dmag mi'i phyir 'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / 'tshang 'dru bar 'gyur ba der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyis dbusu 'dug nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyis don dang nor rin po
275a3(mdo sde): che yongasu btang ste/ de dag 'dun par sbyoraro// de dag dum par rig nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas
275a4(mdo sde): bas yan lag dang nying lag thams cad kyis dbang po nyams dpa med kyang sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir dbang po nyams par yang ston pa dang / spyod lam phun sum tshogs kyang
275a5(mdo sde): yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir spyod lam thams cad 'brugs par yang byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mas nges pa gzhan mu stegs can ston pa dang / thag ring dugan
275a6(mdo sde): ba bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mu stegs can de dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dgug pa'i phyir/ de dag gi mdun du dkon mchog gsum gyis bsngags pa brjod pa dang / byang chub sems
275a7(mdo sde): dpa' thabs mkhas pas/ sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las log nas bsams bzhin du
275a8(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i khams skye ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa rnams la skye ba'i sdug bsngal bstan nas dben pa thob pa rnams bla ma'i lam sgom du gzud pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa ston pa dang / 
275b1(mdo sde): skyon med pa la ma zhugs pa mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar 'dun pa rnams kyi mdun du byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi sku ston pa dang / sangs rgyas la dad pa thob cing sem
275b2(mdo sde): mnyam par bzhag pa rnams byang chub kyi sems len du gzud pa'i phyir rkyen 'di shes pa la 'jug pa nye bar ston pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis byang chu
275b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o// pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa la 'jug pa yongasu dag pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa na/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po
275b4(mdo sde): ba'i 'khor dang / de ma yin pa gzhan lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri zla'i srog chags dgu khri brgyad stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// bcom ldan
275b5(mdo sde): 'das kyi 'khor byang chub sems dpa' las byang chub sems dpa' khri brgyad stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// mi ma ci'i rgyal po ljon pa ni/ shes rab sgra
275b6(mdo sde): ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar byas/ yang dag par 'dzin
275b7(mdo sde): du bcug/ yang dag par gzeng stod// yang dag par tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste mgu ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas rin thang med pa'i ras bcos bu phrugs gcig
275b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol to// byang chub sems dnga'i dge 'dun dang nyan thos kyis dge 'dun thams cad la yang rin thang med pa'i gos kyis so sor bka' bo// gnas thams cad
276a1(mdo sde): ni yong su long spyod pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la phul lo// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i bu brgyad stong pas rin po che'i pad+ma bkod pa dang / rin po che'i gdus
276a2(mdo sde): brgyad stong du tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste gtor ma thag tu/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag thams cad 'khor gyi khyams der bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i drang zad kyi
276a3(mdo sde): steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad stong tsam na rin po che'i gdugs gcig tu gnas par gyur to// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i bu brgyad stong pos bcom ldan 'das kyi cho
276a4(mdo sde): 'phrul rgya chen po 'di lta bu 'di/ mthong nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag pa
276a5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod do// de dag gis brang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang thos
276a6(mdo sde): bas bdag cag byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ba byang chub tu yongasu smin par bgyid pa'i chos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
276a7(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag cig la bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas ta la bdun srid kyi steng gi bar
276a8(mdo sde): snang la spyir mo dkrungs bcas te bzhugs nas sku la 'di lta bu'i 'od byung ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// gang / 
276b1(mdo sde): mi 'am ci dri za dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gi rol mo sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs de dag thams cad ma brdungs ma dkrol bar mdzes pa dang ldan par
276b2(mdo sde): 'khrol lo// ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang na spos kyi shing dang / me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing ji snyed pa de dag las kyang rol mo sil snyan gyi sgra byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i
276b3(mdo sde): khung bu thams cad nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong byung ngo // 'od zer thams cad kyi rtse mo las kyang pad+ma tshad shing rta'i bang lo tsam dag byung ngo // pad+ma'i snying po thams cad la
276b4(mdo sde): yang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa'i lus ngag gnas par kun tu snang ngo // de nas sangs rgyas kyi
276b5(mdo sde): mthus/ rol mo sil snyan de dag las ni/ yongasu 'dri ba'i tshig su bcad pa byung / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ni/ sgra dbyangs dang / skad gcig gis tshigs su
276b6(mdo sde): bcad nas/ nges par lan 'deb so// de la sil snyan las tshigasu bcad pa/ bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// ji lta bur ni bskyed pa dang // byang chub snying por 'dug par du// sems ni
276b7(mdo sde): brjed pa med par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ sems can kun gyi ched kyi phyir/ lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs// snying rje tshe dang ldan pa ni// 
276b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems brjed mi 'gyur ro// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// de dag bsam pa ji lta bu// rab tu sbyor ba'ang ci 'dra zhig/ de dag snying rje chen po la// nges par sems pa ji ltar skye/ 
277a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ g.yo med lhag pa'i bsam pa ste/ de dag sbyor ba bcos ma yin// mya ngan 'das sgor 'jog pa ni// de dag snying rjed
277a2(mdo sde): 'dra'o// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// de dag gtor ba ji lta bu// ji ltar byin nas 'gyod med cing // rnam smin don du mi gnyer bar// byang chub tu ni bsngo bar byed// byang chub sems dpa'i
277a3(mdo sde): gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ dngos po kun la mi lta bar// des ni byin nas 'gyod pa med// byang chub lam du 'jog byed pa// de phyir rnam smin re ba med// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ 
277a4(mdo sde): ji ltar tshul khrims ldan gyur kyang // tshul khrims kyis ni rlom sems med// theg chen bla na med pa la// tshul khrims 'chal pa sbyin par byed// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnas/ 
277a5(mdo sde): kyis smras pa// byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims ldan// / stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems med// byams pa chen po skyed pa na// tshul khrims 'chal ba yongs
277a6(mdo sde): smin byed// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// ji lta bur na sems can gyis// spyos shing bsdigs pa bzod byed cing // sems kyis gnod pa mi byed pa// mchog tu dga' ba skyed par
277a7(mdo sde): 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi// nyon mongs bsol ba'i sman pa snyam// de dag ngan par smras pa yis// 
277a8(mdo sde): tshig thos zhe sdang mi 'gyur// sil snyan rnams kyis spras pa/ de dge brtson 'grus ji lta bu// brtul ba yang ni ji 'dra zhing // ji ltar zhum pa med sems kyis// byang chub spyang pa spyod
277b1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// chos dang sems can srung ba ni// rtul ba dang ni brtson 'grus so// dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pa ni// des na sems ni
277b2(mdo sde): zhum mi 'gyur// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag ji ltar dran dang ldan// blo gros rtogs par khong du chud// ji ltar bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// de la chags pa med par 'gyur/ 
277b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ g.yeng ba med pa dran dang ldan// tshul 'chos med pa blo gros ldan// thabs kyis bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// des na de la
277b4(mdo sde): chags mi 'gyur// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar she ras rab ldan pa dang / yang dag lta ba drang po dang // chos rnams rnams rnam par dbye ba la// mkhas shing 'jigs
277b5(mdo sde): pa med par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa thos pas shes rab kun tu 'phel// rten pas/ lta ba drang por 'gyur// chos kyi sbyin pas nges
277b6(mdo sde): 'gyur te// tshul bzhin gyis ni don rtogs 'gyur// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar thos pa btsal ba na// de dag thos pa mang du 'gyur// gang gi che ba'i bdag 'gyur bar// thos
277b7(mdo sde): ba'i chos rnams ston par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis smras pa/ gus par byas te thos tshol zhing // sgrub pas thos pa mang du 'gyur// zang zing med par chos sbyinapa
277b8(mdo sde): des ni che ba'i bdag nyid 'gyur// sil snyam rnams kyis smras gangade dag byams pa ji lta bu/ de dag snying rje ci 'dra zhig/ de dag dga' ba ji lta bu// btang snyoms kyang ni ci 'dra zhig/ byang chub
278a1(mdo sde): sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis spras pa// sems dang btang snyoms byams pa ste// sems can dgrol ba'i snying rje// sangs rgyas chos dag dga' ba ste// gnyis
278a2(mdo sde): spangs pa ni btang snyoms so// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// sems kyang ji ltar dang bar 'gyur// chos thos nas ni ji lta bur// de dag the tshom
278a3(mdo sde): skye mi 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ sangs rgyas rje su dran bsgoms pa// des ni 'dren pa mthong bar 'gyur// the tshom med cing bsam dag pas// chos
278a4(mdo sde): thos nas ni som nyi meng // sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ bsod nams tshogs ni ji lta bur// ye shes tshogs kyang / da ci 'dra zhig/ de dag zhi gnas lhag mthong la// rtsom
278a5(mdo sde): pa yang ni ji lta bu// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis smras pa/ ngoms mi shes pa bsod nams tshogs// 'dri ba rnam sa ni ye shes tshogs// zhi ba'i sems ni zhi gnas
278a6(mdo sde): te// chos shes pa ni lhag mthong ngo // sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag gi ni spyod yul gang // de dag gnas kyang ji lta bu// de dag gnas pa ci 'dra zhig/ de dag sbyor ba'ang ci lta bu// 
278a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag spyod yul stong pa nyid// gnas ni pha rol phyin pa'i lam// gnas pa bsam gtan bzhi rnams te/ sems can
278a8(mdo sde): rab dgrol sbyor ba'o// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// de dag bdud kyi las gang yin// sangs rgyas phrin las ji lta bur// ci 'dra ba yi las byas na// byang chub la ni gzhol bar
278b1(mdo sde): 'gyur byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ zegs pa dman pa bdud kyi las// sangs rgyas phrin las theg pa che// sdig pa thams cad spong ba ni// byang chub gzhol bar
278b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'o// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// de dag grags brten ji lta bu// sdig pa'i grogs po ci 'dra zhig/ log par blta la mi gnas shig/ ji ltar yang dag song bar 'gyur/ 
278b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// gang zhig byang chub lam ston pa// rtag tu bde sbyin grogs pa'o// byang chub sems las gang zlog pa// de dag sdig pa'i
278b4(mdo sde): grogs por shes// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// lam du 'jug par 'gyur ba yi// lta ba drang po ji lta bu// sbyor bar rnam par shes nas su// ji ltar lha de 'jig mi
278b5(mdo sde): byed// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras/ pa// las dang bya bar 'jug pa ni// de dag drang por lta ba/ yin// log par sbyor ba rnam shes nas/ 
278b6(mdo sde): lta ba de dag 'jig mi byed// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// ji lhor dam pa'i chos srung zhing // sems can yongasu smin par byed// ji lta bu yi thabs kyis ni// de dag byang chub sgrub par
278b7(mdo sde): 'gyur byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// brtson 'grus kyis ni chos srung ste// bsdu bas yongasu smin par byed// mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs pa ni// byang chub
278b8(mdo sde): bsgrub par byed pa yin// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// de dag shes pa'i lam ci 'dra// nga rgyal las ni ji lta bu// ji ltar bka' tho bde ba dang // thams cad dus su 'thun
279a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// rtsod pa med pa shes pa'i las// nga rgyal las ni brtsod pa 'byung // nges pa bkara' blo bde ba ste/ 
279a2(mdo sde): gus pa yis ni 'thun par 'gyur// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// de dag lam ni ji lta bu// log pa'i lam yang ci 'dra zhig/ bla med byang chub lam du ni// ji ltar sems can rab tu 'go//
