279a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// lam ni pha rol phyin pa drug/ theg pa dman pa log pa'i lam// shes rab thabs la slab pa ni// sems can lam/ 
279a4(mdo sde): la mdzud pa'o// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// ji lnga bur na nor chen 'gyur// de dag rnyed pa'ang ci 'dra zhig/ gter rnams kyang ni ji lta bu// gang gis de dag 'gro
279a5(mdo sde): tshim byed// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs/ rnams kyis smras pa// nor bdun dang ni rtag tu ldan// chos rnyed pa ni rnyed pa'o// de dag gter ni gzugs yin
279a6(mdo sde): te/ rab tu rnyed nas tshim par byed// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// de dag gi ni ba ma gang // nye du'i tshogs ni ji lta bu// g.yog rnams kyang ni ci 'dra zhig/ gang gis mkhas
279a7(mdo sde): pa de dag mdzes// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// ma ni shes rab pha rol thabs// nye du byang chub phyogs rnams yin// dge ba rnams ni g.yog yin te// 
279a8(mdo sde): des ni mabs pa de dag mdzes// sil snyan rnams kyis sbas pa// ji ltar bdag med rtogs nas ni// byams pas 'gro ba khyab par byed// bdag med pa dang byams pa dag/ de la ji ltar/ 
279b1(mdo sde): mtshungs par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ gang dag stong nyid rab tu shes// de ni bdag med khong du chung // gang gis 'gro ba stong shes pa// de ni de'i/ 
279b2(mdo sde): byams pa mchog/ sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ 'du byed rnams ni rang bzhin gyis// 'ong ba med cing 'gro med na// las dang las kyi rnam par smin// ji lta bur na 'thad par 'gyur// byang
279b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// dam pa'i don du 'ong med de// gang du'ang 'gro ba yongs yin// kun rdzob tu na lam 'jug cing // rnam par smin pa nye bar ston// 
279b4(mdo sde): snyan rnams kyis smras pa// stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma me da// smon lam rnam par spangs par ni// mtshan nyid gcig shu rab rtogs nas// de kho na ni ji ltar shes// byang chub sems
279b5(mdo sde): dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ stong nyid gang yin de mtshan med// mtshan ma don du gnyer med pa// mtsha/ na nyid cig cing don gcig ste// rnam par thar pa'i sgor ston to// 
279b6(mdo sde): sil sbyin rnams kyis smras pa/ gang gis mya ngan 'das 'gro ba'i// stong par rtog pa ci lta bu// sems can lta bu ji lta bu// yongasu smin byed ji lta bu// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis
279b7(mdo sde): smras pa/ shes rab kyis ni stong par rtog/ thabs kyis sems can rnams la lta// snying rjes yongasu smin par byed// des ni mya ngan 'das par 'gro/ sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ chos 'di
279b8(mdo sde): dge ni chos nyid kyis// skye ba med cing 'brung med par// tshul mchog 'di 'dra shes nas ni// gang gis 'khor bas skye bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ 
280a1(mdo sde): mi skye ba dang mi 'thung ba// de ni shes rab spyod yul lo// bsams bzhin du ni gang skye ba// de ni thabs kyi tshul yin no// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ gtong la
280a2(mdo sde): dga' bar ji ltar 'gyur// ji lta bur na phyir mi ldog/ ji ltar bzod pa phun sum tshogs// ji ltar rnam par nges par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ chos
280a3(mdo sde): kyi dbyings las phyir ma ldog/ mi skye ba la bzod pa ste// chos shes nas ni rnam par nges// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// ji ltar byang chub snying po gang // rdzogs pa'i byang chub mtshan nyid gas
280a4(mdo sde): ci phyir rdzogs sangs rgyas shes bya// de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar grol// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis spras pa/ byang chub snying pa na mkha' ste// byang chub rnam pa'i mtshan
280a5(mdo sde): nyid do// gang yang kun nas gti mug med// de bzhin nyid phyir de bzhin gshegs// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal ba/ 'i bu de dag gis tshig su bcad pa 'di thos nas/ mi skye
280a6(mdo sde): ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// de dag bzod pa thob nas/ rang rang gis gos dang rgyan bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol te/ 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du
280a7(mdo sde): bdag cag gis nyan pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu thos pas sangs rgyas ni bdag cag gis ched du byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs 'di dag las the tsom 'dri ba'i sgra 'di lta
280a8(mdo sde): byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 'di dag gis dris pa de dag thams cad kyi lan btab 'khor 'di'i dogs pa thams cad spangs pa dang / bdag cag kyang chos kyi snang ba
280b1(mdo sde): dpag tu ma mchis pa skyes pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das sil stan de dag las sgra 'di lta bu byung ba'i rgyu ci lags/ su'i byin gyi rlabs kyis na/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 'di
280b2(mdo sde): dag gis lan 'debs par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzhin bzangs dag de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis rlab su blta'o// bzhin bzangs dag de bzhin
280b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis na mkha' las kyang chos kyi sgra 'di lta bu 'byung na/ sil snyan las chos kyi sgra ci phyir mi 'byung ste/ bzhin bzangs de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i
280b4(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs ni bsam gyis mi khyab go// mi 'ami ni 'i rgyal po'i bu de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dadas sems can thams cad kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi
280b5(mdo sde): rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par gyur cig/ de ni sa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i slas mi 'am ci mo brgya da khri bani sdong mu tig kha dog sna tshogs kyi da shal thogs
280b6(mdo sde): nas khacom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldanas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ ji ltar thogs pa mu tig gi do shal de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
280b7(mdo sde): mngon par bkab bo// mu tig do shal de dag phul ma thag tu/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la/ mu tig gi
280b8(mdo sde): dashal gyi khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur te/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad kyang gru ba'i lham pa/ ka ba bani zug pa/ cha mnyam pa/ ngos shin tu rnam par
281a1(mdo sde): phye ba sha stag go / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag ni rin po ches smras pa'i dri rtsa ba yang rin po che las byas pa/ lha'i ras bcos bu'i zung du ma bkram pa dag byung
281a2(mdo sde): bar gyur to// khri de dag thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa dag bzhugs par kun tu snang ngo // de nas mi
281a3(mdo sde): 'am cin brgyad khri bani stong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di mthong nas tshim zhing mgu ste yid rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te bsam pa thag
281a4(mdo sde): ba nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de dag byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ dga' zhing mchog tu dga' ste dang ba thob nas/ thams cad
281a5(mdo sde): kyis sgra skad dang dbyangs cig tu tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshe/ gsu bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das de la mngon par bstod do// bla na med pa'i dgra bcom mchog
281a6(mdo sde): gsung ba/ don dgongs mtshungs pa ma mchis bsam mi khyab// don dang chos dang 'dul ba rab bslabs pa// sems can mchog la mgo bos phyag 'tshalo// 'dod chags zhe sdang na/ 
281a7(mdo sde): mug thab 'jig/ dgon par zhugs dgyes bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba// rin chen mdzad dang rin chen ston pa po// bcom ldan rgyal po'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// spyan lnga dri bral nyon
281a8(mdo sde): mongs mi mnga' ba// sa yi dbang po pha rol dgra bcom pa// pad+ma lta bur srid gsum mi gos pa// bde gshegs mchog brnyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba'i nang na mig dang
281b1(mdo sde): 'drar spyod cing // nyi zla 'di yi 'od ni spa bkong ba// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigasu rgyal por skyes// 'khor lo'i mtshan mngara' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ming dang gzugs la nam yang mi chags
281b2(mdo sde): shing ka mgon dang dpung dang skyabasu mngar brnyes gyur// khyod dang mtshungs med lhag pa ga la zhig/ mtha' yas dbyangs mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// brnyes dang brnyes la nam
281b3(mdo sde): yang chags mi mnga'// 'jig rten chos rnams zil gyis mnan te bzhugs// chags srod 'khri shing dra ba 'grol mdzad pa// bcom ldan 'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal lo// 
281b4(mdo sde): dul ba thugs ni rtag tu mnyam par gzhag/ nyon mongs bsregs te stobs bcus rab zhugs shing // 'gro/ da la zang zing mi mnga' sbyin stsal pa// sbyin pa'i gnas la mgo
281b5(mdo sde): sa phyag 'tshal lo// sgra mchog dam pa mtshan gyi'o// 'phros pa// lam log byin ci log ni rnam par thA ngas// 'jam zhing sdum la snyan pa'i gsung gsung ba/ srid pa
281b6(mdo sde): gsum las 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo// mi mchog gdung bas gdungs pa mi mnga' ba// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni bye ba'i zhing du gshegs// 'gro ba rab tu sgrol ba'i gru mdzad pa// bcom
281b7(mdo sde): ldan bran 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan brtson 'grus dag pa ston mdzad pa// chags shing zhen pa'i 'gro dang mngon shes drug/ ldan zhing mkhas pa'i nyan thos rnams
281b8(mdo sde): kyang 'grel// 'gro drug nye gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal la// gser gyi kha dog 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo// zhi gnas dbang po dul la phyag 'tshal lo// ston gyi zla 'dra'i zhal
282a1(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo// mi mchog yan tan ma la phyag 'tshal ma/ nyan mongs bsregs shing bsnyengs pa mi ma nga dag skyes bu 'di dag bslam pa 'gru
282a2(mdo sde): bas sgral/ bsdams shing dayang bdul ba'i bcom ldan 'das// khyong lo skyab su 'chi bar mchid kyis 'tshal// thub pas sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab phul// bslangs na
282a3(mdo sde): dbang ba dgyes par rab 'gyur ba// pha rol dag la sbyin pa mchog stsol pa// gtang dpa' bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can nga rgyal rgyags khengs gti mug pa// rgyu
282a4(mdo sde): dang rkyen dang bya ba 'ga' bgyid rnams/ 'phags pa/ na med pa'i las mchog la// rnam par 'dren pa tshe na pa khyod kyis bkod// phung po 'ang bzhin gyis ni snod ma khyen ma/ 
282a5(mdo sde): las dang nyan mongs zil gyis mnan te bzhugs// 'dren 'gro ba rnams kyi som nyi gtsang// bcom ldan dus gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bden pa'i chos la brtson ring mnya
282a6(mdo sde): bar bzhag/ chos rnams kun la mnga' dbang pha rol phyin// bla na med pa kha lo sgyur ba mchog/ bcom ldan ded dpon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bcos pa mi mnga' g.yo sgyu rnams
282a7(mdo sde): dang bral// bdud kyi bde rnams 'joms pa'i stobs po che// mi mchog lam dang lam ma lags la mkhas// rlung mar lta bur ci la'ang chags mi mnga'// gzir bar gyur bsal ba rol
282a8(mdo sde): shin tu gnas// thub pa bas pa ma 'tshal bang mdzod mnga'// spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe na gang ga yi// bye ma snyed kyi mi mchog rnams la mchod// mthu brnyes ma g.yo bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ 
282b1(mdo sde): chags pa'i skyon mi mnga' zhing thang la bzhugs// gnas na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba rnams kyis ste// de slang mi rnams mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// skye dang na dang rga shi rnam par spangs / tshe rabs
282b2(mdo sde): bye ba bsam gyis mi khyab dgongs// bcom ldan 'das kyi mkhyen pa'i gdugs 'od kyis// 'jigs pa chen po'i dra ba rab tu 'dral// 'dren pa mi 'drar chos rnams thugasu chud// phyag
282b3(mdo sde): dang zhabs la bkra shis mtshan mnga' zhing // bkra shis pa las 'jam pa'i ran slong ba// bcom ldan bkra shis mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// gzungs rnams la ni dbang gi pha rol gyi
282b4(mdo sde): zang zing mi mnga' chos kyi sbyin pa srog thub pa chos kyi rnga ni rab rdung ba// chos rje bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// shAkya'i rigs rus rgyal po las byung ba// dbang po zhi zhing
282b5(mdo sde): thugs kyang rab tu ni// ston pa srid gsum 'jig rten rnam gzigs pa// bde gshegs zhi thugs khyod la phyag 'tshalo// bdud rnams dpung dang bcas pas rno ba yi// 
282b6(mdo sde): ral gyi thogs nas byang chub drung lhags kyang / khyod kyi ba spu tsam yang ma g.yos te// bcom ldan lhun po 'dral phyag 'tshalo// mi yi dam pa bzod pa'i pha rol phyin// sku rnams
282b7(mdo sde): kun la nongs pa bgyis kyang bzod // yang 'byung ba dang skye ba dang 'chi bas pa// bzod gsungs bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshalo// mthu brnyes bde bar gshegs pa mi g.yog
282b8(mdo sde): gnas dang gnas min mkhas pa bsnyengs mi mnga' khyod kyis sems can mang po byang chub bkod// chos gnas rgyal ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dus bgyis nyam
283a1(mdo sde): chung snying po med par mkhyen// skye ba'i tshogs ni nyung ba ma lags sel/ khyod kyi mkhyen pa srid gsum khyad par 'phags// ye shes pha rol phyin pa phyag
283a2(mdo sde): 'tshal lo// sems long bsdug bsngal mgon med pa// de dag khyod kyis dkon mchog gsumatshom bgyis/ khyod ni bdud dpung bcas pa skrag mdzad pa// bcom ldan mas
283a3(mdo sde): gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal// stobs dang bsam gtan dang ni dbang po bsgoms// khyod kyi bdud ni dpung dang bcas pa bcom// srid pa rnams kyi nang na mchog gyur pa// thub pa dbang po
283a4(mdo sde): bsgoms la phyag 'tshalo// 'dun pa'i rtsa ba rgya chen chos gsan pa/ mtshungs med byang chub la ni chags mi mnga'// grib ma lta bur mkhyen nas bde gsung ba/ bcom ldan gdugs
283a5(mdo sde): 'dra khyod la phyog 'tshalo// 'dren pa mi 'dra chos rnams thu/ dag su chung // 'phags pa'i 'khor lo rmi 'dra rab tu bskor// 'dus bgyis yang dag tu na rmi lam 'drar// mkhyen nas sems
283a6(mdo sde): can mang po dran par mdzad// chos kyi ljags mchog dag pa dri mi mnga'// ljags kyis rang gi zhal gyi dkyil 'khor khebs// ljags ni pad+ma mdab ma brgya lta bu/ ljags skyon mi mngar
283a7(mdo sde): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// srid gsum kun la chags pa mi mnga' ba// 'gro ba rnams la bdun pa'i skyon mi gsung // 'dun pa'i 'dod chags bral ba ma spang ba// byang chub mchog la
283a8(mdo sde): srog chags 'dun par mdzad// nyon mongs dgra dang sdig pa'i dgra spangs pa// ser sna'i 'dod chags bral zhing chags mi mnga'// mi'i dam pa gser ltar dpal sdug pa// khyod kyi
283b1(mdo sde): mtshan dang grangs pa chub par grags// gnas dang dbang po rnam par 'byed la mkhas// 'di na bzhugs ning 'gro ba'i mig tu gyur// gnas dang yig 'bru tshig gi don bslabs pas// khyod
283b2(mdo sde): kyis chu bo bzhi la zam pa btags// glang po rin hang ma mchis sbyin pa mdzad// 'dren pa mi dang lhag rnams sgrol ba po// khyod kyi yon tan mtha' ma mi rnyed de// mgon po khyod la
283b3(mdo sde): bdag ni thab mo sbyor// mi yi mchog la dag ni sprin byin pas// mi mjed 'dzam bu'i rgyal por gyur lags na// 'dir ni dbang po dang bas thal sbyar nas// skyabasu nye bar
283b4(mdo sde): mchi ba smos ci 'tshal// phung po gsog ste nyams chung snying po med// stong pa sgyu ma chu zla 'dra bar/ ni// go'u tam khyod kyis de dag yang dag mkhyen// phung po
283b5(mdo sde): khams mkhas khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// sred pa'i srad bus dam du mdud bor te// sred pa'i 'gro la dra bar rab grags pa// srid pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyi dra ba de// bde gshegs khyod
283b6(mdo sde): kyis mkhyen pa'i 'od kyis dral// tshangs pa'i sgra skad lta bu'i gsung rjod pa// sho be ma lags mi 'gyur 'drid ma lags// phun tshogs gsung ba de dag thos nas ni// thal
283b7(mdo sde): sbyar te skyab su nye bar mchi// phyag gi mthil gyis sa 'dir reg pa na// nags tshal bcas par rnam pa drug g.yos kyang // 'dir ni zhabs la gnod par 'gyur ma mchis
283b8(mdo sde): bdud phyogs dgra bcom khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lha yi rgyal po chen dang mkhas pa gang // khyod kyi chos don nyer zhing mchis pa rnams// de dag so sor chos bstan pos nas/ 
284a1(mdo sde): zhabs gnyis la ni rab tu gtug pa bgyid// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i slas rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par
284a2(mdo sde): bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs na/ bud med kyi
284a3(mdo sde): dngos po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus na/ ji ltar bdag cag bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thab
284a4(mdo sde): ba dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos de bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la legs par bsha du gsal/ 
284a5(mdo sde): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i slas de dag la 'di skad ces pa// 'astsal to// sring mo dag de'i phyir legs par rab tu
284a6(mdo sde): nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ji ltar bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzog
284a7(mdo sde): bar 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ba ngas khyed la bshad par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das leg so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar sa dang / 
284a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sring mo dag chos gcig par ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skye ba'i dngos po 'thob cing myur du bla
284b1(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ chos gcig pu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu sems bskye/ 
284b2(mdo sde): pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / mi mnyam pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / 'jig rten gsum las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bas
284b3(mdo sde): cad la brjed pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa ste/ sring mo dag chos gcig pu 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te// skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing myur du bla na me/ 
284b4(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos gnyis dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ 
284b5(mdo sde): skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rje gas pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'a/ tshang rgya par 'gyur te/ gnyis gang ne na/ 'di lta ste/ 
284b6(mdo sde): phrag dog med pa dang / ser sna med pa'o// sring mo dag chos gnyis dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang
284b7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos gsum dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ 
284b8(mdo sde): skyes pa'i dngos pa satsang/ myung du ma na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gru te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus
285a1(mdo sde): sa pa gsum ya su dag pa dang / ngag mi sdom pa na yong su dag 'dang / med kyi rnam pa gsum mong su das pal// l+r-ing ma dam tshas pa sum pa di dag nga / 
285a2(mdo sde): ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 
285a3(mdo sde): ro sring mo dag gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
285a4(mdo sde): chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ g.yo med par sbyin pa byin pa dang / g.yo med par bslab pa'i gnas 'dzin pa dang / g.yo med
285a5(mdo sde): bar tshul khrims spen pa dang / g.yo med par ches nyan pa ste/ phreng mo dag chos bani po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes
285a6(mdo sde): pa'i dngos po 'thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na/ 
285a7(mdo sde): bud med bud med kyi dngos pa las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ 
285a8(mdo sde): lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos don du gnyer ba dang // chos thos nas tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas bud med kyi dngos po la smod pa dang / rtag par rgyun tu
285b1(mdo sde): skyes pa'i lus 'thob par sems skyes pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa ste/ sring mo dag chos lnga po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i
285b2(mdo sde): dngos po thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos drug dang ldan na/ bud med
285b3(mdo sde): bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thod cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ drug gang ni
285b4(mdo sde): na 'di lta ste/ drang ba dang / mnyen pa dang / sgyu med pa dang / na med pa dang / gsal ba dang / bcos pa med pa ste/ sring ma ma/ sa drug po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi
285b5(mdo sde): dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing // myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo gzhan
285b6(mdo sde): yang chos bdun dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thod cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par
285b7(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sku thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thob par bya ba'i
285b8(mdo sde): phyir/ chos rjesu dran pa dang / rang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun bsdus pa'i phyir/ dge 'dun rjesu dran pa dang / smon lam yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims/ 
286a1(mdo sde): rjesu dran pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad yongasu dor ba'i phyir/ gtong ba rjesu dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir lha rjesu dran pa dang / 
286a2(mdo sde): de dag dgrol ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la sems pa ste/ sring mo dag chos bdun po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing
286a3(mdo sde): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos brgyad dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos
286a4(mdo sde): po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing // myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mdze/ na par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ brgyad
286a5(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zas la sred pa ma yin pa dang / skom la sred pa ma yin pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma la sred pa ma yin pa dang / bskye
286a6(mdo sde): mos tshal du 'gro ba la sred pa ma yin pa dang / dgod pa dang 'job la sred pa ma yin pa dang / glu dang gar dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgra la sred pa ma yin pa dang / dga' ba dang rtse ba la
286a7(mdo sde): sred pa ma yin pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / dri dang lce dang / dga' ba la sred pa ma yin pa ste/ sring mo dge chos brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur
286a8(mdo sde): te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing / myur du med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos
286b1(mdo sde): dgu dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'chang
286b2(mdo sde): rgya bar 'gyur te/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chad par lta ba ma yin pa dang / rtag par lta ba ma yin pa dang / bdag tu smra ba ma yin pa dang / sems can du smra ba ma
286b3(mdo sde): yin pa dang / srog tu smra ba yin pa dang / gang zag du smra ba ma yin pa dang / 'byung bar lta ba ma yin pa dang / 'jig par lta ba ma yin pa dang / rgyu dang rkyen la 'jug pa
286b4(mdo sde): la mkhas pa yin te/ sring mo dag chos dgu po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang
286b5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos pa cu dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po la/ 
286b6(mdo sde): gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing / myur du bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs pa ra 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta
286b7(mdo sde): ste/ sems can thams cad la byams par gnas pa dang / gzhan gyi long spyod la brnab sems mi skyed pa dang / skyes pa'i sems su yid la byed pa skyed pa dang / srog gi phyir
286b8(mdo sde): yang brdzun gyi tshig mi smra ba dang / phra ma'i tshig mi smra ba dang / zhe gcod pa'i tshig mi smra ba dang / tshig khyal pa mi smra ba dang / pha rol po dga' zhing rtse ba la phra dog med cing
287a1(mdo sde): gnod sems kyi bag la nyal mngon par mi sgrub pa dang / yang dag par lta ba dang / ldan par gyur pa dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa ste/ sring mo dag chos
287a2(mdo sde): bcu po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las log te/ skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing // myung du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs
287a3(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang bud med zab mo la mos pa yin te/ de gzugs la dbu ba rdos pa lta bur so sor rtog kyang gzugs kyis rgyags shing myos
287a4(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ba dang / tshor ba la chu'i chu bu btad sor tog kyang bde ba'i tshor ba la rjes su chags pa med pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la khong khro bar mi 'gyur ba dang / bde ba yang / 
287a5(mdo sde): ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor bas kun rtsa gti mug par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'du shes lamig rku ba lta bur so sor rtog ste bud med kyi 'du shes
287a6(mdo sde): mi skyed skyes pa'i 'du shes mi skyed pa dang / 'du byed rnams la chu shing gi phung po lta bur so sor rtog pa ste/ 'du byed thams cad la snying po med par rtogs nas/ 'du byed thams
287a7(mdo sde): cad la mi gnas shing de la chags pa mi skyed pa dang / rnam par shes pa la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog ste/ sems dang yid dang rnam par rig pa de sgyu ma byas pa bzhin du rtog pa
287a8(mdo sde): nas/ chos thams cad la chags pa med/ zhe sdang med gti mug med pa dang / lus la 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ldan par so sor rtog ste/ 'di lta ste/ sa'i khams dang ldan pa dang
287b1(mdo sde): chu'i khams dang ldan pa dang / me'i khams dang ldan pa dang / rlung gi khams dang ldan par lus la so sor rtog go// lus 'di ni bsdus pa rtswa dang shing dang / bong ba dang / rtsig pa dang / mig yor
287b2(mdo sde): lta bu ste/ 'di bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin gyi/ phyin ci log sngon du song bas rgyu dang bya ba dang / las kyis byung ba'o// 
287b3(mdo sde): gzhan yang bud med mig la kha zas las skyes pa'i sha'i gong bu ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa rang bzhin gyis dben pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtogs pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / 
287b4(mdo sde): sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la ngo bo nyid kyis stong par darang bzhin gyis dben par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pa'o// gzhan yang bud med lus la gzugs
287b5(mdo sde): brnyan lta bur 'jug pa dang / ngag la brag cha lta bur 'jug pa dang / sems la sgyu ma lta bur 'jug pa'o// srid mo dag chos 'di dag dang ldan na bud med kyi dngos po las
287b6(mdo sde): gyur te/ skyes bu'i dngos po 'thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon
287b7(mdo sde): ba'i sras de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das las bud med kyi dngos po las bsgyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thob nas tshim zhing mgu ste/ yi rangs shing rab tu dga' nas
287b8(mdo sde): dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshig su bcad pa'adi dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod de/ 
288a1(mdo sde): dri med dri bral dri ma gcod mdzad pa// rdul med rdul bral lhag pa'i gzi brjid mnga'// pad+ma'i mdab 'dra'i spyan dang mdzes pa'i thugs// dri med zla zhal khyod la phyag/ 
288a2(mdo sde): 'tshal lo// dga' mdzad zhing mdzad nyon mongs gtsang mdzad pa// dga' ba ston pa rtag tu dgon par dgyes// rin chen 'byung gnas rin mdzod mnga' ba// yon tan mchog mnga' khyod la
288a3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo// pha rol gshegs pa gzhan gyi tshogs rnams 'jom// pad+ma lta bur stong mchog bka' mchid gsung // lam mchog sogs shing dam pa'i don ston pa// mchog
288a4(mdo sde): tu dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chu ba bani rgal bden pa ni bka' mched gsungs// sal rtsub 'di mig stsol mdzad pa// 'khor lo mchog gi mtshan ni stong mnga'ag/ 
288a5(mdo sde): rdul med pan mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs rdul du sal dam pa mthub che// mgon pa 'gro la mchog/ gi don mdzad pa// bdud kyi dpung rnams stobs med
288a6(mdo sde): 'dzeg mdzad pa/ bcom ldan stobs bcu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sred pa'i khri shing gcod mdzad mnyam pa med/ brnyes pa dag dang ma brnyes mtshungs pa'i thugs// 'jig rten mthar
288a7(mdo sde): 'byin snang ba'i sgron mdzad pa// rgya mtsho lta bu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dul zhing stobs bcu chen po dam pa mnga'// sbyin pa stsol cing rtag tu gtong la dgyes// dul ba zhi gnas
288a8(mdo sde): yon tan pha rol phyin// nyon mongs rdul pas la khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mtshan mchog 'gro ba kun la dam pa stsom// bya ba'i 'dren pa lha yi mchog pas mchog/ sems dang stongs
288b1(mdo sde): dang bzod pa nges par dgyes// mchod 'os bde gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mar me lta bur dri med zla ba 'dra// phyi nang nyon mongs dri ma gcod mdzad pa// nyon mongs spangs pa yon// 
288b2(mdo sde): tan bsod nams gter// zhi ba thugs zhi khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dad pa stsol ba dge sbyong ni mdzad pa// ston pa skye mched drug las thar mdzad pa// rjes su dran drug shin
288b3(mdo sde): tu yongs dag dran// rgyal ba dge sbyong rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dom gang 'od ni gser gyi kha dog lta// gsung snyan dam pa rnam par dag pa'i dbyangs// bcom ldan gang
288b4(mdo sde): zag dam pa skyes bu mchog/ srid gsum ni mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// shes rab mun pa ma mchis pha rol gshegs/ rtag tu dka' thub brtul zhugs rab tu spyad/ 
288b5(mdo sde): debazhin kho na gzhan min de bzhin min de gsung // mun par smon ma 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// bder gsheg/ sa grags ldan yon tan bas ma 'tshal// de dag nyid
288b6(mdo sde): kyi tshe spyi gnas ston pa// yon tan brjod pa mthong zhing grags bsgrags pa// mchog tu dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bsngags la gnas shing brtul zhugs dka' thub
288b7(mdo sde): 'phags// khengs dang nga rgyal rgyags pa gcod mdzad pa// ye shes 'byung gnas rdul bral blo glos mchog/ skye bo mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ka la bing ka tshangs
288b8(mdo sde): dbyangs thugs rje can// 'dod pa rtsong bgyid dri ma sel mdzad pa// phung ba yongs mkhyen mkhas pa bde bar gshegs// yon tan tshogs mchog mnga' la phyag 'tshalo// 
289a1(mdo sde): yon tan ston pa yon tan bstod mchod pa// zab mo blta bka' shin tu rtogs par bka'// 'dzum zhal zla 'dra gsong por gsung mdzad pa// bdud stobs 'jom/ 
289a2(mdo sde): mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mnyam thugs kha lo sgras rab dul thugs// kun gyis mngon bstod mnyam pa'i lam la gnas// thub pa mchog gsung dben pa'i bka' mchid can// 
289a3(mdo sde): bde gshegs mnyam thugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lam sol snyan pa shin tu 'jam pa'i dbyangs// bdud kyi bde mang 'jom mdzad nga rgyal dang // lhag pa'i nga rgyal med ma par
289a4(mdo sde): tshul mi 'chos// thub pa dge sbyong rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// stobs dang mthu dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan dgyes// rtag tu 'dod chags skyon dang rab rib bral// bde bas
289a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa mi g.yo gnas la bzhugs// stobs bcu mchag mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag dang / zhabs ni dri med dra bas 'brel/ skye dang rga dang 'chi ba mi
289a6(mdo sde): mngarag/ rgyal bar 'os pa 'gro ba kun las rgyal// na mkha' mnyam thugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i slas mi 'am ci'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi
289a7(mdo sde): stong po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'dzum pa mdzad do// 
289a8(mdo sde): 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer ba dag dum sna tshogs pathung ste/ 
289b1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sngon pa dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / les rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu'o// de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par 'od kyis
289b2(mdo sde): khyab par gyur te tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od zil du rlag par byas te/ slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
289b3(mdo sde): byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas
289b4(mdo sde): la btsugs te/ zhe sa dang bcas shing gus pa dang bcas par/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ tshigasu bcad pa mngon par bsgrubs pa 'dis
289b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don nus pa/ bde bar gshegs pa ci spang 'dzum ston pa// zla ba dri ma med zhal khyod la zhu// dri med gzi brjid mngar
289b6(mdo sde): ba khyod la zhu// gser gyi kha dog lta bu khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa// dam pa'i gzugs rnams mnga' ba khyod la zhu// 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad
289b7(mdo sde): khyod la nu// lha mi rnams kyis mchod pa khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa ci skang 'dzum ston pa/ sbyin dang dul la brtson pa khyod la zhu// tshul khrims yongasu dag gyur
289b8(mdo sde): khyod la zhu// bzod pa'i stobs dang stobs rtsol khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa ci smad 'dzum ston pa// brtson 'grus stobs dang mthu mnga' khyod la zhu// bsam gta
290a1(mdo sde): mngon shes dgyes pa khyod la zhu/ shes rab rnamapa' mnyam pa khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston la// rtag tu byams pa'i thugs can bya
290a2(mdo sde): la zhu// rtag tu thugs rje ldan pa khyod la zhu// dga' dang btang snyoms dgyes pa khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa// sred pa gsum po mthar 'byin khyod la zhu// 
290a3(mdo sde): spyan gsum dri ma me mnga' khyod la zhu// bdud rtsi chos rnams gsung ba khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa// bdud rnams tha mar 'byin pa khyod la zhu// ngan
290a4(mdo sde): pa'i tshogs rnams 'jom pa khyod la zhu// bden pa dam pa/  gzigs pa khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa ci ste du 'dzum ston pa// stobs bcu dam pa mnga' ba khyod la zhu// 
290a5(mdo sde): the tshom dag ni gcod mdzad khyod la zhu/ g.yon tam sto dza gis rgyas pa khyod la zhu// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
290a6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i slas rnams nga las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ lhag pa'i bsam pa bla na med pa yang dag par
290a7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bud med kyi dngos po las bsgyur zhing / skyes pa'i dngos po thob par bya ba'i phyir// nga'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pa mthong ngam/ 
290a8(mdo sde): gsol ba bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal kha/ kun dga' bo mi 'am ci'i slas brgyad khri ba'i stong po de dag gis lhag pa'i bsam pas dge
290b1(mdo sde): pa'i rtsa ba bskyed pa des 'di nas shi 'phos nas bud med bye dngas pa las gyur te/ skyes pa'i lus zab nas/ dga' ldas gyi lha rnams dang bskal pa mnyam par nu bar 'gyur ro// deng spes
290b2(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang lhan cig tu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di kun 'gro ba byed par 'gyur ro// byams
290b3(mdo sde): ba de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub thob pa na/ brnyes par byed cing dam pa'i chos kyang kun bgro ba byed par 'gyur ro// bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang rim
290b4(mdo sde): gyi brnyes par byed par 'gyur/ de dag gi dam pa'i chos kun 'gro bar byed par 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur ro// dri dag rim gyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yang dag par
290b5(mdo sde): bsgrub par bya ba thams cad kun tu rdzogs par byas nas/ gang gi tshe mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa bla na med pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
290b6(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ de dag sangs rgyas kyi ning der skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par yang 'gyur ro// de nas
290b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad do// ngan song ngan
290b8(mdo sde): 'gro thams cad kyi shul bkum mo// bde 'gro thams cad kyi shul rnam par sbyangaso// bdag cag byang chub kyi shul la rab tu bkod do// bdag cag chos kyi gter bston to// 
291a1(mdo sde): bdag cag ye shes kyis la bkod do// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'bar bar mdzad do// pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs bstan to// thabs la mkhas pa bstar/ 
291a2(mdo sde): to khadag cag byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du stsal to// chos bsgrags pas rab tu dga' bar mdzad do// dga' ba dang dang ba dang mchog tu dga' ba thob pas yang dag/ 
291a3(mdo sde): bar gzeng bstod do// chos zab mo bzod pa la dga' bar mdzad do// bdag cag phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu bkod do// bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das la byas pa gzob
291a4(mdo sde): lags kyi / byas pa mi gzo ba ma lags kyang / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sha dang khrag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la lan mi lon na/ gzhan gyis lan
291a5(mdo sde): ljon par mi 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal// de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' kha ci ga 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon
291a6(mdo sde): ba 'di ji srid cig na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'di'i ming ni ji skad ces bya bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems
291a7(mdo sde): dpa'i dge 'dun ni ji snyed cig tu 'gyur/ longs spyod dang yongasu spyod pa ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/ de yis sems can bkod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa
291a8(mdo sde): ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog 'thugs kyis mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad pang/ 
291b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer du ma kha dog tha dad pa kha dog brgya stong phrag du ma byung ste/ phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gi'i klung gi bye/ 
291b2(mdo sde): ma snyed snang bar byas te/ sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byas nas/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dun par byas te/ slar log/ 
291b3(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la lan stong du bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon chad ma mdzad/ 
291b4(mdo sde): ba'i 'dzum pa mthong nas/ stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
291b5(mdo sde): 'dug ste/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde log su thal mo sbya rab btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pas
291b6(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bde bar gshegs pa'i 'dzum pa ci 'dra ba// de rong phyung ste thug med pa yi zhing // rgya chen phyogs bcu'i gang ga'i klung mtha' yas// khyab pa de 'dra sngon chad yongs ma
291b7(mdo sde): mthong // tshangs pa de bzhin 'jig rten skyong ba dang // nor bu me dang nyi ma zla ba 'od// mi dbang gzi brjid kyi ni zil du rlag/ 'dzum mdzad 'di'i rgyu ni lung bstan gsol// su yi ched du
291b8(mdo sde): dpa' khyad kyis 'od srung bas// 'dir mi ngan song gsum zhi byang chub yan lag rdzogs// chos kyi rje yis bdag cag rnams kyi dogs pa sol// mi rnams kyi ni yid gnyis
292a1(mdo sde): ma las par ni 'khrus// 'bar kun dga' bas cag bgyid na// su srad de ring 'dzum pa bstan// de nas tshe nga ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan das la/ 
292a2(mdo sde): tshig su bcang ba 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas bskor ba byas te/ rang gi stan la 'dug// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe glang po che'i lta stangs kyis phyogs bcur gzig/ 
292a3(mdo sde): nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'dis tshul 'di lta bu dang / rgya che ba 'di lta bu dang / rnam pa 'di lta bu/ 
292a4(mdo sde): 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lag so// bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa mthong lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
292a5(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo mi'am ci'i rgyal po ldan pa/ 'di bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu/ rtsa brgyad na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
292a6(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ dkon mchog 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba dri ma med ces bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
292a7(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gyi rgyal po ba zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang me
292a8(mdo sde): rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo // kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba dri ma med pa de ni lag mthil ltar mnyam par 'gyur te/ bai DUR+Ya dkar po la/ 
292b1(mdo sde): grub pa lta bur sdang ba/ shin tu dri ma med pa/ shin tu rnam par dag ga/ mching bu med pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang tshad med par 'gyur te/ byang chub
292b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa/ rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob pa sha stag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni nam mkha' la khang pa
292b3(mdo sde): brtsegs pa na longs spyod do// de dag na mkha' la khang pa brtsegs pa na gnas pa na/ bai DUR+Ya dkar po las grub pa'i sa chen po der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal
292b4(mdo sde): bor snang ba de'i gzugs brnyan mthong bar 'gyuraro// de dag gis mthong ma thag tu chos 'di dag thams cad ni ga zugs brnyan lta bu'o zhes dran pa skye bar 'gyuraro// byang chub sems
292b5(mdo sde): dpa' gang chos gang la the tsom za ba na/ de de bzhin gshegs pas de la snang bar gyur pa de la zhu bar 'gyu ro// de ba/ zhin gshegs pa des kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la zhus
292b6(mdo sde): ba'i lung bstan pas sems rangs par mdzad par 'gyu ro// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis chos thos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyu ro// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams
292b7(mdo sde): de na grong dang grong khyer dang / grang rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal ba'i po zang 'khor yod par mi 'gyur// sems can de dag thams cad kyang rnamapa' la khang pa brtsegs
292b8(mdo sde): pan 'khor bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bud med du gdags pa'ang med par 'gyuro// sems can de dag thams cad kyang brda'i snying po las rngus te skye bar 'gyur/ 'jig sa
293a1(mdo sde): kyi khams de na kha zas su gdags pa med de/ sems can de dag thams cad ni bsam gtan la dga' ba dang / chos la dga' ba'i zas can du 'gyuraro// 'jig rten gyi
293a2(mdo sde): khams de na theg pa gzhan rnam par gzhag pa med de/ sems can de dag thams cad ni theg pa chen po la nges par 'gyur ba dag go// 'jig rten gyi khams de na tshul khrims log par
293a3(mdo sde): zhugs pa 'am/ lta ba log par zhugs pa 'am/ cho ga log par zhugs pa 'am/ 'tsho ba log par zhugs pa'i sems can 'ga' yang med par 'gyu ro// sems can de dag thams
293a4(mdo sde): cad ni nan tan dang ba ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la brtsom la grus brtsams par 'gyur ba sha stag go// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha 'am/ gzhan nu/ 
293a5(mdo sde): stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang dmigs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba med par 'gyu/ 'o// sems can de dag thams cad ni zab mo'i spyod yul
293a6(mdo sde): stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de na ming du btags pa tsam dang / 'du shes can tsam ma gtogs lha dang mi zhes tha dad du bya ba med par 'gyur/ 
293a7(mdo sde): sems can de dag thams cad ni yongasu spyod pa mtshungs par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon
293a8(mdo sde): tan gyi rgyal por snang ba de yang / lha dang ma rnams kyi skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir/ bar gyi bskal pa bcu tham 'tshang bar zhugs par 'gyur ro// bcom
293b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal por snang ba de gang gi tshe yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar 'di
293b2(mdo sde): nga'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
293b3(mdo sde): bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyis ston pa sangs rgyas brtsa
293b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar ba zhes bya ba lung bstan nas/ mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo bar gyi bskal pa der yang sangs
293b5(mdo sde): rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/ bar gyi// bskal pa de ni dkon mchog 'byung ba zhes brjod do// 
293b6(mdo sde): de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa bcom ldan 'das las lung bstan pa zos nas/ dga' zhing mgu ste yi rangs shing rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ byang chu
293b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i shugs kyis sa las steng gi bar snang la shing ta la bdun tsam du 'phags te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dad pa rgya cher spel ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa
293b8(mdo sde): ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi shes rab kyi spobs pas// de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smraso// chos 'di thams cad rab tu dben pa dang / dri ma med
294a1(mdo sde): de rnam pa'i ngo bo nyid// rgyud kyi dam pa 'di ni rnam shes na// de phyir de dag thub sras thu bor gyur// rmi lam bzhin du mthong ba cung zad med// thams cad med de gzung med gas
294a2(mdo sde): rang gsog// chos rnams thams cad rmi lam 'drar shes nas// 'dus byas dag la nam yang skyo ba med// la la sgyu ma'i rta dang glang chen dang // shing rta dpung bu chung dang bzhon mthong ba// dam pa'i don
294a3(mdo sde): du snying po med pa ltar/ phung po 'di dag sgyu 'dra snying po med// gzugs kyi rang bzhin dbu ba rdos pa bzhin// tshor ba 'di ni chu'i chu bur 'dra// 'du shes dag ni smig rgyu 'dra bar gsungs// 'dus byas
294a4(mdo sde): thams cad chu shing snying po med// srid gsum 'di na sems yid rnam par shes// rgyal bas de bzhin rgyu 'dra gsog tu gsung // gzugs kyi rang bzhin stong par rig nas ni// 'dus byas dag
294a5(mdo sde): la nam yang skye ba med// khams bzhi po 'di chos kyi dbyings 'dra dang // skye mched rnams ni grong stong lta bu dang // tshe sa 'di gsog dang gsob ltar rnam shes pa// de dag rgyal ba'i
294a6(mdo sde): chos mdzod 'dzin pa yin// rab tu dul phyir sbyin dang dul ba dang // de bzhin tshul khrims rnam dag tshul khrims dang // ga tu 'phags pa'i tshul gyis bzod mi zad// stong pa nyid phyir
294a7(mdo sde): brtson 'grus rnam par dag/ bsam gtan rang bzhin 'gyur ba med pa dang // de ltar shes rab chags med ma spros par// gang gi 'jug pa de la gyur pa de// pha rol phyin pa'i pha rol rab
294a8(mdo sde): tu byin// bdag med kho na nyid phyir byams pa mnyam// na mkha' lta bur gong du snying rje dag/ zhi phyir dga' dang btang snyoms bcas pa yin// lam 'di tshangs pa'i lam ste rtag tu zhi// bsdu ba
294b1(mdo sde): bzhi po khyad par 'phags pa 'di// rnam par 'dren pas rje su gzur phyir gsungs// 'dzin pa med cing rnam rtog gang med pa// de ni bsdu ba'i dngos pa'i pha rol phyin// sems can 'di dag pa dag
294b2(mdo sde): med sems can med// srog dang gso gang zag mi rnye do// dbang po drug 'di stong ste rab zhi bar// gang shes de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin// de ni gang du'ang bdag med rlom sems med// 
294b3(mdo sde): gnyis dang bral zhing ma chags spros med pa// sems can byang chub sems dpa' de dpal ldan// chos 'di snying po med de sgyu ma 'dra// gang du'ang mi 'ong nam yang 'gro mi 'gyur// chos
294b4(mdo sde): dbyings 'di yi gnas par rig nas ni// rgyal bas de ba bzhin nyid ni mnyam sangs rgyas// gang na'ang yod pa/ 'am med pa med mod kyi// rgyu las brten nas chos rnams
294b5(mdo sde): 'byung bas na/ mtha' la glog mthong 'jig pa lta bur ni// seM mas kyi khri shing de ltar shes par bya// rlung ni na mkha' mi ma gas rgyu ba bzhin// gzugs med sems ni 'dus byas dag la rgyu/ 
294b6(mdo sde): sems kyi rang bzhin rnam dag de shes nas// nyon mongs gzugs med sogs par mi 'gyur ro// lus ni rtsig pa rtsa dang lo ma 'dra// bems po rje med rdo shing ngan pa ltar// de yis snga ma'i
294b7(mdo sde): rang bzhin 'drar shes nas// lus kyi chos la gnas par mi byed do// tshig ni rtag tu gzung med rlung dang 'dra// ri dang phug gi brag cha lta bu ste// de 'drar sgra ni rab tu dben shes pa// sgra
294b8(mdo sde): rnams kun la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags med// bdag ni nam mkha' ngos gnas mi ltung ste// mkha' las ltung ba'i gnas kyang yod ma yin// chos 'di na mkha' 'dra ba rab tu bsgoms nas
295a1(mdo sde): ni de ltar sems can sems can med mtshungs gnas/ bskal pa brgya phrag mang por bsregs kyang ni/ ji ltar rnamapa' nam yang sngon ma tshig chos rnams thams cad rnam par
295a2(mdo sde): 'drar shes pa// de sreg bskal che zhing rnams brgyar yang 'gro/ ri dang ri rag khor khor yug ri// de bzhin ri dang bcas pa'i sa rnams kun// nam pa'i ngos kyis bye bar rig nas de// rdzu 'phrul/ 
295a3(mdo sde): stobs kyis bye ba'i zhing du 'gro/ sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dag dang // sa gzhi 'di dag na mkha'i ngos mnyam par// dpa'o tshul 'di khong du chud pa dag/ ma khas las bye ba mtha' yas zhing du
295a4(mdo sde): 'gro/ srid pa gsum na sgra dang skad kyi bag/ bzang ngan de bzhin 'bring po ci yod pa// de yi mtha' ma bskal pa brgyar brjod kyang // sngon gyi rang bzhin mi snang rgyu ba med// rang 'byung ba ni
295a5(mdo sde): mtshan mchog ma yin yang // sems kyi chos kyi gzugs kyis rab tu phye// sems dang yid ni mtshungs par dben par 'gyur// rgyal ba thams cad ches mtshungs nyid phyir
295a6(mdo sde): mnyam sngon gyi srid par byang chub spyad spyod cing // dge ba brgya stong rab tu bsags nas ni// byang chub mnyam/ zhing mnyam par rabang shes pa// grags pa chen po rnams ni
295a7(mdo sde): lung bstan 'gyur// chos rnams kun ni rang yul yongs dag ste// mtha' yas phyir ni rgyal ba'i yul du mnyam// mnyam nyid 'di dag gang gis rab shes pa// yon tan ldan pa ded
295a8(mdo sde): lung bstan 'gyur// bdag ni gzugs min chor min 'du shes min// sems dpa' ma yin rnam par shes med kyang // byang chub khong du chud pas bdag lung bstan// phung po khams kyi
295b1(mdo sde): bdag ni lung ma bstan// bzod pa gang zhig bzod ma nas zhi yis// skad cig pa ni za dang 'dra min la// mtshungs med mi skye ba la bzod pa na// mi dbang 'gyur nas rgyal bas lung / 
295b2(mdo sde): bstan to// chos rnams kun dang bdag tu rang bzhin mnyam// bdag ni bdag med stong pa'i rang bzhin te// stong pa namakha' 'dra ba'i ngo ba nyid// byang chub rtag tu mkha' mnyam rang / 
295b3(mdo sde): bzhin no// zad par bya phyir zad par shes mi nus// mi zad pa ni zang mi 'gyur// zang pa'i sgo yi chos rnams kun ma skyes// bzod dang ldan la sangs rgyas lung ston to// mtshan med gnas
295b4(mdo sde): 'jug pa yi gnas med de// yang dag 'dus ma byas/ pa dus las grol// ma byas byed du ma bcug byung // ba min// de bzhin nyid 'drar rgyal bas bdag lung bstan// 
295b5(mdo sde): gal te bdag ni lung bstan 'gyur snyam na// chos lam tshul la mi mnyam sbyor ma yin// sems dang yid kyis sbyor ba sbyor ma yin// chos sbyor khyad par 'phags 'di mtshungs shing/ 
295b6(mdo sde): mnyam// khyed cag thams cad sa yi steng na 'khod// bdag ni na mkha'i dkyil na rnam par gnas// sa dang na mkha' mnyam par shes nas ni// srid pa gsum na chags med ye shes
295b7(mdo sde): 'jug de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras nas// steng gi bar snang las babs te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te / bcom
295b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas ni bdag gi ched du byung ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcoM ldan 'das bdag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i
296a1(mdo sde): spyod padon ma mchis par ma bgyis te/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis bdag ma skus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis bsam pa thams cad
296a2(mdo sde): yongs su bskang ba'i slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems bapa' kha cig 'di lta bu'i sems
296a3(mdo sde): te/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang las dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
296a4(mdo sde): sems bskyed snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dang / da' lha'i cod pan gyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ bcom ldan
296a5(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas de bzhin gshegs pa gang las byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs
296a6(mdo sde): ba de'i mtshan ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa rgyas pa tshad med pa bsam
296a7(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i bskal ba la 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
296a8(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs
296b1(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen phung po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
296b2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen phung po de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni bye ba phrag drug cur gyur te/ thams cad kyang brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ bzod pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
296b3(mdo sde): ba'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go// de'i tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba khrag drug cu thub par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba zhes bya ba de yang baiDUR+Ya las grub pa/ rgyan thams
296b4(mdo sde): cad kyis brgyan pa/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris lta bur khang khyim dang / longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dang bza' ba dang btung ba bsams
296b5(mdo sde): pa tsam gyis 'byor pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de natheg pa chen po ma gtogs par theg pa gnas// rnam par gzhag pa med par gyur to// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i
296b6(mdo sde): dus na/ gling bzhi pa dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos 'dzin ces bya ba rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ de'i slas ni stong phrag bzhi bcu yod do// de'i bu ni stong tham
296b7(mdo sde): ba yod do// dpa' ga/ rtul phong ba yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa sha stag go// rigs kyi rgyal pos 'dzin des bcom ldan 'das
296b8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu la/ lo bye ba tham par yid du 'ong ba'i chos gos dang / na bza' dang / mal cha
297a1(mdo sde): dang na pa'i gsos smam dang / yo byang rnams dang / bde bar sbyar ba bde bal reg par gnas par bya ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas/ de nas bcom ldan
297a2(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de la mchod pa dpag tu med pa byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar bstan nas/ bud med pani stong po de dag dang / bu stong po de dang / srog
297a3(mdo sde): chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas byang chub tu sems bskyed nas kyang ga lo bye bar bcom
297a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de la bsnyen bkur byas so// de nas gzhan zhig na bu thu bo brtul zhugs yongasu dag pa zhes bya ba rgyal por bcug nas/ rgyal
297a5(mdo sde): srid thams cad bor te/ sgra dang kha spu bregs nas/ dgos ngur smrig bgos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // 
297a6(mdo sde): de na rgyal ba'i bu de dag gis kyang rim gyis bu thu bo re re rgyal por bcug nas/ pa'i rjesu rab tu byung bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu de ltar na/ rnam grangs 'dis de bzhin gshes
297a7(mdo sde): pa de'i tshe'i tshad ring bar gyur to// rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa de las rab tu byung nas/ rgyal bu gzhon tha chung snying rje'i blo zhes bya ba gcig pu ma gto
297a8(mdo sde): te/ de ni chos kyi rgyal srid byed pa chad pa med pa dang / mtshon cha med par chos 'thun par dbang byed du bcu go// rigs kyi bu de ltar rgyal pos 'dzin de bu dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das
297b1(mdo sde): de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas thog ma dang bar ma dang tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa rin cher phung po de'i dam pa'i chos rab tu bzung // rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor
297b2(mdo sde): los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sa 'dzin ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhag zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tsom za 'am/ yid gnyi su gyur pa lta na/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// 
297b3(mdo sde): de ci'i 'byor zhe na/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ldan pa 'ang de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po sa 'dzin ces bya bar gyur to// rgyal po de'i bur gyur pa de dag thams cad ni da ltar phyogs bcu na byang chub sem
297b4(mdo sde): dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// rigs kyi bu de ltar na mi 'am ci'i rgyas po ljon pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ba rin chen phung po de las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
297b5(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang po sems bskyed tshun tshad de'i bar thams cad du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang
297b6(mdo sde): dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang / ma bral bar gyur te/ 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs kyang myur du yang dag par bsgrubs pas 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin
297b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gyi rgyal por snang ba zhes bya bar 'gyur zhes lung yang bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
297b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod par gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
298a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i mkhyen pa dang ldan pa/ 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bgyis pa'i rgyu bas na/ yun ring du lags pa yang bcom
298a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i mkhyen pas gzigs pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ de bzhin
298a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang / mthong ba dang ldan pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu gang sems can
298a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi 'das pa'i sems kyi rgyud zad pa/ 'gags pa bral ba/ rnam par gyur pa/ rgyu gang dag las sems kyi rgyud de dag byung ba dang / rgyu gang dag med pas zad pa dge ba'
298a5(mdo sde): mi dge ba 'am/ lung du bstan pa 'am/ lung du ma bstan pa de/ dag thams cad rnam pa dang bcas/ gzhi dang bcas// gtan tshogs dang bcas par de bzhin gshegs pas
298a6(mdo sde): rab tu sheso// da ltar byung ba'i sems can thams cad kyis mas kyi rgyud 'byung ga dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ lung du bstan pa 'am/ lung ma bstan pa yang rung ste/ sems gang
298a7(mdo sde): gi 'og tu sems gang 'byung ba de dag thams rnam pa dang bcas/ yul phyogs dang bcas/ gzhi ci las gyur pa dang bcas par de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so// gang ma 'ongs/ 
298a8(mdo sde): pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rgyud dang sems can gyi rgyud dang sems las byung ba'i chos dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ lung du bstan pa 'am/ lung du ma bstan pa yang rung ste/ sems
298b1(mdo sde): gang gi 'og tu sems gang 'thung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa dang bcas/ yul phyogs dang bcas/ gni ci las gyur pa dang bcas par de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu/ 
298b2(mdo sde): shes so// rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pasangs rgyas ni thog pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen
298b3(mdo sde): pa thogs pa mi mnga' ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags sum 'bum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal
298b4(mdo sde): bo ljon pas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' da// nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa zhag bdun bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsnyen pa
298b5(mdo sde): nas yongasu longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi khang khyim deng 'khor gyi khams de yang bcom ldan 'das la phul te 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
298b6(mdo sde): kha thugs brtse ba'i slad du 'dir gshegs shing bzhugs par gsol/ de na skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo
298b7(mdo sde): phal po che'i don dang / mi 'am ci dang / dri za dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i bu dri ma med pa'i mig ces
298b8(mdo sde): bya bas bcom ldan 'das la nor bu rin po che'i dra ba phul nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci bdag cag bla na med pa yang
299a1(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugasu lags kyang bdag cag ni sil snyan dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang / glu dang gar la rab tu chags/ me tog/ 
299a2(mdo sde): dag spos dang / gdug pa dang / drug pa dang / phye ma bag ma mchis par dga' zhing rtse ba lags na/ ji ltar bdag cag bag mchis par 'gyur zhing byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par
299a3(mdo sde): bsgrub par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos rin po che'i phyag rgya'i sgo'i gdams ngag bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la sul bar gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am
299a4(mdo sde): ci'i rgyal po'i bu dri ma med pa'i mig la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bzhin bzang dag de'i phyin chad sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs de dag las byang chub yongasu smin par byed pa'i chos drug cu rtsa bzhi
299a5(mdo sde): 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs par bya'o// drug cu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa'i sgra 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi sgra dang / bdag med pa'i sgra dang / zhi ba'i sgra dang / mngon par/ 
299a6(mdo sde): 'du mi byed pa'i sgra dang / dben pa'i sgra dang / mi skye ba'i sgra dang / dngos pa med pa'i sgra dang / 'byung ba med pa'i sgra dang / gnas med pa'i sgra dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi grwa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i sgra
299a7(mdo sde): dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sgra dang / sems can med pa'i sgra dang / srog med pa'i sgra dang / gang zag med pa'i sgra dang / sbyin pa'i sgra dang / tshul khrims kyi sgra dang / bzod pa'i sgra dang / brtson 'grus kyi
299a8(mdo sde): smangang khasam gtan gyi sgra dang ba shes rab kyi sgra dang / byams pa'i sgra dang / snying rje'i sgra dang / dga' ba'i sgra dang / btang snyoms kyi sgra dang / 'ongs pa med pa'i sgra dang / 'gro ba med pa'i sgra dang / 
299b1(mdo sde): rgyu ba med pa'i sgra dang / gnas med pa'i sgra dang / brtan pa med pa'i sgra dang / stong pa'i sgra dang / mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgra dang // 
299b2(mdo sde): 'byung ba med pa'i sgra dang / rten pa'i sgra dang / rten med pa'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / byang chub tshad med pa'i sgra dang / dran pa te/ 
299b3(mdo sde): bar gnag pa'i sgra dang / yang dag par spong ba'i sgra dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i sgra dang / dbang po'i sgra dang / stobs kyi sgra dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi sgra dang / lam gyi sgra dang
299b4(mdo sde): zhi gnas kyi sgra dang / lhag mthong gi sgra dang / thabs kyi sgo dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po'i sgra dang / sems can yod/ su smin par bya ba'i sgra dang / bdud tshar bcad pa'i sgra dang / 
299b5(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung ba'i sgra dang / chos thams cad skye ma dang / rmi lam dang / gzugs brnyan dang / chu zla dang / bre ga cha lta bu'i sgra dang / chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa'i sgra dang
299b6(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i yongs su mi skyo ba'i sgra dang / 'byung ba'i sgra dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad kyi sgra dang / lbu ba'i dang / chu'i chu spur dang / smig rgyu dang / chu shing gi phung po dang / 
299b7(mdo sde): sgyu ma dang / snying po med pa'i sgra dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bya zhing chos sgrub pa'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzhin bzang dag de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi mthus sil snyan dang / 
299b8(mdo sde): gru dbyangs de dag las gang gis khyed bag yod par byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgrub par 'grus bu lta bu'i sgra/ 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas thams cad dang / 
300a1(mdo sde): ldan pa'i 'khor de mtshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsal te/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du sangs rgyas ba/ 
300a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub 'di byin gyis brlabs kyis shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa dang / chos bstan pa dang / ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa'
300a3(mdo sde): rnams shin tu yongasu bzung ba ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems
300a4(mdo sde): dpa' rnams shin tu yongasu bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' yongasu bzung bas/ sems can thams cad yongasu bzung bar 'gyur ro// 
300a5(mdo sde): grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' yongasu bzung ba gang yin pa de sems can the mas cad kyi don nyid do// de ltar na sems can thams cad
300a6(mdo sde): kyi ched du de dag gi go cha gang gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa 'khor ba ltas mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du gzud par 'gyur ba'i go cha chen po gyon no// grogs po dag
300a7(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar ngad ltar bzhugs kyang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongasu bzung ba mdzad pa gang yin pa des sems can thams cad yongasu gzung
300a8(mdo sde): ba yin par rig par bya'o// grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' gos dpa bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / rna ba'i gso sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis rim gro
300b1(mdo sde): byas pa ni sems can thams cad la rim gror byas par 'gyur ro// grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' la bde bar sbyar bar nye bar bsgrub pa ni/ sems can thams cad la bde bar
300b2(mdo sde): sbyang ba nye bar bsgrubs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ grogs po dag tha na byang chub sems dpa'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa gang yin pa de thams cad kyang sems can
300b3(mdo sde): thams cad la snying rje chen po rab tu 'thob pa dang ldan pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir yongasu 'dzin to// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na
300b4(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bcom ldan 'das kyis
300b5(mdo sde): legs par gsungs pa la rje su yi rang nas/ lha'i me togarnam pa mang po kha dog sna tshogs pas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po lnga
300b6(mdo sde): pas 'di snyam du bsam te/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi rdzu 'phru la gyis sam/ gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis/ bdag gi gnas bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril gshegs
300b7(mdo sde): pa ni bdag gi tshe ma yin gyis/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir shing rta gang la bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas/ 
300b8(mdo sde): pa bzhugs pa de lta bu'i shing rta bkod pa bsgrubs te/ shing rta de yang bdag 'khor dang bcas pas drangs nas/ de ltar na bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la
301a1(mdo sde): mchod pa byas par 'gyuraro snyamo// de nas mi 'aci'i rgyal po ljon pas yid las byung ba'i rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta 'bang du dpag tshad lnga pa khyen du dpag tshad/ 
301a2(mdo sde): lnga pa kha khyer rin po che sna tshogs kyis bskor pa/ shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis leg par brgyan pa/ steng du rin po che'i dra ba zes pa rin po che'i skud pas mig mangs ri su bres pa mngon pa
301a3(mdo sde): sprul nas/ shing rta de la bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan seng ge'i khri bkra ga bltan sdug pa 'phang du mi bdun yod pa/ ras bcos bu zung brgya stong mang po bkram pa mngon par sprul byang chub sems dpa'
301a4(mdo sde): thams cad dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad kyi stan yang so sor mngon par sprul te/ gang dag bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan cing nam ring du 'brang ba brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong
301a5(mdo sde): dang 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gi stan yang shing rta de'i steng du ci rigs par sprul to// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas de lta
301a6(mdo sde): bu'i shing rta bkod pa de sprul nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du shing rta 'di la ji ltar gdan
301a7(mdo sde): bshams pa rnams la 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugasu gsol/ de nas seng ge'i khri de la bcom ldan 'das kyang bzhugs/ byang chub sems dpa' dang dge slong gi 'dun dang 'khor
301a8(mdo sde): thams cad kyang tse rtogs par 'khod do// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ldan pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stabs kyis shing rti lag pa g.yas pas thangs te/ shing bdud srid kyi steng gi bar snang la sngags
301b1(mdo sde): nas/ de nas mi 'am ci'i mo brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag thams cad dang / bu brgyad stong po de dag dang / gzhan yang mi 'am ci dang / dri za dang lto 'phye chen po brgya stong brag du ma dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa
301b2(mdo sde): nyid kyang rin po che'i thag pa thogs nas shing ta la btags te/ namakha' las drang so// de nas bcom ldan 'das steng gi bar snang gi shing rta la bzhugs shing na mkha'i dkyil nas gshegs pa la/ 
301b3(mdo sde): mi 'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis sil snyan dang glu dbyangs blangs nas/ mchod pa byed de mdun du 'dong zhing / bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod
301b4(mdo sde): de/ mi'am ci mo brgyad bri bzhi stong ngo // gzugs kyi dam pa dang na ldan pa dag/ sil snyan rnams ni rab tu dkrol bgyid cing // yang dag bsngags pas 'dren la bstod pa bgyid// mtshan mcho
301b5(mdo sde): bsod nams kyis ni gzi brjid gyur// gzugs mchog mthong na dga' bar bgyid pa'i gzugs// bden parayon tan la ni rtag gnas pa/ yon tan mtsho chen khyed la phyag
301b6(mdo sde): 'tshalo// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams dang khyod mi 'dra// g.yas g.yon na yang rnam par mthong ma myong // ji ltar ri rab brtan zhing mi g.yo ba// de ltar khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// chags pa ma ma
301b7(mdo sde): par yang mkha' las mchi// na mkha' lta bur dag cing dri mi mnga'// bcom ldan nyon mongs pas la la phyag 'tsha lo// lha dang lha min dbang dang srin po dang // brgya byin tshangs pa dang ni dag pa'i/ 
301b8(mdo sde): lhaganyi ma zla ba skar mar bcas pa'i 'od/ khyod kyi mdzodzad spus 'od ni ma mchis gyur// shes rab 'byung gnas shes rab rgya mtsho ldan// sems can kun gyi sems kyi spyod la mkhas/ 'jig
302a1(mdo sde): rten gsum na 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod/ 'jig rten grags pa'i 'bas la phyag 'tshal// bdud bani ma yi skyon rnams bsal ba po// bden pa pa ni la bsgom zhing dpyod pas
302a2(mdo sde): pabardzu 'phrul bzhi'i stobs kyis bsnyengs mi mnga'// sangs rgyas gshegs pas gshegs te gshegs pa mdzes// bskal pa brgyar yang skyo ba mi mnga' zhing // rtag tu dul la thugs ni mnyam par/ 
302a3(mdo sde): gzhag legs par gsungs pas 'gro ba tsham mdzad kyang // khyod ni tshig dang skad la gnas ma lags// khyod kyi gsung ni yid 'ong rab tu snyan// zhing brgya dag tu thogs pa med par mchika/ sgra de
302a4(mdo sde): sems can gang gis thos gyur pa// de dag thams cad bde bas tshim par 'gyur// sems can kha lo sgyur ba spu gcig tu// stong gsum rgya mtsho'i cha ba rnams zhugs gyur kyang // sems
302a5(mdo sde): can rags pa rnams la'ang mi gnod la// rdzu 'phrul la yang skyon ni yong mi gangal/ stong gsum gyi ni ri rab ri bo dag/ phyag gcig gi ni mthil du bzhag/ na su// zhing mang bye ba dag tu
302a6(mdo sde): gshegs mdzad kyang / khyod kyi sku yi stobs ni zhum ma mchis// bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag bsam yas nas// brtul zhugs dka' thub tshul khrims yon tan dang // sbyin dang / dul dang sdom dang
302a7(mdo sde): bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab shin tu bslabs// sangs rgyas bye ba mang la bsnyen bkur mdzad// de dag rnams kyis bshad pa'i chos kyang bzung // thugs rje ldan zhing 'gro/ 
302a8(mdo sde): pa dzin gyi phyir// khyong la yongasu skyo ba'i thugs mi mnga'// rim gro ma bgyis zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / rim gro bgyis pas mtho bar 'gyur ma lags// dogs lta bur snyoms shing mig ma
302b1(mdo sde): ste/ 'jig rten chos gnas mi gos pad+ma bzhin// chos rnams stong pa mtshan ma ma mchis dang // chu zla 'dra zhing sgyu ma lta bu dang // dbu ba rdos 'dra rmi lam klog 'dra dang // smig rgyu'i mtshan
302b2(mdo sde): nyid lta bur rab tu mkhyen// ngo bo nyid kyis gang zag bdag ma mchis// gdod nas stong zhing ba mo rjes ma mchis// nam pa' lta bur dag cing dri ma mchis// dngos po bas par dngos po
302b3(mdo sde): mchis 'dra// las dang bya ba rgyu dang rkyen rnams las// zung ba lags kyi rjes ni ma mchis par// tshul 'di rnam par spyang ba mdzad pas na// de phyir khyad ni rdzogs sangs rgyas shes
302b4(mdo sde): bgyi/ gang dag 'dren pa mthong zhing thos gyur pa// de dag la ni ngan song 'jigs ma mchis// de dag bde 'gro dag tu mchog gzhol te// srog chags de rnams kyi ni rnyed pa
302b5(mdo sde): lags bdag cag rnams kyis gang zag dam pa khyod// na tu mchod pas mchod pa bgyis nas// byang chub tu ni sems kyang bskyed bgyis te// gang zag mchog 'drar
302b6(mdo sde): thams cad 'gyur bar shog/ na mkha' la ni rtag tu nus kyang gda'// rgya mtsho'i cha ba ni bas bgyir nus kyang gang 'o// gnyi zla mkha' las sar ni ltung gda' yi// sangs rgyas yon
302b7(mdo sde): tanabs par 'gyur mi ganga'// de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta la bzhugs te/ na mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas gshegs pas gshegs shing / gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i sku lnga
302b8(mdo sde): 'od gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od phyung ba dang / 'od des rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po dang / bya rgod kyi phu
303a1(mdo sde): ri yang rab tu khyab par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta des rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer dang / bya rgod kyi bung ba'i rig la ba der gshegasaso// de nas rgyal/ 
303a2(mdo sde): po'i khab kyi grong khyer na/ grong khyer gyi rgyal po ma skyes dgra blon po dang rgyal bu dang / tshong dpon dang / grong rdal ba dang / khyim bdag du bcas pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge
303a3(mdo sde): dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams 'od des bskul nas/ phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ me tog dang bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
303a4(mdo sde): thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das bsu ba'i phyir rings pa ri/ das par rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byu/ dang te/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril bcom ldan 'das ga la bder das
303a5(mdo sde): / ljon pa'i slas rnams shing rta 'dren bzhin du sil snyan brgyad khri ba ni stong byed do// mi 'am ci mo'i rol mo sil snyan gyi sgra des bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri thams cad du grags
303a6(mdo sde): par gyur to// de ltar mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa dpung dang bcas 'khor dang bcas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bcom ldan 'das namakha'i dkyil nas khyer te/ bya rgod kyi phung ba'i ri la
303a7(mdo sde): gzhag/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shing ta de las babs nas/ rang gi gnas su gdan bshams pa la bzhug so// byang chub sems dpa' di dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / thams
303a8(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i 'khor kyang shing rta de las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas bcom ldan 'das la kun nas bskor/ 
303b1(mdo sde): te/ rang rang gi stan la 'khod do// 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag kyang shing rted las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs laman
303b2(mdo sde): bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra blon po dang / rgyal bu dang / tshong dpon dang khyim bdag dang / grong rdal ba dang bcas pa dang / dge
303b3(mdo sde): slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams kyis me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / 
303b4(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ji ltar thogs pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bo phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la sku
303b5(mdo sde): ma mnyel tam/ bde ba reg par gnas sam zhes gso/ la nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis 'di
303b6(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci'i rgyale ba ljon pa g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas te/ shing rta la bzhugs pa na mkha'i dkyil nas
303b7(mdo sde): drangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'khor dang bcas pas ci zhig 'thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des mi 'am ci'i
303b8(mdo sde): rgyal po ljon pa slas dang bcas bu dang bcas g.yog dang bcas pas 'dir byang chub tu sems bskyed nas// de dag thams cad nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du mngon par
304a1(mdo sde): shes pa las mi nyams pa rab tu thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du phan tshun 'gro bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen/ 
304a2(mdo sde): bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur/ lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung ba la brtson par 'gyur/ sems can
304a3(mdo sde): yongs su smin par bya ba la spro bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po ljon pa la 'di skad ces smraso// mi 'am ci'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das kyis
304a4(mdo sde): khyad kyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa mdzad pas khyad kyi/ rnyed pa legs par rnyed kyis// khyed kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dri las shes shig khabs kyang 'thab par 'dod de/ mi 'am chus
304a5(mdo sde): rgyal po ljon pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po dge ba'i ba 'di thams cad bdag gis khyad dang sems na thams cad la dbulo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po
304a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ni sems can thams cad dang thun mongs ma yin pa de gang yang med do// rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni ser sna
304a7(mdo sde): can ma yin te/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la ser sna mi skyed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad la gtong yang yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur/ 'gyung bar mi 'gyur
304a8(mdo sde): ras rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang thams cad mthun par yongasu bsngos pa de yang sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur//  ci'i phyir le ma rgyal
304b1(mdo sde): bo byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub ni sems can thams cad kyi gnas byed pa dang / sems can la sbyor ba dang / sems can gyi phyir 'brang bar 'gyur// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis
304b2(mdo sde): gang gis phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzo nur gyur pa rnyed de/ de gnyis las khyed kyis dam pa'i chos thos nas/ des mi shes pa'i mun pa dang / gti mug
304b3(mdo sde): gi ling tog chen pos mtshams med pa'i 'gyod pa byung ba'i sems bsal nas/ khyod kyis chos la chos kyi snang ba chen po thob ste/ chos kyi snang ba des khyed da ltar sgrib pa med pa thob cing
304b4(mdo sde): gnas pas khyod kyis kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// rgyal po chen po de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gus par byas te/ ci nas kyang chos kyi tshig dang / 
304b5(mdo sde): yige 'bru cig thos pa yang brjed par mi 'gyur ba dang / chung ba bar mi 'gyur ba dang / kun tu bzung ba dang / yongasu bsrung ba'i phyir/ bdag chos kyi snod du 'gyur bar bya'o// 
304b6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cong ban gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi snod du 'gyur ba lags/ 
304b7(mdo sde): de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
304b8(mdo sde): dpa' chen pa chas sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan na/ chos kyi sdod du 'gyur te/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i snod sangs rgyas kyi
305a1(mdo sde): byin gyi brlabs dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / byang chub kyi lam nye bar rton pa'i snod sbyor ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba khyad par du 'gro ba'i snod du lhag pa'i
