305a2(mdo sde): bsam pa dang / mang du thos pa'i snod dran pa dang / lam la 'jug pa'i snod blo gros dang / don rtogs pa rje su rtogs pa'i snod rtogs pa dang / longs spyod chen po'i snod sbyin pa dang / 
305a3(mdo sde): bsam pa yongasu rdzogs pa'i sdong tshul khrims dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thob pa'i snod bzod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'grub pa'i snod bcu
305a4(mdo sde): 'grus dang / sems la su rung ba'i snod bsam gtan dang / dogs pa thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i snod shes rab dang / sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa'i snod
305a5(mdo sde): byams pa dang dbul zhing nyam thag pa thams cad bskyab pa'i snodasnying rje dang / chos la dga' ba'i sdod dga' ba dang // rjesu chags pa dang / khong khro ba spang ba'i snod btang
305a6(mdo sde): snyoms dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'dzin du 'jug pa'i snod dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod thos pa tshol bas ngoms mi myong ba dang / mi ltos
305a7(mdo sde): pa'i snod rab tu 'byung ba dang / don nyung zhing bya ba nyung ba'i snod dgon pa la gnas pa dang / bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa'i snod dben pa la dga' ba dang / sems can yongs
305a8(mdo sde): sbyin par bya ba'i sdong bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / chos snang ba'i snod dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa dang / thos pa'i chos thams cad 'dzin pa'i snod gzungs dang / sems can thams
305b1(mdo sde): kyi the tsom gcod pa'i snod spobs pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba'i snod sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod chos rjesu dran pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba srung ba'i
305b2(mdo sde): snod zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad spong ba'i snod stong pa nyid la mos pa dang / mthar 'dzin pa thams cad yong su spong ba'i snod rten cing 'brel par
305b3(mdo sde): 'thung ba dang / mi 'khrugs shing phyed par lung ston pa'i snod mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi
305b4(mdo sde): sdod phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag drang ldan na/ chos kyi snod du rig par bya'o// bstan pa 'di
305b5(mdo sde): bshad pa na srog chags khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzon/ sa pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ tshig 'di/ skad ces bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad
305b6(mdo sde): kyang 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi snod du gyur cig/ bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du bstan pa'i chos de lta bu'i snod du gyur cig ces smraso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am
305b7(mdo sde): ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mi 'am ci'i bdag po khyod kyi 'khor 'di skyo bar gyur du 'ong gis khyod rang gi gnasu song shig/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas gso
305b8(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das gang yongasu skyo ba de byang chub sems dpal nas mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ni skyo ba bzod par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang
306a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yongasu skyo ba lags/ ji ltar na yongasu mi skyo ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bani
306a2(mdo sde): dang ldan na yongasu skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi khams tshad med pa thos na skrag pa dang / 'khor ba tshad med pa thos na skrag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes tshad
306a3(mdo sde): med pa zos na skrag pa dang / bsod nams tshad med pas mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po 'grub pa thos na skrag pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang
306a4(mdo sde): ldan na/ yongasu skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongasu mi skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe naka 'di lta ste/ sem
306a5(mdo sde): can gyi khams tshad med pa de yang bdag gis yongasu mya ngan las 'ja 'a bar bya'o zhes zos na mi skrag pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrub pa'i phyir 'khor ba tshad med pa yongs su
306a6(mdo sde): gzung bar bya'o zhes thos na mi skrag pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshad med med pa de bdag gis yong su rdzogs par bya'o zhes thos na mi skrag pa dang / bsod nams tshad
306a7(mdo sde): med pa bsogs pas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po 'grub ste/ bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o zhes thos na mi skrag pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi
306a8(mdo sde): di dag dang ldan na/ yongasu mi skyo bar rig par bya'o// me 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongasu skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 
306b1(mdo sde): dis ste/ skabs skab su nyan thos kyi zag pa 'dad pa dang / skabs sab su rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa na yal bar 'dor zhing yong
306b2(mdo sde): su 'dzin pa dang / gzhan yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi pa 'di dag dang ldanan
306b3(mdo sde): yongasu skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongasu mi skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rab
306b4(mdo sde): nyan nas cang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis mi 'dod pa dang / lus dang srog kyang 'dor zhing dam par chos srung ba dang / dpag tshad
306b5(mdo sde): stong du 'gro zhing gzhan dag byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jun ba ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag pa byang chub sems dpa' chas bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongasu mi skye
306b6(mdo sde): bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongasu skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ slong ba mthong na yongasu skyob
306b7(mdo sde): dang bsod snyoms byed par sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa dang / mang du thos pa tshol ba la mi brtson pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams gzhan la mi ston pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdan
306b8(mdo sde): po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongasu skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yong su mi skyo bar
307a1(mdo sde): rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ slong ba la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes skyed cing / zhe 'gras pa'i sems med la/ bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med/ tshur shog len
307a2(mdo sde): par 'ongs zhes bya ba'i tshig smras pa dang / bdag bde ba la mi tshigs shing sems can thams cad la bde ba rab tu sbyin pa dang / mang du thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms shing / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyang
307a3(mdo sde): gzhan dag la rgya cher rab tu ston cing / zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos de gzhan la rab tu ston pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongasu
307a4(mdo sde): mi skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongasu skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i la
307a5(mdo sde): yongasu mi tshol ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po la mi sbyor ba dang / sems ca/ na yongasu smin par byed par brtson 'grus mi rtsom pa/ dang / yon tan chung ngu tsam gyis chog par 'dzin cing / 
307a6(mdo sde): gong du mi tshol ba ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos ban po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongasu skyo bar rig por bya'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems
307a7(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongasu mi skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam yongasu tshol ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos
307a8(mdo sde): bo la rtag tu brtson pa dang / sems can yongasu smin par byed par brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / dge ba thams cad yongasu bskang ba'i phyi de la mi chags pa yin te/ mi 'am ci'i
307b1(mdo sde): bdag pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongasu skyo bar rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bzhi pa bsgrub pa 'dis/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po ljon pa/ 
307b2(mdo sde): la lan btab nas/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su skyob dang / yongs su mi skyo ba
307b3(mdo sde): bzhi pa bsgrub pa la 'jug pa 'di thos sam/ rgyal pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thos lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod
307b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yongasu mi skyo bar spyad par bya'o// rgyal po ma skyes dgras gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'as byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa gang lags/ 
307b5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu bskang ba'i phyir/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la bka' stsam pa/ mi 'am
307b6(mdo sde): ci'i bdag po khyod ji ltar sems can yongasu smin par byed pa'i rang gi thabs mkhas pa'i khyad par rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu bskang ba'i phyir khyod
307b7(mdo sde): kyis ston cig/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas rang gis pi wang de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyad sngar blangs so// pi wang de blangs ma thag tu de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / 
307b8(mdo sde): mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyis/ pi wang gi sgra de las seng ges bsgyings pa ltar shing sa la du ma g.yos pa'i sgrar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
308a1(mdo sde): pa'i tshig su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // phan pa spyod pa dag dang don spyod dang // chos thos nan tan byed pa spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ 
308a2(mdo sde): de dag yongasu skyo ba med par spyod// bde ba spyod dang skyid pa spyod pa dang // sems can kun la sems snyoms spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag rgya chen ma yin spyod pa
308a3(mdo sde): med// brtan pa spyod dang bden pa spyod pa dang // bsam pa yongasu dag pa spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang du'ang sna me ga sa yin// dul ba spyod dang sbyin pa spyod pa
308a4(mdo sde): dang 'dangos pa thams cad yongasu gtong spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ de dag ser sna med par spyod pa yin// tshul khrims spyod pa ma nyams spyod pa dang / lus
308a5(mdo sde): dang ngag ni yongs dag spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gispyod pa gang sbyong ba// de dag tshul khrims 'tshal ba'i spyod pa med// brtul zhugs spyod dang bzod pa spyod pa dang / khwa/ 
308a6(mdo sde): skyon yongasu gcod pa'i spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gnad sems med par spyod pa yin// brtson 'grus spyod dang mthu rnams spyod pa dang // 'khor bar yo
308a7(mdo sde): su mi sgra skyed pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag le lo med par spyod pa yin// bsam gtan spyod dang ting 'dzin spyad pa dang / lus dang sems mi ba tu dben spyong
308a8(mdo sde): byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag g.yeng ba med par spyod pa yin// shes rab spyod dang blo mchog spong pa dang // chos rnams thams cad ji bzhin spyod pa dang / byang chub mchag
308b1(mdo sde): gi sbyong ba gang spyod pa// de dag shes rab 'chal ba'i spyod pa med// byams pa spyod dang phan 'dod spyod pa dang // sems can kun la snying rje spyod pa dang / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ de dag khro ba'i tha/ 
308b2(mdo sde): ba med par spyod// stong pa spyod dang rab tu dben spyod dang // mtshan ma med pa yongasu dag spyod dang / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag smon pa med par spyod pa yin// yang dag nyid dang de bzhin
308b3(mdo sde): nyid spyod dang // shes pa thams cad yongasu dge spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang du'ang chags pa med par spyod// dad pa spyod dang dang pa spyod pa dang // dran dang g.yeng
308b4(mdo sde): ba med pa spyod pa dang / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag yongasu gcod pa med par spyod// bsam gtam spyod dang rnam thar spyod pa dang // mngon shes lnga rnams yongs dag spyod pa/ 
308b5(mdo sde): des byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag chag/ sa pa med par spyod pa yin// sangs rgyas spyod dang da chos spyod pa dang // dge 'dun dkon mchog nye bar brtan spyod pa/ bya
308b6(mdo sde): chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag dkon mchog gi spyod pa yin// chos spyod pa dang shin tu rigs spyod dang // sems can thams cad yongasu smin spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pas/ 
308b7(mdo sde): spyod pa/ de dag rgyun mi 'chad par spyod pa yin// bya ba spyod dang chos rnams spyod pa dang // mtha' kun yongasu gcod pa'i spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang
308b8(mdo sde): du'ang lta bar spyod pa med// dag pa spyod dang rnam par dag spyod dang / nyon mongs thams cad yong su gcod spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag yong su gdung bar spyod pa
309a1(mdo sde): pa med 'bade ba spyod dang shin tu rnam par spyod// sems can kun la 'jig med mchog spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag smon lam spyod pa med pa/ 
309a2(mdo sde): yin / nyi ma spyod dang zla ba spyod pa dang // pad+ma lta bur gos pa med spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag ltar bcas 'jig rten phyag bya ba// brgya byin spyod dang tshangs pa'i spyod
309a3(mdo sde): ba dang // dkar ba'i chos rnams yong su rdzogs spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag bdud rnams sder bcas skrag par byed// mchog spyod pa dang khyad par 'phags
309a4(mdo sde): sbyong dang / 'dod chags nyes pa thab gcod spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang du'ang ga ti mug spyod pa med// lam spyod pa dang mu stegs spyod pa dang // shes
309a5(mdo sde): rab mig ni yongasu dag spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod/ pa gang spyod pa// de dag kun tu rtog par spyod pa med/ dul ba spyod dang rab tu zhi spyod dang // ming dang gzugs la mi chags
309a6(mdo sde): spyod pa dang byang chub mchog gi spyad pa dag pa dang // de dag lha dang mi ni mang pos bstod// 'phags pa'i spyod dang shin tu mnyam spyod dang // g.yon phyogs lam ni yongasu gcod spyod dang / 
309a7(mdo sde): byang chub mchog sa spyod pa gang spong ba/ de dag rtag tu don la 'bab pa dang // dpa' ba spyod dang shin tu brtan spyod dang // bdud kyi sde rnams 'jigs par byed spyod dang // byang chub mchog sa
309a8(mdo sde): spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag byang chub snying por gzhol ba yin// gzung ba spyod dang don yod spyod pa dang // gzungs la g.yeng ba med par spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang
309b1(mdo sde): spyod pa/ de dag gang du'ang ma rig spyod pa med// dgon pa spyod dang rab tu dben spyod dang // rtag tu rab tu 'byung bar spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag nan tan
309b2(mdo sde): byed par spyod pa yin// gtso ba'i spyod dang khyad par 'phags spyod dang // 'jig rten thams cad zil gnod spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag dman
309b3(mdo sde): pa la ni spyad pa med/ rigs pa spyod dang thabs la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan de las log par sbyong ba dang // byang chub mchog gi sbyong ba gang spyod pa// de 'go mi shes spyod pa med pa/ 
309b4(mdo sde): yin// lta ba spyod dang rnam par lta spyod dang // ming dang ga zugs la mi chags spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gri spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag 'jig pa med par spyod pa yin// 
309b5(mdo sde): thams cad spyod dang kun tu spyod pa dang // dbang po yong su smin par byed pa dang / byang chub mchog gi/ spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag ye shes rnam pa'i mang dang 'dra// byang
309b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa'i tshig su bcad pa mngon bsgrub pa 'di pi wang gi sgra de las byung ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par
309b7(mdo sde): gyur to// rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i 'khor dang / rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / mi 'am ci dang / dri za dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / de dag gi 'khor gyi sreg chags brgyan
309b8(mdo sde): stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di la bslab par
310a1(mdo sde): gas na gyis bsgrub par byas/ sem cadas chum sems dpa' byung pa 'a byed langs pa sus pas la sas smras
310a2(mdo sde): nas bsam ldan 'das kyis ma 'am ci'i rgyal mi ldan pa 'gror gnang // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bas mi 'am ci'i rgyal ba ljon pa bu dang bcas/ dang dang bcas/ smas das
310a3(mdo sde): bcas gnyen mang ba dang bcas 'khar dang bcas ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'bas la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bzod pa gcos
310a4(mdo sde): nas sel snyan dkrol/ me tog gi char pag 'dadi zer gyi dra' byung ste/ sa chen po rnam pa drug du g.yos par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ste/ de skad cig zang cig lung
310a5(mdo sde): tsam de nyid la/ ri'i rgyal ba spos kyi dang ldang du rang gi khyim du phyin te// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang ba 'am byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// 
310a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / chos la mchod pas bdag zil gyis non to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u
310a7(mdo sde): shi ka/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas khyod 'ba' shig zil gyis mnan pa ma yin gyi/ ko'u shi ka/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thob pa ma gtogs par/ gang
310a8(mdo sde): dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag thams cad mi 'am ci
310b1(mdo sde): rgyal po ljon pas zil gyis non to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka/ byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag pas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / brgya byin dang / 
310b2(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad zil gyis non to// ko'u shi ka/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis zil gyis mi non to// gang
310b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' zil gyis gnon par sems de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zil gyis gnon par 'dod pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las ni de bzhin
310b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa las ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 'brung // de nas lha rnam ras kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan pa 'di thos nas/ thal mo
310b5(mdo sde): sbyar te mchi ma thags nas/ tshig 'di skad ces kye ma bdag sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa chags pa mi ma nga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' ba 'di lta bu las nyam so// zhes smra'o// 
310b6(mdo sde): de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bu/ lha'i bu 'od zer srung zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// 
310b7(mdo sde): yab 'di ltar gang rab tu dben pa rnam par bsgrub par nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ma lags pa'i chos rnams la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi
310b8(mdo sde): skyeng ba ni sems can thams cad la snying rje rtid pa ma lags/ dge pa'i rtsab rgya chen po lams pa'i dge pa'i ba shes gnyen la brten pa ma lags pa sa 'gyid par 'phru
311a1(mdo sde): yab skyon med pa la zhugs te/ rgyud tshig cing sa bon tshig ste/ theg pa chen po'i snod ma gyur pa la da bgyir ci mchis/ bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ sum cu rtsa gsum ris
311a2(mdo sde): kyi lha'i bu las stong tha ma pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskye'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu 'od zer srung gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
311a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dka' ba spyad pa brgya stong phrag ji snyed pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na btar ba ni bdag la mngon sum du
311a4(mdo sde): gyur to// bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpal gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad las mi skye ba'i chos
311a5(mdo sde): la bzod pa thob pa de la 'jug pa'i rnam par dbye ba bstan/ chung zad cig bcom ldan 'das kyis bshadugs na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la
311a6(mdo sde): bzod pa thob pa gang bdag gis thos nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du bsgrubs pas/ chos de 'thob par 'gyur// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu 'od zer srung la 'di
311a7(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyed pa rnams kyis ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par mi 'gyur gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa
311a8(mdo sde): ba bskyed pa rnams kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyuraro// 'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa' chos pa/  ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang
311b1(mdo sde): / zhe na 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi mnyam pa nyid dang / dge 'dun gyi mnyam pa nyid dang / zhing mnyam pa nyid de/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan/ 
311b2(mdo sde): nami skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta
311b3(mdo sde): ste khasam gtan bzhis stong pa nyid la rnam par rtse ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis thabs mkhas pa la rnam par rtse ba dang / mngon par shes pa lngas ye shes la rnam par rtse ba
311b4(mdo sde): dang / thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rdzu 'phrul la rnam par rtse ba ste/ 'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan no// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyuraro// 
311b5(mdo sde): 'od zer srung gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos pa/ zhi dang ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chas la bzod pa thob pa'agyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po rnams la byang chub
311b6(mdo sde): tshol yang phung po rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mos pa ma yin pa dang / khams rnams la byang chub tshol yang khams rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mos pa ma yin pa dang / 
311b7(mdo sde): skye mched rnams la byang chub tshol yang / skye mchen rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog pa dang / chos thams cad la byang chub tshol yang chos thams cad la byang chub kyi rang
311b8(mdo sde): bzhin du mos pa ma yin pa ste/ 'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'od zer srung gzhan yang byang chub
312a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi g.yo ba'i tshul gyis chos thams cad yang dag
312a2(mdo sde): pa'i mtha' la gnas par shes pa dang / dus sum mnyam pa nyid pas chos thams cad de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid 'dres pa med pas tshe
312a3(mdo sde): kyi dbyings 'du shes pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjesu song bas namakha'i rang bzhin du so sor rtog pa ste/ 'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi po 'di dag dang
312a4(mdo sde): ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod
312a5(mdo sde): ba thob par 'gyu ro// lha'i bu 'od zer srung ni rjesu 'thun pa/ 'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// chos kyi rnam grang/ 'di'i tha mar bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
312a6(mdo sde): kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zhus pa/ pha rol tu phyin pas 'dul ba bstan pa'i sgo'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ngam/ 
312a7(mdo sde): kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu nyid kyis bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung lag so// bcom ldan 'das a la la ji tsam du
312a8(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zab mo rnam par nges pa dang / don bzang po dang / tshig 'bru bzang pos brgyan pa ni mdzes te ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir/ bcom
312b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis chos sgo ma bsdus pa de gang yang ma mchi so// bcom ldan 'das sngon bdag la chos snang bar gyur pa gang lags pa de yang da chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brten nas/ 'bum gyur/ 
312b2(mdo sde): tu skyeso// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di snyam du bdag lta bu nyi tshe ba'i 'tshal ba dang ldan pa/ blo chung ngu nyan thos kyi theg pa'i skyen ma mchis pa tha cad la zhugs par gnas pas chos
312b3(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas kyang 'di lta bu'i chos snang ba 'di skyes par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes tshad ma mchis pa'i snod du gyur pa/ blo rgya che
312b4(mdo sde): zhing rgya mtsho lta sa ldan pa/ chos rin po che thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa/ gsol pa ma btab par sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyid pa gang lags
312b5(mdo sde): pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ chos kyi/ snang ba ji snyed cig thob par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal snyam bgyidado// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
312b6(mdo sde): pa kun dga' bo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nyi ma dang zla ba'i snang ba ji snyed pa de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu gcig gi 'od kyis mog mog bor
312b7(mdo sde): 'gyuraro// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od ji snyed byung ba de dag ni shes rab kyi 'od kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ stong gi cha dang
312b8(mdo sde): stong phrag brgya'i cha dang khye ba'i cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang bgrang ba dang / de ba dang rgyur yang nye bar mi 'char// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snang ba thaH/ 
313a1(mdo sde): cad ni shes rab kyi snang ba las byung ba'i phyir// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba gang yin pa shes rab kyi snang ba de dang ldan na/ de bzhin
313a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang / g.yo ba nam/ 
313a3(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba de lta bu dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag dang ldan par 'gyuraro// kun dga' bo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / thos nas kyang mos
313a4(mdo sde): ba dang / mos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang / de
313a5(mdo sde): bzhin nyid du sgrub pa de dag ni byang chub kyi sems mi brjedapa dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba don tu/ gnyer ba dang / snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos pa dang
313a6(mdo sde): khyams pa chen po'i go cha bgos pa dang / bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang / byang chub kyi snying par gdol ba'i skyes bu dam par rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang / 
313a7(mdo sde): ldan pa/ kun dga' bas 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa
313a8(mdo sde): dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams ji snyed cig skyed par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rigs
313b1(mdo sde): kyai bu la garigs kyi bum gang gis snga bro dadus kyi che/ stong gsum gyi stong cher po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ri po me sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang ste rgyum tu zhugs pa dang khan ces/ 
313b2(mdo sde): phyir 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sbyin pa byin pa
313b3(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin du nyi ma'i gung dang / bye ma red kyi dus dang / nam gyi cha stod dang / nam gyi gung thung dang / tho rangs stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rin po che
313b4(mdo sde): sna bdun gyis yongasu bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar la sbyin pa byen pa dang / rnam grangs 'di lta bus lo gcig gam/ 
313b5(mdo sde): lo brgya'am/ lo stong ngam/ lo brgya phrag stong du sbyin pa byin na/ kun dga' bo de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed
313b6(mdo sde): dam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ste/ tshad ma mchiso// bde bar gshegs pa dpag tu ma mchiso// bcom ldan 'das gdugs gcig bsugs pa'i bsod nams rgya
313b7(mdo sde): phung po de yang tshad ma mchis na/ dgung lo brgya phrag stong du bsugs pa lnga smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod mos par bya'o// khyod kyis
313b8(mdo sde): chud par bya'o// byang chub don du gnyer ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba don du gnyer ba dang / sems can rab tu thar par bya ba don tu gnyer ba gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas
314a1(mdo sde): mos sam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gom kun chub par byed na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa las bsod nams kyi phung po mang du
314a2(mdo sde): skyed ma gang de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha ma tshig bzhi de'i tshig su bcad pa tsam 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ 
314a3(mdo sde): klag pa 'am/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang ston na/ de ni sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ de ni sbyin pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'o// 'di lta ste/ chos kyi sbyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa thams cad
314a4(mdo sde): kyi mchog go// 'di lta ste/ chos kyis phan 'dogs pa de ni phan 'dogs pa rnams kyis mchog go// 'di lta ste/ chos kyi gding ba de ni gding ba rnams kyi mchog go// 'di lta ste/ chos yo
314a5(mdo sde): su 'dzin pa de ni yong su 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog na// de ci'i phyir zhe na kun dga' bo chos kyi sbyin pa/ byin pas ni nyon mongs pa 'bri bar 'gyur// zang zing gi sbyin pa byin
314a6(mdo sde): pas ni/ lus brtan pa byas par 'gyu ro// kun dga' bo de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa 'bri bar byed 'dod pas/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa bye te/ chos
314a7(mdo sde): kyi sbyin pa des ni yon tan gyi khyad par thams cad thob par 'gyuro// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa ni/ yon tan gyi phan yon yang dag phul sum cu rtsa gnyis rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur
314a8(mdo sde): te sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / 'dod chags chung bar 'gyur ba dang / zhe
314b1(mdo sde): sngang chung bar 'gyur ba dang gti mug chung bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag dang gzham gyi nyon mongs pa char gcod par 'gyur ba dang / skye bo mang po dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i bsngags pa lha rnams kyis
314b2(mdo sde): brjod par 'gyur ba dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams bsrung bar 'gyur ba dang / las byas nas bsod snyoms za bar 'gyur ba dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na
314b3(mdo sde): ba'i bsos sman dang / yo byad rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshig su bcad pa phyogs bcur grags par 'gyur ba dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba
314b4(mdo sde): dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsngags dpar 'gyur ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongasu srung ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos 'dzin par 'gyur
314b5(mdo sde): ba dang / ngan song thams cad kyis 'jigs par mi 'gyur zhing de la lha dang mir skye ba dka' bar mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / chos nyan pa dang 'bral/ 
314b6(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur ba dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / skye ba dran par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par skye bar 'gyur ba dang / nam du yang dbang
314b7(mdo sde): po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ba dang / skyes bu chen pa'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thob par 'gyur ba dang / gzi brjid can gyi gzungs kyi sa bon sgrub par 'gyur ba dang / spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad
314b8(mdo sde): ba'i rgyu rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / skye bo mabs pas g.yog bya bar 'gyur ba dang / shes rab chen po'i rgyu rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / myur du chos kyi snang ba thob par 'gyur ba
315a1(mdo sde): dang de'i sems la tshul bzhin ma yin pa yin pa yid la byed pa kun tu mi 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten gyi zang zing gi sbyin pa thams cad zil gyis mnan nas/ de chos kyi gtan
315a2(mdo sde): zad mi shes pa yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ba ste/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa de/ yon tan gyi khyad par yang dag phul sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag thob par 'gyuro// de nas
315a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzungs lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las
315a4(mdo sde): 'das pa'i spang na/ sems can snod du gyur pa de dag gi rna lam/ du bsgrag par bgyi/ mos par bgyi/ kun bsrung bar bgyi to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yon tan phun sum tshogs
315a5(mdo sde): pa 'di dang / bsod nams yongasu 'dzin pa don tu gnyer ba'i sladu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la legs zhes bya ba byin te/ ko'u shi ka khyod dam
315a6(mdo sde): pa'i chos yongasu gzung ba'i phyir/ nga'i 'dun du seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa leg so legaso// ko ru shi ka/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nga'i dam pa'i chos yun ji srid cig tu gnas pa de srid du lha dang lha ma yin
315a7(mdo sde): g.yul 'gyed pa ma lda ma yin rnams pham par 'gyur/ lha rnams mi rgyal bar 'gyur// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ garu shi ka/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos yang dag phul yin te// du shika 'di lta ste/ chos thams
315a8(mdo sde): cad mi dmigs pa de ni 'jigs pa med pa'i sbyin pa'o// ko'u shi ka/ gang cung zad 'jigs pa skye ba de dag thams cad ni 'jigs tshogs la lta ba la dmigs shing rab tu gnas pa las byung // kozu / 
315b1(mdo sde): ka gang mi dmigs pa de dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das bdag bsam gtan gyi bde ba la
315b2(mdo sde): gnas pa tshad ma mchis pa gtang ste/ grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang dang gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod pa de dang de dag tu bdag
315b3(mdo sde): chos nyan pa'i slad du nye bar 'chi bar bgyi'o// mchis nas kyang chos smra ba de dag chos dang ldan pas bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab par 'gyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
315b4(mdo sde): nyan tham dang / sang sangs rgyas dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnams ni 'di las 'byung ba'i sladu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal
315b5(mdo sde): po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po bzhi po bdag cag dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi// nyan thos chen po de dag dang / bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
315b6(mdo sde): ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i sladadu/ bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyes pa la brtson par bgyi'o// bdag cag gi 'khor gang dag sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la ma dad pa de dag kyang / cinas de
315b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa srung ba'i slad du brtson par 'gyur bar dad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan
315b8(mdo sde): pal pa dang / gdan masacas ldan las kyi bsta pa la sa pa dang bgrungs se mchis pa dadag pazung cheng dugs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag pa ta 'gyi ga / 
316a1(mdo sde): kyi tshig de dag gis gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum logs pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin lags pa dang / gzhan yang sa / 
316a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi bstan pa la'i sdang bar bgyid pa rnams shin tu tshar gcod par 'gyu ro// tad+ya thA/ ta ra be a ra be/ a ro be/ sa ra ge/ hu lu ma hA hu lu/ hu lu hu lu A bad Te/ bi kad Te kha ri ts+tshe da ni ni gr-i te/ 
316a3(mdo sde): pre g+ha ta ni/ id Ti id Ti/ bdi Ti bidi Ti/ ad tshe g+hats+tshe/ mA ra ni gra ha na sarba ba ra pra bA di ni gra ha na/ sarba mid r+yA pra yA Ta na na ni gra ha na/ sarba b+hA ta ni gra ha na/ bud d+ha ha ba ra ni/ dA d+ha ma ni yan ta shA ya/ 
316a4(mdo sde): bud d+he na bud d+ha bar ni tAn/ tsa tu ra ma hA rA dza ni de shan/ man tra ba yan/ a ba tAr pri k+ki nam gri hA ya/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub
316a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' lha'i cod pan la bka' stsal ba/ skyes bu dam pa dag/ ngas bskal pa mtha' yas grangs med par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 'di ci nas yun ring du
316a6(mdo sde): gnas par 'gyur ba dang / nub par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ khyed gnyis kyi lag tu gzhag go gtad de// de gnyis kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gnyis kyis bcom
316a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi'o// rgyal bar bgyi'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos smra ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ 
316a8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo de dag lag tu mchi bar bgyi'o// de dag mang sde 'di la mos par bgyi ba dang / yong su 'dzin par bgyi ba'i slad du de dag gi yid rab tu bzung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i/ 
316b1(mdo sde): slad ma'i dus na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi rna lam du thos pa dang / zos nas 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par 'gyid pa dang / 'chad pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' byams/ 
316b2(mdo sde): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyi byin gyi rlabs lags par rigs par bgyi'o// de nas bdud sdig can 'khor der 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de/ gdong las mchi ma zag cing ngarda
316b3(mdo sde): phyung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa las brtsams te/ chos bstan pa de ni bdag tha na spu zing zhes bgyid pa
316b4(mdo sde): tsam yang ma mchi so// gang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis byin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byang chub
316b5(mdo sde): gyi lam la 'jug pa sems can thams cad kyi ston pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gsung ba des bdag rgyu ngan gyi zung rngu dang ldan zhing bdag rnyis par gyur pa snyam bgyid do// 
316b6(mdo sde): ma ldan 'das bdag 'a phyag brgyang bsngal du gsog/ gang zas pas bdag rgyangs gyi drung rngu dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i chos kyirnam thangs sa bu yang mi gsus ragasag
316b7(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal ga sdig can khyod dang 'thun pa'i sems can chos zab mo 'di lta bu la ma mos pa ni mang / gang dag mos pa'i sems can de dag ni nyung gis mya ngan ma byed/ smre
316b8(mdo sde): sngags ma 'don cig sdig can 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa'i steng nas rdul blangs pa rnyed kyi sems can ni chos kyi rnam grangs zab mo 'di lta bu la mo so// sa'i rdul je snyed pa de snyed kyi sems ca
317a1(mdo sde): / ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma mos te/ de dag thams cad ni grong dang 'thun// sems can gyi khams tshad med pa khyod dang mthun gyis de bas na sdig can dga' bar gyis chos kyi/ 
317a2(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sems can dpag tu med pa ni byang chub la yang dag par zhug so// byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags
317a3(mdo sde): brgyad khrib ni stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag/ dge slong brgyad stong ni nye bar len pa med pa rag pa rnams las sems rnam par gra'o// stong gsum
317a4(mdo sde): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas snang ba chen pos 'jig rten khyab par gyur te/ lha'i me tog gi char ni rab tu phab/ sil snyan brgyad stong dag ni
317a5(mdo sde): ma dkrol bar rang 'khro'o// lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rnams ni steng gi bar snang las kye ma bdag cag gis 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis bskor ba 'di mdzod
317a6(mdo sde): ngo ka bcom ldan 'das kyis gang yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan te bshad nas/ sems can gyi don mdzad pa gang lags pa 'di ni grong khyer bA ra na ser chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems
317a7(mdo sde): can yongasu smin par mdzad pa de bas ches mchogo// gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher ston pa dang
317a8(mdo sde): tha ma glegs bam la bris te 'chang ba'i sems can de dag kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyu ro zhes ched du brjod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / 
317b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi bcom ldan/ 
317b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de'i phyir khyed kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zhus ga pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par nges pa bstan pa dang / dam pa'i chos
317b3(mdo sde): rin po che'i le'u zhes bya bar zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan dang / tshe dang ldan ba ku
317b4(mdo sde): dga' bo dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod// // 'phags pa mi 'ami ci'i rgyal po ldan pas
317b5(mdo sde): nus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mang rdzog s+ho// zhu chen gyi mo tsa b+ha ban d+he dpal gyi lhun po dang / ban d+he dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas bskur cing / zhus te gtan
317b6(mdo sde): la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su bi kran ta tsin ta de ba pu tra pa re brabrid tsha/ nA ma mA hA yA na sU tra bod skad du/ 'phags pa lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
317b7(mdo sde): mad kham pa dang po// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa ma rgyal bu
317b8(mdo sde): rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ba na/ dge slong khri'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag
318a1(mdo sde): rag tu mang po dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / da las gzhan pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa/ klu'i 'khor mang po rnams dang / 
318a2(mdo sde): gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po lus ngan la sogs pa/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mang po rnams dang / namapa' lding gi rgyal po stobs chen la sogs pa na mkha' lding gi 'khor mang po rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra
318a3(mdo sde): gcan la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi 'khor mang po rnams dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa las sogs pa mi 'am ci'i 'khor mang po rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po lag bzangs las sogs
318a4(mdo sde): ba lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor mang po rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin lnga'i bu stong phrag mang po'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mi mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs
318a5(mdo sde): pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal 'khor stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa
318a6(mdo sde): dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de dag las stsogs pa 'khar bzhi po rnams kyis yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to// de'i tshe na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor de nyid du
318a7(mdo sde): 'dus par gyur te 'dug// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/ rab rtsal sems kyang 'dus par gyur te 'du'o// de nas
318a8(mdo sde): lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'khor phal po che de 'dus par rig nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga
318b1(mdo sde): la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi
318b2(mdo sde): 'dzag pa rnams lags rnga ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtsam pa thams cad pa bcom dgrus btu pa rnams lags de ltar nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngas
318b3(mdo sde): nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyis chags pa ma mchis par spyod pa rnams lags ji ltar na byang chub
318b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis mun pa dang bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang brag
318b5(mdo sde): ba rnams lags/ ji ltar ra byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos pas don la rngon pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos
318b6(mdo sde): la rton pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems
318b7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams
318b8(mdo sde): lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thul par dka' ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos gci
319a1(mdo sde): dpag dka' ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa rnams lags ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
319a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na
319a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres pas rnam par thar pa'i sgor gnas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i nga
319a4(mdo sde): rgyal can tshar gcad pa'i slad du sbrel zhing bsgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyi bgyi ba thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa rnams yangs/ 
319a5(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnam pa dang nga bral zhing rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas/ ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
319a6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sems can yongasu smin par bgyi ba dag thabs la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa yongasu dag par brtul zhugs grub pa
319a7(mdo sde): rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'gras pa'i sems ma mchis shing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
319a8(mdo sde): dpa' chen po pa rab tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu sod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba rnams lags/ 
319b1(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad mngor bar 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog chags pakra/ 
319b2(mdo sde): cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la smras pa ma mchis pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems
319b3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dag la rgya mtsho lta bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la dbang sgyur bas dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnaji ltar na
319b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyi ba thams cad la skyob drapon du gyur pa rnams/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du kha na ma tho ba ma mchis
319b5(mdo sde): shing yon tan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa rnams lags/ de/ skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'i bu rab rtsal sems la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab
319b6(mdo sde): rtsal sems legaso leg so// lha'i bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems da'a' chen po 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ 'jig rten gyi yongasu 'dren pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan
319b7(mdo sde): ba bskal ba grangs med pa nas go chachags pa/ brtson 'grus shin tu brtan pa/ ded dpon chen pa/ sems can dpag tu med pa'i don byed pa/ sems can dpag tu med pa zang bde ba la rab tu
319b8(mdo sde): 'god pa la mkhas pa/ yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi don tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yongasu zhu ba ni yang khyod leg so// lha'i bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yin la zung
320a1(mdo sde): shig dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yon tan gyi khyad par de dag dang / gzhan dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// lha'i
320a2(mdo sde): bu rab rtsal sems kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshalo zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu byang chub sems
320a3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan ma theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thabs la mkhas pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab dang / snying rje che
320a4(mdo sde): pos mngon bsgrubs pa'i byams pa/ don dang chos kyis mngon par ba dasgrubs pa'i spobs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi rnam pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga po dag ste/ 
320a5(mdo sde): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi pa de dag dang ldan ma theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi/ 'jog pa rnams yin// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ thabs la/ 
320a6(mdo sde): mkhas pa mngon par sgrub par byed pa yi/ mngon sum shes rab rtogs par khong du chud gyur cing // thams cad bskyab phyir snying rje chen po yangs pa la// gnas pa'i byams pa mngon par sgrub par byed
320a7(mdo sde): gyur la// don dang chos la shin tu mkhas par 'gyur ba yi// so so yang dag rig la spobs pa thob gyur la// byang chub lam la mngon shes dag gis rnam rtsen// des ni gzhan gyi dring la 'jog par mi
320a8(mdo sde): 'gyur / lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos bzhi dang ldan na/ brtsam pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ phyir mi zlog pa'i brtson 'grus dang / 
320b1(mdo sde): bsam bdag pa'i rtul ba dang / byang chub la 'dun pa drag po dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu bsgrub pa la yid yongasu mi skyo ba dang ldan pa ste/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
320b2(mdo sde): chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ brtsam pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa yino// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ brtson 'grus brtan zhing rab tu gnas pa med gyur cing / bsam pa rnyog pa med
320b3(mdo sde): cing yongasu dag gyur la// sangs rgyas ye shes don phyir 'dun pa drag ldan zhing // sangs rgyas chos rnams 'dod cing rtag tu yongs mi skyo// gang la chos bzhi rgya chen khyad pa de yod pa// de ni
320b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems 'byung ba rtsam pa brtan 'gyur zhing // byang chub yan lug lag mthil bzhag pa bzhin 'gyur la// rings po mi thogs 'jig rten gsum gyi chos rgyal 'gyur// lha'i bu
320b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe ma byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes
320b6(mdo sde): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms par byed pa dang / sems can gang dag byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa de dag byang chub tu sems bskye du 'jug pa dang / sprul pa lta bur dus gsum yongasu bsngo
320b7(mdo sde): ba dang / byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral bas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mkhas pa gang dag shes
320b8(mdo sde): rab pha rol phyin 'doms shing // byang chub zhugs pas byang chub sems 'dzin 'jug byed la// gang dag byang chub zhugs pas dus gsum yi rang zhing // yid dang ma bral sprul 'dra byang chub
321a1(mdo sde): dod byed la/ dge pa gang yin chung zad byed pa thams cad ni// thams cad mkhyen cing sems la rten par byed pa yin/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa ches pa'i/ 
321a2(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ ye shes kyis chags pa med par spyod pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ shes pas byas pa'i bya ba rnams byed cing nga rgyal gyis byas pa rnams mi byed pa dang // chos thams cad rkyen
321a3(mdo sde): la rag las shing byin gyis rlob pa med la gang zag dang bral bar shes pa dang / stong pa nyid spyod yul du gyur cing / sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa dang / chags pa
321a4(mdo sde): thams cad las yang dag par 'das shing skye mched drug yongasu shes pa srung ba ste/ chos bzhi pa de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ shes pas las byed de dag nga rgyal yod min zhing / 
321a5(mdo sde): brtan la mkhas pa yin zhing de dag lha med la/ stong nyid spyod yul/ de dag sems can mi gtong zhing / chags pa kun las 'das shing phyi nang gnas pa med// chos mchog bani/ 
321a6(mdo sde): po de la shin tu rab gnas pa// shes pas pha rol phyin cing chags med spyod pa yin// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na// shes rab kyi mun pa dang
321a7(mdo sde): bral ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pas ngoms pa med cing tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor ba dang / zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos ston pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa shes
321a8(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir nyan mongs pa thams cad la sgyu ma lta bur sa sor rtog pa dang / tshul gcig la 'jug pas tshul thams cad kyi 'jug pa la 'jug ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la/ 
321b1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bya ste/ de dag thos tshal ngoms med tshul bzhin rtog byed cing / de mnyam ston cing klog 'dzin rnyed pa tshol mi byed// nyon mongs sbyin 'dra sgyu ma rmi lam lta bur lta// chos nyid tha dad mi/ 
321b2(mdo sde): byed de dag tshul gcig 'jug che bdag chos bzhi de sten khyad par 'thob 'gyur zhing // shes rab smon 'das mun bsul zla ltar 'jig rten rgyu// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
321b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ zos pa thams cad 'dzin pa'i gzungs thob pa dang / 
321b4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcod pa'i spobs pa thob pa/ dang / sems can thams cad la bdag med pa ston pa'i snying rje chen po dang / bdud dang nyan mongs pa dang bral ba
321b5(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi go cha bgos pa ste/ chos ban ba de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ thos su/ na chud mi za bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs thob cing // de dag
321b6(mdo sde): spobs ldan sems can som nyi gcod par byed// snying rjes chos 'di thams cad bdag med ston byed cing / mngon shes shes pa'i go bgos nyon mongs bdud mang nyams// byang chub sems
321b7(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi po dag gis 'jug na// 'khor kun nang du song yang de la 'jigs pa med// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ thos pas don la rton pa
321b8(mdo sde): rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pa thams cad mi 'dzin pas thob pa dang mi ldan zhing // bsgrub pa nyams pa'i byis pa thams cad yongasu spong ba dang / yi ge dang / sgra dang / skad dang / tshig
322a1(mdo sde): gi lam thams cad mngon du rnam par shes par bya ba'i phyir brag cha dang mtshungs pa nyid khong du chud pa dang / don 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir zos pa yongasu tshol zhing dga'
322a2(mdo sde): mgur bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa dang / brjod pa med pa'i don la 'jug cing / brjod pa'i don la ma yin pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ji tsam mang du thos kyang don la
322a3(mdo sde): mi rtog pas// byis pa thos dang mi ldan rtag tu sgrub chos nyams// srid gsum sgra skad dbyangs dang tshig laM gang yod pa// brag cha 'drar shes de la don ldan sgra thos nas// don nyid rtog
322a4(mdo sde): cing dga' mgu nyes kun phyir mi 'jug/ chos nyid 'di ni don mchog yin te brjod du med// 'di ni don dang sgra skad thos par gyur pa las// 'gro ba rnamasu 'gro bar byed cing 'gro ba
322a5(mdo sde): 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'jig rten gyi tshul gyi/ sa chos la rton pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bre mo
322a6(mdo sde): gtam byed pa rnams la chos ston pa dang / skye bo phal po che 'dus pa dag la 'chi brje su dran pa dang / gtong ba chen po kha rje su yi rang zhing byang chub tu yongasu sngo ba dang / 'du 'dzi thams cad
322a7(mdo sde): las dben par gzhol ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang tshe skye bo mang po'i dbus son gyur ga/ der ni mkhas pas chos kyi gtam la 'jug par bya// skye
322a8(mdo sde): po mang po 'dus par gyur pa'i tshogs rnams la// mchi bar 'gyur ba'i 'du shes rab tu bsgom par bya// de nas bag yang gzhan gyi gtong ba rnam lnga yi// gtong la yi rang byas nas/ 
322b1(mdo sde): byang chub bsngo bya zhing // gang tshe 'du 'ji dag dang phrad par gyur pa'i tshe// der ni dben par gzhol ba rab tu 'dod par bya// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang / 
322b2(mdo sde): ldan na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / thos pa sgrub pa snying por byed pa dang / ji
322b3(mdo sde): skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa la 'jug pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// nyam pa gnod par gyur kyang byang chub sems
322b4(mdo sde): mi gtong // de dag skyob pa'i chos thos sgrub pa snying por byed/ dka' blo bde 'thun ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed// mkhas pa de dag chos kun rang bzhin bdag med 'jug/ de ltar
322b5(mdo sde): brtson pa'i shes ldan spras bzhin byed 'gyur zhing // rtag brgya na mi 'dar rjes 'thun bdag med ci yang med// rtag tu snyan pa'i phreng ba phyogs bcur grags 'gyur zhing / de/ 
322b6(mdo sde): ltar chos sgra de dag chos kyi shes pas 'phags// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang
322b7(mdo sde): zhe na/ bdag nyid sgrub pa la gnas shing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / bdag nyid dul ba dang / bsrungs pa dang / sgrol ba dang / brtul ba dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'das shing
322b8(mdo sde): sems can gzhan dag dul bar bya ba dang / bsrung ba dang / dgrol ba dang / gdul ba dang / yongasu mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir chos ston par byed pa dang / bdag nyid yang dag par
323a1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsam pa nges par gyur cing / sems can rnams kyang theg pa chen po la rab tu 'god par byed pa dang / bdag nyid chos 'dod cing chos 'dod pas
323a2(mdo sde): gzhan dag la yang ston par byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sgrub pa snying por byed cing 'gro la chos ston la// dul srungs legs btul shin tu mya ngan 'das
323a3(mdo sde): nas kyang / gang dag ma dul ma bsrungs ma btul mya ngan las// ma 'das de dag chos kyi dkon mchog 'byor par 'dzud// de dag byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa des gyur cing // theg
323a4(mdo sde): pa de la 'gro ba rnams kyang 'god par byed// rtag tu chos 'dod don ldan bla ma gus byed cing // sems can rnams la de dang 'thun pa'i chos rnams ston// lha'i bu byang chub sarma
323a5(mdo sde): dpa' sems can 'a chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnam sa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yang dang yang du tshangs pa'i
323a6(mdo sde): gnas pa bzhis gnas pa dang / rtag par rgyun tu rab tu dben por gnas pa dang // chos zab mo la bzod pa dang / lus dang sems mnyam nyid du shes pa ste/ chos bzhi pa de dag
323a7(mdo sde): dngango // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// tshangs pa'i gnas pa dag la rtag tu rab gnas shing // dben par gnas pa la yang dga' ba skyed byed la// shes pas zab mo'i bzod la nges pa tha
323a8(mdo sde): grurab cing // mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur pa ste// de ltar mngon par brtson pa'i 'jigs pa med pa rnams// mngon shes lnga po dag gis mngon par 'phags gyur cing
323b1(mdo sde): de dag sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar 'dug 'dral// sems can mang po rnams kyang yong su srim byed 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos pa'i dang ldan na// bdud
323b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyis thul bar dka' ba rnams yin te// bzhi gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i snying
323b3(mdo sde): rje chen po dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcod pa'i brtson 'grus dang // thabs la mkhas pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste// chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // 
323b4(mdo sde): de la 'di skad ces bya ste// mtshan med stong pas nges pa'i bsamang gtan bzhi sgom zhing // sems can yongasu bskyab phyir rtag tu snying rje ldan// dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi gcod
323b5(mdo sde): brtson 'grus thob 'gyur cing // kun tu thabs ldan pa ro phyin pa drug la 'jug/ de ltar spyod mkhas blo/ ldan cha bdag yid gzhungs pa// de dag bdud bzhi dag
323b6(mdo sde): las yang dag 'das gyur cing // bdud kyi lcags kyus zin pa'i 'gro ba mgon med rnams/ mya ngan 'da' bar 'gro ba'i lam la 'god par byed// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
323b7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po ches bani dang ldan na/ thos gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos zab mo'i tshul la 'jug pa dang / rtag tu don dang ldan zhing bsnyen par dka' ba dang / 
323b8(mdo sde): rtag tu yid byung zhing chos sems par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sgrib pa med pa la sems kyis nges par rtog par byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad
324a1(mdo sde): ces bya ste// zab mo'i chos kyi tshul la zhugs par gyur pa dang // rtag tu don dang ldan zhing bsnyen par dga' 'gyur la// rtag tu yid thung chos la bsam pa zhugs
324a2(mdo sde): gyur cing // sems kyis nges par rtog par byed pa gang yin pa'i// mkhas pa theg pa che la brtan par rab gnas pa blo rnams dag gis gting dpag dka' bar rab 'gyur zhing / 
324a3(mdo sde): chags pa med pa'i ye shes yang dag sgrub byed pa// de phyir blo rnams dag gis gting dpag dka' ba yin// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches bzhi dang
324a4(mdo sde): ldan ma/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe ma rnyed pa dang / snyan pa dang / stod pa dang / bde bas khengs pa med pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / 
324a5(mdo sde): mi rnyed pa dang / smad pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis zhum pa med pa dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ phung po rnams la yongasu spyod par byed pa dang / phung po yongasu shes pa srung
324a6(mdo sde): zhing dben par lta ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// rnyed dang snyan dang bstod dang bde ba kun thob kyang // de dag la ni nams kyang khengs par 'gyur ba med// ma rnyed
324a7(mdo sde): mi snyan smad dang sdug bsngal thob gyur kyang // de dag pad+ma bzhin du chags med 'jig rten spyod// sems can smin par bya byir phung po yongs spyod cing // phung po sgyu ma gsog 'dra ya ma rmar
324a8(mdo sde): shes pa// sems can phan bde'i don tu 'jig rten spyod byed kyang // 'jig rten chos kyis me gos tshul khrims spos dang ldan// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches
324b1(mdo sde): bzhi dang ldan na gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams yin te// bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag la bdag med pa dang / sems can la sems can med pa dang / chos dben pa dang / shes pa
324b2(mdo sde): chags pa med pas te/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad bya ste// bdag la bdag med nyid du yongasu shes gyur cing // sems can sems can med par rje su rtogs gyur la// chos rnams
324b3(mdo sde): dben pa nyid du yongasu rtogs gyur cing // mtha' la lag bzhin shes pa chags pa yod min pa'i// dpa' rnams zab mo dag la yongasu spyod byed pa// spyod pa med la rtag tu spyod par byed gyur
324b4(mdo sde): cing // 'dzin dang kun 'dzin kun dang rnams bral bas// sems can dag pa de dag de phyir gting dpag dka'// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos
324b5(mdo sde): ston pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa thob pa dang / sa so yang dag par rig pa shes pa dang / shes rab rno ba dang / sngon gyi smon lam rnam
324b6(mdo sde): par dag pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni rab tu thob gyur ci/ nga // shes pa so so yang dag rig pa mi zad 'gyur// rtag tu
324b7(mdo sde): shes rab rnon por gyur cing sngon yang ni// yang dag bsugs pa yong su dag pa thob gyur pa// sems can rnams kyi dbang po yongasu shes byas nas// de dag 'dra ba'i chos rnams yong su ston par byed// 
324b8(mdo sde): de dag bstan pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir mya ngan 'das mya ngan 'da' bar byed// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres pa/ 
325a1(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa'i sgor zhugs pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid spyod yul du gyur cing lta ba'i 'ching bas bcings pa'i sems can rnams thar bar byed pa dang / mtshan ma/ 
325a2(mdo sde): med pa gnas shing rnam par rtog pa spyod pa rnams yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas shing // sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du skye ba len pa
325a3(mdo sde): dang / thabs la mkhas shing shes rab kyis nges par byung ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// stong nyid spyod yul de dag ltas bcings grol byed cing // mtshan med gnas
325a4(mdo sde): shing sems can 'di dag yongs smin byed// smon pa med la gnas shing sems can smin bya'i phyir/ bsams bzhin skye zhing grang du 'dod pa der skye 'gyur// shes rab thabs kyis nges byung rnam
325a5(mdo sde): bar sgor gnas kyang // 'dus ma byas pa'i dbyings ni dus mi mthob mi byed// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na// lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshar gan
325a6(mdo sde): pa'i phyir spel zhir bsgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings kun nas sgo yang dag par shes pa dang / chos thams cad sgrib pa med par mos pa dang / kun tu rtog pa'i
325a7(mdo sde): rtsa ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams yong su shes pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin can gyis chos thams cad la nem nur med pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // 'di la 'di skad ces
325a8(mdo sde): bya ste/ sems mnyam chos kyi dbyingasu nges par byung gyur cing // de dag rnams kyi sgrib pa 'ga' yang mthong mi gyur// nyon mongs kun tu rtog pa'i rtsa las rab byung bar// shes nas de las snrel zhing
325b1(mdo sde): kun tu ston mi byed/ chos 'di thams cad rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa dang // ma skyes ma 'gags nga ba nyid kyis dag pa yin// de dag kun mkhyen yongs btsal mya ngan 'das gyur nas// lhan pa'i nga rgyal
325b2(mdo sde): dag tshar gcod byed pa yin/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ las kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rgyal mkhyen pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ khong spyod chen po'i rgyu sgra
325b3(mdo sde): ba mi spong ba dang / mtho su skye ba'i rgyu tshul khrims mi spong ba dang / shes rab chen po'i chu thos pa mi spong ba dang / bral ba'i mu skam pa mi spong ba ste / chos bzhi po de dag ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ 
325b4(mdo sde): khang spyod che chu sbyin pa mi srang de'i 'bras te// mtho sa skye ba'i tshul khrims thob cing de'i 'bros te// shes rab nyon mongs 'joms rgyu thos pa de'i 'bras te// rnam grol reg rgyu sgom par byed ce
325b5(mdo sde): 'bras de// rgyu bzhi de la rtag brtson mkhas pa de dag ni// byang / chub snying por dbang bskur 'bras phyir nyin mtshan// spyod// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
325b6(mdo sde): bzhi dang ldan na/ lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rten cing 'brel brla 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chad par smra ba ma yin pa dang / rtag par smra ba ma yin pa dang / ma
325b7(mdo sde): rig pa byung na rga shi'i bar du 'byung bar lta zhing bdag tu lta bar yang mi byed pa dang / ma rig pa 'gags na rga shi'i bar du 'gag par lta zhing srid pa 'gag par yang mi byed pa ste
325b8(mdo sde): chos pa'i ba de dag ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// nam yang rtag par mi lta chang bar ltung mi byed// des ni'i chos rnams rkyen zung byed pa po dang ni// tshe rab pa med rang bzhin rnam
326a1(mdo sde): par dag par shes/ ma rig rtsanas na shi'i bar du 'byung 'gyur ba/ rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs te de 'gags rdung ni/ rkyen pang de pyir phyin chad skyes
326a2(mdo sde): 'gyur zhes gsungs// lha'i du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi ga
326a3(mdo sde): zhe na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la rag las par lta ba dang // dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bstsags pa la skyo ba med pa dang / 'khor ba'i sgo nas mya ngan las
326a4(mdo sde): 'das pa'i sgo yongasu tshol ba dang / sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i mos pa'i thabs kyis nyam su myong bar byed cing / nyon mongs pa rnams kyis ma yin pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag
326a5(mdo sde): dngango // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sangs rgyas byung / chub 'di ni sems can rnams la rten// dge ba stsogs shing 'dod pas yongasu skyo ba med/ 'khor ba'i sgo nas mya ngan
326a6(mdo sde): 'das pa yongs tshol zhing // sems can ji bzhin mos pa thabs kyis yongasu shes// lha'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi
326a7(mdo sde): bar 'tshe ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ long spyod mi zad pa dang / chos ston pa mi zad pa dang / mngon par shes pa thob pa dang / sems dang mnyam pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag ngo // de la 'di skad
326a8(mdo sde): ces bya ste// de dag rnams kyi longs spyod rtag tu mi zad cing // rtag tu chos kyi sa mi zad rgya mtsho 'dra ba yin// de dag mngon shes lnga po mi zad rtag mi g.yo// rtag tu dran ldan bsam pa sa dang / 
326b1(mdo sde): 'dra ba yin// mnyam med byang chub phyir ni yang dag zhugs gyur cing // mya ngan ma 'das gang la chos rnams de yod pa// de dag 'gro ba kun gyi nye bar 'tsher 'gyur zhing // byang chub mchog phyir myur tu
326b2(mdo sde): nges par 'byung bar 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ tshangs
326b3(mdo sde): ba'i gnas pa bzhis gnas pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa dang / bden pa bzhi shes pa dang / mas yang dag pan rig pa bzhi thob pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag ngo // de la 'di skad ces
326b4(mdo sde): bya ste/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po dag gis gnas/ byed cing // bsdu ba'i dngos pa dag la rtag tu dga' byed la// bden pa bzhi po dag la 'jigs med dpa'o rnams/ 'gro
326b5(mdo sde): bas ri mo byas shing mchod pa byas par 'gyur// so so yong dag rig pa'i pha rol son gyur cing // 'chad dang klog pa dag la rtag tu brtson gyur la// pha rol bde bar gyur pa'i bdebs
326b6(mdo sde): mgu byed na// de phyir de dag yid du 'ong zhing sdug par 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na// srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur/ 
326b7(mdo sde): ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan zhing tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / nges shing 'grogs na bde ba dang / dben pa la dga' zhing dbang po bsrungs pa dang / bdag nyid
326b8(mdo sde): bang ba la lhag par chags pa med cing rtag tu kha na ma thob la lta ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ thos pa'i yon tan thob cing tshul khrims pha rol som/ tshul 'chos
327a1(mdo sde): med cing rtag tu des la brtul zhugs bzang // nags dang nags 'dab gnas shing dbang po sdom byed la/ dran ldan bdag bde mi ltos kha na ma tho lta/ gang la rtag tu dge ba'i yon ta/ 
327a2(mdo sde): de yod pa/ de dag rtag tu sems can pan phyir brtson 'gyur zhing // de dag sems can ngon yang rtag tu byed 'gyur la/ de dag rtag tu byang chub phyir yang yid gzhol 'gyur// lha'i bu bya chub
327a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la ma sbas pa med pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dad pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / brtson 'grus
327a4(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa dang / snying rje chen po phun sum tshogs pa dang / theg pa chen por yongasu bsngo ba la mkhas pa rnams te/ chos bzhi po de dag ngango // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// de dag dang dang
327a5(mdo sde): ldan la rtul ba brtan ldan zhing // de dag brtson 'grus mthu da nga stobs dang ldan pa yin// 'gro ba kun la byams dang snying // rje che ldan zhing // byang chub ched du yongasu sngo la mkhas pa
327a6(mdo sde): ste/ de phyir dge ba kun la smras pa yod min zhing // zla ba nya ba'i zla ba mkha' la skar ma yi// tshogs kyi dbus na gnas pa rnam par mdzes pa ltar// yang dang yang du dge ba kun la rnam 'phel 'gyur
327a7(mdo sde): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan ma shes rab dag la rgya mtsho lta bu rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang // sku ba snying po
327a8(mdo sde): byed pa dang // blo rab tu gnas pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa rdo rje ltar brtan pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mkhas pa de dag ji skad sbas pa de bzhin byed// de dag sgrub
327b1(mdo sde): bsnying por byed cing tho rab gnas/ gang dag brtson pa de dag rdo rje lta bu yi// lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa dgang ldan par 'gyur// mkhas pa gang dag chos pa ni de dag ston byed pa// de dag rtag tu/ 
327b2(mdo sde): dge ba'i gshes gnyen bsten byed cing // dam bcas rnams la snying por byed par 'gyur ba dang // rtag tu sangs rgyas gsung yang 'dzin par byed pa yin// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
327b3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos dbang sgyu rabs dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ye shes kyi stobs can rnams yin zhing / nyon mongs pa'i stobs can rnam ma yin pa dang / 
327b4(mdo sde): sems la dbang sgyur ba rnams yin zhing / bdud kyi dbang sgyur ba da ma yin pa dang / gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa na/ sa yin pa dang / 'bras bu yod par chos ston pa rnams ni/ 
327b5(mdo sde): te chos bzhi pa de dag dang // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// de dag shes stobs ldan nyan mongs dbang mi 'gro/ shes rab stobs kyis blun spangs lha rnams kun dang bral// sems la dbang
327b6(mdo sde): sbyar byed cing bdud bzhi spangs gyur la// spobs pa brtan par gyur cing gzungs kyis 'khrugs pa med// de dag ston pa 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur te// de phyir myur tu dbang phyug nyid dang ldan
327b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na// bya ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ nga rgyal med pa dang / bla ma la/ 
327b8(mdo sde): gus pa dang / bag yod pa dang / 'dun pa drag po ste/ chos bzhi pa de dag dang // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// nga rgyal med cing tha ma gus pas gnas gyur la// kun nas bag yod byang chub
328a1(mdo sde): mchog la 'dun drag cing // bsam pa zag pas smon cing rtag tu drang gyur la// slob dpon dpe mabyud med pa rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur// mkhas pa 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i don mangs
328a2(mdo sde): shing tshul dang tshul ma yin la mkhas pa'i brtan pa rnams 'jig rten kun mdza' thams cad rtogs par khong du chud// de phyir 'gro bas spyi bor de la thal sbyar de la 'dud// lha'i bu byang chub sems dang
328a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ thams cad du ba na ma tho ba med cing yon tan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba dang
328a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa'i spob pa dang / dge ba thams cad dang mi 'bral zhing bag chags dang bral ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad ldan zhing / dbang bskur ba thob pa ste/ 
328a5(mdo sde): bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// sems can dag pa rgya chen mngon shes shes pas rtse// bde gshegs kun gyis dgongs pa mkha' 'dra'i spobs dang ldan// brtson 'grus thogs
328a6(mdo sde): med mi dge bag chags kun spangs shing // dge dang ldan zhing dbang bskur thob par 'gyur ba ste// chos rnams de dag la ni rab tu gnas gyur pa// de dag kha na ma tho med pa'i yon tan ldan/ bcom
328a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bsgrub pa 'di bstan pa na/ lha dang mi rnams las srog chags sa ya nyi 'bum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed// byang chub sems
328a8(mdo sde): dpa' nyi bri lnga stong gis ni mo skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu la srog chags 'bum ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam
328b1(mdo sde): bar dag go// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing / 'jig rten thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par yang gyuraro// lha rnams kyis kyang lha'i/ 
328b2(mdo sde): me togi char rab tu phab cing // lha'i sil snyan dag gis sgra yang phyung bar gyur to// klu rnams kyis kyang mu tig dmar po dang / klu'i me tog gi char rab tu pha'o// lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / 
328b3(mdo sde): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i mchod pa dag gis mchod pa byaso// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang / a la
328b4(mdo sde): mas la la chos shes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod nas/ mchod pa chen po dag kyang byas so// de nas lha'i bla rab rtsal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la 'di
328b5(mdo sde): skad ces smraso// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das kyis chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gi don dang / tshig gi rnam par gtan la dbab pa bstan pa de bka' stsal gyis/ 'jam dpal
328b6(mdo sde): khyod kyang chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gi don dang tshig rnam par gtan la dbab pa de la spongs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pan
328b7(mdo sde): gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin// 'jal dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems gzhan gyi rkyen gyis mi 'gro ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub
328b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtsam
329a1(mdo sde): pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad nges par
329a2(mdo sde): par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtsam pa thams cad la brtson 'grub brtan pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems
329a3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams ngag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos
329a4(mdo sde): kyi dbyings mi g.yo ba rjesu rtogs pa de ltas lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam sa
329a5(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyis chags pa med par spyod pa rnams yin// 'jam dang / la gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
329a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rnams yul thams cad la chags par mi byed pa/ de ltar na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po// ye shes kyis chags pa med par spyod pa rnams yi
329a7(mdo sde): no/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis mun pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang
329a8(mdo sde): byang sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongasu dag par shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis
329b1(mdo sde): mun pa dang bral ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal
329b2(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad rnam par bye na/ mi rnyed par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems
329b3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor ba rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
329b4(mdo sde): chen po thos pas don la rton pa rnams yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad
329b5(mdo sde): brjod du med par shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu bya nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos pas don la rton pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
329b6(mdo sde): dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyis chos la rton pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
329b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings zhib nyid du shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chas la rton pa
