329b8(mdo sde): rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba rnams
330a1(mdo sde): yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sgra thams cad la rten par mi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu
330a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin smra ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na
330a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
330a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rnams smra ba thams cad las ldog par byed pa de ltan/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la chos sba ba rnams
330a5(mdo sde): yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams
330a6(mdo sde): yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad las g.yog par mi byed pa de lta na/ 
330a7(mdo sde): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na
330a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thul par dka' ba rnams yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems
330b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams stong pa nyid rje su rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ nyon mongs pa nyid byang chub yin par yongs su tshol bar byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa
330b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thul par dka' ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
330b3(mdo sde): thos gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
330b4(mdo sde): cad kyi gting rtags par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zlos gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 
330b5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu
330b6(mdo sde): gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig cen na spyod kyang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur ba de lta na/ lnga'i bu byang chub sems
330b7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin no// lha'i dus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
330b8(mdo sde): gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bdag la bdag med/ 
331a1(mdo sde): khas sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus
331a2(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang
331a3(mdo sde): gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dbang po drug gis dbang po thams cad la lta bar byed ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
331a4(mdo sde): po chos ston pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres
331a5(mdo sde): pas rnam par thar pa'i sgor gnas pa rnams yin/ 'ang / ma dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sgo thams/ 
331a6(mdo sde): cad nas thar pa ston par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dre sa rnam par thar pa'i sgor gnas pa rnams yin no// 
331a7(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshar bcad pa'i phyir snrel zhir bsgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams
331b1(mdo sde): las 'das pa las kyang 'khor ba tshol zhing lta bar byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshar gcad pa'i phyir/ snrel
331b2(mdo sde): zhir bsgrub pa mkhas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rgyu la
331b3(mdo sde): mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad mi 'pho bar lta bar byed pa de lta
331b4(mdo sde): na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyis bya ba thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal
331b5(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras
331b6(mdo sde): ba lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad bdag po med par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta
331b7(mdo sde): ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
331b8(mdo sde): pa sems can yongasu smin par bya ba dag la thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
332a1(mdo sde): po rnams 'jig rten gyi tshul la spong par mi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can mang su smin par bya ba dag la
332a2(mdo sde): zabs la mkhas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa yong su dag pas brtul zhugs
332a3(mdo sde): grub pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtogs pa nyid yin par shes par byed pa de lta
332a4(mdo sde): na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa yongasu dag pas brtul zhugs grub pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na
332a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'gra sa pa'i sems med cing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
332a6(mdo sde): lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po rnams chos thams cad gtan tu yong su mya ngan las 'das par shes par byed lta bar byed
332a7(mdo sde): pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'gras pa'i sems med cing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa
332a8(mdo sde): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa rnams yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i
332b1(mdo sde): bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thamams cad pha rol las mthong bar byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pa/ 
332b2(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad
332b3(mdo sde): kyi nye bar 'tsho ba rnams yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings mi zad pa rab tu rtogs par
332b4(mdo sde): byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba/ rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
332b5(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chena'ajig rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe
332b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mi sdang ba'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na snang ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig
332b7(mdo sde): rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar gyur pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog chags thams cad kyis
332b8(mdo sde): bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos 'ga' yang len par mi byed/ 
333a1(mdo sde): spong bar mi byed pa de lta ma lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin// lha'i bus smras/ 
333a2(mdo sde): pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la smras pa med pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang
333a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad na mkha' dang mtshungs pa 'dra bar shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
333a4(mdo sde): chen po dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la sbas pa med pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dag la
333a5(mdo sde): snying por gyur pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems// dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'byed
333a6(mdo sde): pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dag snying por gyur pa rnams yin no// lha'i'o bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems
333a7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos dbang sgyur gang phyug tu gyur pa rnams yin/ lajam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
333a8(mdo sde): bsam du med pa sems pas sems thams cad shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la dbang sgyur bas dbang phyug tu
333b1(mdo sde): gyur pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams yim/ 'jam dpal/ 
333b2(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams tshul gcig gis tshul thams cad shes par byed cing / tshul thams cad kyis kyang tshul gcig
333b3(mdo sde): shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar
333b4(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du khra na ma tho ba med cing / yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras galha'i
333b5(mdo sde): bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rna mas chos thams cad gnyen po med par rtogs nas chos 'ga' yang bsgrub par mi byed/ chos 'ag
333b6(mdo sde): yang sel bar byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing / yon tan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin no// 
333b7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gno nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga khri brgyad stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// lha dang mi rnams kyi skye
333b8(mdo sde): dgu bdun khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// srog chags 'bum lhag tsam ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
334a1(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la mchod pa'i phyir lha rnams kyis kyang steng gi bar snang las lha'i me tog gi char dag mngon par
334a2(mdo sde): rab tu bgo// thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang / 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di thos nas yid rangs pa dang / dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas tshig 'di
334a3(mdo sde): skad ces bdag cag gis kyang chos de dag thob par gyur cig/ 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa'i spobs pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i spobs pa mi chod pa yang thob par gyur cig ces smraso// 
334a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la 'jam dpal khyod kyis chos rnam par gtan la dbab pa bstan pa 'di legs par smras te/ leg so// leg so zhes
334a5(mdo sde): leg so zhes bya ba byin no// / bam po gnyis pa// de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'jam dpal/ gzho nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces spraso// 'jam dpal
334a6(mdo sde): ci khyod kho bo las chos kyi dgab pa 'dod ngam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di skad du// khyod chos kyi dgab pa 'dod dam zhos zer ba me lha'i bu legs par gsungs pa'i chos
334a7(mdo sde): 'dul ba 'di las chos kyi dgab pa zhes bya ba ni sred pa dang / 'dod pa spangs pa yin te/ chos 'di ni so sor rtogs pa med pa'i phyir 'dong ba med pa yin// chos 'di ni mig gi
334a8(mdo sde): lam las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir bltar mi snang ba yin no// chos 'di ni mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir ma byas pa yin no// chos 'di ni yul drug dang ma 'dres pa'i phyir
334b1(mdo sde): mi mthong ba yin no// chos 'di ni sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'i phyir bdag gi ba med pa yino// chos 'di ni gtan yongasu ma grub pa'i phyir gzung ba med pa yin no// 
334b2(mdo sde): chos 'di ni yul med pa'i yul du 'gro ba'i phyir gzhi med pa yin no// chos 'di ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir zag pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni sngon gyi mtha' rnam
334b3(mdo sde): dag pa'i phyir 'ong ba med pa yino// chos 'di ni phyi ma'i mtha' rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'gro ba med pa yin// chos 'di ni da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa'i phyir gnas pa med pa
334b4(mdo sde): yin no// chos 'di ni brtag cing sel ba dang bral ba'i phyir co la ba med pa yin// chos 'di ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir mnyam pa med pa yin// chos 'di ni gnyen
334b5(mdo sde): bo med pa'i phyir mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin// chos 'di ni bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir g.yong/ med pa dang / rlom sems med pa dang / ma brtags pa dang / 
334b6(mdo sde): rnam par ma rtags pa dang / rnam par ma bsgrubs pa dang / kun tu ma bstan pa yino// chos 'di ni skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang bral ba'i phyir blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa yin// chos 'di ni chos kyi
334b7(mdo sde): dbyingasu yang dag par gzhol ba'i phyir gnas med par gnas pa yin// chos 'di ni yang dag par ma byung ba'i phyir dbyer med pa yino// chos 'di ni spros pa dang bral ba'i phyir rab tu spyod pa med pa yin
334b8(mdo sde): chos 'di ni rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi ba'i phyir spros pa dang bral ba yino// chos 'di ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir nye bar zhi ba yin// chos 'di ni phas kyi rgol ba thams cad nges
335a1(mdo sde): par bcom pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa med pa yin// chos 'di ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi rdul dang bral ba'i phyir shin tu 'phags pa yin// chos 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi phyir stong pa yin no// 
335a2(mdo sde): chos 'di ni nges par ma brtags pa'i phyir mtshan ma med pa yino// chos 'di ni rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'i phyir smon pa med pa yin// chos 'di ni rtsa ba yongasu chad pa'i phyir mi gnas pa
335a3(mdo sde): yin 'chos 'di ni grogs med pa'i phyir ma rten pa yin// chos 'di ni mi rten pa'i phyir mi g.yo ba yino// chos 'di ni gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag med pa yin// chos 'di ni gan
335a4(mdo sde): mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir sems can med pa yin// chos 'di ni gzod ma nas ma byung ba'i phyir rtag pa med pa yin// chos 'di ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ma byung ba yin// chos ni
335a5(mdo sde): ni mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ma skyes pa yin// chos 'di ni mtshan nyid thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir mtshan nyid med/ ba yin// chos 'di ni bzod ma nas yang dag par rgyan
335a6(mdo sde): chad pa'i phyir zhi ba yino// chos 'di ni bzod ma nas nye bar ni ba'i phyir yang dag par rgyur chang pa med pa yin// chos 'di ni mi phyed pa dang mi snang ba'i phyir rnam pa'i mtshan nyid lta bu yin
335a7(mdo sde): maldi'i bu de lta bu la chos kyi dgab pa ji lta bu zhig yod/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos 'di'i dgab pa 'di kun tu 'phro ba med pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bu leg mo len no/ 
335a8(mdo sde): ji skad smras pa de bzhin te / chos 'di'i dgab pa ni gang la lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyis rtul ba med pa de lta bu yin// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos 'di mi gsal ba rnyog pa med pa yin pas de ni/ 
335b1(mdo sde): sems rnyog pa can gyis mchod par mi nus pa'i phyir// lci'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na sems rtog pa can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lnga'i bu gzugs kyi mtshan rjesu dran par
335b2(mdo sde): byed pa ni sems rnyog pa can yi no// sgra dang / skad dang / dbyangs dang / tshig gi lam gyis chos rjesu dran par byed pa ni sems rnyog pa can yino// 'bras bu thob pa mngon tu byed pas dge 'dun
335b3(mdo sde): rjesu dran par byed pa ni sems rlog pa can yi no// nyon mongs pa gtan spong ba rje su dran par byed pa ni sems rnyog pa can yino// skye ba la rten pas lha rje su dran par byed pa ni sems rnyog pa can
335b4(mdo sde): yino// ma dul ba'i sbyin sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin// ma zhi ba'i tshul khrims kyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin// sems can la rten pa'i bzod pa'i sems ni sems rnyog
335b5(mdo sde): pa can yino// spros pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab kyi sems ni sems rnyog pa cam yino// bdag tu 'dzin pa la gnas pa'i byams pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yino// sems
335b6(mdo sde): la nges par ma bsam pa'i bsam gtan gyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yino// the tsom can gyi snying rje'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yino// mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam dang bral ba'i dag
335b7(mdo sde): ba'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yi no// gnyis la gnas pa'i gtang snyoms kyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yino// lusu 'du shes pa'i tshor ba'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin// cho su 'du
335b8(mdo sde): shes pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yino// skye ba dang 'jigs par 'du shes pa'i yang dag pa spong ba'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin// lus dang sems la
335b9(mdo sde): rten pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yino// dbang po drug la rten pa'i dbang po lnga'i sems ni sems rtog pa can yin// lta bas stobs dang ldan pa'i stobs lnga'i
336a1(mdo sde): sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin// cho su 'du shes pa la gnas pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag gi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yino// 'du byed yid la byed pa la brtson pa'i/ 
336a2(mdo sde): lam bsgom pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yi no// sdug bsngal la yongasu rtog pa'i 'du shes can gyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yi no// kun 'byung ba la bsgom pa'i 'du shes can gyi
336a3(mdo sde): sems ni sems rnyog pa can yino// 'gog pa la zad par 'du shes pa'i sems ni sems rtog pa can yino// lam bsgom pa la bsgom par 'du shes pa'i sems ni sems rtog pa can yin/ 
336a4(mdo sde): te lha'i bu ji tsam du rang bzhin gyis yong su dag pa nyid/ rispro 'degs par byed pa de tsam du sems rnyog pa can yi/ dran// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems rnyog pa med pa dag gang TI/ 
336a5(mdo sde): kham dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag sems nam dang mnyam pa dgo// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal nam/ 'a la sems chung zad kyang yod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
336a6(mdo sde): lha'i bu ji ltar na mkha' la sems med pa bzhin du sems de yang de dang 'dra ste// gang gi sems de 'dra ba de ni sems na mkha' dang mnyam pa yi mo// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gnas de
336a7(mdo sde): lasu zhig mos par 'gyur// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu lhag par byed pa la brtson pa rnams kyis mos par dka' ba yi no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal lhag par byed pa zhes bya ba de ji lta
336a8(mdo sde): bu yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras ga lha'i bu gang gi sems na mkha' mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir lhag par byed pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal ci zhig lhag par byed pa yin/ 'jam dpal
336b1(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu rtag par byed pa ni/ lhag par byed pa yin// mi rtag par byed pa ni lhag par byed pa yin// de bzhin du bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang / sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / bdag dang
336b2(mdo sde): bdag med par byed pa ni lhag par byed pa yin// stong pa zhes bya ba dang / gang zag ces bya ba de ni lhag par byed pa yin// mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya ba de ni lhag par byed pa yin
336b3(mdo sde): sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / brag cha dang / chu zla dang / smig rgyu dang / sprul pa'i dpe nye bar dgod pa dag gis chos rnam par 'jog par byed mtshon par byed/ 'jug pa
336b4(mdo sde): byed/ ston par byed pa/ de ni lhag par byed pa yino// ji tsam du chos rnam par 'jog par byed pa de tsam du lhag par byed pa yin te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa la skyon du byed pa dang / rnam par byang
336b5(mdo sde): ba la skyon med par byed pa de ni lhag par byed pa yin// 'khor ba la skyon du lta bar byed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la phan yon tu lta bar byed pa de ni lhag par byed pa yin
336b6(mdo sde): te lha'i bu de dag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyi lhag par byed pa dag yi no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar me lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lci'i bu gang gis
336b7(mdo sde): nges par 'byung ba'i dbyings rtogs shing nyon mongs pa thams cad 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas kyang / 'gog pa 'gog par yang mi byed la/ skye ba med pa skyed par yang mi byed cing / sgra thams na
336b8(mdo sde): kyis skrag par yang mi byed la kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de nyid rnam par byang ba'i rang bzhim yin pa de ltar shes shing chos thams cad la gnyis dang bral ba dang / blang ba med pa
337a1(mdo sde): dang / dar ba med pa thob pa de ni lha'i bu lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin// 'jam dpal gan dur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa ni lha'i bu nyi khri nyi stang chos rnams la chos
337a2(mdo sde): kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dgo// dge slong lnga stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grolo// byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri nyi stong gis mi skye ba'i chos
337a3(mdo sde): la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags stong phrag rab tu mang po dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyedado// dge bsnyen stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi
337a4(mdo sde): mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dgo / khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba las bud med nyis stong yang chos rnams lnga chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par nga 'o// de nas lcin/ 
337a5(mdo sde): bu rab rtsal sems kyis nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces smra so// tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag kyang the tsom ci yon bdag 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la dris shig// de nas gnas ba
337a6(mdo sde): 'od srung chen pos 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa la/ a.i ces smra'o// 'jam dpal dge slong rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa/ ji zhig la bsam gtan byed pa yin 'jam dpal/ 
337a7(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po dge slong rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa ni/ rtsa ba med pa dang / mtha' med pa dang / gnas med pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang / mi 'phrul
337a8(mdo sde): pal bsam gtan byed pa dang / yang dag pa la bsam gtan byed pa yin/ 'od srung chen pos sbas pa 'jam dpal tsa las bsams te gang sgra/ 'jas dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung
337b1(mdo sde): chen po rtsa ba ni rang gi lus yin/ mtha' ni rang 'dzin pa yin/ gnas ni khams gsum yin/ 'khrugs pa nyon mongs pa rnams yin/ mi mnyam pa ni gnyis yin te/ de la des lus ni rtsa ba
337b2(mdo sde): med par shes/ rang 'dzin pa ni mtha' med par shes/ khams gsum ni gnas med par shes/ nyon mongs pa rnams ni mi 'khrugs par shes/ bsam gtan rnams ni gnyi su med par shes
337b3(mdo sde): pas na/ btsun pa 'od srang chen po// kho bos de las bsams nas dge slong rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa ni rtsa ba med pa dang / mtha' med pa dang / gan med pa la bsam
337b4(mdo sde): gtan byed pa dang / mi 'khrugs pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang / yang dag pa la bsam gtam byed pa yi no zhes smras so// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar ma byang chub sems dang / 
337b5(mdo sde): chags pa med pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa yin 'ja/ ma dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu byang chub/ sems dpa' gang chags pa thams cad la spyod par byed kyang
337b6(mdo sde): chags pa thams cad kyis gos par mi 'gyur zhing / nyon mongs pa thams cad la mngon du byed kyang / sems can yong su smin par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa de dag gi rang bzhin gang yin
337b7(mdo sde): ba'i nyon mongs pa de dag kyang spong bar mi byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa yino// mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na
337b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che ba yin 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po byang chub sems dpa' gang 'dus byas kyang ma thob/ 'dus ma byas kyang ma thob la/ slob

338a2(mdo sde): dpa' 'on mongs pa med par gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpa' gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad sgrib pa med par shes par byed la/ pha rol dang // 
338a3(mdo sde): tshul rol dang bral zhing byang chub kyi sgrib pa yang mi spong la ting nge 'dzin las kyang mi ldang zhing khya ba thams cad kyang ston par byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa med par
338a4(mdo sde): gnas pa yino// byams ma'i bu gang pos smras pa/ 'jam dpa lnga ji ltar ma byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba yin/ 'jam dpral gyis smras pa/ btsun pa gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' da

338a7(mdo sde): dpa' bsam gtan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa nam gru gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mnyam par bzhag pa nyid yin par yang shes par bye/

338b1(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan pa mno// nye bar 'khor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba 'dzin pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa nye bar/

339a2(mdo sde): sde rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa bzhi thob cing tshig gcig
339a3(mdo sde): gis kyang bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du rgya cher rnam par 'byed cing ston la/ ci nas kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa spong bar mi byed pa dang / rnam par bya ba len par mi byed pa de ltar ston par byed pa dang / chos

339a6(mdo sde): don gyis don so so yang dag par rig pa ston pa dang / chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyis chos so so yang dag par rig pa stor ba dang / ming dang mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag
339a7(mdo sde): par rig pa ston pa dang / khrag ca dang mnyam pa nyid kyis spongs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ston par byed na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' so so yang yang dag par rig pa thob

339b2(mdo sde): gyis na byang chub sems dang 'tshul khrims dang ldan pa yino// kun dga' bos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/

339b7(mdo sde): bus smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper ma gnag rjes las brten na rdzing bu mchog yin pa de bzhin nyid du/ nyan thos gzhan dag las brten na kho bo cag kyang mchog yino// 'di lta ste/

340a1(mdo sde): lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa rnams kyis bstan pa yin te/ legaso// leg so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa//
