343b1(mdo sde): tho su 'gyur bas de'i nyes pa ni der 'gyu ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'dus byas ni so so'i skye bo'i sa yin la/ 'dus ma byas ni 'phags pa rnams kyis yino// 'o na ji ltar na byang chub sems
343b2(mdo sde): dpa' 'phags pa'i sa spangs shing so so'i skye bo'i sa la gnas pa 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnasu 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dus byas la yang mig
343b3(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas la yang mi gnas pas de'i phyir de ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnasu 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'du byed las yid bskyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas
343b4(mdo sde): la mi gnas pa yin pas 'dus byas kyi skyon dang bral ba dang / 'dus ma byas shes pa rtogs pa yin te/ de 'dus byas kyi skyor dang bral bas ni 'dus byas la mi gnas la/ 'dus ma byas
343b5(mdo sde): shes rtogs pas ni 'dus ma byasu mi ltung ba'i phyir// / lha'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper mtshan po che chen pos steng gi bar snang la mda' 'phangs par gyur la/ de nas mnga' de na mkha' la
343b6(mdo sde): mi gnas par 'dug cings la yang mi ltung na/ lha'i bu de la dka' ba chung zad yod dam/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal dka'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bas kyang byang chub sems
343b7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'dus byas kyang mi spong zhing 'dus ma byas kyang thob par byed la/ 'dus ma byasu yang mi ltung zhing / 'dus byas thob pa rnams kyang yengasu smin par byed pa
343b8(mdo sde): ni les dka' ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i 'jigs pa 'dus byas sam/ 'on te 'dus pa byasasam gang las 'thung bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras
344a1(mdo sde): pa lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jigs pa ni 'dus byas las kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'dus ma byas las kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu 'dus
344a2(mdo sde): las ni nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung la/ 'dus ma byas las ni nyon mongs pa med pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa med pas 'jigs
344a3(mdo sde): ba ci yod/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lci'i bu khams gsum na ni nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa yod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gang khams gsum du nyon mongs par mi byed na/ de ni nyan
344a4(mdo sde): thosu 'gyur ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi
344a5(mdo sde): shes pas 'dus byas la spyod par byed cing / thabs kyi shes pas 'dus ma byasu mi ltung ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chu ba sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin// lha'i bu gzhan
344a6(mdo sde): yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can la lta bas 'dus byas spong bar mi byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos la lta bas 'dus ma byasu mi ltung ba de lta na byang chub sems
344a7(mdo sde): dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yino// lha'i bu gzhan gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bsod nas kyi tshogs nye bar bsags pa'i phyir 'dus byas la spyod par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi
344a8(mdo sde): tshogs nye bar bsags pa'i phyir/ 'dus ma byasu mi ltung ba de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin// lci'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'dus ma byas la gnas te/ bsam
344b1(mdo sde): gtan rnams skyed par byed cing / thabs la gnas te bsam gtan rnams las ldog par byed pa de lta na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'/ 
344b2(mdo sde): byang chub kyi sems la gnas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar stsogs par byed cing / snying rje chen po la gnas te/ sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed pa de lta ran/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa
344b3(mdo sde): ming pa yi no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dben pa la gnas te/ bdud kyi las rnams rtogs par byed cing / thabs la gnas te bdud kyi las rnams spong bar byed par/ 
344b4(mdo sde): lha na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yino// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa chen po la gnas te/ chos ston par byed cing / snying rje chen po la gnas
344b5(mdo sde): te zang zing gi sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa de lta ma byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin// lci cu gzhan yang gang gi na// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba la gnas te/ mya ngan lnga
344b6(mdo sde): 'das pa yongasu sbyang ba'i las byed cing / mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas te/ 'khor ba yongasu sbyang ba'i las byed pa de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no// 
344b7(mdo sde): lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba med pas skye bar byed cing / 'pho ba med pas 'byung bar byed pa dang / chos lta bas snang bar byed cing / phung po dang / khams
344b8(mdo sde): dang / skye mched kyi rab tu phye ba ma yin pa dang / thams cad dang rje su 'brel cing zhi ba dang / nye bar gyur pa dang / 'bar bar byed cing 'bar bas tshig par mi byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams
345a1(mdo sde): cad yongasu spyod par byed cing / nyon mongs pa'i skyon rnams kyis mi gos pa dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa rnams 'dul bar byed cing / nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba la reg par/ 
345a2(mdo sde): mi byed pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la 'jug cing chos kyi bsam pa spong bar mi byed pa dang / bdud kyi lcags kyu shes par byed cing chos kyi lcags kyu spong bar mi byed pa dang / shes
345a3(mdo sde): pas 'jug par byed cing / thabs kyis ldog par byed pa dang 'phags pa'i rnam pa ston par byed cing / 'phags pa ma yin pa yin pa yongasu smin par bya ba la spro bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba la/ 
345a4(mdo sde): mngon par dga' bar byed cing / chos mthong ba la kun tu 'dod par byed pa de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin// 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa/ 
345a5(mdo sde): na lha'i bu lnga bri chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dgo// lha'i bu nyi khri lnga stong ni len ba med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par gro'o// byang chub se// 
345a6(mdo sde): dpa' sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa lnga khri ri mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri ni spobs pa thogs pa med pa skye so// lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog
345a7(mdo sde): chags stong phrag rab tu mang po dag gis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la lha'i mchod pa dag byas// gzhan yang lha'i bu rab rtsa la sems
345a8(mdo sde): kyis 'jam dpal gzo nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smra so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lam la rab tu gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa lci'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sem
345b1(mdo sde): raba' 'dod chags spangs pa'i phyir yang chos ston par byed la/ 'dod chags dang bral ba mngon du yang mi byed pa dang / zhe sdang spang ba'i phyir yang chos ston par byed la zhe sdang spong ba mngon du yang mi byed pa/ 
345b2(mdo sde): dang gti mug spang ba'i phyir yang chos ston par byed la/ gti mug spong ba mngon du yang mi byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston par yang byed la/ nyon mongs pa spong ba mngon du yang ni/ 
345b3(mdo sde): byed pa de tsam gyis na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yino// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la smon pa med pa ston par yang byed la stong
345b4(mdo sde): pa nyid mngon du mi byed pa dang / sems can rnams la mtshan ma med par ston par yang byed la/ mtshan ma med pa mngon du yang mi byed pa dang / sems can rnams la smon pa med pa ston par yang byed la/ 
345b5(mdo sde): smon pa med pa mngon du yang mi byed pa dang / de bzhin du sem/ sa can rnams la mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / skyeb med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / 'dod chags
345b6(mdo sde): dang bral ba dang mi ldan pa dang / 'gog pa'i chos ston par yang byed la/ 'gog pa mngon du yang mi byed pa de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yino// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi
345b7(mdo sde): che byang chub sems dpal yongasu mi gtong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang / 
345b8(mdo sde): gnod sems kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang / le los brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang / brjed nga na sa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par
346a1(mdo sde): byed pa dang / bems po dang / lug ltar lkug pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par sgrub par byed pa de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yi no// lha'i bus smras/ 
346a2(mdo sde): pa/ 'jam dpal ji las bsams te de skad smra 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongasu gtong ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can yong su mi
346a3(mdo sde): gtong ba dang / chos yongasu mi gtong ba dang / byang chub kyi sems yong su mi gtong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasu mi gtong ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ni chos bzhi po dedag yongasu mi gton
346a4(mdo sde): bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed// lha'i bu tshul khrims lus yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya ba de ni/ de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i tshig bla dwags yin te/ tshul khrims las yang
346a5(mdo sde): dag par 'da' bas ting nge 'dzin dang te nge 'dzin khas yang dag par 'a da' bas shes rab dang shes rab las yang dag par 'da' khas rnam par grol ba shes pa sgrub par byed/ lha'i bu khyod kyi/ 
346a6(mdo sde): rnam grangs des gang tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' ba de/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed par rig par bya'o// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang gnad sems la zhugs pa ni
346a7(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi theg pa las log par zhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las log par zhugs pa yin pas de ni theg pa chen po la legs par zhugs pa yin te/ gang theg pa chen po sa
346a8(mdo sde): legs par zhugs pa de ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yino// lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' lus kyis rtul bar mi byed cing / ngag dang sems kyis rtul bar mi byed pa
346b1(mdo sde): de ni le lo can yi ral gang de ltar chos la mngon par brtson pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub par byed pa yin// lci'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni rmi lam na yang sa gnyis po
346b2(mdo sde): dag la dga' ba'i sems skyed par mi byed pas de ni brjed ngas pa yin la gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rjes ngas pa de ni theg pa chen po la mnyam par gnag pa yin pas/ de ni
346b3(mdo sde): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yino// lha'i bu chos thams cad ni bems po ste/ tsA dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang / mig yor dang / lug ltar lkug pa dang 'dra bar rang bzhin gyi
346b4(mdo sde): nus pa med pa yin pas/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang / ye shes kyis kyis de ltar chos thams cad bems po dang lug lkug pa lta bus byang chub sgrub par byed pa de ni shes rab kyi
346b5(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa byed pa yin te/ de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni kham sgrub par byed pa yino// lha'i bu ga/ zhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i lam/ 
346b6(mdo sde): yang mi spong la mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam yang tshol bar byed pa dang / lam gyi las kyi rgyun yang mi gcod cing lam gyi bya ba yang sgrub par byed pa dang / lam ngan par zhugs pa'i sems can nas/ 
346b7(mdo sde): kyang lam la 'god par byed pa de lta na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yino// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems can thams cad dang / chos thams cad btsal na mi rnyed pa dang / 
346b8(mdo sde): byang chub kyi lam spong bar mi byed pa dang / 'bras bu yod par bsam gtan byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi lam thob pa yi no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' nyan
347a1(mdo sde): thos kyi lam yang rab tu shes la/ nyan thos kyi lam gyi nges par 'byung bar yang mi byed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam yang rab tu shes la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gyis nges par// 
347a2(mdo sde): 'byung bar mi byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam yang thob par byed la lam nges kyang dbang po yongasu ma rdzogs par nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas
347a3(mdo sde): pa yin// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba'i 'bras bu don du mi gnyer ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa'i
347a4(mdo sde): skyen gyis mi gos pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad byang chub tu yong su sngo bar byed pa dang / byang chub kyi phyir 'phel ba yang dag par rje su mi mthong ba dang / 'bri ba yang dag par rje su mi
347a5(mdo sde): mthong ba de lta ma byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yino// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' lam pa na pa las lam yongasu tshol bar byed pa dang / lam yongasu
347a6(mdo sde): btsal nas kyang nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yi no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lam ngan pa lam yongasu tshol
347a7(mdo sde): bar byed 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lji bu lam ngan pa zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de la gnas nas sems can nges par 'byung ba'i phyir lam yong su tshol bar byed kyi/ bdag
347a8(mdo sde): nyid nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ni ma yin// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa yimo// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar
347b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten na spyod kyang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis migs pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa ston par byed kyi/ nyon mongs pa med pa nyid du mi
347b2(mdo sde): ltung ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba ston par byed kyang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med par shes shing skyon med pa mngon du mi byed pa dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la yongasu
347b3(mdo sde): spyod par byed kyang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched don du mi gnyer ba dang / phung po dang khams dang / skye mched yongasu shes par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can rnams la chos ston kyang / yongasu shes
347b4(mdo sde): pa de dag yongasu shes par mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thur pa dang / ting 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang // mngon par sgrub par byed cing sems can rnam par g.yengs pa
347b5(mdo sde): rnams nye bar 'jog par byed kyang / nye bar 'jog pa la 'byung bar mi byed pa dang / bdud kyi yul nye bar ston par byed kyang bdu da kyi lam rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa dang / sangs rgyas
347b6(mdo sde): yul spong bar mi byed pa dang / bdud kyi yul gyi rje su mi 'jug pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi yul las ldog par mi byed pa dang / sems can gyi khams kyi yul nye bar len par byed pas na/ de'i phyir len
347b7(mdo sde): chen pa de dag gi spyod pa ni/ 'jig rten thams cad dang 'thun pa yin//  smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa la spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
347b8(mdo sde): lha'i bu bsam pa yong su dag cing nang dang phyi rol dben pa nyid kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa la spyod pa dang / rab tu spyod pa med pa nyid kyis sbyor ba la spyod pa dang / sems mi brjed pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi sa
348a1(mdo sde): / mirjed pa la spyod pa dang / sems dul ba nyid kyis sbyin pa la spyod pa dang / sems ni ba nyid kyis tshul khrims la spyod pa dang / smras pa med pa nyid kyis bzod pa la spyod pa dang / lus dben pa nyid
348a2(mdo sde): kyis brtson 'grus la spyod pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par g.yeng ba med pa nyid kyis bsam gtan la spyod pa dang / spros pa med pa nyid kyis shes rab la spyod pa dang / sems can la bdag med pa nyid
348a3(mdo sde): kyis byams pa la spyod pa dang / nyon mongs pa yod pa ma yin pa rab tu zhi ba nyid kyis snying rje la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba'i phyir dga' ba la spyod pa dang / mtha' gnyis dang bral
348a4(mdo sde): ba'i phyir btang snyoms la spyod pa dang / bzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir mi rtag pa la so sor rtog pa la spyod pa dang / yongasu rtog pa sdug bsngal ba'i phyir/ sdug bsngal la so sor rtog pa la spyod pa dang / 
348a5(mdo sde): phyin ci log rang bzhin med pa'i phyir bdag med pa la so sor rtog pa la spyod pa dang / 'du shes yongasu shes pa'i phyir zhing la so sor rtog pa la spyod pa dang / phung po sgyu ma lta bur yongasu
348a6(mdo sde): shes pa'i phyir sdug bsngal yongasu shes pa la spyod ba dang / ma rig pa sngon du 'gro ba'i phyir kun 'byung ba shes pa la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa'i phyir 'gags pa shes pa la spyod pa dang / 
348a7(mdo sde): 'dus byas la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir lam shes pa la spyod pa dang / 'bras bu yongasu shes pa nyid kyis rgyu shes pa la spyod pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'gyur ba'i phyir rkyen shes pa la
348a8(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / ming dang gzugs 'byung ba med pa'i phyir don so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang / sgra brag cha dang mtshungs pa'i phyir spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang / 
348b1(mdo sde): tshig 'bru gsal ba nyid kyis don la rton pa la spyod pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul ma spangs pa nyid kyis ye shes rton pa la spyod pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa nyid kyis nges pa'i don gyi
348b2(mdo sde): mdo sde la ston pa la spyod pa dang / gang zag yongasu smin par bya ba nyid kyis chos la rton pa la spyod pa dang / las rnam par dag pa'i phyir lha'i mig la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i phyir
348b3(mdo sde): lha'i rna ba la spyod pa dang / ting 'dzin rnam pa dag pa'i phyir/ pha rol gyi sems shes pa la spyod pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir sngon gyi gnas rjesu dran pa shes pa la spyod pa dang / sems
348b4(mdo sde): la dbang sgyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub pa la spyod pa dang / mi bye dra ba'i phyir spyod pa brtan pa la spyod pa dang / mi lhod pa'i phyir spyod pa sra ba la spyod pa dang / bskyod du med pa'i phyir gnas
348b5(mdo sde): pa med pa la spyod pa dang / tha dad pa med pa nyid kyis spyod pa mnyam pa'o/ sbyong ba dang / thams cad rje su ma brtags pa'i phyir sa da nga// chu dang me dang / rlung dang / namapa' lta bur spyod pa dang / rnam par
348b6(mdo sde): bsgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis phyir sgyu ma lta bu la spyod pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rmi lam lta bu la spong pa dang / rnam par rmongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis sdig rgya lta bu la spyod pa
348b7(mdo sde): dang bdag mi srid pa'i mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / sems rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan ma med pa la spyod pa dang / khams gsum rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis smon pa
348b8(mdo sde): med pa la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la spyod pa dang / sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa 'jug pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bdud tshar
349a1(mdo sde): / gtsang ba la spyod pa dang / spod pa thams cad rnam par bsgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pas spyod pa ste/ lha'i bu de lta spyad par
349a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pa yin no// / bam po gsum pa ste tha ma'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni de nyan thos
349a3(mdo sde): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yino// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dad pas rjesu 'brang ba ma yin pa dang // 
349a4(mdo sde): chos kyi rje su 'brang ba ma yin pa dang / gang brgyad pa ma yin pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa ma yin pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba ma yin pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba ma yin pa dang / dgra bcom pa ma
349a5(mdo sde): pa dang / gang nyan thos ma yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa / gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs
349a6(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang / ston pa ma yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin par mi smra'o// lha'i bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' gang so so'i skye bo'i chos can ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags kyi/ 
349a7(mdo sde): chos can ma yin pa dang / zhe sdang gi chos can ma yin pa dang / gti mug gi chos can ma yin pa dang / gang 'khor ba'i chos can ma yin pa dang / yongasasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can ma yin pa de
349a8(mdo sde): ni byang chub sems dpa' yin par mi smra'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji las bsams te/ de skad smra/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dad pas rjesu 'brang ba dang / chos kyi
349b1(mdo sde): rjesu 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / de bzhin
349b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / ston pa dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos can dang / 'dod chags kyi chos can dang / zhe sdang gi chos can dang / gti mug gi chos can dang / 'khor
349b3(mdo sde): ba'i chos can dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dad par byed pa dang / cha/ 
349b4(mdo sde): pa thams cad la dad par byed kyang de la chags par mi 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi dad pas mi 'gro ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi lam la dad pa skyed cing / 'dzin par byed pa dang / chags pas chags
349b5(mdo sde): par gyur pa rnams thar bar byed pa gang / chags pa med pa'i ye she/ sa yongasu tshol bar byed pa dang / 'khor ba la chags par mi byed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par mi ltung ba de tsam
349b6(mdo sde): gyis ma lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dang bas rje su 'brang ba yin// lha'o bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjesu 'brang ba yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bu
349b7(mdo sde): gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa 'dzin par byed pa dang / kun 'dzin par byed pa dang / chos kyi zas dang ldan zhing zang zing gi zas med pa dang / chos kyi gnas shing
349b8(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa la mi gnas pa dang / chos kyi stobs can yin gyi/ nga rgyal gyi stobs can ma yin pa dang / chos smra ba yin gyi/ 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gtan smra ba ma yin pa dang / chos kyi dbang
350a1(mdo sde): // phrug yin gyi nyon mongs pa'i dbang phyug ma yin pa dang / chos la rton pa yin gyi gang zag la rton pa ma yin pa dang / chos sba ba yin gyi/ chos ma yin pa mi smra ba dang / chos
350a2(mdo sde): rjesu 'thun pa'i chos la rton pa yin gyi/ brtson pa btang ba'i chos la mi gnas pa dang / chos skyon med pa nyid du chos thams cad shes par byed pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo chags pa med pa dang ldan pa
350a3(mdo sde): dang / nor 'dun dang ldan pa dang / dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin par byed pa dang / chos kyi khyad par la gnas pa de lta ma lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjesu 'brang ba yin// lha'i dus
350a4(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brgyad pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' log pa nyid brgyad las yang dag par 'das
350a5(mdo sde): pa dang / yang dag pa nyid brgyad la rab tu gnas pa da/ nga/ lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par snang ba la mkha nyes pa dang / sbyor ba yongasu ma rdzogs par lam des nges par 'byung
350a6(mdo sde): bar mi byed pa dang / mi khom pa brgyad du skyes pa'i sems can rnams dal ba phun sum tshogs pa dag la 'god par byed pa dang / skyes bu dam pa'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad la gnas pa
350a7(mdo sde): dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mi spong ba de lta ma lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' brgyad pa yin// lha'i
350a8(mdo sde): bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar ma byang chub sems dpa' rgyun tu zhugs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can rgyun phyogs
350b1(mdo sde): su de pa rnams rkun las zlog par byeng pa dang / 'khar ba'i rgyun thams cad gcod par byang la 'bar ba mi gcod pa dang / dam sa thams cad kyang gcod par byed pa dang / sems can
350b2(mdo sde): rnams bde 'gro dang / mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du bya ba'i lam la 'god par byed pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / lha dang mi la gzhol ba dang / bden pa ston par byed pa dang / rlom
350b3(mdo sde): semasu mi ltung ba dang / the tsom dang bral ba dang / nges pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzhol ba dang / so so'i skye bo'i lam las yang dag par 'das pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi lam
350b4(mdo sde): la rab tu gnas pa dang / 'khor ba'i gting rnyed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs par gyur pa dang / 'jig rten gyi spyir gan su gyur pa dang / 'dus byas la snang ba dang / 
350b5(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas pas rab tu phye ba dang / phyir ldog 'gyur ba dang / dge 'dun la yang dag par gzol ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rgyun tu zhugs pa yi
350b6(mdo sde): zhon lnga'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos tham
350b7(mdo sde): cad 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med par shes nas/ sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin 'ong ba dang / sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed pa dang 'ong ba dang / 
350b8(mdo sde): 'gro ba stan par byed pa dang / chos nyid la bang ba dang / 'gro ba med par mthang ba dang / 'ong yang nyan mongs pa med pas 'ong ba dang / rang gi las yang su dag pas 'gro ba dang 'ang
351a1(mdo sde): ma'am pa nyid ma spang ba dang / bdud kyi dbang gis mi 'gro ba dang / byang chub kyi lam nye bar ldan pa'i phyir bang ba dang / nye bar blangs pa'i sems ca bsgral ba'i phyir
351a2(mdo sde): ba dang byang chub kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa kra'ing mi byed pa de lngan/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' lan cig phyir 'ong ba yi mo lnga'i bus spras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar ma byang chub sems pa'i
351a3(mdo sde): phyir mi 'ong ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' lta ba rnams dang / phyin ci log rnams dang / sgrib pa rnamasu yang mi 'ong ba dang / 'dun pa dang / 'dod
351a4(mdo sde): chags dang / zhe sdang dang / 'jigs pa gti mug gis yang 'ong ba dang / 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba dang / byas pa nges par ma gyur cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma rdzogs par mi 'ong ba dang / 
351a5(mdo sde): 'ong ba med pa dang / 'pho ba med pa la mkhas pa/ rga/ shi med pa la thob pa dang / mthar gnas pa dang / khya skyes pa nges pa dang / lung bstan pa thob pa dang / dmigs pa med pa
351a6(mdo sde): dang rnam pa med pa thob pa dang / shes pas gzhan la rag ma las pade lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi 'ong ba yi no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub
351a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' dgra bcom pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med cing 'dod chags gdul ba'i phyir sems can
351a8(mdo sde): rnams la chos ston pa dang / sdang ba med cing zhe sdang gdul ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / rmongs pa med cing gti mug gdul ba'i phyir sems can rnam
351b1(mdo sde): la chos ston pa dang / chos thams cad la nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa dang / sems can thams cad la sems ma btang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la
351b2(mdo sde): brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / 'dod pa'i long spyod thams cad la dga' ba med pas dga' ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / pad+ma bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi
351b3(mdo sde): ma gos pa dang / shes pas 'phags pa dang mnyam pa dang / thabs kyis 'phags pa ma yin par gnas pa dang / nye bar len pa thams cad la bdag gi
351b4(mdo sde): med cing yongasu 'dzin pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bdag gir byed cing yongasu 'dzin pa dang / rang gi sems kyi rgyud dag la zag pa med pa'i sems dang
351b5(mdo sde): ldan pa dang / gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud dag la zagapa med pa gnas par byed pa dang / sngon dam bcas pa dag la brtag pa yong su rdzogs pa dang / tshul rol dang / kha rol
351b6(mdo sde): la gnas pa rnams kyi pha rol tu son pa dang / tshu rol gyi gnas ma spangs pa dang / gnad gyi sems can gzhan thar bar byed pa de lta ma lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom pa yin
351b7(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la mdza
351b8(mdo sde): pa'i chos sgrogs par byed cing yul rnams la spyod par mi byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i dam pa'i chos dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i chos sgrogs par byed pa dang / rgyu dang rkyen dang / 
352a1(mdo sde): / bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis g.yo ba med pa sgrogs par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa dang / rnam pa' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams spros
352a2(mdo sde): par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / ye shes chen po la chos thams cad rgyus nye bar 'gro ba rtsoms shig ces sgrogs par byed pa dang / sgrogs pa yang gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa
352a3(mdo sde): dang / thos pas kyang rlom sems mi byed pa dang / blugs pa thams cad kyi sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi 'chang ba yongasu shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa mi zang ba thob pa dang / don da
352a4(mdo sde): tshig dang yig 'bru mi zad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa dang / shes pa ston par byed pa dang / sa so ci rigs par chos ston par byed pa dang zhi ba'i sa la gnas pa
352a5(mdo sde): dang spros pa med pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam la spyod pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos yi/ ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
352a6(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rkyen la rag las pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zab
352a7(mdo sde): med pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / rnam par bsgrubs pa nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / des rkyen rnams legs par mthong ba'i phyir byang chub 'dren par byed pa'i rkyen 'di
352a8(mdo sde): lha ste pa rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi phyags deng byang chub tu phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi grogs dang bsdu ba'i nges pa 'azhi'i phyogs dang / tshad med pa pa'i phyogs dang mngon par shes
352b1(mdo sde): pa'i phyogs yang dag par sgrub par byed pa dang / de rkyen sgrub par byed cing / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pas byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshang rgya bar byed pa dang / sa ngan pa dag las sems skye bar
352b2(mdo sde): byed pa dang / nyi tshe ba'i shes pa 'dul ba la mkhas pa dang / theg pa chen po la legs par rab tu gnas pa dang / chos thams cad la mngon du gyur pa de lta ma/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rang
352b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas yino// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lci'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad
352b4(mdo sde): bzong ma nos dber pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad gzod ma nas bdag med pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa dang / ming mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dman pa dang / 
352b5(mdo sde): mchog dang brnam thams cad rtogs par byed pa dang / rang ge nyon mongs pa stong pa nyid kyis nyon mongs pa tham sa cad rtogs par byed pa dang / skad cig gcig la rje su rdzogs pa'i
352b6(mdo sde): rim gyis sa dang spyod pa sna tshogs ston par byed pa dang / sems can dbang po dang mos pas chos ston par byed pa dang / 'bras bu yod par chos ston par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang
352b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas yi no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub
352b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa lam du 'gro ba dang / de bzhin nyid mi brjed pa dang / de bzhin nyid la rab tu gnas pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sbyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi tshul khrims dang / de bzhin
353a1(mdo sde): nyid kyi bzod pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi brtson 'grus dang / de bzhin nyid kyi bsam gtan dang / de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab dang / de bzhin nyid kyi thabs dang / de bzhin nyid kyi smon lam dang / de
353a2(mdo sde): bzhin nyid kyi stobs dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sems can med pa dang / seMn yongasu thar bar byed pa dang / sems can gyi gnas dang / 'khor ba na yang spyod la spyod
353a3(mdo sde): pa thams cad las kyang yang dag par 'das pa dang / spyod pa las sgrol bar byed pa dang / de na yang yin la/ de na yang ma yin pa dang / 'di na yang yin la 'di na yang ma yin pa dang / gnyi ga las
353a4(mdo sde): dag pa dang / mun pa dang bral ba dang / rtag tu gsal ba dang / mun pa med pa dang / mun pa'i ling rtog dang bral ba dang / de bzhin nyid kyi rjesu song ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i rje su song ba de lta
353a5(mdo sde): na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ nyes bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na bya/ nga chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das shes bya/ 'jam dpal gyis
353a6(mdo sde): smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa bcom pa dang / chu bo las rgal ba dang / srid pa mthong ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi khur dang / srid pa 'joms pa dang / srid
353a7(mdo sde): pa'i 'du shes dang / bral ba dang / bdud bcom pa dang / khur bor ba dang / srid pa'i 'gro bas 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / bya ba shes pa dang / srid pa'i 'dod chags bstsal pa dang / lus dang sems
353a8(mdo sde): bsgoms pa dang / tshul khrims dang shes rab bsgoms pa dang / srid pa'i skyon legs par mthong ba dang / srid pa'i sred pa dang bral ba dang / sems can la bsam pa ma btang ba dang / srid pa'i
353b1(mdo sde): rgya mtsho las sgrol ba dang / chu lon dang zam pa legs par byas pa dang / mi gnas pas legs par mthong ba dang / rtag tu bsgom pa las yid kyis brtsom pa dang / sems can gyi srid bzang bar byed / 
353b2(mdo sde): pa dang / srid pa thams cad las rnam par log pa dang / thabs la mkhas dang / nyon mongs thams cad la thal bar rlog par byed pa dang / srid pas rnam par rtse ba la mkhas pa dang / srid pa gsum
353b3(mdo sde): na yod pa rnams kyi mchod pa de lta ma lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das shes bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rdzogs
353b4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' mtshams med pa gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pas ma'am pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs
353b5(mdo sde): par byang chub par byed pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa rnams dang / phyin ci rnams dang / bsgribs pa rnams dang / chong pa rnams dang kun nas ldang ba rnams gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kya
353b6(mdo sde): de dang mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du mngom logs nub par byed pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gang dang mnyam pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad gang dang mnyam pa byang chub
353b7(mdo sde): de dang mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams dang / slob pa'i chos rnams dang / nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang / rang sangs
353b8(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang / ma
354a1(mdo sde): pa nyid du rnam par 'jug par mi byed pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid du lta bar byed pa dang / chos thams cad bzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir rkyen
354a2(mdo sde): la rag las pa dang / yod pa ma yin pa'i yong su rtog pas kun nas blang ba na mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' yang dag
354a3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yi no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ston pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
354a4(mdo sde): gang la ston pa dang / rab tu ston pa dang / rjesu ston par byed pa de dag thams cad mi g.yos pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang bstan pa yong su 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / stong gsum gyi
354a5(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu ston pa dang / rab tu ston pa dang / ston pa gcig pur 'gyur ba da// sems can thams cad kyi skyabs dang / gling dang / dpung gnyen
354a6(mdo sde): du 'gyur ba dang / mtshan ma thams cad zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / the tsom dang bral ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcod pa la mkhas pa dang / brgya byin
354a7(mdo sde): dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong gi phyag byas pa dang / yang dag par smra ba dang / khams gsum pas phyag byas pa dang / sems na mkha' dang mnyam zhing / khengs pa med pa dang / yang
354a8(mdo sde): dag pa'i mtha' legs par mthong ba'i phyir smad pa dang / brdeg pa dang / dgod pa dang / bshung ba dang / khro ba dang / spyod pa dang / bsdigs pa thams cad dang / rlom sems thams cad kyis
354b1(mdo sde): zhum par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can gyi rang bzhin legs par mthong ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la par zhing sring rtse ba dang / 'jig rten la ston par grags par 'gyur ba de lta ma lnga'i bu bya chu
354b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' ston pa yin/ lnga'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so so'i skye ba'i chos can yin 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lnga'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems
354b3(mdo sde): dpa' thabs kyis so so'i skye ba'i sbyod ba thams cad kyang ston par byed la/ shes pas so so'i skye bo'i spyod pa thams can kyang ston par byed la shes pas ma sa'i skye ba'i spyod pa thams cad la
354b4(mdo sde): chags par yang mi 'gyur ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' so so'i skye bo'i chos can yino// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyi chos
354b5(mdo sde): can yin 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi nas rnams la rjesu chags par 'gyur ba dang / ngag tu sangs rgyas
354b6(mdo sde): kyi sku la kun tu chags par 'gyur ba dang / bsam gton dang / ting 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa sgrub pa'i phyir rtag tu dgon pa gnas pa la rjes chags par 'gyur ba dang / sems ca
354b7(mdo sde): rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis bsdu ba la rtag tu rjesu chags par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad la zhe 'bras pa'i sems med par 'gyur ba de ldan/ lha'i bu byang chub sems
354b8(mdo sde): dpa' 'ad tshigs kyi chos can yin// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ni sdang gi chos can yim 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa lnga'i bu gang ni tshe byang chub sem
355a1(mdo sde): dpa' 'dus byas rnams la gcig tu nyes pa'i skyon chags par lta bar byed pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi zag pa la sdang par byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / 
355a2(mdo sde): 'du byed thams cad la skyon du yang 'du shes la nyon mongs pa rnams dang / 'du byed rnams spong bar byed pa dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir brtsor 'grus rgyun mi gcod par byed pa dang / 
355a3(mdo sde): snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin par yin gyis snying brtse ba rgya chen po yang dag par skyed par byed pa dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams nyon mongs pa'i 'das rdzab
355a4(mdo sde): las 'byin par byed pa dang / sems can zhe sdang can rnams la bzod pa nye bar sgrub par byed cing nyon mongs pa rnams la shes pa sbyin par byed pa dang / 'chi 'pho'i thabs thams cad dang 'khor bsun
355a5(mdo sde): 'byin par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang gi chos can yino// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gti mug gi chos can yin/ 
355a6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal dpal gyis sbas pa/ lnga'i bu gti mug ces bya ba ni gang chung zad kyang mi shes pa yo pas/ de la gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi banying la snyoms par zhugs
355a7(mdo sde): pa de shes par mi byed/ rnam par shes par mi byed/ kun tu shes par mi byed/ len par mi byed/ spong bar mi byed/ 'byung bar mi byed/ 'jig par mi byed/ g.yo bar mi byed/ rlom semasu mi byed/ 
355a8(mdo sde): skyo bar mi byed cing / chos kyi rang ba'imagyis 'gogs pa la snyoms par zhugs pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gti mug gi chos can yin// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal
355b1(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i chos can yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor las kyang mi g.yo ba de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi chos
355b2(mdo sde): rnams tshol bar yang byed pa dang / bdud thams cad dang thun mongs ma yin zhing spyod pa dman pa rnams dang ma 'dres pa dang / sems can rnams spong ba dman pa las bral zhing spyod pa rgya chen
355b3(mdo sde): bo la 'god par byed pa dang / don 'thun par byed pa dang / mi dge ba thams cad la mi bsngags parjod par byed cing 'dun pa zlog pa dang phyir ldog par byed pa dang / byang chub 'khor ba la gzhol
355b4(mdo sde): bar shes par byed pa dang / 'bor ba mnyam pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid du lta bar byed pa dang / 'khor ba las mi g.yo zhing gnas par yang mi byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems
355b5(mdo sde): dpa' 'khor ba'i chos can yino// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' na dngasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis sgra
355b6(mdo sde): ga lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs mya ngan las 'das par lta bar byed ba dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi bar shes par bya/ 
355b7(mdo sde): ba dang / sems can thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla ba dang / nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par byed pa dang / sems can dpag tu med pa me gsum gyis 'gyur ba rnams te
355b8(mdo sde): b.ra'i bar byed cing yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa la yang spyod par byed la/ gtan du yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bas yongasu mya ngan las 'ad
356a1(mdo sde): / bar yang mi byed pa de lta ma lha bu byang chub sems dpa' yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can min ta/ thabs mkhas pa dang / thabs shes pa la nges par skyes pad/ 
356a2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la ban pa dang / rjesu snying brtse ba dang ldan pa yin// 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags 'bum lhag tsam chos rnams la chos
356a3(mdo sde): kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dgo/ srog chags drug khri mi len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par gral// sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen
356a4(mdo sde): bkur byas pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzang ba thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' nyi bri lnga stong gis ni mi zad pa'i rnam pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i gzungs ma sar thob
356a5(mdo sde): pa bgyu / srog chags sa ya phrag nyis dang lnga 'bum gyis ni thun/ meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sams bskyed/ steng gi bar snang las kyang bcom ldan
356a6(mdo sde): 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la mchod par bya ba'i phyir me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu pha'o// de nas lha'i bu re ba rtsal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la
356a7(mdo sde): 'di skad ces spraso// 'jam dpal ji ltar ra byang chub sems dpa' thabs dang shes rab kyis nges par 'byung ba yi mde nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas/ lha'i bu rab cal sems la tshig/ 
356a8(mdo sde): su bcad de smras pa/ gang tshe sems ni chags med pa/ bla med byang chub sems yin te/ sems kyi rang bzhin mngon sum pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid// sems rnams bskyed pa thams
356b1(mdo sde): ni/ byang chub tu ni yongs sngo zhing // byang chub sems las rab rtas pa// de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid// sems can thams cad bdag med cing // mi bden ya ma rA gsog tu// gang tshe shes pas she/ 
356b2(mdo sde): byed pa// de mi shes rab mtshan nyid// gang phyir sems can thams cad dag/ byang chub phyir ni sbyin byed cing // bsam pa thag pas sdud byed pas// de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid// gang tshe bdag
356b3(mdo sde): dang byang chub dag/ gtan du mthong bar mi byed cing // 'khor gsum yongasu dag gyur pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do// nang dang yang ni phyi rol dag/ thams cad yongasu gtong byed cing // sems
356b4(mdo sde): can kun la yongasu bsngo ba// de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid// zhi zhing rab zhi gtsang dag cing // tshul khrims rlom sems mi byed la// las dang ngag yid ni gyur pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid// tshul
356b5(mdo sde): khrims la ni zhugs gyur cing // gzhan yang tshul khrims sbyor byed// la// sangs rgyas tshul brims sngo byed la/ de phyir thab sa shes bya ba yin// chos rnams thams cad rab stong
356b6(mdo sde): zhing / bdag med bzod pa sgom byed la// lus dang sems kyis ma smras pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// lus kyis sbyor bar mi byed cing // ngag dang sems kyis ma yin pa/ chos rnams kun la/ 
356b7(mdo sde): dberan gyur pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyim/ sems can kun gyi khro ba dang // bsod dang 'ching ba bzod byed cing // sems can de dag mi spong ba// de ni thabs kyi pha rol phyin// sems can yod/ 
356b8(mdo sde): su smin bya'i phyir// bsam gtan bde ba rab spangs nas/ grong dang yul 'khor snang byed pa// de ni thabs kyi pha rol phyin// tshul rol ma yin pha rol min// 'thun pa'i phyi rol rab bAn
357a1(mdo sde): shing // spros pa'i lta ba rdzun bcad pa/ shes rab pa rol phyin rtogs yin// gang gis stong nyid rtags gyur nas// de ni btang snyoms mi byed cing // sems cad stang cing rgyam
357a2(mdo sde): byed pa/ de ni thabs kyi tshul yino// sangs rgyas gzung med ma pa 'dra bar// chos kyi sgo nas lta byed cing // de tshe gzugs la zhen med pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid// sangs rgyas mtshan nyid man
357a3(mdo sde): 'dod cing // sangs rgyas bye ba mchod byed la// 'dren kun mchod du 'jug byed pa// de phyir thabs shes bya ba yin// chos rnams rdul med rdul bral zhing // mkha' dang mnyam pas mnyam gyur la/ cho
357a4(mdo sde): 'ga' 'ang 'dzin par mi byed pa/ de ni shes rab pha rol phyin/ chos ni yongasu gzung ba'i phyir/ lus dang srog ni 'dir byed cing / 'jig rten kun gyis dben gyur pade ni thabs kyi sgo man
357a5(mdo sde): dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir// yang dag mtha' la rab gnas/ shing // de bzhin nyid las mi g.yobs// de ni shes rab sgo yin// gang gis chos nyid ci 'dri ba// sems can de
357a6(mdo sde): 'drar shes byed cing // de ltar rtogs par byed pa'i mtha'// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// chos kun 'chi 'pho yod min zhing // skye ba med par shes byed la/ mi 'gro rgyug par mi byed pa// de ni shes
357a7(mdo sde): rab pha rol phyin// sems can yongasu smin pa'i phyir// mkhas pa 'dod dang gzugs rnamasu// bsams bzhin du ni skye byed pa// de dag thabs kyi yon tan yin// dgon pa gnas rab gnas/ 
357a8(mdo sde): byed cing / nyon mongs med la rab gnas la/ bsam gtan rnam thar ston byed pa// de dag shes rab mtshan nyid yim grong dang yul 'khar rnamasu ni// song na stan gtam ston byed/ 
357b1(mdo sde): cing mi zad zhum pa yod min pa'i// mkhas pa thabs la mkhas pa yin// 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las// skrag cing 'du 'dzirten med la/ bdag nyid dul ning de gyur pa/ de ni shes rab pa
357b2(mdo sde): rol byin/ 'gro ba dag na 'das chen dang // tshogs dang 'du 'dzi ji snyed pa/ kun na snang ba de dag ni/ thabs kyi smras pa med pa yin// brten pa chags med spyod byed cing // yi ge don gnyer mi byed la
357b3(mdo sde): med nges don don gnyer ba/ de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// mangs pa chags pa thams cad ma/ snang zhing chos rnams ston byed pa// dkon mcho gsum gyi sngags brjod pa/ de ni thabs kyi pha rol phyin// 
357b4(mdo sde): mngon shes shes pa mkhas gyur cing // zhi zhing dul la zag pa med// bdag med bzhag pa yod min pa// de ni shes rab pa ral gyim// mngon shes dag la rnam 'phrul zhing // zhing rnams bye bar 'gro byed
357b5(mdo sde): la/ sangs rgyas bye ba mchod byed pa dreni thabs kyi mtshan nyid yin// phung po sgyu ma 'drar shes shing // nyon mongs dngos me da shes byas nas// de dag bdud bzhi ni gyur pa// de ni shes rab pa/ 
357b6(mdo sde): rab byin// bdud rnams thams cad sngon byed cing // bstan nas rgyal bar byed gyur la// de las sems can thar byed pa/ de ni thabs kyi sgo yin// stong nyid mtshan ma med pa dang / sman par byed pa yod/ 
357b7(mdo sde): minag rnam par sgrol ston byed pa/ de ni shes rab mtshan nyid yin// chags med sdang ba yod mim zhing // rmongs med shes pa'i spyod yul dang / blang med dor ba yod min pa// de ni shes mtshan nyid
357b8(mdo sde): yi sa ma pa kun gyi mchog ldan mim/ stong nyid rab tu sur gyur la / kun gyi pha ral sa mgru gram ma med 'gog pa'i mchad kyang yin/ lag med btub bam yin ga/ dang gnas pa/ 
358a1(mdo sde): ldan 'gyur zhing 'khor ba'i spyod yul de dag mi sems can kun gyi grog su 'gyur// bsod nams tshogs kyis mi ngoms pa'i/ mkhas pa thabs la mangs pa yin/ shes pa la/ 
358a2(mdo sde): la mkhas pa yi ma yan lag gnyis ldan lam de ni/ shes ldan byang chub sems dpa'i ste// des ni 'dren rnams nges par 'byung // thabs dang mi ldan shes rab kyi// ma byung 'byung bar 'gyur ba med// 
358a3(mdo sde): shes rab med pa'i thabs kyis ni// mkhas pa rab tu ni mi 'gyur// shes rab dang ni thabs shes pa// de nyid kun tu 'dres gyur cing // gnyi gzung du 'jug 'gyur na// de ni dam pa rtogs par 'gyur// 
358a4(mdo sde): gang dag bgrod pa 'dir 'gro ba/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rab bsngags shing // ye shes pha rol phyin gyur te// de ni chos rnams chos nyid// de dag sangs rgyas spyod yul gyi/ chos dbyings dbyer med dag sa
358a5(mdo sde): byed cing // sangs rgyas byang chub bla med pa'i// rdul med byang chub rtogs par 'gyur// lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smraso// 
358a6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal byang chub kyi yul gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lga'i bu byang chub kyi yul ni rang gi yul dben pa nyid yin// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi mtshan da
358a7(mdo sde): gang yin 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub ni rnam pa'i mtsham nyid nga// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi mtha' gang yem 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lci'i bu byang chub
358a8(mdo sde): kyi mtha' mi ston pa yi mo/ ldel bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi gnas gang yin// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi gnas ni chos thams cad kyi gnas yin no/ 
358b1(mdo sde): lho'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi sgo gang yin/ 'jams dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bu byang chub kyi sgo ni kun nas sgra ya no// lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal byang chub kyi rtsom pa gang yin/ 
358b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi sdom pa ni sems can thams cad bdag med pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub ji dang mnyam/ 'jam dpal dpal gyis
358b3(mdo sde): smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub ni chos thams cad mi skye ba dang mnyamo// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi bgrad pa gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi bgrod pa ni
358b4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa yin// byang chub kyi bgrod pa ni 'gro ba med par 'gro ba dang / rgyu ba med par 'gro ba yino// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub gang gi rgyu 'thun
358b5(mdo sde): pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lci'i bu byang chub ni sI/ nga rje chen po'i rgyu 'thun pa yi no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal snying rje chen po gang gi'i rgyu 'thun pa yin/ 'jom dpa'
358b6(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu snying rje chen po'i sems can thams cad rab tu thar par bya ba'i rgyu 'thun pa yin// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub ga las btsal bar bya/ 'jam dpal rgyas
358b7(mdo sde): smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rjesu rtogs pa las btsal bar bya'o// lha'i bus sbas pa 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams ga las btsam
358b8(mdo sde): bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu nyon mongs pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las btsal bar bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci 'phags pa'i la
359a1(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas sam 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa lha'i bu gal te 'phags pa'i lam gnyisu gyur pa zhig yin na ni/ 'phags pa'i lam nyan mangs pa/ 
359a2(mdo sde): rnams dang lhan cig gnas par yang 'gyur ba zhig ma lha'i bu 'phags pa'i lam ni gnyi su gyur pa med pa ste/ nyon mongs pa tshol ba gang yin pa de nyid 'phags pa'i lam yin// lha'i bus
359a3(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ lam gyis lam gyi bya ba byas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi'i tshe btsal na nyan mongs pa rnams mi rnyed cing 'khor ba yang ma rnyed lnga/ 
359a4(mdo sde): ngan las 'das pa yang mi rnyed pa de lta na/ lam gyis lam gyi bya ba byas pa yi no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i lam gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu
359a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' lam ni lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsag/ nyes dang / phyin ci log bzhi dang / sgrib pa lnga dang / dge ba'i phyogs kyi chos thad dad// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpas
359a6(mdo sde): ji las bsams te de skad smra/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can la sbyor ba yin pas/ sems can rnams kyang lta ba'i rnam pa dang / phyin ci log dang / 
359a7(mdo sde): sgrib pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams ma gtogs pa gzhan las btsal bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gang gis sems can rnams rab tu phye ba'i lta ba'i rnam
359a8(mdo sde): ba dang / phyin ci log dang / sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa de dag nyid tshol bar byed de/ de tshol bar byed pa ma sems can yang mi rnyed/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyang mi rnye // ma rnyed na sems can
359b1(mdo sde): yongasu smin par byas la skyo bar mi 'gyur te/ lha'i bu rnam grangs nges mnyon mongs pa tshol ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam yin la/ sems can tshol ba yang byang chub sems dpa'i kham mi/ 
359b2(mdo sde): phung po dang khams dang / skye mched dang / nyon mongs pa tshol ba yang byang chub sems dpa' lam yim/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal rnam par thar pa'i sgra gsum po dag byang chub sems
359b3(mdo sde): dpa'i lam ma yin nam/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid ni btsal bar mi nus la/ mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med yang btsal bar mi nus// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu de la
359b4(mdo sde): ni sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa 'jug par mi 'gyur la/ gang la sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa 'jug pa mi 'gyur ba de ni btsal bar mi nus pa'i phyir// lha'i bus
359b5(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal lam ji ltar mngon par rtog par bya/ 'jam dpal gyi smras pa/ lha'i bu yang dag pa'i/ lta ba gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i lta ba yang de dang mnyam
359b6(mdo sde): ba de ltar mngon par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni lam mngon par rtog pa yin// yang dag pa'i rtog pa gang dang mnyam/ log pa'i rtog pa yang de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag gang
359b7(mdo sde): dang mnyam pa log pa'i dag kyang de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i las kyi mtha' yang de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i 'chab
359b8(mdo sde): gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i 'tsho ba yang de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba gang dang mnyam pa/ log pa'i rtsol ba yang de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa gang
360a1(mdo sde): dang mnyam pa/ log pa'i dran pa yang de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin gang dang mnyam pa/ log pa'i ting 'dzin kyang de dang mnye ba de ltar mngon par
360a2(mdo sde): rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni lam mngon par rtogs pa yi mo// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal yang dag pa'i lta ba gang dang mnyam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu yang
360a3(mdo sde): dag pa'i lta ba dang / log pa'i lta ba ni stong pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid dang mnyam pa yi no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid dang dben pa nyid la tha dad du bya ba ci yod/ 'jam
360a4(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu mapa 'dang na mkha' la tha dad du bya ba ci yod/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal tha dad du byab chung zad kyang mdo// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de
360a5(mdo sde): bzhin du stong pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid la yang tha dad du bya ba chung zad kyang med// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dang/ la tha dad du bya ba gang las rab tu phye ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyi/ 
360a6(mdo sde): smras pa lha'i bu tha dad du bya ba ni mtshan ma dang / dmigs pa dang / 'du shes dang / spros pa las rab tu phye ba yin te/ mtshan ma dang / dmigs pa dang / 'du shes dang / spros pa gang yin pa de'i
360a7(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid rjesu rtogs pa gang yin pa de la ni tha dad du bya ba medo// lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen por ma zhugs pa'i chu la ni tha dad du bya ba yod kyi rgya mtsho chen por zhugs
360a8(mdo sde): ba'i tshul ni tha dad du bya ba med pa de bzhin du lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings yongasu ma shes pa la ni chos la tha dad du bya ba yod kyi/ chos kyi dbyings yongasu shes pa la ni chos la tha dad du bya/ 
360b1(mdo sde): ba me'o// lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal ci chos kyi dbyings yongasu shes par nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu chos dbyings ni yong su shes par mi nus// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu chos/ 
360b2(mdo sde): thams cad ni chos dbyingasu yang dag par 'du ba yin la/ chos kyi dbyings ni chos dbyings yongasu mi shes pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyingasu yang dag par 'du ba'i chos de dag la gnyi su med par
360b3(mdo sde): shes pa gang yin pa de ni yongasu shes pa zhes bya ste/ sems cig nas gcig tu brgyud pa nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i phyir// de ni yongasu shes pa zhes bya'o// gzhan gyi rnam par rig pa la gnas pa
360b4(mdo sde): phyir de ni yongasu shes pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ namapa' gzugs med pa'i snang ba la/ gzugs thams can/ srang yang / gzugs de dag ni rnam pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa de bzhin du
360b5(mdo sde): bu byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gis smras pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo mas/ chos thams cad mthong yang / chos de dgagi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kho na yin/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
360b6(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mgo smos pas go ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu mgo smos pas go ba'i rang gi lta bas/ sems can thams cad kyi lta ba spang ba'i phyir/ chos ston par
360b7(mdo sde): byed na'o// lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par spros pas go ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lci'i bu dben pa'i phyir bdag kyang gzhan du mi byed la/ bdag med
360b8(mdo sde): ba yang bzhan du mi byed nal 'jam dang 'ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi bkri ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chas 'ga' yang srid par mi byed / 
361a1(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas lhur len pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma/ 
361a2(mdo sde): med pa'i gnas las g.yo bar mi byed na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gis byang chub sems dpa' tshogs gsum po nges pa nyid dang / ma nges pa nyid dang / log pa nyid du nges pa'i
361a3(mdo sde): tshogs dag la sdang bar 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lci'i bu yod do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji lta bu yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub
361a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' nges pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la'o// ma nges pa ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la'o// log pa nyid du nges pa ni de las sems can bsgral bar bya ba la'o// lha'i
361a5(mdo sde): bus smras pa 'jam dpal gang gis byang chub sems dpa 'ami kham pa thob cing kham pa ma thob pa'i rnam grang sa yong dam/ 'jas dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bu long pa/ lha'i
361a6(mdo sde): bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'o na ci'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' mi khom pa thob pa rnams la snying rje chen po skyed par byed cing / sems can yong su smin par bya ba'i phyir// khom pa thob pa de
361a7(mdo sde): dag kyang yal bar 'jog par byed/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang rnam par grol ba'i tshogs de dag ni mi khom pa thob pa yin pas/ de la ni byang chub sems dpa' mi snang // lha'i
361a8(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod mi khom pa thob pa yin nam/ 'om te khom pa thob pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho ba ni khom pa thob pa yang ma yin/ me khom pa thob pa yang ma yin no// 
361b1(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni thob pa yang ma yin/ yang dag par thob pa yang ma yin// khom pa yang ma yin/ mi khom pa yang ma yin la khom
361b2(mdo sde): pa dang / mi kham pa la chags par yang mi byed pa'i phyiraro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis ni/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad tshar bcad// 'jam dpal gyis smras
361b3(mdo sde): pa lha'i bu 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ni phung po yong su shes pa yang med/ nyan mongs pa sel ba yang med/ bdud las yang dag par 'das pa yang med pa'i phyir// lha'i bus smras
361b4(mdo sde): pa 'jam dpal nye bar sbyar bas gzhan mu stegs can rnams pham par bya'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltara'adi la mu stegs thams cad kyi spyod pa'i phyi ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 
361b5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal chos kyi tog gtsug so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu snang ba med pa dang / mun pa med pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'dis ni chos kyi 'khor
361b6(mdo sde): rab tu bskor to// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu lta ba'i mtha' thams cad yongasu bcad pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos bstan pa 'dis chos kyi sdang ba ji snyed
361b7(mdo sde): cig byas// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag la sdang ba yang med la/ mun pa yang med pa de dag chos kyis snang bar byas so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can
361b8(mdo sde): gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni dkon no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di la su dag mos par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu
362a1(mdo sde): gang dag 'ching bas rnam par 'khrug par mi 'gyur ba rnamaso// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'ching bas rnam par 'khrug par mi 'gyur ba dag gang yin/ 'jam
362a2(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dgra 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa bsal ba'i sgo nas thar pa tshol bar mi byed pa dang / gang dag 'dod chags dang / 
362a3(mdo sde): zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par grol ba mnyam par 'gyur ba dag ste/ de dag gis ni 'ching ba ma dmigs pas rnam par 'brug par yang mi 'gyur
362a4(mdo sde): ba'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags lnga 'bum tsam gyis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas tshig 'di skad ces/ bdag cag gis kyang
362a5(mdo sde): ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / de bzhin ga/ shegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ sangs rgyas kyis chos 'di dag brnyes pa de bzhin du thob par
362a6(mdo sde): gyur cig ces kyang smraso// lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags 'bum lhag tsam ni chos thams cad la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// gnas
362a7(mdo sde): gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu drug khri ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu brgyad bri yang len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems
362a8(mdo sde): rnam par grol lo// srog chags dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen ma nyi khri yang len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par gro'o// byang chub sems dpa' sngon
362b1(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa bdun bri nyis stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyang dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yi rang ba dang / rab tu
362b2(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas ched du brjod pa'i da ched du brjod do// e ma ho kun nas yongs grol ba'i// dmigs med chos ni len par bshad/ 'jam dpal gzho nur
362b3(mdo sde): gyur pa yis// shin tu legs par bshad pa byas// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / namapa' lding dang / mi 'am ci
362b4(mdo sde): dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag gis lha dang mi'i mchod pa dag byas te/ steng gi bar snangar lus kyang lha'i me tog gi char dag kyang phag rin po che'i char
362b5(mdo sde): dag kyang phag gos kyi char dag kyang phag/ bdug spos kyi char dag dang / spos chu'i char dag dang phye ma'i chu ra dag kyang ba'o// lha'i bu rnams kyis steng gi bar snang bas
362b6(mdo sde): lha'i sil snyan brgya stong dag kyang rab tu bsil bar gyur to// dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang rang rang gi 'byor pa ci bdog pa dag gis
362b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa byas so// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang thal mo sbyar te tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das
362b8(mdo sde): gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad par mi bgyid pa de dag la ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba ma mchis lag so// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar bgyid pa de dag la ni rab
363a1(mdo sde): tu 'thung ba ma mchis lag so// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsgrubs te gnas par mi bgyid pa de dag la ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa ma mchis lag so// de dag la ni/ 
363a2(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i bsnyen par rdzogs pas bsnyen par rdzogs pa yang ma mchis lag so// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bgrod par mi mchi ba de dag la ni dge slong gi tshul ma mchis legs/ 
363a3(mdo sde): de dag la ni bram ze'i tshul yang ma mchis lag so// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la skrag par 'gyur ba de dag ni thob par yang ma mchis/ mngon par rtogs pa yang ma mchis lagaso/ 
363a4(mdo sde): gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'an par bgyid pa dang / thos nas kyang mos par bgyid pa dang / len par bgyid pa drang // kum chub par bgyid pa dang / 'dzin par 'gyid pa dang / klog
363a5(mdo sde): bar bgyid pa dang yi ger 'dri bar bgyid pa dang / snod 'tshal bar bgyid pa nas/ gzhan dag la yang ston par bgyid pa dang / skyo ba ma mchis pa'i yid kyis 'dom
363a6(mdo sde): bar bgyid pa dang / rjesu ston par bgyid pa dang / 'di la nam tan du sgrub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag kyang nan tan gyis sgrub du stsol bya dang / nyams par mi 'gyid pa de dag ni sem
363a7(mdo sde): can dam pa dang / sems can chen po dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrung ba dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang / gting rnyed pa dang / log par ltung ba'i rgyun bkum pa dang / 
363a8(mdo sde): ngan song dang ngam 'gro'i sgo bkum pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu zin pa dang / dge ba'i bshos gnyen rnams la shin tu gus pa dang / dge ba'i bshas gnyen rnams
363b1(mdo sde): la bgyis pa gan zhing bgyis pa tshor ba lags shing / de dag ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung
363b2(mdo sde): ba'i slad du zhugs pa lags te/ skyes bu dam pa de dag la ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba yang mchis lag so// de dag la ni chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba yang mchis lags// de dag
363b3(mdo sde): ni 'bras bu mchis pa dang / khom pa dang ldan pa lagaso zhes kyang gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag la leg so zhes bya ba byin nas/ 
363b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' khyams pa la bka' stsal pa khyams pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags nyi khri nyi stong ni chos rnams
363b5(mdo sde): chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog cha/ gas 'bum phrag brgyad ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las
363b6(mdo sde): sems rnam par grol lo// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / namapa' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang
363b7(mdo sde): dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma sa ya phrag gnyis kyis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'di na gnas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas 'dus pa'i byang chub
363b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' lnga 'bum gyis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa tha dad pa nyi stong tsam gyis ni gzungs sna tshogs so sor
364a1(mdo sde): thob par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'bum gyis mi gzungs dri ma med pa sa sor thob par gyur to// de dag las byang chub sems dpa' mang bdag byang chub sems/ 
364a2(mdo sde): dpa' khams pa khyod kyis byang chub thob pa'i dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur zhing mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu dag nod pa dang / ston pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog par yang 'gyur te/ de dag ni byams
364a3(mdo sde): pa khrod nyid kyis byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
364a4(mdo sde): bu ma gang dag mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas pa bgyi ba'i slad du/ glegs bam du bgyis te 'chang ba dang / tha na
364a5(mdo sde): lan 'ga' zhig nyar par 'gyid pa dang / rna lam du gra// gas par bgyid pa de dag bsod nams ji tsam skye/ byed par 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan
364a6(mdo sde): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongasu 'dri bar sems pa ni leg mo leg so byams de'i
364a7(mdo sde): phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// byams pa nan gyis dper na/ lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las lha 'am/ mi gang zhig gis sangs rgyas
364a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'khor gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang bcas pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig la bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bde ba'i yo byas thams cad kyis
364b1(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byas par gyur pa de bas ni/ gang gis mdo sde legs par gsungs pa 'di yi ger bris te 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / de bzhin nyid du bsgrub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la ston pa
364b2(mdo sde): byed pa de ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur te/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ring po mi thogs par byang chub kyi snying por nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// byam
364b3(mdo sde): pa nga ni gang dag gis mdo sde 'di thos nas spong bar mi byed cing / mod par byed pa dang / tha na glegs bam du 'dri bar byed pa de dag kyang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyir mi ldog pa nyid du lu
364b4(mdo sde): ston to khyams pa nga ni gang dag gis mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu 'di ni ming tsam thos pa de dag kyang 'bras bu yod par lung ston par byed na/ gang dag mos pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / 
364b5(mdo sde): klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang ston par byed bdag lta la smos kyang ci dgos/ gang dag mdo sde 'di yi ge/ ra 'dri ba dang / lung nod pa dang / kha don byed pa dang / klog pa dang / 
364b6(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu gtam 'dri bar byed pa dang / phebs par smra bar byed par 'gyur te/ de dag ni rtag tu sangs rgya
364b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bras par 'gyur zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' sems
364b8(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang de dag la ston par mdzad cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par yang 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
365a1(mdo sde): kun ga' bal bkang sul gsung dga' ba chos kyi rnamagrangs 'di thos pa ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra ba yir gyi gu dpa' gabyad kyis chas kyi nam grangs 'a thu
365a2(mdo sde): gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston cig kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ 'di'i ming ji skad bstan par bgyi lags/ 
365a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' ba chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/ lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jam dpal gyis bstan pa chos thams cad rnam par gtan la
365a4(mdo sde): dbab pa stan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig de nas 'khor de dag gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
365a5(mdo sde): cag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos bstan pa na dang du thos lags na ji ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir tu rnam par phye ste/ rgya cher bstan pa dang / de lta bu'i chos ni nam/ 
365a6(mdo sde): yang ma byung lag so// bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs la dga' ba 'di lta bu thab pa ni sngon ma myong lags te/ de lta lags pas bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das
365a7(mdo sde): nas kyang / skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams kyi slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ci nas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid ya 'gyur ba dang / sems can mos pa tha dad pa
365a8(mdo sde): rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa tha dad pas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / de dag bde 'gror mchi bar bgyi bar/ bcom ldan 'das
365b1(mdo sde): kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par byin gyis rlab du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi po de dag gis gsal ba btab par thugs su chud nas phyogs bcur rnam
365b2(mdo sde): par gzigs so// bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sa gzhi chen po rnam
365b3(mdo sde): pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur cing / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyang dga' ba
365b4(mdo sde): dang mgu ba dang / yid rangs pa dang / spro ba dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ ci nas kyang phyi ma'i dus na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nub par mi 'gyur bar byin gyis
365b5(mdo sde): brlab par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byangachub sems dpa' sems can la dga' ba rnam sa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la lha'i mchod pa dag byas shing
365b6(mdo sde): steng gi bar snang la me tog gi char dag kyang rab tu phab/ lha'i sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs dag kyang rab tu gsil cing blangs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
365b7(mdo sde): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la 'di skad ces nga dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis rlabs so zhes go bar yang mdzad do// de nas
365b8(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dga' ba dang / mgub dang / yid rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba
